story:
During the polo silk scarves campaign many people asked if we could make fashion face masks with polo images. 

So we decided to produce an exclusive design, which is available for pre-sale only for a week, from 2nd to 9th July!

Our face masks are produced in Italy on the same premises as the scarves, and the stock will arrive in September. 

One size with rubber straps, stock of only 100 units.   

Shipping of 1 or 2 masks in the EU, UK and Switzerland at 9 USD, rest of the world at 20 USD.  

Shipping set scarf + mask in the EU, UK, Switzerland, USA is free and rest of the world at 15 USD. 

For further details, please write to km@katerinamorgan.shop

 

It´s a new way of bringing a luxury image of horse polo to everyday life. Delicate and elegant silk scarves as perfect match to horse polo lovers at any kinds of events, such as, friend’s gatherings, work and travelling.  

It is also an idea to introduce an original and modern image to decorate your home. Emotional and amazing objects designed and created to connect you with the sport of the Kings.   

Katerina Morgan is the first ever conceived fashion brand creating its own designs based on truthful and original pictures of real TOP polo players, unique star people, worldwide. Every piece tells its awesome story. 

Exclusive items meant to be your future favorite to wear day by day during the years, thanks to excellent manufacture and outstanding quality of the silk used. Scarves produced in an Italian factory specialized in luxurious goods for recognized brands worldwide. Edges of each scarf are hand rolled. Katerina Morgan is an exceptional and authentic brand.   

 

 

Polo Lifestyles June 2020

Polo Lifestyles is a monthly, modern luxury publication curated around the jet-set and glamorous world of professional polo.

A magazine created for people who are passionate about experiencing their Polo and its lifestyle. LA POLO places Polo and bespoke luxury in the context of culture and the world we live in, always leading readers to what will happen next. Thought-provoking, relevant and always influential, LA POLO redefines the “sport of the Kings”.

Pololine June 2020

Pololine - The best media outlet, covering the best polo around the world everyday.

TRY mundial July 2020

 

Katerina Morgan fashion brand story began last year. Creator and founder Katerina Morgan is a successful polo photographer with ten years of experience. Among her clients there are royal family members, famous people, and polo players from different countries, e.g. Argentina, Brunei, Canada, France, Spain, Thailand, USA, UK.   

Katerina Morgan started her fashion brand by experiencing with the polo players pictures she had taken around the world, looking for creative ideas to do something brand-new and interesting. She had, then, the idea to design and produce silk scarves to facilitate people to come closer with this elegant and amazing sport.   

Horse polo is a fascinating human activity with a great history, and the combination of horse and player is esthetically unique and beautiful, dynamic and strong, really Kings of the sport. Both polo history and such appealing image make a perfect match to be printed in silk, and chic, classy accessories. A great complement of a sophisticated outfit for every occasion.   

 

You can choose your favorite scarf from our thirty-scarf collection, which has ten designs with three color combinations.  By matching designs and colors you can create different chic outfits for a classy lifestyle. And scarves are the easiest way to upgrade your wardrobe day by day. 

 

Everything began with this picture, taken in Spain with Pablo Mac Donough, a top Argentinian polo player. This image, replicated in a modern and elegant pattern, conveys a spirit of strength, balance and harmony. 

 

Pablo Mac Donough is an Argentinian highest ranked polo player worldwide, a fine 10 goal polo player. Winner of the most important championships in the world, he is also the founder of the polo horse breeding company called La Irenita, with a history of obtaining several awards on best polo ponies worldwide. 

Katerina Morgan and Pablo Mac Donough and his wife, Mercedes. Sotogrande, Spain.

 

Pablo “Polito” Pieres, also a fine 10 goal polo player, is a member of one of the most famous Argentinian polo families, and a multiple champion of the most disputed polo world cups. 

Polito Pieres and Katerina Morgan. Sotogrande, Spain

This design is inspired on two of the finest and best polo players worldwide under the same name, Pablo Mac Donough and Pablo Pieres (both of them 10 goal polo players). They have never played in the same team, always against each other. This rivalry is shown by this design.

Katerina Morgan with Pablo Pieres and Pablo Mac Donough. Sotogrande, Spain

Dedicated to Argentinian high goal polo player Ignacio “Cubi” Toccalino, who participated on the most prestigious world polo cups. 

Katerina Morgan with Ignacio Toccalino and his wife. Buenos Aires, Argentina.

Clemente Zavaleta is a professional polo player from one of the most well-known Argentinian polo families, taking part of high goal polo teams in Argentina, and French Saint Mesme polo team, one of the oldest and most prestigious polo clubs near Paris. 

Katerina Morgan with Clemente Zavaleta and his wife, Isabelle Strom and her family. Paris, France

 

Limited collection includes only 107 scarves of different colors. You get a certificate bearing your name and the scarf number. 

Simpor is the name of Brunei Darussalam national flower, and leitmotif of this scarf. It is actually the first silk scarf ever conceived in the history of fashion dedicated to ladies´ polo! This design is dedicated to an exceptional woman, the only woman in Brunei who plays polo, Her Highness Princess Azemah.

Her Highness Princess Azemah and Katerina Morgan. Sotogrande, Spain

This scarf is dedicated to Adolfo Cambiaso, a true legendary polo player with a long professional record, a superstar and symbol of Argentinian and worldwide polo. He has won countless awards as the best polo player worldwide and has been winner of important world cups. He is also a horse breeder with many best polo ponies awards. 

Adolfo Cambiaso and Katerina Morgan. Adolfo Cambiaso and his wife, Maria Vazquez.  Buenos Aires, Argentina.

Maria Vazquez wearing blue and green silk scarf.

 

Unfortunately Indiegogo page not permit to create gallery with high quality images. 
So we made our page and high quality images of scarves you can see here. 

 

For further outfit ideas and ways of wearing and tying your silk scarf, you will receive a Style Guideline every week in your email address. 

 

We have created the first collection with the idea of matching different designs and putting them together to make decoration pieces. 1, 2 or 3 scarves may be hanged together. 

 

 

The manufacture process is handcrafted, when scarves are screen printed,  but it is computerized when scarves are digitally printed.  However, most of the work, in both cases, is carried out by hand by professionals with years of experience in the field. 

When the factory receives the file with the design, layers are separated by color. A special printing frame, called screen, is prepared for each color. Depending on the amount of colors we would use, there may be 3, 7, 12 or more different printing frames for each scarf of course for screen printing technique.  Dyes are then prepared by hand using Pantone palette and mixing chemical products authorized by applicable rules and regulations. 

Screen printing is done  on  special long table where fabrics are stretched, and two people move the printing frames  by  carefully  introducing  dye by dye of each scarf.  Quality control is ensured in every step and, in case  of  failure, the whole process is  started over. 

For digital printing, the company receives the files, separates them into different channels, one for each color, and conveys them to the machine specifying the recipe chosen for each color. In this case all colors are printed in one step. 

After screen or digital printing, the fabric is taken to the steaming process step so that the colors are fixed onto the fabric.  After steaming, the fabric roll is washed, controlled and treated with final manufacturing details and, then, ironed, in order to confer the desired hand feeling and size to the fabric. After a further inspection the meters are cut and hemmed by hand.  So that the resulting scarf is a unique and perfect piece. 

 

 

Proud to produce in the EU, we support Italian artisans and craft art. We use only natural materials (silk 100%) and believe in fashion based on environmental sustainability. 

Buy less, choose well, wear high quality garments and wear your silk scarf for many years is our philosophy. And If you get bored of wearing your silk scarf, you can decorate your home with it.   

For packaging we use paper boxes, please do not discard the box. Keep your chic and delicate silk scarf inside the box to extend its life in great conditions. Avoid throwing so much trash to help environment keep clean. 

 

 

These difficult times we are living have seriously affected clothing brands and manufacturers. We are looking for an extraordinary launching idea and, thus, we have decided to run the company on Crowdfunding platform. 

We are confident about the future, and we would like to expand our production. Our main goal is to make our product available to the public, and promote horse polo in the world. We wish to increase our production capacity and create new and exclusive products.

By being very responsive to any issues that may arise, we guarantee real support to our backers. We will get in touch with you to answer any questions you may have and, in case of any unforeseen delay, we will notify backers immediately. In any case, be sure you will receive your order, timely and in a good shape, and get proper support. 

Pictures of the scaves were taken from first made samples; final products may have minor variations like a smaller logo or color tone adjustment.

Thank you. 

 

Free shipping to UE, UK and USA - Rest of the world US$ 15 

Domestic Shipping - To EU 27 Countries: 

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden. 

Backers with a shipping address in any of these 27 countries will NOT have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT. We've got that covered! 

International Shipping - Rest of the World: 

Backers from all other countries (apart from the 27 countries listed above) may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to pertinent authorities upon receiving their goods - depending on import policies of respective countries. Duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may check it out with customs and border protection authorities of your country.   

 

https://www.instagram.com/katerinamorgan.shop

https://www.facebook.com/KaterinaMorgan.shop

https://www.pinterest.es/katerinamorgan_shop

https://katerinamorgan.shop

story:
At LIVINGWEAR, We believe Quality Consumer Goods should be made available to everyone. Especially our Essentials and Wear products. 

BUT we couldn't find a perfect balance in the market. Premium Brands were exorbitantly priced & mass market brands that were inferior in quality and craftsmanship.

We wanted to create an alternative that was way better than the current market status quo. So, Here's what we did & reinvented: 

So that's why we are happy and excited to introduce:

Meet UltraSkin™, our first collection that is made using the latest Lyocell Nanotechnology which makes it insanely comfortable, soft , thermoregulating & hypoallergenic. Certified to be free of any harmful chemicals.

From working indoors to staying outdoors & for all stages in life, we got you covered.

* Secret Perk Unlocked if you subscribe to us on our Website HERE! Also, know more about us and our story! 

Find out about our 3 Key Releases:

 

Note: For our Smart Undershirt, We removed the Shoulder Logo and shifted it to the Bottom hem of the Undershirt. For our Collar, we no longer have the Crew neck Version but a more Versatile High V Neck Version which suits 2 types of style(You can see it below)!

 

 

 

DO TAKE NOTE THAT ALL PRICES SHOWN ARE IN SGD ( SINGAPORE DOLLARS) We have converted it the USD for Indiegogo's Pre-Orders. Prices are shown on Perks >>>

Tax & duties: All our shipments are shipped DAP & declared that 1 Piece is S$3. So if you have a 8 Piece Bundle, that's S$24!

Do take note of the small additional taxes and duties that might be charged accordingly depending on where you live. 

You can use this Import Calculator to help you calculate your costs. We are located in Singapore!

T&C for returns: 

All products must be send back with their original packaging with all tags and labels.   
We will be issuing Store Credits for the Returns & Exchanges cost. (Eventually rolling Cash refunds out for them!)

 

We believe the profits are important as well, to keep our business going and be able to make a big impact in the long run. But with the way we see it, Being Customer-First Driven & centric will enable us to do so. We got absolutely no doubt that,if we are the best company with the best products that truly cares and delivers a stellar experience for you, that we will be profitable and last in the long run!

 

At LivingWear, we take our sustainability efforts seriously and with pride. That’s why Sustainability is proudly part of our Values. We aim to be a company that our community and customers are proud to be a part of. We incorporate and consider sustainability and how it fits into our entire supply chain, model, design and more. We will continue to look at it and grow it alongside with the company. It’s our commitment to keep improving as we grow and live alongside you. 

Our Steps at Sustainability at this point:  

For our Production:

Clothing Production is done by our partner factories in Indonesia & China, with all offices being in the region, which reduces our global footprint of delivery and shipping. 

Our fulfillment partner storage space is in Singapore alongside our office. 

Our Products:  

Our Fulfilment packaging is made from 100% recycled card-box, which is fully biodegradable & recyclable again. No excess was planned in our Packaging and Fulfilment to the best that we can.

Our UltraSkin collection features only Tencel™, purchased from Lenzing, which has a much lower environmental impact compared to Cotton. We don't use generic version of Lyocell or Modal as their quality is lower and their production is uncontrolled. Branded Tencel™ has been given a A+ grade by trustedclothes.com (See our FAQ for more info on Tencel) 

 

After searching and engineering our amazing fabric, we went on a search for like-minded partners to be part of our supply chain. We are glad that after searching for them in our region, we managed to partner with 2 amazing factories that share the same values with us.  

Our Zhongshan, China Partner Factory – Cut & Sew our Modern Underwear & Smart Undershirt

Our Bali Partner factory – Cut & Sew our Luxe Fitted Tees.  

Our UltraSkin fabric is sourced from one of the top fabric mills in China and in Java, which only uses Lyocell® & Modal®bought from Lenzing™. 

Know who made your clothes.

Click HERE to see our Factory Facts!

 

Congrats on reading through all of this! 

If you still have any questions or burning inquiries, email me directly at desmondpheh@livingwearco.com, message us on Instagram or Facebook or drop a comment on Kickstarter or Indiegogo. The Team and I will get back to you ASAP. 

With all the love and gratitude, 

 The Team @ TLWCo. | team@livingwearco.com  

 

Risks and challenges

We want to be honest with all of you. This is our first Kickstarter.

Everything is being handled as beautifully to the best we can from production, sourcing, fulfilments, customer service, exchanges & tracking. Our partner factories and mills are ready to manufacture the items once we end our Campaign. 
You will be well taken care of without a doubt. 
Like all great movements, there might be some unforeseen minor kinks and pivots but we will get through them.

We are very confident that we will start shipping out by April and you will receive all your products by May however we cannot predict everything. We already calculated for extra production time due to holidays and other delays.

No Matter what, we promise to deliver and get all items to you and will be here for our community throughout!

If there are any shipping delays, do let us know and we will try our best to make things right! Because we really care.

In all cases, we will make sure you receive your products and give you updates as regularly as we can through email & Kickstarter, and we’ll get it through together. We promise.

This is our first Kickstarter.Everything is being handled as beautifully to the best we can from production, sourcing, fulfilments, customer service, exchanges & tracking. Our partner factories and mills are ready to manufacture the items once we end our Campaign. You will be well taken care of without a doubt. Like all great movements, there might be some unforeseen minor kinks and pivots but we will get through them.We are very confident that we will start shipping out by April and you will receive all your products by May however we cannot predict everything. We already calculated for extra production time due to holidays and other delays.No Matter what, we promise to deliver and get all items to you and will be here for our community throughout!If there are any shipping delays, do let us know and we will try our best to make things right! Because we really care.In all cases, we will make sure you receive your products and give you updates as regularly as we can through email & Kickstarter, and we’ll get it through together. We promise.

story:
Who we are?


Factoria Rent Me  is the young fashion designer Carolina Diez-Cascón (1985) and it was founded in Barcelona in 2008.

Factoria´s philosophy is to join fashion with the art, derived from the idea that fashion has the aptitude to create sensations just as art does.

For this reason the Factoria´s collections has collaborated with artists like Tom Sanford and at the same time Factoria has developed parallel artist projects demonstrating the fusion of fashion and art.


We need your help


Factoria is trying to enter in the fashion market but being a young brand is not always easy
.
The last collection, fall 2011/12 was presented during the London Fashion week but it could not be possible to produce it without your help.

Do you believe in art and fashion? then you should believe in young designers!

If you become a Factoria Rent Me supporter brand, you´ll join our brand, being part of Factoria fashion and art projects. Your name will be always placed in our website as a sponsor and of course you will have special and interesting discounts in our collections.

Factoria also believes and supports new art talents. We make limited editions in collaboration with emergent artists.

Be a Factoria sponsor and become also a young artists promoter!

We would apreciate so much your help. We would be delighted to share with you our love for art and fashion.

The collection


This limited-edition collection ("I have lived for love, I have lived for art", fall 11/12) springs from the collaboration with the Italian artist Elena Monzo.

Elena Monzo, established artist represented internationally by Bonelli Contemporary Gallery, joins the discourse of Factoria Rent Me for this new season.

"Just kids", the Best Seller by Patti Smith, is the main source of inspiration for this collection.

The book speaks about the love affair between Robert Mapplethorpe and Patti Smith, in a time where idealism and the love of art was a way to live and feel. A young innocent, pure vision faced with changes of time; sexual freedoms, religions and sects, and political disagreements...

Robert is the key to this collection. A young man who has doubts about his sexuality, struggling to come to terms with his religion and the internal demons which tormented him. Robert finds release through artistic expression to become one of the world’s most renowned photographers. Mapplethorpe’s now well know crazy necklaces, crucifixes, and rabbit paw charms, color the collection for this new season. The photographers work can be seen through the collection’s feminine style, evoking his idealistic spirit that art can spring from love.

In order to bring across this concept, Elena Monzo has offered two of her paintings, creating a clothe-art piece, a statement of femininity, freedom, fresh energy in the effort to feel how art was felt years ago.

Once more, Factoria Rent Me meets art, but this time to talk about love.


Thanks

Thanks so much for help and believe in new talents.
