story:
Fashion Passes, but Style is forever –Coco Chanel

Is the motto we live by……

Who are we, you ask??

We are Chic Boutique, a high end women clothing store that is set to launch within the coming year. My name is Brandy Flint and I am the owner. It has been my dream since I was a little girl to open up my own boutique and now it seems that my dreams are finally coming to light. I have been working as a fashion stylist in Chicago/L.A for the past 7 years, and have been involved in just about all aspects of the fashion industry at some point in my life. Now I am ready to take my career to the next level by opening my own boutique.

What We Need to Succeed…..

We have the blueprint, now all we need is the funding to help jump start this project.

We need to raise funds in the amount of at least $10,000. We have found a retail space in a very desirable location and are now ready to move forward with prepping for the launch of the online store. 

The $10,000 is broken down as follows:

  • $7500 for Inventory (clothing, shoes, handbags, jewelry)  
  • $2500 for online store set-up & design (projected to be up & running by Dec 15, 2012).

Any amount over the $10,000 will go toward marketing materials and more inventory. If for some reason we do not reach our goal of $10,000 all funds will go toward the set up and Design of the online store in anticipation for the Grand Opening of the flagship store.

What You Get for Your Contributions…..

Everyone who contributes will receive an exclusive "Team Chic Boutique" tote bag, your name on our Twitter “Wall of Fame”, frequent updates on how the progress of the store is coming along and a personalize thank you card signed by me.

If you contribute at least $50, you will receive the above perk, plus a one of a kind Chic Boutique cosmetic case with a Viva Glam lip gloss included. 100% of the Viva Glam perk goes toward helping women, men and children living with and affected by HIV and AIDS.

Other awesome perks include:

  • $500 gift card to shop in the store or online.
  • A pair of Tory Burch Shoes, Current Elliot Jeans or Christian Dior Sunglasses.
  • A CHANEL perfume gift set.
  • V.I.P. Invite to the Grand Opening.

All perks are items that will be sold at Chic boutique. Items will be delivered by December 10, 2012, just in time for Christmas. So you can always give the perk that you receive to someone special as a Christmas gift.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute financially, but still want to help?? No worries, here are some ways you can help us reach our goal:

  • Share this campaign in your social media networks. Tweet it! Share it! Talk about it!  Just click any of the tabs below the video to share a link to our campaign.
  • Email this Campaign to your most fashionable friends, family, co-workers, etc. so they can enjoy some of these amazing perks.
  • Like/Follow us on Facebook and Twitter so that we can keep all of our fans updated on the latest with Chic Boutique. Just click our social networking links below to stay in touch.

Your Impact

Every dollar that you contribute or email you forward will help with the opening of the store. All money will go toward something concerning the startup of the store. Whether it is the online store or the physical store every single dollar is needed and will be used accordingly.

Your time and effort in helping us reach our goal is much appreciated and will be generously rewarded.

Thanking everyone in advance for their support!

XOXO-BRANDY!

story:
OUR MISSION

To create an online boutique selling the best ethical brands from around the world. Style that is socially conscious and sensitive to the environment around us.

Based on belief that fashion can bring about positive change, Gather&See is driven by debonair design and defined by values that protect and promote local people, the environment and original craftsmanship.

But we can't do it all by ourselves. Launching in Spring 2014, we are asking for your help in raising £20,000. These funds will be used to secure and source these unique products. In return there's an exclusive collection of beautiful gifts and a supporters’ discount that gives you the best of Gather&See for less.

Above all, your kind investment will initiate positive change within the world of fashion, by promoting better working conditions and fostering age-old indigenous values — all while helping you look good in the process.

Join the movement. Let's bring some serious style to ethical fashion!

HOW?

Our brands are:

+ People-friendly

By embracing Fair Trade values, each brand trains, supports and pays a living wage to its workers.

+ Environmentally friendly

Brands that are conscious of how the products we sell affect people and the world around us.

+ A pioneer of artisan craftsmanship

Labels with practices dedicated to small-scale production and the preservation of skill over generations.

If you too share these values and want to support the local communities behind the clothes & accessories that you love to wear, Gather&See is here to help you do it.

WHERE the money raised you help raise for IndieGoGo will go...

35% = product acquisition
30% = website production
20% = marketing & communications
20% = logistics
5% = misc. costs

WHO?

We are Stephanie Hogg and Alicia Taylor. Friends since teenagers, we've spent years soaking up sights, sounds and styles stretching as far as Africa and beyond. Our love for fashion and appreciation of design is the sum of many happy hours trawling through local markets, vintage shops and journeying online for unique trinkets from all over the globe. 

Along our path, we've encountered the most amazing artisan handwork in existence. Produced within impoverished parts of the planet, worlds away from industrial supply chains and methods of mass production. Incorporating the most intricate methods of craftsmanship, using only basic tools and in return for very low wages, these environments are what inspire us most. 

We decided indigenous quality and moral business values did not have to be mutually exclusive. Supported by Stephanie's ethical fashion label, NearFar based in Sierra Leone, and Alicia's PR experience in the luxury retail business, we are proud to present Gather&See.


(Anne Gorke- one of brands!)


WHAT your investment will entitle you to…


£10 = A Gather&See Thank You

Each and every contributor will see his or her name in lights. Listed on the Gather&See website, immortalised on the worldwide web forever.


£30 = Six Limited Edition Postcards

The perfect stocking filler! Exclusively designed for Gather&See by London artist Frances Hogg, this evocative postcard series reflects on her travels throughout India.


£45 = Gather&See Membership & Bag

As if a yearlong membership allowing you Free Standard Delivery and 10% off all online orders isn’t enough, we’ll throw in a useful organic Fair Trade bag made from cotton. The ultimate shopping companion.


£70 = Gather&See Membership & Albion Wash Bag

On top of 10% off all online orders and Free Standard Delivery’ entitled to all members, we have an Albion wash bag to give away. Created on the streets of Rio by woman living in favelas, Albion is a accessories brand dedicated to the empowerment of underprivileged women.


£100 = Salone Style Necklace

Receive an exquisite one of a kind necklace made exclusively for Gather&See by jewellers that provide sustainable employment to women in Sierra Leone, plus Premium Gather&See Membership (Free Standard Delivery and 10% off for on year).

£120 = NearFar Goodies

Made using traditional West African fabrics by tailors in Sierra Leone, NearFar present this ideal festive gift of stylish cushions, make-up bag and bunting.  This collection also comes with Premium Membership to Gather&See (Free Standard Delivery and 10% off for on year). Each item is made from surplus fabric, so no-one piece is the same. 


£200 = Albion Clutch Bag

Inspired by the facades of Copacabana’s art deco heyday, this Albion clutch bag designed in Rio is stunning so get your hands on it fast! Gather&See Premium Membership is also included (Free Standard Delivery and 10% off for on year).


£500 = Style It Up with Gather&See

Take part in one of our editorial shoots. Model your new Salone Style Necklace, NearFar Christmas stocking and Gather&See tote bag and feature as part of Real Gather&See Girls online.


£1000 = Milly Swire Pendant

Created by British luxury jeweller, Milly Swire, and made from recycled silver, this pendant is a beautiful one off piece. Each pendant comes with the tote bag, NearFar cushions, Albion wash bag and Gather&See Premium Membership (Free Standard Delivery and 10% off for on year).  NB - the necklace may vary slightly from that shown

story:
THE PASSWORD FOR THE VIDEO IS indiegogopreview (all lower case, all one word)

Error Guided Designs 

Error Guided Designs is the product of the trials and errors I have faced attempting to break into the fashion world. The goal has been, and will be, to make changes in the way this industry works by turning that which would normally be rejected into unique, personalized, items of practical beauty. Many of my most creative designs have come from situations where I was fighting against the norm, where I made a mistake, but all of these challenges have provided for the creation of things far more inspiring than that from which they came.


Our Story 

I've always had dreams of becoming a fashion designer. I worked hard to pursue this dream but found few role models who seemed to care about the art or creativity involved. Most seemed only interested in the profit to be had. I was becoming disillusioned and exhausted at fighting against the norm and was thinking that, perhaps, it was time to give up. Living with my mom and with no steady job (only odd jobs unrelated to fashion) finding motivation was a constant challenge.

 

Then, one evening, my mom informed me that we would be having a young man over as our CouchSurfing guest and this was when things began to change.

 

I walked through the door that evening and found the most easy going, inspirational man I had ever met. Every night we ended up talking late with each other and I learned he was following his dream to become a filmmaker through IndieGoGo (see Glide's campaign here: http://www.indiegogo.com/Writing-Acting-Love-2nd-Round-of-Funding ). He encouraged me not to give up on my dreams and this re-awakened a passion to produce the one of kind fashion designs that had always driven me.

 

As the friendship grew and evolved into romance, so did my desire to prove to myself, and to the world, that dreams do come true: that passion, love, and persistence can make anything possible.

 

Now, embarking on an adventure in Malta, I am pursuing my dream to design couture garments from re-used materials.

 

I am currently seeking funding to hire similarly ambitious creative people to join my venture, and to source materials and afford operations to create my first online fashion boutique - bringing re-designed clothing to the fashion cognoscenti. If you want to express yourself outwardly through what you wear while also appreciating art and creativity, Error Guided Designs can do that for you with customized clothing. 

 

The Impact

Error Guided Designs re-purposes what already exists instead of generating harmful waste such as through the creation of brand new material. We source all kinds of discarded clothes and materials and then re-interpret and re-design them to form couture clothing, all to specification and in collaboration with our buyers. This reduces the negative impact on the environment that clothing manufacture can have. 

 

Error Guided Designs is also all about empowering local communities and businesses. I would like to give a chance to as many talented local artists as possible. I have met many amazing artists throughout the years that have not gotten the chance or acknowledgement they deserve, I want to change that. Where ever I find a talented artist I will work with them to bring their vision and art in to light. If this is not possible for any reason then I would like to promote their talent in any other way that I can.

 

If this campaign doesn't happen a lot is at stake. Having sold pretty much everything I own to dive full on into pursuing this fashion dream it's a do or die moment for myself and the people that have known me. There is no safety net here - only a leap of faith in the power of community support to lift up a young entrepreneur to achieve success and who, in return, will provide color, and vibrancy, through creativity and art, in a way that will revitalize the fashion industry - moving away from a focus on profit, to a focus on sustainability and personal expression.

 

What We Need & What You Get 

Here is an estimate of start up costs:
 
$100,000 - Materials: although bulk of the materials are re-used they are not free. Also there will be materials that can not be bought used, e.g. thread, oil for machines, labels, packaging, office supplies etc (though we will partner with companies that use recycled products for these supplies when we can and as we find out about them).
 
$100,000 - Labor: The amazing people that I will hire to work for me have to be paid livable wages. The core team for a supply location would include: a seamstress, a graphic designer, an office assistant, and a pattern maker, to name a few (there might be others involved as budget and logistics allow)
 
$100,000 - Equipment: Sewing Machines, Dress forms, Overlock machines, computers, clothing racks, mannequins, irons, steamers,etc.
 
$50,000 - Legal / Payroll: incorporation, workers comp and liability insurance, employer / employee tax / licensing costs, and any other legal fees.
 
$50,000 - PR: Marketing, events, advertisements, etc.
 
$40,000 - Living: Since this is going to be consuming all my time and energy it will also be my sole source of income and therefore I will be taking aprox 10% of funding to provide a living for myself while I pursue my goal.
 
As for what you get - see the perks detailed on the side. To email me about the existing perks, or to inquire about donating amounts not listed or to suggest alternate perks go to http://www.indiegogo.com/Amanda-Frenz and click on the "Send a Private Comment" button in the bottom right corner of the page. You can make a donation of any size and which is unrelated to the perks on offer. If you donate without using one of the suggested perks on this page, and did not contact me prior to doing so, I will have to assume your donation was done without expectation for something in return and thus if any perks are provided to you at all, they will be entirely at my discretion. For those that donated for specified perks I will follow up with you to gain or provide information necessary to fulfill them, so please ensure you provide contact information that you regularly check so I can get in touch with you.
 
As a rough guide on expectations of the use of money donated, assume aprox. 10% of what is donated will go toward personal expenses, aprox. 20% will go toward perk fulfillment costs, and the rest will go toward funding my company's start up costs (which will be calculated in more depth once it's clear what the actual total amount raised will be). If funds fall short of the ideal funding goal a new round of fundraising, or reliance on non-indiegogo funding, will have to be explored depending on what the shortfall is and what can and can't be done with the money that does get raised.

Other Ways You Can Help 

Spread the word, if you like what you see, if you want to work with us, if you think it is awful, please tell everyone you know, contact us and let us know, blog, tweet, facebook about it. Thank You
story_txt:
THE PASSWORD FOR THE VIDEO IS indiegogopreview (all lower case, all one word)
Error Guided Designs 
Error Guided Designs is the product of the trials and errors I have faced attempting to break into the fashion world. The goal has been, and will be, to make changes in the way this industry works by turning that which would normally be rejected into unique, personalized, items of practical beauty. Many of my most creative designs have come from situations where I was fighting against the norm, where I made a mistake, but all of these challenges have provided for the creation of things far more inspiring than that from which they came.

Our Story 
I've always had dreams of becoming a fashion designer. I worked hard to pursue this dream but found few role models who seemed to care about the art or creativity involved. Most seemed only interested in the profit to be had. I was becoming disillusioned and exhausted at fighting against the norm and was thinking that, perhaps, it was time to give up. Living with my mom and with no steady job (only odd jobs unrelated to fashion) finding motivation was a constant challenge.
 
Then, one evening, my mom informed me that we would be having a young man over as our CouchSurfing guest and this was when things began to change.
 
I walked through the door that evening and found the most easy going, inspirational man I had ever met. Every night we ended up talking late with each other and I learned he was following his dream to become a filmmaker through IndieGoGo (see Glide's campaign here: http://www.indiegogo.com/Writing-Acting-Love-2nd-Round-of-Funding ). He encouraged me not to give up on my dreams and this re-awakened a passion to produce the one of kind fashion designs that had always driven me.
 

As the friendship grew and evolved into romance, so did my desire to prove to myself, and to the world, that dreams do come true: that passion, love, and persistence can make anything possible.

If this is not possible for any reason then I would like to promote their talent in any other way that I can.

 
If this campaign doesn't happen a lot is at stake. $100,000 - Materials: although bulk of the materials are re-used they are not free. Also there will be materials that can not be bought used, e.g. thread, oil for machines, labels, packaging, office supplies etc (though we will partner with companies that use recycled products for these supplies when we can and as we find out about them).
 
$100,000 - Labor: The amazing people that I will hire to work for me have to be paid livable wages. The core team for a supply location would include: a seamstress, a graphic designer, an office assistant, and a pattern maker, to name a few (there might be others involved as budget and logistics allow)
 
$100,000 - Equipment: Sewing Machines, Dress forms, Overlock machines, computers, clothing racks, mannequins, irons, steamers,etc.

To email me about the existing perks, or to inquire about donating amounts not listed or to suggest alternate perks go to http://www.indiegogo.com/Amanda-Frenz and click on the "Send a Private Comment" button in the bottom right corner of the page. You can make a donation of any size and which is unrelated to the perks on offer. story:
AUTHENTIC BLOCC PACKAGING

Our patented design comes in the following packaging.

 

 

 

 

 

SIZE

Blocc comes in two sizes: Medium and Large. The width for both sizes are identical. It is based on that of 3M’s protective eyewear, which provides a universal fit for adults.

The 3D models below are based on the dimensions of the average adult male and female head. The female model on the left is wearing the medium size and the male model on the right is wearing the large size.

 

WHICH SIZE SHOULD I CHOOSE?

1. Measure the length between the center point of your eyebrows and the tip of your chin.
2. Compare your measurement with the lengths shown on the 3D models below.
* We recommend the large size for men and medium size for women.

 

 

ITERATIONS

We devoted all our time and effort developing Blocc over the past four months. Thanks to 3D-printing, we were able to create a number of prototype iterations, conduct extensive product testing, and refine every aspect of the design to ensure comfort, style, and functionality.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

HELP US SPREAD THE WORD!

We need your help to spread the word about Blocc. Feel free to use the materials in our press kit. Every post, share, and pledge counts!

 

 

OUR STORY: HOW BLOCC BEGAN

As a team of three young men from South Korea, we conceived the idea of Blocc in the early stages of the pandemic as we noticed how often pedestrians were touching their faces—a habit, as warned by the World Health Organization and Centers for Disease Control, that significantly increases the risk of infection. Upon further research, we learned that the average person subconsciously touches their face roughly 23 times an hour. Therefore, it seemed logical to create a product that would deter this habit.

The first item that came in mind was a face shield. After all, the purpose of a face shield is, as its name suggests, to shield the face. Seeing that the standard ones on the market were bulky, uncomfortable, and far from aesthetically pleasing, we decided to design one that would combine style with safety—a face shield that would look and feel like a fashion accessory without compromising function.

After months of nonstop design and sleepless nights, we finalized our design and launched Blocc on Kickstarter in the summer of 2020. Since then, Blocc has raised over $1 million worldwide and became one of the most popular personal protective equipment for everyday use.


 

 

FAQ

Q. Won't it fog up? Does it scratch up easily?
A: Blocc is coated with anti-fog and anti-scratch coatings to mitigate fogging and minor scratches.

Q: How should I clean Blocc? Can I use alcohol / lysol wipes?
A: No, Blocc should be rinsed with dish soap and warm water only.

 

U.S. ORDERS

All shipments in the U.S. are shipped via ground delivery from our warehouse in California within 3-5 business days after placing your order. Our logistics partner will provide your tracking number once they’re ready to ship your order.

 

INTERNATIONAL ORDERS

All orders for countries outside the U.S. will be shipped via air delivery from South Korea. Due to the current global pandemic and a high volume of orders, shipping may take as long as 14 business days. Our logistics partner will provide your tracking number once they’re ready to ship your order.

* Please Note: All fees imposed during or after shipping, such as duties, customs, and taxes, must be covered by the customer. Payment of these is required to release your order from customs on arrival. Should you choose not to make the payment, the item will be returned to us at our expense. Hence, we will not be able to provide you with a refund. We are unable to mark your package as a gift. It will be marked with its correct retail value.
 

If you have any questions regarding your order status, please contact us via email at fulfillment@blocc.kr.

 

RETURN POLICY

Due to the nature of PPE and the possibilities for contamination, we cannot accept returns on Blocc Face Shield. While we have excellent quality control at our factory, we would, of course, make exceptions for defects. Please send us accompanying proof of any quality issues via email at info@blocc.kr within 7 days of its delivery to you. Our customer service team may request that you provide additional images or videos for our inspections team to examine the defect fairly and thoroughly. Should our inspections team conclude that your item is indeed defective, we will send you a new Blocc Face Shield.

 

CONTACT US

For further inquiries, please contact us via email and we'll get back to you shortly.

- Shipping & Fulfillment Inquiry : fulfillment@blocc.kr

- Customer Support : info@blocc.kr

- Business Inquiry : sales@blocc.kr

story:
Hey!!

How many times did you have to bring your own lunch into the office or to university? And have you ever noticed how annoying is it to carry an empty and dirty lunchbox in your bag all day long once you’ve finished eating? Today, we are happy to introduce a huge innovation for your lunch break: Vi Lunchbox.


 

Vi is the first foldable lunchbox that once emptied of its content can be folded and fitted into your pocket! Finally, after your lunch break you won’t have to carry around multiple plastic bags and you can simply forget about the existence of your lunchbox! Vi is only 14.5x12x1 cm (5.7x4.7x0.4 in) – officially making it the thinnest lunchbox in the world! Carrying around Vi will be like having a smartphone in your pocket, just more beautiful and colorful!


 

Vi is available in a range of 6 different colors: yellow, pink, red, green, blue and transparent, so you can choose the one that best represents you!



 

Vi has an hermetic and leakproof sealing system, therefore it can be filled with every kind of food, both solid and liquid. At the end of the meal, the dirty part of the box can be folded upon itself, so that it doesn’t come into contact with other surfaces, so you can avoid the risk of dirtying your pocket or bag.

 


 

Vi even comes with a foldable fork with which you can comfortably eat, so you don’t even have to bring your own, heavy cutlery from home!

 

 

 

The history behind Vi

Firstly, let’s introduce our team: we are Manfredi, Enrica and Riccardo, three Italian students who took advantage of their experience at university to create Vi Lunchbox. During our student years, in order to save money and eat healthily, we brought our lunch from home, and countless times we had to deal with the annoying encumbrance of a big, empty lunchbox in our backpacks, taking up space that could instead be used for important things… such as books! Numerous times we had to bring our empty lunchboxes to the cinema or to an exhibition, and this lead us to think, ‘is there really not another solution?
The idea of creating Vi came about in September 2017, and was inspired by Manfredi’s interest in the usage of Chinese origami as a means to improve the life-quality of astronauts. He thought, ‘Why not apply the origami folding principle to a lunchbox? In this way, once the lunchbox has been emptied, it can be folded and it won’t take up so much space in your bag!’ In the first phase of product’s development, we spent months watching origami tutorials, looking for the perfect design. To our minds, the product’s design was crucial, as we did not want to create another of the many functional, but plain-looking lunchboxes. We wanted to create the perfect lunchbox, that would meet the publics’ needs also from an aesthetic point of view - an object both functional and pleasing to the eye. 

Vi’s current design is minimal - simple and elegant. We believe it truly embodies ‘Made in Italy’, something we are proud to bring to the world!



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Once we had settled on a design, we started to engineer the perfect lunchbox, carefully selecting materials, measurements, machines and modes of production.
Over the past few months, we have been constantly asking for our followers’ advice whilst working. In fact, for us, what matters the most is that Vi turns everybody’s lunchbreak into an enjoyable moment! As a result, after less than a year, three students without money, but with an innovative idea, had conceived a new philosophy for lunchtime.

How Vi works:

  • Fill Vi with every kind of food


 

  • Enjoy your lunch

 

  • Fold Vi 

 

  • Remove the sachet inside Vi

 

  • Wash it

 

  • And reuse Vi again and again!

 

Why we are the Dream Team:

- Manfredi has already had crucial work experiences, as well as having created a start-up which in 2015 was prized as one of the 3 best Italian start-ups due to its innovative content.

- Enrica, our marketing expert, managed to find more than 1,000 potential customers in three months with $0 budget.

- As an aerospace and nanotechnology engineer Riccardo has in depth knowledge of advanced engineering technologies and materials and is used to technical interfacing with industry producers.

 

The goals of the project

Our primary goal is to eliminate every form of waste, from the waste of unnecessary space to the widespread plastic waste. Due to this reason, Vi is 100% eco-friendly. Vi is easy to hand-wash and dishwasher-safe, therefore it can be re-used as long as desired.

 

 

Furthermore, in such a way, the compulsive usage of disposable plastic boxes is eliminated. The material which composes Vi is called polypropylene. This is a non-toxic and food-certified material, which is 100% recyclable and BPA-free. We care about the environment and that's why our choice is totally green.

 

Technical Section

Vi started to become a reality by means of a simple sheet of paper, folded according to the Origami principle. After multiple prototypes, Vi has finally assumed its definitive shape.




It was a remarkably difficult product to conceive, due to its non-conventional character and to the low budget available. - Vi is a food container composed mainly of polypropylene, a frequently employed plastic in the food industry. Polypropylene is favoured due to its a-toxicity, chemical resistance, and resistance to high temperatures. Propylene is also easily recyclable and microwaveable. Furthermore, it has a low environmental impact and it is pleasing to both the eye and touch. A critical feature of polypropylene is its capacity to form living hinges – that is to say the folds which allow Vi to assume different shapes. These hinges have a long duration with repeated cycles of folding in time, which enable us to ensure our customers that Vi will remain functional over time.

 

 

In order to respect the original concept derived from origami, Vi’s main body is made from semi-finished propylene sheets, which are subsequently refined through processes and equipments that are suitable for foods. Layers of propylene film positioned on the upper part of the container allow a hermetic sealing system through an airtight cursor. In addition, Vi has two interlocking lids ‘tongue and groove’ which guarantee its isolation from the environment, thereby enhancing the safety of our customers’ food. 

When Vi is open, hence ready to be filled with food, it has an internal basis of 11. 5 x 12. 5 cm and it is 5. 8 cm high (4.5 x 4.9 x 2.3 in). As a result, it has an internal volume of 0.83 liters (28.1 oz). Instead, when it is folded on itself, its dimensions are 14.5 x 12 x 1 cm (5.7x4.7x0.4 in). Any normal pocket of a jacket should therefore be able to fit 3 or 4 Vi Lunchboxes!


 

Why Vi is different from other lunchboxes?

  • Vi is 100% hermetic and leakproof; 
  • Microwaveable: you can comfortably heat your lunch in your office’s microwave, leaving the food directly inside Vi; 
  • Dishwasher-safe: Vi is easily washable either by hand or in the dishwasher. In this way you can reuse it as many times as you want! You won’t need disposable containers ever again (which contribute significantly to plastic wastage)! 
  • Vi can be folded upon itself: in this way, after lunch, you can use the handy folds of your lunchbox to close it! 
  • It occupies zero space in your bag!  
  • It contains a foldable fork! 

 

How much do you like Vi? 

In terms of watching what you eat, lunch is the toughest meal of the day: eating out is often expensive and you can never be sure about the quality of what you are eating. Why should you give up eating healthily when you are out of the house? Vi allows you to take your lunch or snack always with you, and once finished eating you won’t be burdened by the box!
 

 

One of the greatest features of Vi is that it can be used by everybody in every situation: we have spoken to people in different lines of work, from students, workers, to sportsmen and mothers, and they all appreciate the effectiveness of Vi.

Examples:

  •  Students at university and children at school, after having had their lunch, will have the necessary space for books and notebooks in their backpacks;  
  • Workers in the office will be able to put Vi in a pocket of their suit or in their 24 hours;  
  • Sportsmen can enjoy their lunch during their excursions without having to carry around a big, empty box for the rest of their activity! 
  • Mothers prepare around 180 lunchboxes for their children throughout the year, and we think they would be excited to know that their children see their lunchbox as a new ‘game’ to play, through folding Vi on itself each time!  
  • Travelers, instead of spending time at the restaurant, can bring their lunch with them and enjoy it in every corner of the city without interrupting their trips, and are then be able to fold the lunchbox and put it comfortably in their pocket! 
     

 

Our numbers

2500 followers on social media. More than half of them explicitly expressed their interest in the product by asking for the link to purchase it; 

150 bloggers who supported us during the campaign by joining the team, demonstrating their belief in this product’s potentiality;

1000 email of people written to our newsletter.

 

Deadlines

  • 19 August: Start of the campaign 
  • 19 September: End of the campaign 
  • 3 October: Start of Vi’s production 
  • 1 December : Start shipping products

 

Special thanks to:  

 

  • LazioInnova and LazioFabLAB for providing services, consultancy/mentoring and laboratories in which we produced the prototypes free of charge. 
  • to Lazio FabLAB technical managers: Manlio DiDio, Davide Mariani, Giovanni Vona, Marco Pesoli, Silvia Pùtano.
  • and to Elisa Faccioni (video editing) 

 Press:

 

Press Media Kit: 

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1W_luL8PFPxCuJMGFue1hbX1gQFLm76ic

 

Risks and challenges

As every project on Indiegogo, there is always a minimum percentage risk. However, we will do everything in our power to keep our promises. As of now, we are in touch with multiple suppliers/producers so that we can test their materials and machines, in order to create the perfect product in terms of quality and duration. 
We have advised delivery time to our customers, in order to ensure we have time to deal with any issues that may arise. However, we hope to dispatch the lunchboxes much before this! We will do everything we can so that our customers are going to receive Vi even before the estimated delivery date!

Vi is available in a range of 6 different colors: yellow, pink, red, green, blue and transparent, so you can choose the one that best represents you!
 
Vi has an hermetic and leakproof sealing system, therefore it can be filled with every kind of food, both solid and liquid. At the end of the meal, the dirty part of the box can be folded upon itself, so that it doesn’t come into contact with other surfaces, so you can avoid the risk of dirtying your pocket or bag.
 
 Vi even comes with a foldable fork with which you can comfortably eat, so you don’t even have to bring your own, heavy cutlery from home!
 

 

 
The history behind Vi
Firstly, let’s introduce our team: we are Manfredi, Enrica and Riccardo, three Italian students who took advantage of their experience at university to create Vi Lunchbox. During our student years, in order to save money and eat healthily, we brought our lunch from home, and countless times we had to deal with the annoying encumbrance of a big, empty lunchbox in our backpacks, taking up space that could instead be used for important things… such as books! Numerous times we had to bring our empty lunchboxes to the cinema or to an exhibition, and this lead us to think, ‘is there really not another solution?The idea of creating Vi came about in September 2017, and was inspired by Manfredi’s interest in the usage of Chinese origami as a means to improve the life-quality of astronauts. He thought, ‘Why not apply the origami folding principle to a lunchbox? In this way, once the lunchbox has been emptied, it can be folded and it won’t take up so much space in your bag!’ In the first phase of product’s development, we spent months watching origami tutorials, looking for the perfect design. To our minds, the product’s design was crucial, as we did not want to create another of the many functional, but plain-looking lunchboxes. We wanted to create the perfect lunchbox, that would meet the publics’ needs also from an aesthetic point of view - an object both functional and pleasing to the eye. 
Vi’s current design is minimal - simple and elegant. We believe it truly embodies ‘Made in Italy’, something we are proud to bring to the world!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Once we had settled on a design, we started to engineer the perfect lunchbox, carefully selecting materials, measurements, machines and modes of production.Over the past few months, we have been constantly asking for our followers’ advice whilst working. In fact, for us, what matters the most is that Vi turns everybody’s lunchbreak into an enjoyable moment! As a result, after less than a year, three students without money, but with an innovative idea, had conceived a new philosophy for lunchtime.
How Vi works:
Fill Vi with every kind of food
 Enjoy your lunch Fold Vi  Remove the sachet inside Vi Wash it And reuse Vi again and again! Why we are the Dream Team:- Manfredi has already had crucial work experiences, as well as having created a start-up which in 2015 was prized as one of the 3 best Italian start-ups due to its innovative content.- Enrica, our marketing expert, managed to find more than 1,000 potential customers in three months with $0 budget.- As an aerospace and nanotechnology engineer Riccardo has in depth knowledge of advanced engineering technologies and materials and is used to technical interfacing with industry producers. The goals of the projectOur primary goal is to eliminate every form of waste, from the waste of unnecessary space to the widespread plastic waste. Due to this reason, Vi is 100% eco-friendly. Vi is easy to hand-wash and dishwasher-safe, therefore it can be re-used as long as desired.  Furthermore, in such a way, the compulsive usage of disposable plastic boxes is eliminated. The material which composes Vi is called polypropylene. This is a non-toxic and food-certified material, which is 100% recyclable and BPA-free. We care about the environment and that's why our choice is totally green. Technical SectionVi started to become a reality by means of a simple sheet of paper, folded according to the Origami principle. After multiple prototypes, Vi has finally assumed its definitive shape.It was a remarkably difficult product to conceive, due to its non-conventional character and to the low budget available. - Vi is a food container composed mainly of polypropylene, a frequently employed plastic in the food industry. Polypropylene is favoured due to its a-toxicity, chemical resistance, and resistance to high temperatures. Propylene is also easily recyclable and microwaveable. Furthermore, it has a low environmental impact and it is pleasing to both the eye and touch. A critical feature of polypropylene is its capacity to form living hinges – that is to say the folds which allow Vi to assume different shapes. These hinges have a long duration with repeated cycles of folding in time, which enable us to ensure our customers that Vi will remain functional over time.  In order to respect the original concept derived from origami, Vi’s main body is made from semi-finished propylene sheets, which are subsequently refined through processes and equipments that are suitable for foods. Layers of propylene film positioned on the upper part of the container allow a hermetic sealing system through an airtight cursor. In addition, Vi has two interlocking lids ‘tongue and groove’ which guarantee its isolation from the environment, thereby enhancing the safety of our customers’ food. When Vi is open, hence ready to be filled with food, it has an internal basis of 11. 5 x 12. 5 cm and it is 5. 8 cm high (4.5 x 4.9 x 2.3 in). As a result, it has an internal volume of 0.83 liters (28.1 oz). Instead, when it is folded on itself, its dimensions are 14.5 x 12 x 1 cm (5.7x4.7x0.4 in). Any normal pocket of a jacket should therefore be able to fit 3 or 4 Vi Lunchboxes! Why Vi is different from other lunchboxes?
Vi is 100% hermetic and leakproof; 

Microwaveable: you can comfortably heat your lunch in your office’s microwave, leaving the food directly inside Vi; 

Dishwasher-safe: Vi is easily washable either by hand or in the dishwasher. In this way you can reuse it as many times as you want! You won’t need disposable containers ever again (which contribute significantly to plastic wastage)! 
Vi can be folded upon itself: in this way, after lunch, you can use the handy folds of your lunchbox to close it! 
It occupies zero space in your bag!  
It contains a foldable fork! 

 How much do you like Vi? In terms of watching what you eat, lunch is the toughest meal of the day: eating out is often expensive and you can never be sure about the quality of what you are eating. Why should you give up eating healthily when you are out of the house? Vi allows you to take your lunch or snack always with you, and once finished eating you won’t be burdened by the box!  One of the greatest features of Vi is that it can be used by everybody in every situation: we have spoken to people in different lines of work, from students, workers, to sportsmen and mothers, and they all appreciate the effectiveness of Vi.Examples:
 Students at university and children at school, after having had their lunch, will have the necessary space for books and notebooks in their backpacks;  

Workers in the office will be able to put Vi in a pocket of their suit or in their 24 hours;  

Sportsmen can enjoy their lunch during their excursions without having to carry around a big, empty box for the rest of their activity! 

Mothers prepare around 180 lunchboxes for their children throughout the year, and we think they would be excited to know that their children see their lunchbox as a new ‘game’ to play, through folding Vi on itself each time!  

Travelers, instead of spending time at the restaurant, can bring their lunch with them and enjoy it in every corner of the city without interrupting their trips, and are then be able to fold the lunchbox and put it comfortably in their pocket!  
 Our numbers2500 followers on social media. More than half of them explicitly expressed their interest in the product by asking for the link to purchase it; 150 bloggers who supported us during the campaign by joining the team, demonstrating their belief in this product’s potentiality;1000 email of people written to our newsletter. Deadlines
19 August: Start of the campaign 
19 September: End of the campaign 
3 October: Start of Vi’s production 
1 December : Start shipping products
 Special thanks to:   
LazioInnova and LazioFabLAB for providing services, consultancy/mentoring and laboratories in which we produced the prototypes free of charge. 
to Lazio FabLAB technical managers: Manlio DiDio, Davide Mariani, Giovanni Vona, Marco Pesoli, Silvia Pùtano.
and to Elisa Faccioni (video editing) 
 Press: Press Media Kit: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1W_luL8PFPxCuJMGFue1hbX1gQFLm76ic Risks and challengesAs every project on Indiegogo, there is always a minimum percentage risk. However, we will do everything in our power to keep our promises. As of now, we are in touch with multiple suppliers/producers so that we can test their materials and machines, in order to create the perfect product in terms of quality and duration. We have advised delivery time to our customers, in order to ensure we have time to deal with any issues that may arise. However, we hope to dispatch the lunchboxes much before this! We will do everything we can so that our customers are going to receive Vi even before the estimated delivery date!

story:
Voir la version française

We have just returned from Afghanistan after living there for three years. Through our work with the Turquoise Mountain Foundation, we discovered a side to Afghanistan rarely seen in the media. Talented craftsmen using age-old techniques and local natural materials to create objects with lasting character and soul. 

Afghanistan’s craftsmen - like many of those in other countries at war - face a single common challenge: how to get their work in front of customers abroad?

With this question in mind, last December we set up a beta site selling three simple types of cufflinks. The response was phenomenal. We sold ten times the number of cufflinks we initially expected to sell. What started out as a week of work for the young group of Kabul jewellers we were working with, turned into five weeks of full-time employment.

It was enough evidence for us to leave Afghanistan to set up our own e-commerce platform. 

 

  • The slow process. Taking time with methods and materials to create objects with lasting value.
  • Pairing top international designers with craftsmen in cut off regions. Ancient craftsmanship guided by modern design.
  • The power of beautiful objects to spread positive stories about countries where such news is rare.   
  • Conscious consumerism - where your purchase creates economic opportunity in areas of need.

 

Afghanistan has been ranked by the World Bank as the 166th (out of 168 countries) most difficult place with which to do business in the world… so there’s a reason why these craftsmen are cut off! One of the main problems we face is that as a landlocked country shipping fees from Afghanistan are enormous.  By reaching our target for preorders we will be able to reach big enough quantities to bring down these shipping costs, passing on these savings to you – the customer.

It will also allow us to:

  • Build a website which does our products justice
  • Expand our network of craftsmen and designers

BUT, and here's an important detail, if this campaign is unsuccessful we will not have the resources to continue with the business. 

Our Perks represent one part of our collection. If this campaign is successful we will launch our full range in October 2016. 

 

Last March we went to visit Ghulam Sekhi in his mudbrick workshop in Herat. He is one of last remaining glassblowers in Afghanistan, belonging to a tradition dating back centuries. It would be a tragedy to see this precious industry die with his knowledge. We believe a successful Indiegogo campaign will help us get this industry back on its feet.

 

Our jewellery is made by a group of six jewellers called Blue Diamond. Despite being all under the age of 25, they like making jewellery the traditional way: 100% made by hand. We are passionate about helping young entrepreneurs in difficult environments grow their businesses. With Afghanistan facing economic crisis, employment for Afghanistan’s youth has never been more important.

 

Afghanistan is one of the world’s last great carpet producing countries: famous for the luxurious quality of its local wool and the vivacity of its natural plant dyes.The slow process by which carpets are made is something of enormous rarity in our fast-paced world. Each rug is the result of hundreds of hours of concentrated work. Teams of up to five women weave the carpets at any one time, with carpets such as the Gehry and Hadid, taking more than four months to weave.

 

Our social Impact model is built on three pillars. Here's how it works:

 

After the campaign ends, you'll receive a survey to submit all the information. We will ask you for your shipping information, size, style and color as applicable.

It depends which reward you go for! While ISHKAR jewellery, handblown glass and the knives do not include contributions to NGOs, a percentage of the value of all Kilims, carpets and trays is invested back into development programs. This varies from 5% for trays right through to 50% for Kilims, and 80% for the Frank Gehry carpet. Our partner NGOs are the Turquoise Mountain Foundation and Arzu.

For specified perks shipping is not included. The shipping fees are given at a reduced rate and are calculated according to the destination. Please also bear in mind that you'll be responsible for custom or duties on your end, unfortunately we cannot include that into our costs.

Unfortunately we are not able to handle returns at this stage.

‘ISHKAR’ is the Persian word for a shrub found only in the deserts of northern Afghanistan. For thousands of years ISHKAR’s ash has been gathered and mixed with dyes to bring out the intense colour present in so many of Afghanistan’s crafts, from carpets, to ceramics and handblown glass.

Not only does ISHKAR represent the alchemy which lies behind the craftsmanship, a desert plant with extraordinary properties, also seems a fitting emblem for Afghanistan & Syria at a time when much of the world sees little else from them but war and poverty.

Version Française

Nous venons tout juste de rentrer d’Afghanistan après y avoir vécu pendant trois ans. A travers notre travail avec la Fondation Turquoise Mountain, nous avons découvert un aspect de ce pays peu couvert par les medias: des artisans talentueux utilisant des techniques ancestrales et des matériaux naturels afin de créer des produits ayant une âme.

Les artisans Afghans – comme ceux de beaucoup d’autres de pays en guerre – font face à un obstacle commun : comment rendre ces objets accessibles au consommateur étranger ?

Dans cette optique, nous avons monté en décembre dernier un site beta vendant trois types de boutons de manchette. La réaction fut extraordinaire. La semaine de travail de notre groupe de jeunes bijoutiers de Kaboul, s’est transformée en 5 semaines à plein temps.

Ainsi nous avons quitté l'Afghanistan pour démarrer notre propre site de vente en ligne.

  • De l’élaboration lente et progressive de la confection. Prendre le temps avec des méthodes et matériaux uniques pour créer des objets avec une valeur durable.
  • De mettre en avant des collaborations avec des designers internationaux. Un artisanat ancestral mais résolument moderne et design
  • Que les beaux objets ont: diffuser des histoires positives sur certains pays - radicalement différentes de celles que l’on imagine trop souvent.
  • D’une consommation responsable - ou chaque achat cree des opportunités économiques dans des zones de besoin.

Nos contreparties représentent une partie de notre collection. Si la campagne marche, nous lancerons notre gamme complète en Octobre 2016. 

 

 

En mars dernier nous avons rendu visite à Ghulam Sekhi dans son atelier. Il est un des derniers souffleurs de verre Afghan, appartenant à une tradition millénaire. Ce serait triste de voir cette industrie exceptionnelle mourir avec son savoir faire. Le succès de cette campagne Indiegogo contribuera à la remise sur pied de cette industrie.

Nos six jeunes bijoutiers ont formé une entreprise - Blue Diamond. Malgré leur jeune âge, ils cherchent à préserver la tradition du fait main. Nous sommes extrêmement motivés pour aider ces jeunes entrepreneurs à développer leur activité dans un environnements difficile. 

L’Afghanistan est un des plus gros producteurs de tapis  au monde, connu pour la riche qualité de sa laine locale et l'intensité des pigments naturels. La lenteur de confection du tissage des tapis  devient précieuse par sa rareté dans notre environnement qui va à cent à l’heure: chaque tapis est le résultat de centaine d’heures de concentration. Des équipes de cinq femmes tissent pendant un minimum de 3 mois pour des tapis comme celui de Frank Gehry et de Zaha Hadid.

 

Sur 168 pays, l’Afghanistan a été classé 166eme pays concernant la difficulté d'échange commerciale...Dans ce contexte, il n'est pas étonnant que ces artisans soient coupés du monde ! L’une des raisons principales: depuis ce pays enclavé, les frais d’exportation sont extrêmement élevés. Si nous atteignons notre objectif de pré-commandes, nous serons en mesure de réduire les frais de livraison, et donc de vous faire bénéficier a vous, clients, de ces économies.

Ceci nous permettra à :

-        Construire un site Internet qui rende honneur a nos produits ;

-        Développer notre réseau d’artisans et de designers ;

-        Faire faire des emballages protecteurs pour que nos verres puissent arriver jusqu'à vous en un seul morceau.

Une fois la campagne terminée, vous recevrez un questionnaire vous demandant ces renseignements: votre adresse de livraison, la taille, le style et la couleur choisis.

Cela dépend quelle contrepartie vous choisirez ! Les bijoux ISHKAR, les verres soufflés et les couteaux n’incluent pas de contribution pour les ONG. Un pourcentage de la valeur des Kilims, des tapis et des plateaux, est réinvesti dans des programmes de développement. Celui-ci peut varier de 5% pour les plateaux, jusqu’à 50% pour les Kilims, et 80% pour le tapis Franck Gehry. Les ONG partenaires sont la Fondation Turquoise Moutain et Arzu.

Pour certaines contreparties, les frais de livraison ne sont pas inclus dans le prix. Ces frais de livraison sont appliqués à taux réduit et calculés en fonction de la destination. Ayez également à l’esprit que les taxes d’importation ou frais de douane applicables chez vous seront à votre charge, nous ne pouvons malheureusement pas les inclure dans nos coûts.

Malheureusement, nous ne sommes pas en mesure de prendre en charge les retours à ce stade.

‘ISHKAR’ est un mot persan qui désigne un arbuste que l’on trouve uniquement dans les déserts du nord de l’Afghanistan. Depuis des millénaires, les cendres d’ISHKAR sont amassées et mêlées aux pigments, donnant ainsi naissance aux couleurs intenses présentes sur tant de produits de l’artisanat afghan, tapis, céramiques ou encore verres soufflés.

ISHKAR ne représente pas seulement cette alchimie sur laquelle repose l’artisanat, mais cette plante du désert aux propriétés extraordinaires semble aussi être un symbole de choix pour la Syrie et l’Afghanistan, à une époque où ces pays laissent transparaître au reste du monde peu de chose hormis la guerre et la pauvreté.

story:
The 7ven Messenger in 3 colours (Brown, Black, and Grey)

German Designed magnetic locking latches. Designed for ultimate efficiency.

 

STORY

Most of us have one bag for work, and another bag for play. Carrying multiple bags to the office is inconvenient and unprofessional. So wouldn’t it be better if you had one bag that adapted for both work and play? A bag that you can take to work, and instantaneously transform for play whenever you need it. We couldn't find this bag, so we decided to make it.

 

INTRODUCING THE 7VEN MESSENGER

The 7ven Messenger is specifically designed for you - the digital nomad, the professional, the entrepreneur, the adventurer, the creative, and the athlete. It is created for people that are passionate and motivated to pursue their life dream. With the capacity of a duffel bag, the style and functionality of a messenger bag and the professionalism of a briefcase, the 7ven Messenger is three bags merged into one. The minimalist external design and its endless versatility makes the 7ven Messenger a bag that you can use every day of the week, for WORK & PLAY.

 

FEATURES HIGHLIGHTS

 

 

 

DESIGNED FOR WORK

SIMPLE AND ELEGANT STYLE

The simple and elegant black design means you won't look out of place even when you are in your full work attire.

 

THREE MODES OF CARRY 

You can change between three modes of carry (shoulder, messenger, or carry) by using the quick adjusting shoulder strap.

Three modes of carry for added versatility:

Quick strap adjustment to switch between messenger, shoulder, and briefcase style.

For him and her.

 

TOUCH OF CLASS

Carry handle wrapped in leather to give a better carry experience

Leather-wrapped bottom corner for that touch of class. 

The bottom of the bag is also lined up with 4 low friction nylon feet that protect the bag from getting dirty. They also make the bag very easy to retrieve from the airplane overhead compartment. 

 

HASSLE FREE TRAVEL

A convenient quick access pocket in the shoulder strap, for your money and/or transport travel card.

Dedicated hidden external phone pocket for easy phone storage 

7ven Messenger triangular shape ensures easy storage and retrieval from air-cabin's overhead bins.

 

ORGANIZED FOR THE DIGITAL CENTURY

A dedicated front pocket to carry all your tech gear and cables.

Perfect for everyday carry. Fits all your essentials.

 

 

 

DESIGNED FOR PLAY

LIFE-PROOF FABRIC

Water and stain resistant. Very easy to clean.

COMFORT

ALPAKA 7ven Messenger is designed to reduce shoulder load when used in messenger mode. Apart from the wide, padded shoulder strap and body-hugging shape, we also designed a revolutionary new Mag-lock™ magnetic chest strap (with one finger operation magnetic locking), which allows significant weight to be distributed evenly across the back. 

The Mag-lock chest strap is so cool you'll want to use it everyday.

You can deploy or tuck away the Mag-lock™ chest strap without having to look at it, and with a simple one click operation (with or without gloves on). Cool and efficient.

 

 

ADAPTABLE STORAGE SPACE 

The unique triangular shape of the 7ven Messenger means it will adapt to your load by simply changing its shape. The bag also has an unique OVERLOADABLE design that increases internal storage space by more than 30% when you need to overpack your bag.

 

GREAT FOR ANY ACTIVITY 

The 7ven Messenger's body-hugging shape and Mag-lock™ magnetic chest strap ensure that the bag is stable enough for any activity. Whether you're riding a bike, or free-running through your urban environment.  

    

 U-LOCK STORAGE

We love riding our bikes to work, so we understand the importance of having a dedicated storage pocket for U-lock.

TRIPOD MOUNT

Tripod holder with Mag-lock strap

PLAY SAFE

Padded bottom and back for added drop protection.

It also has a Reflective Strip makes night riding safer.

 

 

ZERO EFFICIENCY-DRAG

7ven Messenger is designed for pure efficiency. On average, when using the 7ven Messenger every day of the week (when compared to other messenger bags), you can save up to 10 minutes a day. That's over an hour a week and more than 50 hours saved in a year. 

If you earned $10 USD a hour, a saving of 50 hours a year is equivalent to saving of $500 USD a year. 

 
 

SPECIFICATIONS

We chose the highest quality and most durable materials possible, because we wanted to create a product that's durable. We're not a fast fashion company. We're here to make stylish and functional products that are long lasting.

The 7ven Messenger's unique triangular shape has several advantages over traditional rectangular messenger bags:

  • It won't tip over.
  • This shape also allows the bag to sit closely to your back for a more ergonomic feel.
  • The triangular shape makes the bag look less bulky and keep a slimmer look even when it is full.
  • Greater storage capacity.

 

Reinforced stitching, high quality zippers, materials and components make the 7ven Messenger exceptionally durable.

  

Every seam is carefully stitched.

TESTED BY US 

We tested the 7ven Messenger for over 10 months by travelling with it

 

TESTED BY OTHERS

As part of our commitment to achieve our quality goal, we sent many pre-production 7ven Messenger prototypes for testing and evaluation by different people and organizations.

 

Are you an urban traveler that loves traveling light? But still want to have all the essentials like phone, camera, passport, wallets, keys, etc., with you at all times?

This is why we created the Go Sling, a small sling bag that is designed to hold all your travel essentials in a light, sleek, and secure bag.

When we designed the Go Sling, we imagined it as a travel sling bag that will go everywhere with you. With this in mind, we designed the Go Sling to be modular with a removable and reversible strap (for both left and right hand use), so that it will fit perfectly inside the 7ven Messenger. We also added a flexible and quick adjusting shoulder strap, which allows you to have many different wearing styles for maximum comfort and security.

 

It's Dimensions are:

  • 28cm Width
  • 16cm Height
  • 12cm Depth

 

 

 

 

TECH DOPP KIT

The Tech Dopp Kit is designed to keep all your personal digital gear organized every day of the week. It features specially designed compartments for all your digital gear.

 

GYM CUBE

Many people prefer to go to the gym before they go to work and then head to work straight after. But taking your used gym clothes in your work bag for whole day is not ideal, due to the strong odor. This is why we designed the 7ven Gym Cube, which can absorb most of the strong odors from used gym clothing.

MADE IN JAPAN ODOR ABSORBING MESH

We worked with a Japanese fabric manufacturer to develop a special mesh fabric that absorbs almost all the strong odors associated with dirty gym clothes, whilst still offering strong breathability of mesh fabric.

REUSABLE and WASHABLE

The smell absorbing mesh can be washed to recover the smell absorbing function. 

 

REWARD LEVELS

 

 

DESIGN

The design and prototyping process was a long, expensive and life-learning journey. It took us more than a year to get from the initial design sketches to the final pre-production prototypes. Sometimes we had to work more than 100 hours a week to ensure that our prototyping milestones were met.

Every aspect of the bag design was tested and scrutinized for usability and quality. We worked with many international companies to ensure that the we have the best processes in place for the manufacturing of the 7ven Messenger bag. 

Finally, we were able to produce more than 50 (fifty) 7ven Messenger bags prior to the Crowdfunding campaign to ensure that we can achieve our promised production schedule and quality target. 

Design Sketches for 7ven Messenger.

Early prototypes of 7ven Messenger bags

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

German designed magnetic latches used in our Mag-lock Straps.

  

VALUE

7ven Messenger is a duffle bag, a briefcase, and a messenger bag all rolled into one. How much would you expect to pay for a high quality messenger bag, a briefcase and a duffle bag?

ABOUT ALPAKA

                             ALPAKA company motto: "Anything is possible"

ALPAKA was founded in 2013 by two friends. We share a passion for fashion, technology and design. We also love to travel and explore the world, but at the same time we are young professionals who are immersed in the modern digital culture of the 21st Century. With this in mind, we realized that the current range of carry products (i.e. bags) have not really kept up with the world we live in, nor are they suitable for those who are looking to use one bag for both work AND play. So we decided to design an everyday bag that you could use for both work & play. This was how the 7ven Messenger was born. 

 

 

FAIR WAGE

As part of our ethos, we believe that every product that we design and make, is done with both environmental and workplace sustainability in mind.

In keeping with our workplace sustainability goal, we pay higher wage directly to the craftsmen who make the bags. After all, great products are only made by people who love what they do, and you can only love what you do, if you are paid fairly.

HOW IS THE MONEY SPENT

We believe in making high quality products that stand the test of time, this is why we chose only the best quality fabrics, and parts for the 7ven Messenger. However, we also believe that quality products should be affordable. 

In keeping with our philosophy for quality and affordable prices, we negotiated hard with our suppliers to make sure we get the best possible prices for all the materials and parts we use in our bag. We then passed these cost savings directly to our Indiegogo supporters. 

 

 

 

FOLLOW US

story:
Founders Short Bio

My Name is George, I am a strong believer & pioneer of finding viable everyday solutions that have a positive Impact on the world by making it more efficient and a fun place to live in. 

For detailed information about the founder please visit:www.georgemwangi.com

The Current Problem

It with this that I realized the great troubles Tourists, Business Travelers, People working away from their Native countries into alien countries abroad, Online Traders, Volunteers abroad and Students studying abroad (to name but a few); encounter while doing simple transactions abroad like withdrawing money, purchasing tickets online, paying for hotel accommodation, shopping at a local store, paying for bus-fare etc.

The foreign currency becomes an estranged legal tender that becomes hard to decipher its intrinsic (real) value compared to the currency that the foreigner is familiar with.

Due to the disconnected networks of Second and Third world financial systems abroad, visitors and online traders have to follow un-realistic and time-consuming procedures to get their transactions across. This at times leaves them stranded, agitated and even at cross-roads not knowing what to do; worse enough if you don’t know anyone from where you are at the instant of being stranded.

Wallet Abroad – The Solution

Not to worry anymore, The solution is finally here and is going to be your “Financial Companion” while visiting or going to live abroad or while doing your international transactions which involve multiple currencies. Introducing “Wallet Abroad” 
www.walletabroad.com

and we shall post it in our blog as we keep in mind the major and Key financial challenges Abroad Visitors & Online Traders face so that as we develop our system; we are able to ensure all (most) of it is addressed.

Wallet Abroad is a hybrid mobile financial enabled platform that will ensure that while you are visiting, living or even conducting transactions abroad.
 
With Wallet Abroad you are able to:

  • Send or Receive money of any currency to anyone in the world within seconds & with “Ease”.
  • It allows you to Withdraw money of any currency from anywhere in the world within seconds
  • It also allows you to choose between virtual cash or real cash, meaning you don’t need to carry huge amounts of cash while Living or Travelling abroad
  • It expands your cash withdrawal avenues while in abroad, you can choose to withdraw from the nearest bank, or the nearest ATM card of any bank regardless of whether its VISA Electron enabled or the nearest Local mobile money booth.
  • It also makes shopping abroad easier and safer, because you just pay up for your services or products through your mobile phone with the traders desired currency
  • It also helps you manage your cash while abroad: Wallet Abroad enables you to create a budget and convert it into the desired currency amount

Our Creed

Our Creed is built on the maxim “All 4 One & One 4 All”, This signifies that we exist to ensure your financial management while pursuing your abroad errands either Physically or Virtually, you don’t encounter the agitating hurdles of disconnected networks and the entrapment of not being able to withdraw or send money, move around and/ or purchase at the local store anything you may need with ease.

Join Wallet Abroad Community

Come and join the growing Wallet Abroad Community and help us make your abroad pursuits more Fun, more Memorable, more Enthusiastic and most of all More Financial Stress Free.

Kindly if you have ever been abroad and you encountered any hurdle please send us your story either via:

Email: mystory@walletabroad.com

Contact Page:http://www.walletabroad.com/contact-us

and we shall post it in our blog as we keep in mind the major and Key financial challenges Abroad Visitors & Online Traders face so that as we develop our system; we are able to ensure all (most) of it is addressed.

Become Part of Us & Together Let’s Do it!

Help us “spread the word” to all those will be impacted positively by this System so as to join in the community and make it a reality.

We shall be glad to connect with you on:

 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/walletabroad

 Twitter: https://twitter.com/walletabroad

Google +: https://plus.google.com/u/0/105302678714664254168

YouTube:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Po_VHbZDF44&list=PLdTlaBvUR0DdccDiBSfjocNGrG8qo-CiQ&index=1

Pinterest: http://www.pinterest.com/gmgeorgemwangi/

story:
....above video is last years undergraduate fashion show.....


My Story

I am a Senior at Academy of Art University in San Francisco California. I am a sustainable women's wear designer. I have been chosen to participate in our fashion show in May. My collection is based on geometric patterns, minimal seams, zero waste pattern making, subtraction cutting, transformation and organic fabrics. My collection focuses on low impact manufacturing and domestic sourcing. I am the first sustainable designer in over 2 years to show at our graduation fashion show. Academy of Art is the only school to show during New York fashion week during the fall and spring. The May fashion show is the largest and most professionally produced fashion show in the West Coast. Our guest of honors have included Vivian Westwood, Alexander McQueen, Ducky Brown and much much more 


I was inspired by the garbage I came across everyday. I wanted to do something about it.


(San Francisco 2011 - Tenderloin)



My design inspiration came from the structure of proteins. I liked the biological and organic shapes the proteins created.






My Design Detail.



My Exploration.




 

The Impact

Having the collection created will show the fashion industry the importance of sustainable design. It will create an awareness about being eco- conscience. The fashion industry and the community would miss out on the beauty of a collection without waste and low impact manufacturing. It would be sad for myself and my classmates not to see the final product of my innovative concept.


What I Need & What You Get


I need $5500 for material cost. The materials needed to complete the collection would be organic wool, organic cotton jersey and brass trims. 40% of the construction will be sent to professional seamstresses. If the goal is not met the money still gathered will go towards fabric cost. Using only domestic fabrics makes it more expensive but the quality is much better than international sourcing. 20% of my fabric costs is being funded by the fabric company. I will make 2 people a garment of their choice (made to measure).


Other Ways You Can Help

Share this project with others and create an awareness about sustainable fashion.

story:
Temples & Bridges sunglasses are hand crafted and designed one-by-one in the brand's workshop, which lends a personalized approach to each pair. Each pair will be crafted with Carl Zeiss quality sun lenses. From bohemian and retro to classic and stealth, there are varieties for those looking to have their eyewear become an extension of their personal style.

“Our unique handcrafting system ensures a more precise and comfortable fit than obtainable from standard off the shelf designs. There’s not a brand out here that can give you that feeling of flashiness with a great design, craftsmanship, and material such as Temples & Bridges. We use classical shapes and accents that make them not only modern but gives you a feeling and new persona when worn," commented Tito Riveros, the brand's founder.


We at Temples & Bridges aim to protect the eyes and enhance faces of men and women all over the world, by manufacturing and selling sunwear characterized by their high technical and stylistic quality, in order to maximize our customers' wellbeing, style and satisfaction. Our sunwear is the result of a continuous research and development process, aiming at anticipating and interpreting the needs, wishes and aspirations of people around the world.




About Carl Zeiss Vision Sunlens

Carl Zeiss Vision Sunlens is dedicated to research, development and production of high quality sunlenses, that offer to the consumers protection from sun rays, but also superior optical performance. Through long-term expertise in tints and coating development, Carl Zeiss Vision Sunlens offers the leading, widest and most differentiated range of products and services in the industry.

BLACK ACETATE

MATTE GOLD METAL ACCENTS

BROWN  GRADIENT LENS

TORTOISE ACETATE

SHINY GOLD METAL ACCENTS

Ritz. These are an elegant blend between aviators and wayfarers. These frames are made from high quality acetate, metal, and come with the best lens you can ever buy... CARL ZEISS LENS.

DIMENSIONS: 55-21-145



GOLD MIRROR LENS

 NInos. A fresh look at flat top frames with an attention demanding gold metal detail as a bridge.These frames are made from high quality acetate, metal, and come with the best lens you can ever buy... CARL ZEISS LENS.

DIMENSIONS: 56-17-145

Julias. These flat top frames are the perfect marriage between premium leather and high quality metal.These frames are made from high quality acetate, metal, leather, and come with the best lens you can ever buy... CARL ZEISS LENS.

DIMENSIONS: 56-17-140


We are privileged to have one of the best graphic artist contributing to our kickstarter by designing limited edition prints of the upcoming collection. These pieces are an amazing statement whether they're displayed in your office or in your house.These amazing prints are limited to 50 prints each and are printed on high quality Matte paper.


 

 I would like to thank you for taking the time to look at our kickstarter and supporting our hard work and creativity. Its truly amazing to have you support my dreams and goals and help me get closer to making them a reality.
story_txt: Temples & Bridges sunglasses are hand crafted and designed one-by-one in the brand's workshop, which lends a personalized approach to each pair. Each pair will be crafted with Carl Zeiss quality sun lenses. From bohemian and retro to classic and stealth, there are varieties for those looking to have their eyewear become an extension of their personal style.“Our unique handcrafting system ensures a more precise and comfortable fit than obtainable from standard off the shelf designs. There’s not a brand out here that can give you that feeling of flashiness with a great design, craftsmanship, and material such as Temples & Bridges. We use classical shapes and accents that make them not only modern but gives you a feeling and new persona when worn," commented Tito Riveros, the brand's founder.We at Temples & Bridges aim to protect the eyes and enhance faces of men and women all over the world, by manufacturing and selling sunwear characterized by their high technical and stylistic quality, in order to maximize our customers' wellbeing, style and satisfaction. Our sunwear is the result of a continuous research and development process, aiming at anticipating and interpreting the needs, wishes and aspirations of people around the world.About Carl Zeiss Vision SunlensCarl Zeiss Vision Sunlens is dedicated to research, development and production of high quality sunlenses, that offer to the consumers protection from sun rays, but also superior optical performance. story:
The Haywire Republic Story

Hey Indiegogo!

My name is Rebecca Corrigan. I'm a model, fashion guru & creator/designer of Haywire Republic. I was born & raised in San Antonio, Texas and although I live in Holleywood I will forever remain a Texan at heart.

 

 Being tied to the modeling world I've learned the ins & outs of fashion, particularly the Jewelry industry.  I've always believed that no outfit is ever complete without a fine piece of jewelry; however, I also believe that cheap jewelry is worse than no jewelry at all... 

The problem with desirable jewelry today (unique design, high quality, affordable price) is that it is nearly impossible to find. It's either high quality = high price or usually poor quality = unoriginal cheap jewelry. This makes Jewelry shopping increasingly frustrating for the average young fashionista like myself. 

 

I'm combining my fashion knowledge/background with my southern roots to create an authentic and affordable cowgirl chic fashion jewelry line.

 

Being a model in Hollywood I have a unique upper hand in creating a fashion jewelry line. I've been able to built up an incredible network of fashion designers, stylists & very influential fashion bloggers with a vast social network. Through my fashion connections I've been working with the same technical jewelry design team that manufacturers for jewelmint.com and for the past 4 months turning my vision & Jewelry concepts into working pieces.


Where Will YOUR money GO?

The technical sketches & designs are complete and my first round of sample pieces are already manufactured and in hand. It's time for mass production! In order to be able to launch my business I will need a minimum of 100 pieces of each (12)design. Your money will go toward the overall mass production.

I will update you with pictures, videos & more to make sure you know exactly where we are every step of the way!

The Impact

My Jewelry line will allow women to indulge in a brand that is unique in every way, even if they are on a tight budget. My  hopes are that when my jewelry line takes off it will influence young Americans to embrace their entrepreneurial spirit and encourage them to pursue what they are passionate about.


The Perks!

Please make sure to check out the wonderful perks that come along with helping me start my business. Not only will you feel good but you'll end up looking good too! You can receive up to 6 pieces of jewelry & a $500 gift card! 

Other Ways You Can Help

DIWO!!!  ("Do It With Others") By sending my Indiegogo page to your friends & family the chances of accomplishing my target amount become immensely  higher! Help me make some noise about Haywire Republic!!!
