story:
Dog On The Go Is On A Mission To Equip Dog Owners With The Perfect Travel Pack For Dogs

 ~~~~~   Packed With More Than 20 Items   ~~~~~

Check Out "A LOOK IN THE BAG" Product Highlights In The UPDATES Section!

SEE FULL DESCRIPTION BELOW!!

HOW YOU CAN HELP LAUNCH THE DOG ON THE GO:

Friends coming to this Indigogo site are saying, "I DON'T GET IT!  HOW DOES THIS WORK? WHY ARE YOU DOING INDIEGOGO?"

(1) Your contribution will help me launch The Dog On The Go. The use of proceeds is to purchase initial minimum quantity inventory from suppliers, enhance our website, and begin marketing the product. 

(2) As a "thank you" for your contribution, you receive a "PERK" based upon the contribution made.

(3) Indiegogo was selected as the launching pad for "The Dog On The Go" to help get some early pre-launch exposure to the product.  Crowd funding is the newest and perhaps most intriguing way to fund a project or idea, so I thought I'd give it a try.

(4) You can help by making a contribution and/or sharing this project with your friends!!

THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

 

MY STORY - See a need and fill it!

With businesses becoming increasingly dog-friendly, more Americans than ever are taking their dogs to work and traveling with their dogs.

I learned the hard way that when you have a Dog On The Go, you not only need to have necessities, you also need to be prepared for the unexpected.

I often found myself saying, "Oops! I forgot…", or "Wish I had…" or "Yuck! How am I going to clean THAT up?"

I tried to find a complete travel pack for dogs and when I couldn't find one,I ended up putting together the ideal travel pack for my dog Gracie. When a friend saw it she said, "I need one of those," and another said, "You should sell these!"

So, here it is!  The Dog On The Go Travel Pack!

Whether it's a day at the office, a car ride to the beach, a weekend getaway or a trip across the country, if YOU have a dog on the go, you’ll love The Dog On The Go Travel Pack!

Makes a great gift, too!

 

**PERKS! PERKS! PERKS!**

We’ve got great perks with great stuff for dogaholics! All the product descriptions are included below, so be sure to check out all that’s packed in The Dog On The Go Travel Pack! And see our daily updates "A LOOK IN THE BAG" featuring product highlights!

Everyone will get a shout out – make that a "Bark Out" – on the IndieGoGo page of our website www.TheDogOnTheGo.com!

Shipping is included to all 50 US states. Actual shipping charges outside the US will be additional. 

 

WHAT’S IN THE DOG ON THE GO TRAVEL PACK?

The Dog On The Go Travel Pack includes 23 items I have personally needed when traveling with Gracie. Some are hard to find items like the PetScan thermometer strip. (Don’t know about you, but I can’t imagine using a rectal thermometer!)

Other items are things you just wouldn’t think of until you need it, like the pet first aid kit or the carpet cleaner! Some you hope you never have to use - especially the personalized "LOST" poster, which you should never leave home without.

I tried and tested lots of products and here’s what’s included in the pack….

  • The Dog On The Go Backpack. This durable polycanvas backpack measures 17" x 12-1/2" x 7" and features a large interior compartment to hold all The Dog On The Go items. There is a front zippered pocket along with an easily accessible side pocket to hold the water bottle. Two adjustable shoulder pads and a nylon carrying strap make for flexibility in carrying.

 

  • Water Bottle. We tested several, and this is THE BEST travel water bottle/bowl on the market!! It is leak-free even when held upside down and the wide-mouth bottle allows you to easily fill it with water and even ice. Extra water left in the bowl tips back into the bottle, so there is no wasting water when you’re out-and- about. Includes a belt or waist-band clip as well. BPA free and dishwasher safe (top rack).

 

  • Travel Food Container/Bowls. This multi-purpose self-contained travel food container is a terrific way to not only hold the kibble (about 8 cups), but includes easily removable food and water bowls! The airtight container keeps food fresh and its compact design allows you to provide easy feeding when on the go. Your choice – Pink or Blue. Gracie and I both LOVE this!!

 

  • Pet First Aid Kit. Pet emergencies happen, so it’s important to have what you need to comfort your pet until you can seek professional help. Being prepared will be of comfort to you too! Our first aid kit contains: 3 antiseptic towelettes; 4 ear cleanser swabs; 2 2'' x 3'' non-adherent pads; 2 2'' x 3'' adhesive pads; 1 set of gloves; 1 tweezers; 1 roll of tape; 1 scissors; 1 pet first aid guide.

 

  • PetScan Dog Thermometer Strip. Simply place the PetScan dog thermometer strip on your dog’s belly to determine if they have an elevated temperature. Temperature is indicated by the color change of the paws on the front of the thermometer strip. (Personal experience: Gracie got real sick on one trip. The first thing the vet asked when I called was if she had a fever!)

 

  • "Dog in Car"sign. This sign affixes to the window with a suction cup to alert first-responders in case of an accident that your dog is in the car. (Note: Please be sure your dog is safely secured when riding in the car!)

 

  • Waste Bags with Dispenser. It’s not only courteous to pickup after your dog, in some places it’s the law. This bone-shaped dispenser can be attached to the outside of The Dog On The Go backpack, or onto your leash, if you prefer, so you can always be prepared! Contains 20 waste bags.

 

  • Personalized "LOST DOG" poster. Can you imagine being away from home and losing your dog? We hope it NEVER happens, but it’s important to be prepared. The Dog On The Go pack includes a personalized LOST DOG poster. Just send us photos (up to three) of your dog, along with a description, breed, gender, microchip number (if applicable), contact numbers (up to two) Contact name(s) (first name only, up to two).

 

  • Document Holder. This document holder will allow you to neatly keep and organize certain documents you should always have when traveling with your dog, such as a copy of their vaccination certification, insurance information and the Lost Dog poster.

 

  • Super-absorbent drying towel. Rain, puddles or a dip in the lake will get your dog on the go wet. You can be prepared for any situation, including if you have to give your dirty dog a quick bath, with this super-absorbent 20.5" x 12.5" drying towel. It is designed to absorb 10 times its weight in liquid, and will dry your dog quickly without affecting the coat.

 

  • Dual sided dog brush. If your dog is long or short-haired, and whether or not it sheds, grooming while "on the go" is important. One side of this wooden-handled brush has soft bristles, and the other metal pins.

 

  • Treat Bag. At home or on the go, we all know how much our dogs love treats! This treat bag will keep your dog’s favorite treats easily accessible. Contains an inner drawstring, and a clip to attach to your belt or The Dog On The Go backpack.

 

  • Treats!! (6 oz) These bacon flavored treats include vitamins and Omega 3s & 6s. Made in Canada.

 

  • Carpet spot remover and deodorizer.  (13 oz) Even the most housebroken dogs can have an accident in a hotel room or when you’re a guest in someone’s home. You’ll be prepared to clean it up!

 

  • Lint brush. Although we love our dogs, we don’t love wearing their fur on our clothes. Since even dogs that don’t shed have loose hairs that stick to clothing, you’ll need The Dog On The Go lint brush that grabs the hairs to wipe them away.

 

  • Spare Leash. It’s not unusual to lose or misplace a leash, and when it happens away from home, it’s not always easy to find a place to buy one. The Dog On The Go travel kit includes a 6’ nylon leash with a wrist strap and metal spring clip latch.

 

  • Rope/ball toy. Great for tugging, retrieving or just chewing this rope toy promotes hours of exercise while having fun. Toy is made of tightly wound rope and is threaded through a tough tennis ball.

 

  • Potty Pads. Whether you’re traveling with a new puppy or an adult dog, these 22" x 21-1/2" potty pads are a necessary "just-in-case" item, even if your dog is completely housebroken. These extra-absorbent pads have a plastic bottom to protect floor surfaces. (Personal experience: Works great in an airport’s rest-room handicap stall!)

 

  • Disposable gloves. For those unexpected messes, especially if your dog gets ill, the Dog On The Go travel kit includes 10 (5 pair) of disposable gloves. (One size fits most,) (Personal experience: Hmmm... I think I’ll spare you the details! The gloves are definitely a must-have item!)

 

  • Anti-bacterial hand wipes. Since you never know what unpleasant things might get on your hands when traveling with your dog, the Dog On The Go travel kit includes anti-bacterial hand wipes for those "just-in-case" times. Includes 36 fresh scented alcohol free antibacterial sanitizer wipes. Sanitizer kills 99.9% of germs when used correctly. (Personal experience: I’m sure I’m not the only one who has gotten "Resi-doodoo" on my hands. EWWW!)

 

  • Paw/Body Wipes. (15) A Dog On the Go is likely to go through dirt, mud or even blacktop that gets their paws dirty. These 9"x 9" wipes provide a fast and easy way to clean those dirty paws, as well as to wipe away overall dirt, odor and even dander from their coat. (Personal experience: An absolute travel must especially for white and light colored dogs!)

 

  • Eyes Wipes. (12) It’s important to maintain clean eyes even when traveling. These eye wipes allow you to clean discharge and tear stains from around the eye area.

 

  • Ear Wipes. (12) Dogs ears get dirty even when on the go! These ear wipes help to clear wax, dirt and other unwanted matter from your dog’s ears.

 

  • Bowl and toy wipes. (36) When traveling, you often have limited access to water for cleaning your dog’s bowl, toys and other items that may get slobbered on. These wipes are specially formulated to clean these items and more.

 

A $130 VALUE IF PURCHASED SEPARATELY!

(Please note some items may be a different color or not exactly as pictured based on suppliers' inventories.)

ã€€**********************************************************

The funds collected will be used:

  • To purchase initial inventory
  • Enhance the website 
  • Launch The Dog On The Go Travel Pack

 A bit about me…

I’m a serial entrepreneur who has spent nearly 20 years in executive management of five publicly traded companies. Having done a series of acquisitions I am in the process of publishing a book entitled, "Selling Your Business? You've Got To Be Prepared". (Trust me, most people are not!)

I travel extensively with my dog, Gracie and don't leave home without her! Realizing it took almost as much time to pack her bag as it did to pack mine,  I saw the need for The Dog On The Go Travel Pack, and decided to fill it!

Launch The Dog On The Go Travel Pack

 A bit about me…
I’m a serial entrepreneur who has spent nearly 20 years in executive management of five publicly traded companies. Having done a series of acquisitions I am in the process of publishing a book entitled, "Selling Your Business? You've Got To Be Prepared". (Trust me, most people are not!)
I travel extensively with my dog, Gracie and don't leave home without her! Realizing it took almost as much time to pack her bag as it did to pack mine,  I saw the need for The Dog On The Go Travel Pack, and decided to fill it!

story:
Above is a picture of Syndicate Brand HQ, where all of our products are made.

Who we are and why we're here!

We are Syndicate Brand, a sustainable jewelry, apparel, and lifestyle brand based in Oakland, CA. We produce cutting edge, original looks for men and women made of upcycled. We use sustainable and salvage woods, metals, fabrics, and more and transform them into beautiful things from jewelry to furniture. Up until now, the craft inside Syndicate Brand has been edgy, unique, and put together in the best ways possible with the few tools we have. Now, we need new tools and machines to help us produce more and better quality goods which we can sell to more stores, and we're hoping you can help!

Our designs + Our designers!

 

CLOCKWISE FROM TOP LEFT: Button down shirt made from upcycled denim, Mahogany Portal Pendant w/ Glass, Survival Kit Earring St, Bubinga Hardwood Ring, Denim/Sterling Bracelet Convertible, Wenge Hardwood Ring with gift-box~

Syndicate Brand is truly based on design and the elements of social responsibility, which are both built into each product that we intend to make. Everything made by S.B. is done so in Oakland, CA right here in this studio, and has a strong history in the Bay, though is inspired by a great multitude of other designers and crafters the world round. Based on collecting materials from flea markets, art suppliers, or sustainable lumber companies, we have come up with many excellent and fiery accessories over the past few years. Our passion is definitely pushing towards newer and more expansive ideas for both the products and how we can give back to the community.

Currently, we have a tremendous previous collection, comprised of one-of-a-kind necklaces and several made-to-order pendants, along with our brilliant and popular Hardwood Rings in two bold styles, along with a few other collections of accessories, all of which is available as gifts for donating to our cause! 

Though we have some means to continue making our products and hopefully adding some new ones, the prospect becomes difficult as some tools, equipment and materials are certainly needed to adapt. This is where you come in to help~ By contributing to our cause, we will be more able to add our new pieces, such as woven wristwear, brand new long sleeve shirts from sustainable fabrics, and a really spectacular and surprise addition to our jewelry lines! Lastly, we have also been working on a separate collection of hygienic and personal lifestyle products which will be made from all organic ingredients!

All of this and many new designs are in the works and we're readying ourselves for the ability to machine and handmake our new items for you and the world-

Social responsibility

What we've begun doing, as a token of our love for culture, is giving 33% back of all product sales to a small program of food donation in the bay area~ Whatever we make after we've invested our IndieGoGo funds is definitely apart of this idea and we intend to continue giving back to the people!

What we will do with the funds

We are asking for $3000 because we've done our homework, and the tools and materials required to make our new lines fit well into this figure, such as the Micro-Lathe which will help with some of our jewelry which costs $600 by itself, along with the materials to compose the jewelry and new shirts and clothing, which usually equal to $10 of average material costs per piece! If you add it all up, we certainly aren't asking for more than we need~

Here are some more details about where the money will go:

Facility Rent- $400

Tickets to Event- $300

Micro-Lathe- $595

Serger Sewing Machine- $200

Rock Tumbler- $100

Dremel Drill Press- $50

Alembic Still- $120

Small Water Pumps (Diamond Cutting Station)- $40

Techshop Facility Membership- $100

Materials for New Products- $10 per piece (average) x 20

Dremel/Rotary Bits- $5ea (average) x 10

= approx. $2300 w/ tax

Other items will be:

Display box/Gift Boxes and Foam Inserts

Displays for Shows/Events Coming up

Filters

Respirator

Iodine Cleaning Solution

Tung Oil Polish (for wood)

+

Materials for all gifts included for our awesome contributors!

=$3000+ (we've spent some of our own money too!)

PERKS!

The gifts we'll be sending your way are listed in the PERKS section as well as below:

$5: Your name will be featured on our Contributors web-page, where everyone who designs and helps the brand is shown!

$25: Permanent Shout Out!, plus you'll receive a ticket to RAW San Francisco's Event at 1015 Folsom on June 27th. Syndicate Brand will be featured here with lots of great pieces! This is a nice and fun way to support and see what we make along with other local SF artists!

$50: This perk offers a Permanent Shout Out! on our web page, 1 invitation ticket to Raw SF this June, and your choice from our line of beautifully hand-crafted Hardwood Rings, either from online or at the event!

$60: Your name on our page, + a ticket to an amazing event, and our newest denim/sterling bracelet/necklace convertible. see here: http://syndicatebrand.com/denimsterling

$80: For this amount, you'll get both the Shout Out and an Invitation, and also a Custom Made MEN'S DRESS SHIRT. You will get a private design session with our apparel visionary Irys Kornbluth to brainstorm concept, colors, fabric, and fit. You will end up with a dress shirt that expresses your personal style, tailored to exactly your size!

$100: You'll receive a Shout Out, an Invitation, and your choice of a one-of-a-kind necklace from our available collection, or two handcrafted Hardwood Rings of any variety!

$150: This amount will get you the Shout Out!, and 4 tix to the RAW SF event- Great if you have a few friends to bring along for an amazing night of art/fashion in a great venue. + You'll get 1 of any item we carry from our current collection (check online store).

$200: For this amount, you will receive Shout Out!, 2 RAW SF Invitations, A custom designed dress shirt or pre-order for our current design, and any two pieces of different jewelry that we carry. This is our "special offer," providing a great amount for a fair price!

$500: Along with our Shout Out to you, and 2 RAW SF Tickets, you will receive 1 each of the different styles of jewelry we carry, by your choices, and a Custom Consultation Order of any type Accessory/Clothing Article!

$1000: By contributing for this PERK, you will receive a Photograph & Shout Out! on our web Contributor Page!, 3 RAW SF Invitation for June 27th, 1 each of our current and UPCOMING Jewelry collection (LOTS OF GIFTS!), a Pre-Order for our First Button-Down Shirt or a custom consultation for a shirt~ + YOU'LL GET a Fully Accommodated Tour of our workshop/operations and the awesome neighborhood we work in, Jack London Square, and Introduction to Syndicate Brand's platform for green crafting! 

$1500: Fit for Kendrick Lamar, by contributing at this level, you will get a custom tailoring session to produce the suit of your dreams.

 

We understand not everyone is in the place to contribute through Indiegogo, though we hope if you like what we're doing, you'll spread the word for us to your friends and family! Please share this campaign through your twitter/facebook if you have a moment! Thanks tremendously!

story:
I would like to thank everyone who supported our campaign. If you are just now finding us and would like to purchase an Exhale fan, our online store is now accepting preOrders!

For the latest news and updates,
visit our website at: http://www.ExhaleFans.com
Updated-Full Scale Smoke Demo [click here]
NEW! - Color is now available.
Free for all Indiegogo backers! You will be able to choose your color after the campaign.
     
Cool White

Available in all white or with gray accent ring!
Ivory


Available in all ivory or with gray accent ring!


Great for the more traditional designed interior.
Light Gray


Perfect for homes with dark ceilings, "The man cave",
or restaurants that want the
fan to just blend away!

Dark Gray
Pretty in Pink!


"No boys allowed!"

Colors lovingly named
by my little princess!

Lovely Lavender
Light Blue



"Girls have Cooties!"

Safe for bunk beds.

Fire Engine Red!
You will be able to choose your color at the end of the campaign.
Colors shown are renderings and actual color may vary slightly.
What Others Are Saying
"An innovative ceiling fan which not only does away with the classic bladed design, but improves airflow by producing a quiet, recirculating vortex of air"
TheAwesomer 		"It's not every day that someone comes up with a new design for a ceiling fan that both looks and functions better than the original"—Evan Ackerman 
DVICE
"It’s never easy and takes guts to reform something that has remained basically the same for years. Enter Exhale Fan, a new spin on the design and functioning of a ceiling fan."—Naveen Kumar 
HomeChunk 		"Exhale Ceiling Fan Could Be the Bladeless Air Moving Contraption You Have Been Looking For"—C. S. Magor 
UberReview
"A genius reinvention of the ceiling fan"—Dave Parrak 
Gizmag 		 
Breaking Convention

I have always been interested in innovation, combining simple solutions with elegant design.  The Exhale was inspired by 19th century inventor Nikola Tesla and is the world's first truly bladeless ceiling fan.  It utilizes the science of laminar flow between an array of flat disks to efficiently move air throughout your environment.  This laminar movement creates a smooth uninterrupted airflow with virtually no noise.
Vortex Airflow, Unmatched Comfort

The vortex airflow profile generated by the Exhale fan is unmatched in the ceiling fan industry. Air is not simply directed straight down, but moves around the room in a 360° horizontal flow.  The air passes over you from the side as if you were experiencing a cool spring day with its fresh-feeling and calm breeze.


     

This cyclonic airflow multiplies as the Exhale runs, mixing the air to eliminate hot and cold spots.  This complete homogenization of the air stabilizes the temperature, reducing stress on your air conditioning or heating system. Fewer cycles on your HVAC system results in lower heating and cooling bills.

We have made a 1/6th scale demo to show the vortex flow created by the Exhale fan. This test was performed in water with slightly less than buoyant material added to aid with the visualization. Enjoy!

Since our 1/6th scale water demo, we have been asked many times for a smoke filled full scale demo to show the vortex flow created by the Exhale fan.

So we did, Enjoy!
Tech Specs
  • Width: 34" (863.6mm)
  • Height: 7.25" (184.15mm)
  • Weight: 25lbs (11.3Kg)
  • Material: Precision injection molded plastic
  • Motor: High efficiency DC (34 watts max)
  • CFM: 3,186 @ High speed (93.7 CFM/Watt)
  • Sound Level dB -see chart
  • Power: 120v/60Hz or 240v/50Hz
  • Control: Wireless 6-speed remote
  • Coverage: Effective in rooms up to 20'x20'
  • MSRP: $499.99 in standard white (45%-50% off for backers)
Fan Speed RPM Sound Analysis in dB
Low 80 33-35
Level 2 120 35-37
Level 3 160 36-38
Level 4 200 37-38
Level 5 240 38-41
High 280 40-43
* Readings were taken directly below the fan in the center of the room 3' above the floor. -Baseline dB while fan was not running: 33-34
From Rendering to Reality

Form does not always have to follow function.  We have worked tirelessly to create a minimalistic design without sacrificing performance that appeals to the sophisticated designer in all of us.  The Exhale fan fits comfortably in any room from the ultra modern to traditional.


What we've done:  For the past 18 months, Exhale fans has been perfecting the function and design through renderings, computer modeling, and prototypes.  We have started manufacturing our production tooling and it is nearing completion.

A high efficiency DC motor with 6-speed wireless remote has been sourced to bring the fan to life.  These DC ceiling fan motors reduce operating costs by 50%-80% over their AC counterparts.  We worked very closely with the manufacturer to custom build a model that will maximize the effectiveness of the laminar flow while not increasing power usage. 

What we are doing:  After receiving the first parts from our production tools, we are perfecting the fit and finish as well as selecting the proper material to be used.  Packaging engineers are already working on initial designs for our review and testing.  Prototyping and tool building is very expensive.  At this point, we have "broke the piggy bank" and need your help to finish what we have started. 

What we will do:  Our continued goal is to use our experience and advanced design techniques to build the best product for our customers.

What's the money for?:

  • Finalizing the tooling
  • Packaging design - We want to make sure your fan gets to your ceiling.
  • UL approval
  • Raw materials
  • Press time
Official Time Line   ETA
Design Done!  
Prototyping Done!  
Packaging Design - Done!  
  Tooling Jan 15th
UL Approval Pending!  
Tooling Main Tooling - Done!  
  Finalizing Texture Jan 15th
  Production Ready Feb 15th
  Initial Run Mar 1st
Estimated First Shipments   Mar 15th
Inventors Story -Nik Hiner

I get excited about products with great design that seem to utilize the simplest solutions for every day problems. A few years ago I found myself in a conundrum that I just couldn't get off my mind. I started to take a look at the current ceiling fans installed in my house and was unsatisfied with their look and performance. My wife and I decided it was time to replace our outdated fans, but were even more disappointed in the options that were available on the market. It was in that moment that inspiration struck. "Cyclonic air movement"

Studying the science surrounding Nikola Tesla's bladeless turbines led me to a breakthrough that I knew was the perfect solution to the problem that was plaguing my thoughts. In 2005 the first bladeless ceiling fan was born. It wasn't aesthetically pleasing nor was it overwhelmingly functional, but it worked! Over the next few years, many prototypes and design changes were created, and the product started to take shape.

Today with the help of my co-founder, Richard Halsall, we have been able to develop that initial thought into the world's first truly bladeless ceiling fan. Exhale Fans continued goal is to constantly innovate in the ceiling fan industry and bring inspiring designs to those who love innovation as much as we do.
FAQs
  • Q: I have a vaulted ceiling, can I still get one?
  • A: Of Course! Down rods can be used for slanted/vaulted ceilings and are available at your local hardware store in various lengths.
  • Q: Why does the fan look wobbly?
  • A: The fan in the video is the first prototype test from the production tooling. (Discs were not perfectly flat)
  • Q: Where is the light?
  • A: We are currently working on LED based lighting systems. - ETA:Q2 2013. The fan does have a removable cap near the base of the central hub that houses an electrical junction box that will accept existing lighting kits.
  • Q: Is it easy to clean?
  • A: Yes... The leading edge of any fan will collect dust. Using a standard brush adapter with your vacuum removes it with ease. (Set the fan to low speed while cleaning!)
  • Q: Didn't Dyson make this already?
  • A: No... The Dyson air multiplier uses a high speed impeller motor to direct up and out a nozzle on the leading edge. The Exhale uses laminar flow and uniform circular motion to draw air through the fan.
  • Q: Does the fan make a lot of noise?
  • A: Not at all... The laminar flow makes virtually no noise and our DC motor has upgraded bearings for quiet operation. -Sound Analysis chart in the Tech Specs above.
  • Q: How does heating/cooling work, Do I need to reverse directions?
  • A: No... The spinning movement of the air generated by the Exhale homogenizes the air in the entire room. Summer or winter, there is no need to reverse directions like bladed fans.
Starving For More?

For more information about the Exhale™ Fan, please visit our website @ www.ExhaleFans.com

A: Yes... The leading edge of any fan will collect dust. Using a standard brush adapter with your vacuum removes it with ease. (Set the fan to low speed while cleaning!)


Q: Didn't Dyson make this already?
A: No... The Dyson air multiplier uses a high speed impeller motor to direct up and out a nozzle on the leading edge. The Exhale uses laminar flow and uniform circular motion to draw air through the fan.


Q: Does the fan make a lot of noise?
A: Not at all... The laminar flow makes virtually no noise and our DC motor has upgraded bearings for quiet operation. -Sound Analysis chart in the Tech Specs above.


Q: How does heating/cooling work, Do I need to reverse directions?
A: No... The spinning movement of the air generated by the Exhale homogenizes the air in the entire room. Summer or winter, there is no need to reverse directions like bladed fans.





Starving For More?
For more information about the Exhale™ Fan, please visit our website @ www.ExhaleFans.com

story:
***

Thanks so much to everyone for all of your support! Posters will be shipping out at the end of this month, and t-shirts are to follow toward the end of October.

If you missed the boat with the fundraising campaign, not to worry! You can still place a pre-order at http://alisonrowan.bigcartel.com

Thanks again!

***

11x17" Poster Design

What's This "That's So Gay" Business?

Hello! I'm Alison Rowan, an 18 year-old graphic design student, and "That's so gay" is something I hear far too often, especially among people my own age. It's used to mean that something is stupid or uncool or otherwise negative, which is not only offensive, but frankly, it doesn't make the speaker sound like the sharpest tool in the shed, either.

These t-shirts and posters were designed to challenge the phrase by targeting the speaker and letting them know that they have so many other words to choose from—So many options which better articulate their point and don't have hurtful side-effects if they'd simply rethink their derogatory word choice a little, instead of contributing to negative connotations of homosexuality. 

Hopefully this design will be able to get those who use the phrase to stop and really think about what they're saying, and how they're shaping the attitude of our culture in doing so. By contributing to this project and displaying a poster or wearing a t-shirt, you'll be helping to do just that. 

T-Shirt Design, Pictured on Women's Fit

Sure, But How Can I Help?

Your funding for this project is essential in getting this design out to the world, where it can really do its work. Printers require a certain order size to bother printing a design at all, which is the challenge for a one-person endeavour like this. My fundraising goal is $1500, which will cover the cost of the first printing.

By contributing, you're pre-ordering your own copies of posters and/or t-shirts depending on the reward level you choose, and in doing so, you're helping to meet the minimum number required for an initial print run. This is your opportunity to ensure that you'll be one of the first people in the world to own a copy of the design! Contributions will also go toward covering the time required to package and ship orders. If a substantial amount of extra funds are raised, they will go toward making the t-shirts and posters available offline through Toronto craft shows by covering the costs required for vendor fees and building an inventory.

 8x10" Poster Design

The Fine Print: Specs & Sizing 

Posters

  • Printed on Matte Cardstock
  • 8x10"
  • 11x17"

Women's T-Shirts

  • Printed on American Apparel Fine Jersey Women's T-Shirts
  • Available in sizes S, M, L, XL, 2X

Unisex T-Shirts

  • Printed on American Apparel Fine Jersey T-Shirts
  • Available in sizes XS, S, M, L, XL, 2X, 3X

Getting Your Reward

Once the fundraising term is complete, I'll be in touch with you to find out all the details needed for your specific reward choice, whether it's simply your shipping address, or your t-shirt style (unisex/female) and sizing information, as well. 

Please make sure to read the shipping information related to your specific reward package, listed at right. Shipping costs to Canada are included in the reward cost. If you live in the United States or elsewhere, you'll need to add the specified amount to your contribution to cover shipping. 

This is a flexible funding campaign, so even if the full funding goal isn't raised, the reward you've earned will still be headed your way! That said, the world needs this design and it's our job to get it out there. If you want to see "That's so gay" erased from everyday speech as much as I do, this is your chance. You can help by spreading the word—whether you work best in person or by harnessing your social media skills, your sharing is much appreciated. 

"That's so gay" needs to go away—And we're here to make that happen.

story:
Hello!

My name is Irfaan and I am a 15 year old designer from the heart of the UK.

I have been interested in clothing for over 3 years now and it was only until this year I realised whats stopping me from having my own clothing line!

So I thought its better late than never and so here is my clothing line.


I have huge dreams and I am trying to make them a reality and I hope you will also help me to chase my dreams.

I have been into design for well over a year now however I wasn't designing clothing then, I was designing other graphic design things like website banners and headers. I also made speed arts of me designing on YouTube and that really inspired me to take my designing abilities further, by reading the positive comments it made me realize that I was good and that people were actually interested in what I make.


I have also posted most of my designs on my Instagram (@irfn_uk)

After posting my designs on Instagram, I started getting alot of positive comments and my likes starting going up rapidly. This showed to me that there was something good about my clothing and it really made me believe in myself. 

Many people also started asking me where they can buy the tees, however unfortunately I had to tell them that they haven't been printed yet because I don't have the money.

And so this is the reason I have made this campaign, 

I am asking for you kind people to donate towards the printing of my tees, so I can kickstart my company off.  I am only young and your money will help me enormously!

With the money I will:

  • Print the T-Shirts
  • Buy the tags and labels to go with it
  • Make more designs

Thank You

- Irfaan

story:
We've launched our website at www.taraand.co! 

Buy directly from us for the best pricing.

Curious how our bag works?  Watch this one minute video to check out  all our features.

 

Founded by ex-Facebooker and female entrepreneur, Julia Lam, Tara creates beautiful accessories that provide both form and function for your everyday life.

Tara&Co was born out my own need when I was running around from meeting to social event to a meeting doing business at my last company.  I was injuring my shoulder by dragging around my life in my handbag, but ultimately needed to present the most "professional" look to get business done.  I thought, there's got to be a better way.

The name, “Tara” is inspired and named after “Green Tara” the Buddhist mother goddess, who represents action, great strength, and the virtues of success in work and achievements.  We felt like this represented the women we were designing for.

Our first product is a highly stylish 2-in-1 convertible bag that fits up to a 13" laptop.
 
*Photo by Kimberly Brizzollara
 

A $395 That You Won't Regret.

We're spent countless hours researching and crafting a bag that won't let you down. We believe in it 100 percent. Stop purchasing bags for different occasions that won't hold up: Tara&Co can take you anywhere, anytime.

 
 
 
 

 

There were two main problems we were trying to address with this bag:

  1. The ability for distributed weight when you need it (a backpack), but to look professional when you want to (a shoulder bag).  
  2. Stopping "bags within bags."  Too often we see women carry a smaller bag within a larger work bag because one bag doesn't suit their needs.  With the Tracy, you have a 2-in-1 bag, so you never need to carry two separate bags again.

You might wonder how we name our products -- we name products after women who inspire us.  Our first bag is named, “The Tracy,” after Tracy Chou – former Pinterest and Quora engineer and entrepreneur – for her work in diversity and women-in-tech.  Her blog post spurred 250 tech companies to release their otherwise well guarded diversity numbers so we could have a real conversation about diversity.  We're excited to honor her and name this bag after her.

2-in-1 Bag Design.

The Tracy is a 2-in- 1 convertible tote style bag in soft, genuine leather for the contemporary woman on-the- go. We're a bag that works for you.  We convert to provide four distinctive looks for work or evening functions.

We're made for women who carry devices.  We fit up to a 13” laptop and have a zip-off clutch.

 

Zip-off Clutch.

Oh yes, we did!  The flap of your Tracy zips off to become a stand-alone piece, so you can grab your basics, and go.

No more bags within bags.

Women love to just take the clutch for lunch, dinner, or errands, when it's more appropriate to have a smaller bag.  Next time you don't have to lug everything, you can just take this.  The clutch comes with its own pocket and detachable strap. ​

 

3-Way Wear.  

Feel great wherever you are.  No more shoulders hurting, or feeling "too young" at a meeting.  Our easy slide-and- go strap allows the bag to be worn 3-ways -- shoulder style as a tote, a cross-body, or as a conventional backpack.  Just pull one up for a shoulder bag or cross-body, and pull out for a backpack.  It converts between them in a snap.  You don't have to deal with complicated conversions!

Our straps are made with leather on the outside and a soft nylon on the inside to look great, but wear most comfortably in any situation.

 

 

Fits your life.

We hold everything you need in your bag.  We know busy women have busy lives, so The Tracy is there to assist you.

 

Personalized.  

Sometimes you want to accessorize your outfit, or have a night out on the town.  That's why today we're releasing two other clutch colors - Cerulean Teal and Lava Red.  Use them in two ways: 1) Wear the clutches as their own piece or 2) Use them to easily change and personalize the color of your flap.  Our clutches come with their own pocket and strap so you can look great from day to night.

Expandable Side Pockets.

Sometimes you just need extra space.  That's why we've designed two expandable zip-out side pockets when you need them.  They sit sleek and flat along the side of your bag, but you can expand them out to hold water, an umbrella, or other needs.

 

Easy Access Back Phone Pocket.  

We know you have calls, texts, messages, and apps that you need when you're on-the-go, so we've developed an easy to reach back pocket which keeps your phone safe, secure, and easy to access.

 

Organization.  

We created lots of compartments for everything you bring everyday.  We polled hundreds of women on what they carry in their bags and designed a spot for anything that over 50% of women carried daily.

This includes a padded pocket for devices, 2 zippered pockets, and places for your keys, sunglasses, lip gloss, pens, bus passes, and more.

 

Best Materials.

Your Tracy not only looks good, it feels good.  It's made out of genuine soft leather & the best YKK zippers.

Bag Specs

  • Tote: Height: 14”, Width: 11”, Depth: 4”.  Please choose a strap based on height. Short Strap Length: 48” (under 5'4), Standard Strap Length: 60” (Everyone Else)
  • Clutch: Height: 6.5”, Width: 11”, Removable Strap Length: 20”
  • Genuine Soft Leather.   Weight: 3.5 lbs.

*Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.

We've tested with CEOs, consultants, teachers, mothers and more!  They love their Tracy bag which suits their needs for many occasions.

This is a perfect gift for you, or the professional woman in your life.  Great for graduation gifts, business gifts, holiday gifts, or just to tell the woman in your life that you love her.

Women who travel often, like consultants, no longer have to take two bags, they just take The Tracy and zip-off the clutch when they need something smaller on their trips.

Every day women love The Tracy.  When you're running home from meetings, you can leave the tote of The Tracy in your car, and just take your clutch if you need to step out to the grocery store, mall, or meet up with a girlfriend.

New mothers love The Tracy since they can put their baby in the front, and The Tracy in the back to look stylish and still carry the things they need for their new family.

 

Since we're a 2-in-1 convertible bag, we get the best of both worlds.  Learn how we differ from pure backpacks and handbags.  The Tracy has it all.

 

 

We're a team of professional women, bag designers, and mechanical engineers.  I'm a former Facebook employee and longtime female founder.  We have a collaborative building philosophy so we constantly ask professional women what they want and need and design it into our bags.

We've talked to and tested our bags with hundreds of women.  Our extended testers are excited and say they want to buy The Tracy.

We want to solve problems for professional women and the challenges they face in their day-to-day lives.  Most products out there today are not designed for women who have dynamic lifestyles.

 

With $45,000 you can help us contribute to our first run of "The Tracy" and help launch the Tara&Co brand to help reimagine products for real women everywhere.  We have bootstrapped the R&D process of the bag through 3 prototype cycles and six months of designing, re-designing, testing, iteration, and love, to get where we are today.   We're almost there.  We have a few tweaks left, and we're ready to produce. 

We're carefully fine tuning the rest of the bag, but will have it in your hands before the holidays!

 

Like any startup, there are challenges and unforeseen circumstances.  However, we have brought products to market before and are confident in our ability to do it again.  Our product is close to being finalized, but we will continue to improve the bag aesthetically and functionally, so you receive the best possible product.  That may mean tweaking, adding, or removing small features.  The product is also built in genuine leather which is beautiful and soft, malleable and flexible, and our product will behave and age as such.  Please research the characteristics of leather and make sure it's a material that you're excited about buying.

Production generally takes ~2 months of time to create, but can vary based on a number of factors including large quantity of units to create, differences in material, unclear specs etc.  Because our zippers are YKK and extremely high quality, they take over 20 days alone to order.  However, our team has produced with our high quality factory before which has created items for many retailers including Calvin Klein.

Every startup takes an army to build, and we couldn't have done it without help from so many people.

Special thanks to:

  • Andrew Imm, my co-founder at heart.
  • Emily Yau, our beautiful stop motion director.
  • Adrienne Gunde, our awesome photographer.
  • Madison McKamey, our DP for our lovely Indiegogo video.
  • Steve Jennings at Technology Design Group LLC for use of their space. 
  • Sam Brewczynski, our mechanical engineering ninja.
  • Marisa Juarez-Burdick, our amazing event guru.

and many many more....

And thank YOU for your support on our journey.  We want to empower women to feel sleek and elegant, while also being practical and useful.  We hope to simplify life, so you can focus on what matters.

We had three launch events in San Francisco, New York, and Los Angles during our campaign and hundreds of people who came out to see The Tracy 2-in-1 bag in person and help us celebrate amazing women everywhere.

Here are our photos from our events:

  • San Francisco
  • New York
  • Los Angeles

Can't wait to see you at another event near you.

 

 

 

About Us

  • How did you get this idea?  This was born out of my own frustration of not being able to find bags that were sleek and elegant, while also being practical and useful.

  • What does Tara mean?  The name, “Tara” is inspired and named after “Green Tara” the Buddhist mother goddess, who represents action, great strength, and the virtues of success in work and achievements.  We felt like this represented the women we were designing for.
  • Who is the bag named after?  We name products after women who inspire us.  Our first bag is named, “The Tracy,” after Tracy Chou – former Pinterest and Quora engineer and entrepreneur – for her work in diversity and women-in-tech.  Her blog post spurred 250 tech companies to release their otherwise well guarded diversity numbers so we could have a real conversation about diversity.
  • What problems were you trying to solve?  There were two main problems we were trying to address with this bag: 1) The ability for distributed weight when you need it (a backpack), but to look professional when you want to (a shoulder bag).  2)  Stopping "bags within bags."  Too often we see women carry a smaller bag within a larger work bag because one bag doesn't suit their needs.  With the Tracy, you have a 2-in-1 bag, so you never need to again.
  • I'm not ready to buy a Tracy, but I love your mission and would love to support!  How can I help?  We'd love your help!  If you'd like to make a smaller donation, feel free to grab a Tara Supporter Headphone Case for $25.  If you're not ready to buy, please help share our story with your family and friends.
  • Where can I learn more about Tara&Co?  You can learn more on our website: www.taraand.co
  • Where can I read about The Tracy 2-in-1 bag?  Don't take our word for The Tracy being great, take a look at some of the press about us!  We've been featured in the publications below:
    • Brit + Co: This New Convertible Bag Is a Working Woman’s Dream (5/9)
    • Trendhunter: The Tara&Co Tracy Convertible Bags Transition to Be Worn in Three Ways (5/31) 
    • The Gadget Flow: The Tara&Co Tracy 2-in-1 Bag (5/31)
    • Ashley Chloe: Seasonal Sizzle: 5 Wardrobe Basics Your Closet Needs This Summer 2017 (6/5)
    • The Fashion Lab: The Perfect Handbag for the Busy Woman (#styleforyourlife) (6/6)
    • Melanie Sutrathada: The Bag You Need to Have: TARA&CO's Convertible Tracy Bag (6/6)
    • LA Fashion Magazine: Fashion Meets Function (6/8)
    • Buzzfeed: The Next Must Have Bag For New York City's Professionals: Introducing the 2-in-1, "Tracy" Bag by TARA & CO (6/8)

Logistics

  • When will I receive my bag? You’ll have your bag in hand by end of November 2017, before the holidays arrive. 
  • Can I buy the pieces separately?  The Tracy is a 2-in-1 bag and must be purchased together.
  • What is your return policy?  We will only accept returns in case of manufacturing defects.
  • What are the bags made out of?  The bags are made out of genuine soft leather.
  • Do you have any other bags?  Currently, the Tracy is our first piece marrying the idea of fashion and function.  We plan to have more accessories in the future that are both sleek and elegant, and practical and useful.
  • Do you have smaller bags?  The Tracy is  made to carry up to a 13” laptop.  In the future, we’ll have bags of varying sizes.
  • Does The Tracy come in other materials?  Currently, The Tracy only comes in soft, genuine, leather.
  • How much will the bag retail for?  The bag will retail for $395.  We’re awarding early adopters by providing a pre-order discount.
  • Do you ship worldwide?  We currently only ship to the US and Canada.
  • How much is shipping?  Shipping costs vary depending on the package you buy.
  • What are the dimensions of the bag?  Tote: Height: 14”, Width: 11”, Depth: 4”.  Please choose a strap based on height. Short Strap Length: 48” (under 5'4), Standard Strap Length: 60” (Everyone Else)  Clutch: Height: 6.5”, Width: 11”, Removable Strap Length: 20”.  Genuine Soft Leather.   Weight: 3.5 lbs.  *Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.

*Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.We've tested with CEOs, consultants, teachers, mothers and more!  They love their Tracy bag which suits their needs for many occasions.This is a perfect gift for you, or the professional woman in your life.  Great for graduation gifts, business gifts, holiday gifts, or just to tell the woman in your life that you love her.Women who travel often, like consultants, no longer have to take two bags, they just take The Tracy and zip-off the clutch when they need something smaller on their trips.Every day women love The Tracy.  When you're running home from meetings, you can leave the tote of The Tracy in your car, and just take your clutch if you need to step out to the grocery store, mall, or meet up with a girlfriend.New mothers love The Tracy since they can put their baby in the front, and The Tracy in the back to look stylish and still carry the things they need for their new family. Since we're a 2-in-1 convertible bag, we get the best of both worlds.  Learn how we differ from pure backpacks and handbags.  The Tracy has it all.  We're a team of professional women, bag designers, and mechanical engineers.  I'm a former Facebook employee and longtime female founder.  We have a collaborative building philosophy so we constantly ask professional women what they want and need and design it into our bags.We've talked to and tested our bags with hundreds of women.  Our extended testers are excited and say they want to buy The Tracy.We want to solve problems for professional women and the challenges they face in their day-to-day lives.  Most products out there today are not designed for women who have dynamic lifestyles. With $45,000 you can help us contribute to our first run of "The Tracy" and help launch the Tara&Co brand to help reimagine products for real women everywhere.  We have bootstrapped the R&D process of the bag through 3 prototype cycles and six months of designing, re-designing, testing, iteration, and love, to get where we are today.   We're almost there.  We have a few tweaks left, and we're ready to produce. We're carefully fine tuning the rest of the bag, but will have it in your hands before the holidays! Like any startup, there are challenges and unforeseen circumstances.  However, we have brought products to market before and are confident in our ability to do it again.  Our product is close to being finalized, but we will continue to improve the bag aesthetically and functionally, so you receive the best possible product.  That may mean tweaking, adding, or removing small features.  The product is also built in genuine leather which is beautiful and soft, malleable and flexible, and our product will behave and age as such.  Please research the characteristics of leather and make sure it's a material that you're excited about buying.Production generally takes ~2 months of time to create, but can vary based on a number of factors including large quantity of units to create, differences in material, unclear specs etc.  Because our zippers are YKK and extremely high quality, they take over 20 days alone to order.  However, our team has produced with our high quality factory before which has created items for many retailers including Calvin Klein.Every startup takes an army to build, and we couldn't have done it without help from so many people.Special thanks to:
Andrew Imm, my co-founder at heart.
Emily Yau, our beautiful stop motion director.
Adrienne Gunde, our awesome photographer.
Madison McKamey, our DP for our lovely Indiegogo video.
Steve Jennings at Technology Design Group LLC for use of their space. 
Sam Brewczynski, our mechanical engineering ninja.
Marisa Juarez-Burdick, our amazing event guru.
and many many more....And thank YOU for your support on our journey.  We want to empower women to feel sleek and elegant, while also being practical and useful.  We hope to simplify life, so you can focus on what matters.We had three launch events in San Francisco, New York, and Los Angles during our campaign and hundreds of people who came out to see The Tracy 2-in-1 bag in person and help us celebrate amazing women everywhere.Here are our photos from our events:
San Francisco
New York
Los Angeles
Can't wait to see you at another event near you.   About Us
How did you get this idea?  This was born out of my own frustration of not being able to find bags that were sleek and elegant, while also being practical and useful.

What does Tara mean?  The name, “Tara” is inspired and named after “Green Tara” the Buddhist mother goddess, who represents action, great strength, and the virtues of success in work and achievements.  We felt like this represented the women we were designing for.

Who is the bag named after?  We name products after women who inspire us.  Our first bag is named, “The Tracy,” after Tracy Chou – former Pinterest and Quora engineer and entrepreneur – for her work in diversity and women-in-tech.  Her blog post spurred 250 tech companies to release their otherwise well guarded diversity numbers so we could have a real conversation about diversity.

What problems were you trying to solve?  There were two main problems we were trying to address with this bag: 1) The ability for distributed weight when you need it (a backpack), but to look professional when you want to (a shoulder bag).  2)  Stopping "bags within bags."  Too often we see women carry a smaller bag within a larger work bag because one bag doesn't suit their needs.  With the Tracy, you have a 2-in-1 bag, so you never need to again.

I'm not ready to buy a Tracy, but I love your mission and would love to support!  How can I help?  We'd love your help!  If you'd like to make a smaller donation, feel free to grab a Tara Supporter Headphone Case for $25.  If you're not ready to buy, please help share our story with your family and friends.

Where can I learn more about Tara&Co?  You can learn more on our website: www.taraand.co


Where can I read about The Tracy 2-in-1 bag?  Don't take our word for The Tracy being great, take a look at some of the press about us!  We've been featured in the publications below:

Brit + Co: This New Convertible Bag Is a Working Woman’s Dream (5/9)

Trendhunter: The Tara&Co Tracy Convertible Bags Transition to Be Worn in Three Ways (5/31) 

The Gadget Flow: The Tara&Co Tracy 2-in-1 Bag (5/31)

Ashley Chloe: Seasonal Sizzle: 5 Wardrobe Basics Your Closet Needs This Summer 2017 (6/5)

The Fashion Lab: The Perfect Handbag for the Busy Woman (#styleforyourlife) (6/6)

Melanie Sutrathada: The Bag You Need to Have: TARA&CO's Convertible Tracy Bag (6/6)

LA Fashion Magazine: Fashion Meets Function (6/8)

Buzzfeed: The Next Must Have Bag For New York City's Professionals: Introducing the 2-in-1, "Tracy" Bag by TARA & CO (6/8)


Logistics

When will I receive my bag? You’ll have your bag in hand by end of November 2017, before the holidays arrive. 

Can I buy the pieces separately?  The Tracy is a 2-in-1 bag and must be purchased together.

What is your return policy?  We will only accept returns in case of manufacturing defects.

What are the bags made out of?  The bags are made out of genuine soft leather.

Do you have any other bags?  Currently, the Tracy is our first piece marrying the idea of fashion and function.  We plan to have more accessories in the future that are both sleek and elegant, and practical and useful.

Do you have smaller bags?  The Tracy is  made to carry up to a 13” laptop.  In the future, we’ll have bags of varying sizes.

Does The Tracy come in other materials?  Currently, The Tracy only comes in soft, genuine, leather.

How much will the bag retail for?  The bag will retail for $395.  We’re awarding early adopters by providing a pre-order discount.

Do you ship worldwide?  We currently only ship to the US and Canada.

How much is shipping?  Shipping costs vary depending on the package you buy.

What are the dimensions of the bag?  Tote: Height: 14”, Width: 11”, Depth: 4”.  Please choose a strap based on height. Short Strap Length: 48” (under 5'4), Standard Strap Length: 60” (Everyone Else)  Clutch: Height: 6.5”, Width: 11”, Removable Strap Length: 20”.  Genuine Soft Leather.   Weight: 3.5 lbs.  *Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.

story:
The Problem

For years, we have been wearing swimsuits and board shorts that have been restricting and not flexible. As adventurers, we are always on the move and participating in activities that get us going! With that, we need apparel that can move with us, and not hold us back and make us uncomfortable during our journey. 

We decided to take the matter into our own hands and develop a board short that could become the perfect companion for our water adventures.

Features

  • 4-way Stretch Capabilities. These shorts are manufactured with 95% polyester and 5% spandex, giving you ultimate stretch and comfort.

  • Durable Material that Dries Quickly. We have worked with our manufacturers to source and develop a material that is durable and built to dry quickly.

  • 3 Pockets. We made it a point to add two side pockets and a back pocket to ensure that you have space to carry your items to your water destination.

  • No netting. We designed these swimmers to come without a net. As active adventurers, we have always been extremely uncomfortable with netting as it simply frays and collects unwanted goods from the water.

The Styles

The Malibu

The Powell

The Ross

The Anchorage

The Fir

 

Features List

  •  97% Polyester / 3% Spandex
  • Two side pockets 
  • One back pocket
  • Flexible drawstring
  • No inner netting
  • Above knee cut
  • Signature Dulo woven patch
  • Stretches with you

Sizing

  • Small = 28-29" waist
  • Medium = 30-31" waist
  • Large = 32-33" waist
  • XL = 34" waist

Social Impact

We have formed a strategic partnership with the Anxiety and Depression Association of America (ADAA). You can visit their site here and learn more about what they do. 

5% of proceeds from all purchases will go towards initiatives such as:

  • Funding research on better alternatives for treating mental disorders. 
  • Supporting those diagnosed with a mental disorder for therapy or medication.
  • Educating and increasing awareness about the reality of these diseases and the opportunities that are available for those who suffer.

We are passionate about this topic and it is a large part of who we are. We know that with our influence and brand we can make a difference.

Warranty

We believe that products should be made with the highest of quality and standards. We stand by our products and their quality and durability. There is a 1 year warranty on all Dulo products. 

Warranty does not cover:

  • Suits that are worn out over time and due to use.
  • Any damage on any part of the suit resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents.

Funding Details

Pledge Amount. Our pledge amount is $1,500. Manufacturers are only able to produce items with a bulk order. This allows them to keep costs lower and make money. Ordering in mass amounts requires capital. That is why we need the $1,500. These funds will allow us to order in bulk quantities.

Flexible Funding. We have elected to go with the "flexible funding" strategy. This means that when you place an order we will send you a pair of our swimsuits no matter what. We selected this option because we have a handful of suits on hand from a small first-run production.

If we don't reach our $1,500 goal, you will still get your suit. If we do, we will have sufficient funds to place our bulk order, and you will get your suit. So, basically in short terms if you place an order you will get your suit.

This leaves very little risk to you, if any at all. We want to make sure that you have confidence that you will receive your product without question. Our relationship with you is EVERYTHING. Without you, this could not be possible.

Timeline

The Team

Dulo Supply Co. was started by a young entrepreneur, Mitch Casey, who wanted to create a brand that would be known for making a difference. Mitch is passionate about Dulo Supply Co.'s cause as well as entrepreneurship and business. Mitch has experience with start-ups, supply chain operations, and graduated with a business degree in April.

Mitch has sought out direction and guidance from multiple advisors who are helping him every step of the way. Each advisor has had success in various business realms. (The advisors will not be stated for privacy issues.)

Mitch's experience coupled with guidance from tenured business owners will ensure that your orders will be successfully fulfilled.

A Sincere Thank You

We are excited to see where our project can go with your help! We know that this would not be possible without you! 

Credits

Video: Jason Casey

story:
Hi, my name is Carolyn, and my boyfriend Dave is kind of a crazy inventor type. One day he walked into the kitchen holding a homemade purse. I knew it did something, so I asked him "Okay, so what does it do?"

He said "It protects women and unborn babies from cell phone radiation!"

I have to admit that I didn't know much about cell phone radiation, so I did some research, and here's some of what I found:

  • *Studies at Yale and UCLA showed that fetal exposure to radiation could cause lifetime hyperactivity and other neurological and emotional effects.

  • *According to a Danish study, children exposed to mobile phones while in the womb are 30 percent more likely to have ADHD by age 7 than children who were not exposed to mobile phones while in the womb.

  • *Women who used handsets two or three times per day while pregnant were 54 percent more likely to give birth to children who developed behavioral problems by the time they reached school age than women who did not use them. The risk of behavioral problems increased along with the mother's mobile phone use during pregnancy.
  • *Cell phone manufacturers, including Blackberry and Apple, say consumers should keep devices away from the body due to potential safety risks but these warnings often go unnoticed because they are featured in device manuals.

And it not just unborn babies who are at risk:

There are no published studies examining the effect of cell phone radiation on reproductive health in women. 

But, read what happens to men:

"Men who carried a phone in a hip pocket or on the belt had 11 percent fewer mobile sperm than men who kept a phone elsewhere on the body (Kilgallon 2005).
Men who carried a cell phone on the belt and used it intensively during a five-day test period had a 19 percent drop in highly motile sperm from their previous levels (Davoudi 2002)."

Should women expose themselves to this radiation? If men's sperm are affected, what happens to our eggs?

After doing the research, I decided that it was important to give women a way to protect themselves, and their unborn babies. So, I'm starting a company called the Silver Lining Purse Company. We're going to make the purses that Dave designed, so women can have a practical and stylish way to block the radiation. These are the world's only purses designed to protect women and their unborn babies from cell phone radiation.

THE PURSE

The Silver Lining Purse is a radiation blocking purse. We use a special cloth liner made with real silver, that blocks over 99% of the cell phone radiation. 

The purses are offered (as perks) in Basic Black (which would retail for $100.00) and Fancy Black, Mod Blue and Red Leatherette (all of which will retail for $120.00). (Getting a purse as a perk is much cheaper!)

(When we start the company, we'll eventually introduce even more colors and patterns, so, if you'd prefer some other color, consider our gift certificate perks)

How it works: The purse is the shield. It's designed to be worn right next to the belly, where it does the most good. When you look at the pictures, you'll notice a distinctive "funnel shaped" pocket. This pocket is specially designed so you can easily slide the phone in and out, and the phone will stay in the middle of the shielded area. The pocket comes with a magnetic snap to keep your phone secure inside.

Note: You have to keep your phone in the outside pocket for the shielding to work.

The purses are made of 1000 denier nylon (similar to cordura) with nylon straps. The pockets and side panels will be made of nylon or vinyl. The purses are fairly large, about 12" tall and wide. There are two special round bottomed pockets inside, designed to make it easy to grab your keys, or small items like change.


WHO WILL BENEFIT

We expect most of our customers to be pregnant women, and women hoping to become pregnant, but any woman hoping to lessen their exposure to radiation can benefit from this product.

THE IMPACT

Your donations to this project will help me start a company dedicated to helping protect women and their babies. 

The money collected will be used to:

  • Make the perks items. (even if we don't meet our goal, you WILL get your purse.)
  • Shipping costs.
  • Finance the company, including business licenses, patent fees, and website development. 
  • To make more purses to sell at baby fairs, online, and, eventually, wholesale to stores nationwide.

OUR PHILOSOPHY

When I decided that Dave's latest invention was a good idea for a business, we talked about what it meant to start a business. It's not just about making money. We want to help our community, which is why the Silver Lining Purse Company will only make purses locally, or have them made in indigenous communities that need to be financially empowered.

NATIVE OWNED 

I am full blood American Indian of the Muscogee Creek and Chickasaw Nations. Both Dave and I have always had an interest in American Indian causes, including empowering native businesses. When I spoke with Dave about the two of us starting a business, he handed me the purse and said "You should start a native owned business." 

So, the business is my responsibility, and I'm going to work very hard to make sure this business will be successful, as a example to other American Indians and to give us the resources that can be used to help the indigenous people of the Americas.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Protecting women and their unborn babies is important, and, if you agree, please share this campaign with anybody you think might find that important. Pregnant women, women who might want to become pregnant, women who are concerned about their health, all their friends, and the men and women who love them should all know about this campaign. 

Thanks for all your help!

FAQs

Q: Will my cellphone still work when it's in the pocket?

A: Yes. The shielding is only between the phone and your body.


Q: Does the silver lining fabric really block most of the radiation?

A: Yes! Look at the two photos below. In the second photo, a small piece of the shielding fabric covers part of the phone.


Q: Where are the purses made?

A: The purses are made in America by a small company that also makes pouches for the US military. We're having them made locally so we can be sure that they're well made, and also, because we think it's important to support our local economy.


Q: Will I get my purse even if you don't meet your goal?

A: Absolutely! Our manufacturer has agreed to make any quantity we ask for, so, we don't need a minimum order to get your purse made.


Q: If you don't reach your goal, what can I do with the gift certificate?

A: While I'm very confident that this campaign will reach it's goal, I want my customers to know that their money is secure. Any gift certificate can be refunded for it's purchase price at any time.


Q: How long will it take to get my purse?

A: Our manufacturer say's he can have them finished in four to six weeks after the end of the campaign. So, the latest you should get your purse will be January 8, 2014, though they may be available several weeks sooner. Don't expect your purses to arrive before the holiday season, but the gift certificates will arrive mid December.


Q:  Do you ship internationally?

A:  U.S. shipping only, but we plan to ship internationally in the future. If you live outside the United States, and would like to get one of our purses, please contact me on Facebook, and I'll see what I can do.


Q: If I'd like to get more purses after this campaign ends, how do I get in touch with your company?

A: Our website will be Silverliningpurseco.com, but our website probably won't be ready until January. Meanwhile, please like us on our facebook page!


Q: Are these purses cruelty free?

A: All Silver Lining purses are vegan and cruelty free.


Q:  Where can I find more information on the effects of radiation?

A:  *Note:  The information above are included in the links below.

http://www.emfnews.org/articles/

http://electromagnetichealth.org/quotes-from-experts/

http://www.emfnews.org/Mobile-Phone-Use-While-Pregnant-Causes-Neurological-Problems-in-Babies-Part1.html

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2231498/Cell-phone-radiation-DOES-harm-baby-study-says.html

http://news.yale.edu/2012/03/15/cell-phone-use-pregnancy-may-cause-behavioral-disorders-offspring

http://www.nydailynews.com/life-style/health/yale-study-cellphone-pregnancy-bad-babies-health-article-1.1039527

http://www.webmd.com/baby/news/20101206/cell-phone-use-in-pregnancy-risks-for-child

Q: How long will it take to get my purse?
A: Our manufacturer say's he can have them finished in four to six weeks after the end of the campaign. So, the latest you should get your purse will be January 8, 2014, though they may be available several weeks sooner. Don't expect your purses to arrive before the holiday season, but the gift certificates will arrive mid December.

Q:  Do you ship internationally?
A:  U.S. shipping only, but we plan to ship internationally in the future. If you live outside the United States, and would like to get one of our purses, please contact me on Facebook, and I'll see what I can do.

Q: If I'd like to get more purses after this campaign ends, how do I get in touch with your company?
A: Our website will be Silverliningpurseco.com, but our website probably won't be ready until January. Meanwhile, please like us on our facebook page!

Q: Are these purses cruelty free?
A: All Silver Lining purses are vegan and cruelty free.

Q:  Where can I find more information on the effects of radiation?
A:  *Note:  The information above are included in the links below.
http://www.emfnews.org/articles/
http://electromagnetichealth.org/quotes-from-experts/
http://www.emfnews.org/Mobile-Phone-Use-While-Pregnant-Causes-Neurological-Problems-in-Babies-Part1.html
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2231498/Cell-phone-radiation-DOES-harm-baby-study-says.html
http://news.yale.edu/2012/03/15/cell-phone-use-pregnancy-may-cause-behavioral-disorders-offspring
http://www.nydailynews.com/life-style/health/yale-study-cellphone-pregnancy-bad-babies-health-article-1.1039527
http://www.webmd.com/baby/news/20101206/cell-phone-use-in-pregnancy-risks-for-child

story:
What is this about?

It is amazing what 15 years of losing can do to a fan base. I grew up in Baltimore rooting for the Birds and when it came to baseball knew nothing but winning. I loved the Birds and man did I love that Orange!!! They were our boys and represented all I knew at the time. We were winners with a strong tradition. I want to make apparel that represents our tradition and culture as fans of Baltimore Baseball.

The last time I lived in  Baltimore before the turn around last year was the  1997 Wire to Wire Season and after that..... the wheels feel off. Far less fans went to the games and people started call our home names like Fenway South. We had a generation of Baltimore fans that didn't know what it was to have a winning season. 15 years of losing and team in DC that weaken the fan base even more.

 I lived in New York and Los Angeles during the 15 years of losing. During my time in LA I started making hand customized baseball caps of vintage/defunct sport teams. New York and are baseball cities with a huge baseball fan base. You would always see Fan T-Shirts. Pretty much made by fans for fans kind of thing ( the punk-rock-shirts of baseball ). Those shirts spoke to me. I  noticed such shirts were part of the baseball culture, unique to that city, and those fans. Inspired by this I started hand screening t-shirts as well.Since moving back to Baltimore I have immersed myself back into the Baltimore baseball culture. Going to the yard and local bars I noticed the lack of passion / energy in most Baltimore Baseball gear. Everything seemed to be licensed apparel from bigger companies or freebie giveaways. That's fine, but I wanted something more.

I will like to build a Black and Orange Army of like minded fans. Baltimore fans that think of creative ways to support the boys. Fans that wear black and orange at least 162 times out the year. Now that we are playing winning baseball again it is time to rebuild this fan base, keep Baltimore excited about the team that represents us.

So if you feel that way I do, support this project. You will receive gear that will present you as Baltimore fan and part of an army that spreads the culture of Baltimore Baseball. We will be devoted to support the boys WIN or LOSE!

If this project is successful I would like backers to send me pics wear there Perks as they watch us versus Boston on the 29th of September. Pics will be posted on Blackandorange.org for your comrades to see.

What will you do with the money?

With your help I can continue to make Baltimore Baseball gear that will add to the excitement of the City. Help us stand out even when we are not cheering at the top of our lungs and get us noticed as what we are.....Prideful Fans of Baltimore Baseball. I want to expand the culture. I want us to be the team people think of when they hear Black and Orange!  Black and Orange.org  will be come the home of the Baltimore Baseball Fanatic and the Black and Orange Army. Help me make this happen.

This campaign ends on September 9th which will give me enough time to get perks to my backers. I will have all perks to backers before the last game against Boston on the 29th of September.  Lets wear the perks on that day as proud fans of Baltimore Baseball. We are in exciting times! Let show this city and team all the support we can.


The Perks

Memorial Stadium 1.25 Pin Back Button

2.5 x 2.5 Iron-On Mobbtown Mad O's Patch

"When I Die" T-Shirt

Mobbtown Mad O's T-Shirt


Mobbtown Mad O's Snapback

Cap and T-Shirt Combo

What else can you do to help?

Spread the word about BlackandOrange.org

story:
Гагарин и маки (Gagarin and poppies)

Gagarin and poppies is digital art-work by Moscow painter Milana Juventa.

Original work of «Gagarin and poppies» is dedicated and already printed on vinyl 1,5x2 meters. This work is already showed on exhibition in Moscow.

You can see more works on their official website – www.milanajuventa.name

T-Shirts

Original idea and manufacturing process is provided by Syntex Lab and Maxim Synthetic.

Official website is www.syntexlab.com or you can find more info with social networks:

  • Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/syntexlab
  • VKontakte – http://vk.com/syntexlab
