story:
Old art to fight a modern enemy

Fast fashion has all but destroyed any value we get from wearing clothes. Their planned obsolescence through trends, short cuts in quality, and generic sizing has made it virtually impossible for a modern man to buy a great shirt for under $100. 

In the US alone, the EPA reports that 11.1 million tonnes of perfectly usable clothing is trashed each year. We live in a society where we put as much thought into buying a shirt as we do our toothpaste. That's the legacy of fast fashion, and we're here to change that, one shirt at a time.

Our solution involves developing the perfect men's shirt so that you have a product that looks and feels as good on you now as it will in 10 years time. No need to repeatedly buy shirts; we want to give you something you take pride in, fits you perfectly, transcends fashion, is built to last, and incorporates the finest materials.

Most importantly, we want to give it to you for no more than what you would pay a fast fashion company for their inferior product.

 

About our shirt

1. A classic oxford shirt available in 6 colours - one of the most versatile weapons in a man's sartorial arsenal. It's perfect worn casually with sleeves rolled up, or pressed and worn with a suit. Always looks fantastic on any man, and will continue to in decades to come. Welcome to permanent style.

2. Made the traditional bespoke way where we draft each customer's shirt from scratch using their unique measurements. This ensures a personalised fit for every body type, each and every time, unlike made-to-measure which alters blocks (standard templates) to create your pattern. We are using age-old skills to keep this worthy tradition alive.

3. Hand crafted by a skilled shirt maker - a rare commodity in a world of mind-numbing production lines. One shirt maker typically sews each shirt, with another sewing buttons and button holes. It's slow fashion at it's finest.

4. Constructed to last decades with fully finished seams throughout. No over locking, no raw edges, our shirts are designed to be thrown in the wash time and time again and withstand the rigours of an active gentleman. 

5. Made of the finest materials. We chose fabric that is durable, versatile, and comfortable to wear. Even the shell chosen for the mother-of-pearl buttons is second to none. You can't have the perfect shirt without the best materials.

 

Colours

These are indicative colours. Final tone may vary slightly depending on the cloth we end up with, but colour types will remain the same.

 

How we do it

  1. You send us your measurements online using our step-by-step measurement guide (check it out here).
  2. We take your measurements and put it into our parametric CAD model which drafts a bespoke pattern for you. We developed this model based on what the top tailors around the world use.
  3. We plot your custom pattern, cut it out, and sew up your shirt by hand.

 

Who are we?

The chap on the left is me, Marc C. Close. I was a structural engineer but realised that 'race-to-the-bottom' fast fashion needed fixing. So I assembled a team of tailors, engineers and craftspeople and we created A Product Company. We believe focus should be on the product itself and want to reinvigorate the bespoke culture in fashion. We do this using modern technology to help keep costs down, while preserving artisan skills and keeping quality at a premium.

We need you to help us create a viable, more considered, alternative to fast fashion!

 

What's the big deal about bespoke?

Bespoke is the highest level of shirt making. It is derived from the saying "to be spoken for," meaning the customer has complete control over the shirt. The major difference from bespoke to made-to-measure is patterns are drafted from scratch for each and every customer, as opposed to being altered from a template. This means you get a fit like none other, and you have complete control over how you want your shirt to be.

In a bespoke shirt you will never have sleeves too short, top buttons that can't be done up, baggy arms or excess fabric around the waist. The shirt length will be long enough to never untuck from your pants, or short enough to wear untucked - it's up to you. Anyone wearing a bespoke shirt looks freaking brilliant, because it fits and has a level of quality unlike anything you can find in store or off a naff tailoring website.

 

Help us fight fast fashion

We need your help to bring this product to market. We have everything in place to start producing, but we need support to buy fabric, interfacing, thread and buttons. We also need to invest in marketing materials such as a photo shoot, and produce samples of each custom option so you know what it looks like on a real person.

We also need you to tell us your thoughts about the shirts. Do you want us to add a penny collar as an option? Do you want the power to define exactly how big your collar is? How about colours? Whatever it is, we can probably do it, and if it's popular enough we can add it to the plans.

story:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

The S-Holder is an innovative shirt holder, which will keep your shirt perfectly tucked in even when you move! It is made of comfortable and skin-friendly materials, which will make sure that the S-Holder and your body work as one. You will constantly look amazing and sharp, as every real Gentlemen should!

 

 

  

IMPROVEMENTS

After a great Kickstarter success last year with the T-Holder, we have asked our beloved backers for feedback. The majority of them were extremely positive, saying how T-Holders improved their lives and that they basically cannot live without it anymore. However, we were even happier to receive some suggestions for improvements. Based on these, we have developed the S-Holder with these main improvements:

Adjustable side straps: which will work perfectly with any length of shirt

 

 

New clips

 

 New colors: Gentlemen black, classy beige and navy blue

 

REWARD SYSTEM 

 
 

SHIPPING PLAN

 
The one thing you really do not need to worry about is shipping. It will be totally free, thanks to our business partners. The package will be delivered to your home safely in just a few days. When the campaign is over, you will receive a survey in which you will provide us your delivery address, thigh measurement and the colour of your brand new S-Holder.

HOW TO MAKE THE THIGH MEASUREMENT CORRECTLY

Our mission is to make high quality, custom made products. In case the S-Holder Kickstarter campaign is funded, we will ask you for your thigh measurement on the thickest part, that we can create an unique product for you! How to do it:
1. Take flexible measuring tape and wrap it around your thigh on the thickest part, as it is shown in the video below.
2. Remember that measurement, because you will have to provide it to use in the Survey, if we are funded.

 

                        

 

 

COMMUNITY 

We have already welcomed more than 5000 Gentlemen in our T-Holder family. Positive feedback and customer are number one in our priority list. We are so proud that we have received a bunch of them in those months:

TEAM

The team who has brought the S-Holders alive:

Nik Vene - Founder and CEO

Team of dressmakers, lovely ladies who are making sure that S-holders of the best quality become a part of your everyday life.

Luka Karlin, Rok Podgorelec, Vid Šubic – Movie makers

Eva Ožbot, Maja Rigler – Graphic designers

 

Anže Vene, Klemen Maček, Andres Monroy – Models

 

Joe Rayner - English proofreader

Niko Klanšek - Business advisor

story:
Our Story

We are Abby Gleason and Cassie Kay Rusnak, founders of an online magazine project for the Pittsburgh, PA area that supports and features only local and independent businesses and designers. We are putting on a fashion show to celebrate our 1-year anniversary on March 31, 2012 and to raise funds for the next year. We are including boutiques in the city that we worked with this past year as a celebration of how far the magazine has come and of the continued support of local business.

The event will include: donated food and drink by local restaurants; a fashion show featuring local models, Pittsburgh-based independent boutiques and designers; and will close with a crazy fun dance party provided by DJ Dario.

The Impact

The show is going on whether or not we reach the whole goal, but the funding we receive here will take the show from homemade and small-scale, to something more professional, beautiful and it will make a bigger impression on the Pittsburgh fashion scene.  East End Fashion Magazine's mission is to become a non-profit organization that focuses solely on the local and independent cultural scene in Pittsburgh, PA. Our featured photo spreads, interviews, and reviews bring people and businesses into the limelight.  This fashion show celebrates the past year of businesses we supported and the fundraising and tickets sales from this event will enable the next year of EEFM to bring great ideas to fruition.


What We Need & What You Get

We will be selling tickets to the public as a source of income, but this will not be enough to cover our preparation expenses to make this first-of-its-kind event in Pittsburgh as awesome as it deserves to be!

We are using a huge loft gallery space, The Space Upstairs, located in Construction Junction's 100-year old warehouse in the East End of Pittsburgh for the venue. This gives us a unique urban location with lots of industrial charm, but much work needs to be done to the Space to prepare it for its first fashion show. LOOM Exquisite Textiles in the Strip District is providing inspiring bursts of color and personality but we need funds to cover the cost of (potentially) building a runway, incorporating spring-inspired dÃ©cor with live plants, advertising, and fair compensation to our extremely hard-working team that includes a set designer, hair and makeup artists, models, DJ and other fantastic individuals who are donating their time and energy.

Please browse the perks below to see what your donation will get for you! As a thank you for any pledge amount, we have something special from East End Fashion Magazine.


Other Ways You Can Help

The extremely talented individuals with whom we are working have great vision and are willing to donate their time, but we would so love to thank them properly. Please help us by pledging whatever level is right for you and by spreading the word.
story_txt:
Our Story
We are Abby Gleason and Cassie Kay Rusnak, founders of an online magazine project for the Pittsburgh, PA area that supports and features only local and independent businesses and designers. We are putting on a fashion show to celebrate our 1-year anniversary on March 31, 2012 and to raise funds for the next year. We are including boutiques in the city that we worked with this past year as a celebration of how far the magazine has come and of the continued support of local business.
The event will include: donated food and drink by local restaurants; a fashion show featuring local models, Pittsburgh-based independent boutiques and designers; and will close with a crazy fun dance party provided by DJ Dario.

The Impact
The show is going on whether or not we reach the whole goal, but the funding we receive here will take the show from homemade and small-scale, to something more professional, beautiful and it will make a bigger impression on the Pittsburgh fashion scene.  East End Fashion Magazine's mission is to become a non-profit organization that focuses solely on the local and independent cultural scene in Pittsburgh, PA. Our featured photo spreads, interviews, and reviews bring people and businesses into the limelight.  This fashion show celebrates the past year of businesses we supported and the fundraising and tickets sales from this event will enable the next year of EEFM to bring great ideas to fruition.


What We Need & What You Get
We will be selling tickets to the public as a source of income, but this will not be enough to cover our preparation expenses to make this first-of-its-kind event in Pittsburgh as awesome as it deserves to be!
We are using a huge loft gallery space, The Space Upstairs, located in Construction Junction's 100-year old warehouse in the East End of Pittsburgh for the venue. This gives us a unique urban location with lots of industrial charm, but much work needs to be done to the Space to prepare it for its first fashion show. LOOM Exquisite Textiles in the Strip District is providing inspiring bursts of color and personality but we need funds to cover the cost of (potentially) building a runway, incorporating spring-inspired dÃ©cor with live plants, advertising, and fair compensation to our extremely hard-working team that includes a set designer, hair and makeup artists, models, DJ and other fantastic individuals who are donating their time and energy.

story:
Very few days left!

...and more than 80.000 € have been backed already! From people all over the world, who would love to get a PAPRCUTS WATCH as the very first. Our internal goal is to reach 100.000 € together with our supporters, so that the capacities of our little production sites here in Berlin (we also work with a prisonors & other social projects) are fully utilized. 

Report: We have sent out the design survey so all backers can choose their preferred designs for their PAPRCUTS WATCH. For a short time, it is possible to pre-order in our Online-Shop: https://www.paprcuts-shop.net/de/paprcuts-watch/

We are Paprcuts. A self financed StartUp from Berlin. Our aim is to work regionally so the whole production process is Made in Germany.

We don’t believe in investors and try to always work with our cash flow. Since the production of our unique PAPRCUTS WATCH will be very expensive we need your support. The minimum production was funded after 80 hours! Back the campaign and get a PAPRCUTS WATCH to a super good bargain - only for a short time up to 29% less than our future retail price. Delivery will be in July/August 2017.

 

 

You want to support via Paypal or transfer (Überweisung)?

We make it possible! Because Indiegogo only accepts Credit Card payments.
Just send us a transfer (including shipping fees). 

Paypal:
Send money / Geld senden to: post@paprcuts.de 
Type in:

• the amount of your perk including the shipping costs 
• the perk name you would like us to book for you
• your shipping address 

And off it goes. We will book the perk for you.

Click here to continue to Paypal!

 

Wire Transfer:
IBAN: DE67 1001 0010 0351 3831 07
BIC: PBNKDEFF  /  Institut: Postbank

Please write a mail to paprcutswatch@paprcuts.de with your adress and a screenshot of the transaction. We will book the perk for you. 

 

Everything about... 

... of course, our super cool PAPRCUTS WATCH! 

(Sorry to boast about it, but we are a little bit proud and excited to finally reveal our little beauty to the public after months of planning and prototyping.)

 

 

In Action

We've been out on the streets with our amazing Creative Director Evran to catch some first impressions. Here we want you to see and feel how our new PAPRCUTS WATCH fits into the life of you, me... everybody.
Enjoy the pics and let us take you into the Berlin mood.

 

Pre-Order Now and Save up to 25 %!

We created this overview to make our campaign easily understandable. Once the Early Birds are gone you still have the opportunity to order the normal perk for almost 20% off the retail price! Hope you'll like that.

 

The Design Range for Now. We will ask you for your favorite design the week after the campaign.

It's been a bit fast to get the whole overview in the video, right? Check the overview below! And the great thing: you don't have to choose now. You will receive an email the week after the campaign: There we will list again all designs and ask you about your choice!

25.000 € Stretch Goal New Designs:

75.000 € Stretch Goal New Designs:
(Tropical, Japanese and Ice Crystals)

 

The new PAPRCUTS WATCH Combo Perks are online.

 

Perk 1: PAPRCUTS WATCH Combo

Here you can choose your PAPRCUTS WATCH, a matching Wallet and a super nice Pencil Case. To wear it all alone or share it with your closest friends. For this perk we can offer 10 different designs where you can save 25 % off the normal retail price!
 

Perk 2: Upgrade Combo

There’s an Upgrade Perk to add a matching Wallet and Pencil Case to your PAPRCUTS WATCH. The first 250 Early Birds get free shipping.

 

 

Packaging

We just finished the packaging of the PAPRCUTS WATCH. Leave us your opinion on it!

 

​Funded after 80 hours!

Wow! We reached the minimum funding goal of the PAPRCUTS WATCH campaign after very few days! The production is safe! Backers will be able to choose their design the week after the campaign.

We defined stretch goals, so all backers have an even wider range of design options to choose from, once certain milestons are reached.

Next Stop: 75.000 €!

 

Retailer Perks

Those perks are made for shops who would like to order a first batch of our PAPRCUTS WATCH. German shop perks include the VAT, international ones go without it of course.

If you fancy a PAPRCUTS WATCH with your own design, you are at the right spot also. Starting at 100 pieces you can design your own and get Watches from the first big batch for you, your friends, friends of friends, your costumers and even some ex girlfriends. 

 

Technical Overview

We have created something which wasn't there before. Our PAPRCUTS WATCH made of Tyvek®. Here's a complete overview of what you can expect from it. Looks almost unbelievable but it's true!

 

How much time do we need to produce?

Well, this is one of the most important questions for all of you out there. Here we go.
With the knowledge of one small batch that has been produced already, we calcuate 6 - 8 weeks delivery time after the campaign has successfully ended.

 

The Team

Last but not least - the Paprcuts Gang from Berlin. We are people like you. Only a little bit crazy and nerdy about creating cool accessories.

 

Why we chose crowdfunding

We have done a crowdfunding before and it gave us such a positive feedback that we wanted to do it again! Now we’ve come up with a really nice product which we think has to go out into the world. With the help of the super enthusiastic Indiegogo crowd we want to move forward. It’s always great to try something new and move towards exciting frontiers. Let’s do this together, right?!

 

Risks & Challenges

We have tried to look into all the risks and challenges for our new product.
That’s why it took us 9 months to develop our new baby - what a sweet coincidence. ;-)
We have tested soooo many different types of watches, closure systems, designs… We even almost went into a lawsuit already (Luckily managed to talk us out of it).

We need to manage the large-scale production with our suppliers and our production sites. From the first produced batch we know that we will be able to fulfill our promises.

The battery keeps up its purpose, the magnet system is still awesome. And of course the Tyvek® still repells water and is far from wearing out.

Finally we will work all the way towards a great product - including the quality control. So every single PAPRCUTS WATCH is perfect!

 

FAQ

Can I exchange the battery?

Yes, you can. I will be a bit tricky, but you can manage. We will generate a video for it after the campaign. There's enough time - the battery lasts loooooong!

How long does the battery last exactly?

Depending on your click rate it has about 1 - 2 years on an average pressing-person.

Will the magnet closing system work properly?

Yes, it allows many different sizes and it is strong! Even in the biggest storms - you will not lose your watch.
It's also not wearing out like other closings. Magnets work and work and work. They are so much fun!

How does the display of the Watch work?

The time display of our PAPRCUTS WATCH is made from LED lamps which shine through the Tyvek® and use it as a canvas. A little bit like a cinema screen, just from the back.

It doesn’t like bright sunshine. As your smartphone display. So give it some shadow or take it to the bars and clubs with your friends. 

What about the wristband? Does it scratch?

Not at all. Since the material Tyvek® is super smooth it fits your wrist perfectly and you won’t even realize you are wearing it - until your friends ask about your cool & new accessory.

(Lisa will update this section once we get more questions coming in. Stay tuned. Write your questions to paprcutswatch@paprcuts.de)

 

Nils and the crazy Paprcuts Gang want to THANK YOU for your support to get our new Baby alive!

story:
Buy Athena Today on Indiegogo Marketplace

We've shipped all pre-orders! If you have not received your order, 
please email us at help@roarforgood.com.

We built Athena to help save lives. 

Athena is a simple device with a big mission - protect women from physical assaults at the touch of a button. By working with superstar technologists, self-defense gurus, and police / public-safety officers - we’ve engineered Athena so it acts as a deterrent by helping ward off an attack and instantly calling for help. When activated, it emits a loud alarm and sends text messages to loved ones with the wearer’s location.

Women should not need to alter their lifestyle, modify their behavior, or carry self-defense devices to protect themselves. Our goal is to help create a society where that is a reality. In the meantime, we are committed to helping make a difference.

 

Athena is not just a product, it's part of a movement to ROAR for Good. For each device sold, a portion of proceeds is invested in educational programs that have been shown to increase empathy and decrease violence.

 

 

 

We’ve partnered with expert designers to create jewelry that is sleek, stylish, and can be as discreet as you want it to be. 

 

Athena will be available in 3 colors to choose from - Antique Silver, Timeless Black, and Rose Gold. 

We made Athena to be small and light - it's about the size of a half-dollar and an ounce in weight. 

Over the last 16 months, we've performed exhaustive research and conducted numerous focus groups and user testing to ensure Athena will be easy to use in panic situations without being accidentally triggered.

It was designed to be activated with just one hand. During mock attacks with our prototypes, we discovered the least effective place to wear a safety device is on your wrist as it restricts access when you need it most. As such, Athena was designed to be worn on on various locations on your body to provide you easy access.

 

 

Athena was built with the goal of getting you help when you need it most. When working with law enforcement officials, we discovered that an unanticipated loud noise can serve as an effective deterrent in certain circumstances. Although the volume is louder than a garbage disposal, we’re confident that it can be engineered even louder.

We know there are occasions when the wearer doesn't want the attacker to know that the device has been triggered. So, we've also engineered SilentROAR™, a feature in which alert messages can be sent without the alarm being activated.

 

We talked to thousands of women and these modes were determined based on their personal experiences. Here are the scenarios they shared for which mode they would use when: 

*Source: Noise Sources and Their Effects - Purdue University. Link: https://www.chem.purdue.edu/chemsafety/Training...

Upon downloading the ROAR mobile app, users will be prompted to create an account and add their emergency contacts.

The application will be turned on automatically as soon as the wearer presses the activation button on Athena. Your contacts do not need the application installed - they will receive text messages with your location. 

 

Research has found that empathy levels have declined by 40% in college students since the year 2000 (Konrath, O’Brian & Hsing, 2011). Based on the sexual assault numbers from the top 29 Northeast college campuses from 2008-2013 (Rocheleau, 2014), sexual assaults have increased as shown - suggesting a correlation between lack of empathy and aggression.

As a social-mission certified B-corp, we don’t want to just put a bandaid on the problem. In addition to the jewelry, we are committed to getting to the root causes of these attacks. That’s why for every Athena device purchased, we are investing a percentage of proceeds into non-profits that are teaching young boys and young girls about empathy and healthy relationships. Programs like these have been shown to reduce violence in adulthood.

To make that a reality, we've partnered with The One Love Foundation. Ten percent of proceeds from this campaign will go towards raising awareness about the warning signs of abuse and helping end relationship violence.

In addition, we've teamed up with Women Against Abuse (WAA) to provide in-kind devices to women in need with our "Give the Gift of Safety" and "One for One" perks. WAA is one of the foremost domestic violence advocate and service providers in the country. This non-profit agency provides safe havens, transitional housing, aftercare services, and education to women experiencing intimate partner violence. Their mission, which aligns harmoniously with ROAR's, is to end violence through advocacy and community education.

Our company started when Yasmine spent six months solo-trekking across South America where she met many women (both locals and travelers) who had been victims of assault. Just one week after she returned to Philadelphia, a woman was out feeding her parking meter when she was grabbed from behind, dragged into an alley, severely beaten, and brutally raped. It was at that moment that Yasmine and co-founder Anthony made a commitment to leverage their skills, resources, and energy to make a difference. And it was at that moment ROAR for Good was born.

The stats are horrifying. One in four women on a college campus will be sexually assaulted. One in five women has been a victim of rape or attempted rape. This is unacceptable, and ROAR is focused on developing solutions to help make a difference. We want to redefine the status quo - and believe that it’s possible.

ROAR is founded by serial entrepreneurs who have successfully built and sold companies in the past. ROAR for Good is not just the company name, it embodies our team’s passion.

Yasmine Mustafa, Co-founder & CEO
Yasmine Mustafa is a tech entrepreneur, community leader, and advisor for several companies in Philadelphia. She founded her first startup, an affiliate marketing company helping writers monetize their content, after graduating from Temple University. She sold it to a prominent content marketing firm in late 2011. Yasmine also started the Philadelphia chapter of Girl Develop It, a non-profit focused on providing affordable and accessible programs to women who want to learn software and web development. In addition, she’s a board member for Coded by Kids, a non-profit that helps inner city youth learn how to code.

Anthony Gold, Co-founder & COO/CTO
Anthony Gold is a serial entrepreneur, investor, author, and board member for several companies - both for-profit and nonprofit. He and Yasmine met eight years ago and have since jointly contributed to the development of several organizations focused on empowering women and championing the underserved. In a past life, Anthony led hardware and software engineering for Unisys Corp. Anthony was recognized as one of the top business leaders in open source business and has eight patents around mission-critical hardware and software design. He architected a supercomputer that was entered into the Guinness Book of World Records for hosting the largest number of concurrent gamers.

The rest of the team includes Charlotte Wells, our business development executive, Joe Crabtree, our electrical engineer, Mahmoud Mustafa, our product development manager, and Hunter Vargas, our social media coordinator. We also have several additional resources helping with all aspects of the business including mobile app development.

Our prototype fabrication partner is NextFab, a manufacturing and development center that assists in our industrial design and mechanical engineering needs. 
We're blessed to have a seasoned advisory board to complement our team. Gerie DiPiano, Sara Van Aken, Grant Ervin, and Tracey Welson-Rossman provide expertise in areas such as manufacturing, fashion, women empowerment, and public safety. 
 

The unfortunate truth is that everyone knows someone who has been a victim of assault. Athena has been designed as a smart, stylish accessory that instantly calls for help and can't be used to harm the person wearing it. And we're not simply focused on selling products, we're dedicated to digging into the root causes of violence. Your support will enable us to complete our production activities - as well as to help diminish attacks against women. 

Our goal is to raise $40,000 in 33 days. With these funds, we will:

  • Move forward with the printed circuit board (PCB) development and manufacturing
  • Finalize mobile app development
  • Design additional colors & styles for the jewelry 

User Research: We began with numerous focus groups, market surveys, and interviews with self-defense experts to get a sense for what works, what doesn’t work, and what has the potential to truly move the needle with regard to safe methods for reducing assaults.

Jewelry Design: We designed several iterations of jewelry styles that were small in size and lightweight. In addition, we're configuring the device to be modular so you can swap out the face with additional colors and styles in the future. We tested those designs with many women, iterated on feedback, and developed our Athena line of jewelry.

Hardware Prototyping: In parallel with our jewelry design, we developed a printed circuit board containing the logic needed to emit a loud alarm and connect with a mobile phone for alerting loved ones with the wearer’s location. We’re using a Bluetooth low-energy chipset for our communication stack to maximize battery life, as well as pairing & beaconing to achieve our desired functionality.

Software Development: We wrote all the firmware for the circuit board and developed a version of the mobile application that allows users to enter their emergency contacts and configure their alert messages (for both alarm mode and silent mode). And we currently have functional prototypes that, when activated, sound an alarm and send text messages to emergency contacts.

Feature Additions: We designed the jewelry to be modular so that as we come out with new designs and colors, the face of Athena can be snapped out and replaced with the new designs - allowing for maximum customization to meet the most particular fashionista. These include casual, sporty, and luxury styles.

Accolades: We’ve been honored to receive several awards along the way as we built the team and developed the idea into a business.

Next Steps: We have one more iteration of the circuit board to get it production ready (including all required certifications), and we have superstar electrical and mechanical engineers leading the way. We are also working on the next version of our mobile app - both for iOS and Android - in order to complete all the features our users want. And we are finalizing our production manufacturer to ensure we have the entire supply chain lined up and ready to go. Our plan is to have a production product ready for shipping in Spring 2016.

     

    It’s unfortunate that devices like this are required, but our goal is to help reduce assaults against women through wearable technology and education. 

    The Athena line of jewelry is our first product. We plan to introduce additional designs and styles to appeal to different lifestyles. Also, as technology evolves, more things can be done in even smaller space. For example, embedding the technology directly into clothing, footwear, phone cases, and so forth enables even greater flexibility. 

    As a company, we have this one metric that we use to measure success: the number of lives we touch. Thus, we will continue developing solutions to reduce assaults and ideally begin to transform society.

    Can Athena be used for men, seniors, and children as well? 

    We're targeting our messaging to women because of the tragic statistics, but we intentionally made the design unisex so anyone can benefit from it.

    When will I receive my Athena device?

    We're aiming to ship the first Athena devices so that they arrive by Spring of 2016. As our production devices are ready, we will ship them out on a "first come, first served" basis.

    Will Athena be available internationally?

    Yes, we believe women all over the world should be able to take part in ROAR's mission to reduce assaults.

    Can Athena contact 911?

    We are working toward engineering a solution that allows Athena to initiate a phone call when alarm mode is activated. Our goal is to have this functionality ready by the time we ship in the Spring.

    Will Athena trigger accidentally?

    We've taken preventative measures to limit accidental triggers. After numerous focus groups and mock-attacks within self-defense classes, we designed Athena with distinctive raised texture to guide your finger to the recessed button in the middle of the device. It must be pressed for 3 seconds to activate the device.

    In addition, once Athena is activated, the user has 10 seconds to deactivate the outgoing alert before contacts are notified.

    How long will the battery last? 

    Although we're constantly looking to maximize battery life, our current tests show that the battery will last approximiately 3 months. The mobile application will notify the user when the battery is running low. 

    How do I select the colors I want? Or what if I move by the time you ship? 

    We'll be sending a survey a couple of months before shipping to ask for your color selection(s) as well as updated address information if needed. 

    What type of warranty will you offer? 

    We appreciate your willingness to invest in us as we move towards production and we will do everything we can to ensure our customers are happy with it. Our development and QA teams are working very hard to minimize potential glitches. And if there are any required updates, we will provide them at no additional cost.

    Is Athena water-resistant? 

    The Athena device is water-resistant, which means it is rain and splash-proof. 

    Is there a monthly fee for the GPS/texting/calling features?

    There are no monthly fees that ROAR charges. However, text message and data rates from your wireless provider may apply based on your wireless service plan.

    How far away from iPhone can you be and still work?

    Athena uses a Bluetooth low-energy (BLE) protocol to communicate with the phone. BLE has a theoretical maximum range of 100m with perfect conditions and line of sight. Given the uncertainties in each user’s environment, fifty feet is a conservative estimate we’ve been using.
     
    Am I being tracked all the time? 

    No, your GPS coordinates will only be sent when you activate Athena - and only to those you designate as your emergency contacts. 

    How do you ensure privacy? 

    User privacy is of the utmost concern for us. We've secured our infrastructure with powerful encryption so your data is always private and safe. Our system is consistently updated with the latest security patches and our network's firewall is constantly monitored to prevent unwanted visitors. In addition, we do not store or retain your location information other than using it for alert purposes.

    What if you are in an area with poor signal or bad data connection? Will this device still function?

    There are two aspects to the Athena jewelry: the first is sounding a loud alarm when the button is pressed and held for three seconds. That function will work regardless of your location or mobile phone signal strength. The second is the outreach to your emergency contacts. Athena connects with your mobile phone (via Bluetooth) to send messages with your location to your emergency contacts. If your phone does not have a good wireless provider connection (ie. poor or no signal), then the messages will not be sent. However, our mobile application will retry to establish a connection until you cancel it.

    Can I swap out the designs?

    ROAR is currently providing three different metal backings - Antique Silver, Timeless Black, & Rose Gold - but we're also working to provide users the option to customize the front of Athena with different styles and colors.

    I have other questions that are not listed - where do I go?

    You can ask questions at any time in the comments section of this campaign or by emailing us at help@roarforgood.com. 

    We have been working for more than a year developing ROAR and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We have plans to mitigate the risks and have enlisted great advisors that will also help.

    We need to create the tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.

    When we have the first few production samples produced we will need to ensure they meet our quality standards. We have factored in several months for this process, which may involve iterative edits and improvements until we’re happy with what we’re sending you. However, if these take longer than anticipated, we’ll let you know why - along with a revised timeline.

    We will undoubtedly have surprises on our journey, but we trust that we have the team to overcome all challenges, as we’ve done so far. Our goal is to make the best possible product for you and deliver it on time.

    Thank you for your support - this couldn't happen without you! We hope you join us as we revolutionize safety and empower women everywhere.
story_txt:
Buy Athena Today on Indiegogo MarketplaceWe've shipped all pre-orders! If you have not received your order, please email us at help@roarforgood.com.We built Athena to help save lives. Athena is a simple device with a big mission - protect women from physical assaults at the touch of a button. By working with superstar technologists, self-defense gurus, and police / public-safety officers - we’ve engineered Athena so it acts as a deterrent by helping ward off an attack and instantly calling for help. When activated, it emits a loud alarm and sends text messages to loved ones with the wearer’s location.Women should not need to alter their lifestyle, modify their behavior, or carry self-defense devices to protect themselves. Our goal is to help create a society where that is a reality. In the meantime, we are committed to helping make a difference. Athena is not just a product, it's part of a movement to ROAR for Good. For each device sold, a portion of proceeds is invested in educational programs that have been shown to increase empathy and decrease violence.   
We’ve partnered with expert designers to create jewelry that is sleek, stylish, and can be as discreet as you want it to be. 




 




Athena will be available in 3 colors to choose from - Antique Silver, Timeless Black, and Rose Gold. 


We made Athena to be small and light - it's about the size of a half-dollar and an ounce in weight. 

Over the last 16 months, we've performed exhaustive research and conducted numerous focus groups and user testing to ensure Athena will be easy to use in panic situations without being accidentally triggered.

It was designed to be activated with just one hand. During mock attacks with our prototypes, we discovered the least effective place to wear a safety device is on your wrist as it restricts access when you need it most. As such, Athena was designed to be worn on on various locations on your body to provide you easy access.
 

 

Athena was built with the goal of getting you help when you need it most. When working with law enforcement officials, we discovered that an unanticipated loud noise can serve as an effective deterrent in certain circumstances. Although the volume is louder than a garbage disposal, we’re confident that it can be engineered even louder.
We know there are occasions when the wearer doesn't want the attacker to know that the device has been triggered. So, we've also engineered SilentROAR™, a feature in which alert messages can be sent without the alarm being activated.
 
We talked to thousands of women and these modes were determined based on their personal experiences. Here are the scenarios they shared for which mode they would use when: 

*Source: Noise Sources and Their Effects - Purdue University. Link: https://www.chem.purdue.edu/chemsafety/Training...



Upon downloading the ROAR mobile app, users will be prompted to create an account and add their emergency contacts.
The application will be turned on automatically as soon as the wearer presses the activation button on Athena. Your contacts do not need the application installed - they will receive text messages with your location. 






 

Research has found that empathy levels have declined by 40% in college students since the year 2000 (Konrath, O’Brian & Hsing, 2011). Based on the sexual assault numbers from the top 29 Northeast college campuses from 2008-2013 (Rocheleau, 2014), sexual assaults have increased as shown - suggesting a correlation between lack of empathy and aggression.
As a social-mission certified B-corp, we don’t want to just put a bandaid on the problem. In addition to the jewelry, we are committed to getting to the root causes of these attacks. That’s why for every Athena device purchased, we are investing a percentage of proceeds into non-profits that are teaching young boys and young girls about empathy and healthy relationships. Programs like these have been shown to reduce violence in adulthood.

To make that a reality, we've partnered with The One Love Foundation. Ten percent of proceeds from this campaign will go towards raising awareness about the warning signs of abuse and helping end relationship violence.
In addition, we've teamed up with Women Against Abuse (WAA) to provide in-kind devices to women in need with our "Give the Gift of Safety" and "One for One" perks. WAA is one of the foremost domestic violence advocate and service providers in the country. This non-profit agency provides safe havens, transitional housing, aftercare services, and education to women experiencing intimate partner violence. Their mission, which aligns harmoniously with ROAR's, is to end violence through advocacy and community education.

Our company started when Yasmine spent six months solo-trekking across South America where she met many women (both locals and travelers) who had been victims of assault. Just one week after she returned to Philadelphia, a woman was out feeding her parking meter when she was grabbed from behind, dragged into an alley, severely beaten, and brutally raped. It was at that moment that Yasmine and co-founder Anthony made a commitment to leverage their skills, resources, and energy to make a difference. And it was at that moment ROAR for Good was born.
The stats are horrifying. One in four women on a college campus will be sexually assaulted. One in five women has been a victim of rape or attempted rape. This is unacceptable, and ROAR is focused on developing solutions to help make a difference. We want to redefine the status quo - and believe that it’s possible.


ROAR is founded by serial entrepreneurs who have successfully built and sold companies in the past. ROAR for Good is not just the company name, it embodies our team’s passion.

Yasmine Mustafa, Co-founder & CEOYasmine Mustafa is a tech entrepreneur, community leader, and advisor for several companies in Philadelphia. She founded her first startup, an affiliate marketing company helping writers monetize their content, after graduating from Temple University. She sold it to a prominent content marketing firm in late 2011. Yasmine also started the Philadelphia chapter of Girl Develop It, a non-profit focused on providing affordable and accessible programs to women who want to learn software and web development. In addition, she’s a board member for Coded by Kids, a non-profit that helps inner city youth learn how to code.
Anthony Gold, Co-founder & COO/CTOAnthony Gold is a serial entrepreneur, investor, author, and board member for several companies - both for-profit and nonprofit. He and Yasmine met eight years ago and have since jointly contributed to the development of several organizations focused on empowering women and championing the underserved. In a past life, Anthony led hardware and software engineering for Unisys Corp. Anthony was recognized as one of the top business leaders in open source business and has eight patents around mission-critical hardware and software design. He architected a supercomputer that was entered into the Guinness Book of World Records for hosting the largest number of concurrent gamers.
The rest of the team includes Charlotte Wells, our business development executive, Joe Crabtree, our electrical engineer, Mahmoud Mustafa, our product development manager, and Hunter Vargas, our social media coordinator. We also have several additional resources helping with all aspects of the business including mobile app development.

Our prototype fabrication partner is NextFab, a manufacturing and development center that assists in our industrial design and mechanical engineering needs. 
We're blessed to have a seasoned advisory board to complement our team. Gerie DiPiano, Sara Van Aken, Grant Ervin, and Tracey Welson-Rossman provide expertise in areas such as manufacturing, fashion, women empowerment, and public safety. 
 


The unfortunate truth is that everyone knows someone who has been a victim of assault. Athena has been designed as a smart, stylish accessory that instantly calls for help and can't be used to harm the person wearing it. And we're not simply focused on selling products, we're dedicated to digging into the root causes of violence. Your support will enable us to complete our production activities - as well as to help diminish attacks against women. 
Our goal is to raise $40,000 in 33 days. With these funds, we will:

Move forward with the printed circuit board (PCB) development and manufacturing
Finalize mobile app development
Design additional colors & styles for the jewelry 


User Research: We began with numerous focus groups, market surveys, and interviews with self-defense experts to get a sense for what works, what doesn’t work, and what has the potential to truly move the needle with regard to safe methods for reducing assaults.
Jewelry Design: We designed several iterations of jewelry styles that were small in size and lightweight. In addition, we're configuring the device to be modular so you can swap out the face with additional colors and styles in the future. We tested those designs with many women, iterated on feedback, and developed our Athena line of jewelry.
Hardware Prototyping: In parallel with our jewelry design, we developed a printed circuit board containing the logic needed to emit a loud alarm and connect with a mobile phone for alerting loved ones with the wearer’s location. We’re using a Bluetooth low-energy chipset for our communication stack to maximize battery life, as well as pairing & beaconing to achieve our desired functionality.

Software Development: We wrote all the firmware for the circuit board and developed a version of the mobile application that allows users to enter their emergency contacts and configure their alert messages (for both alarm mode and silent mode). And we currently have functional prototypes that, when activated, sound an alarm and send text messages to emergency contacts.
Feature Additions: We designed the jewelry to be modular so that as we come out with new designs and colors, the face of Athena can be snapped out and replaced with the new designs - allowing for maximum customization to meet the most particular fashionista. These include casual, sporty, and luxury styles.
Accolades: We’ve been honored to receive several awards along the way as we built the team and developed the idea into a business.

Next Steps: We have one more iteration of the circuit board to get it production ready (including all required certifications), and we have superstar electrical and mechanical engineers leading the way. We are also working on the next version of our mobile app - both for iOS and Android - in order to complete all the features our users want. And we are finalizing our production manufacturer to ensure we have the entire supply chain lined up and ready to go. Our plan is to have a production product ready for shipping in Spring 2016.

 

It’s unfortunate that devices like this are required, but our goal is to help reduce assaults against women through wearable technology and education. 
The Athena line of jewelry is our first product. We plan to introduce additional designs and styles to appeal to different lifestyles. Also, as technology evolves, more things can be done in even smaller space. For example, embedding the technology directly into clothing, footwear, phone cases, and so forth enables even greater flexibility. 
As a company, we have this one metric that we use to measure success: the number of lives we touch. Thus, we will continue developing solutions to reduce assaults and ideally begin to transform society.




Can Athena be used for men, seniors, and children as well? 
We're targeting our messaging to women because of the tragic statistics, but we intentionally made the design unisex so anyone can benefit from it.
When will I receive my Athena device?
We're aiming to ship the first Athena devices so that they arrive by Spring of 2016. As our production devices are ready, we will ship them out on a "first come, first served" basis.
Will Athena be available internationally?
Yes, we believe women all over the world should be able to take part in ROAR's mission to reduce assaults.
Can Athena contact 911?
We are working toward engineering a solution that allows Athena to initiate a phone call when alarm mode is activated. Our goal is to have this functionality ready by the time we ship in the Spring.
Will Athena trigger accidentally?
We've taken preventative measures to limit accidental triggers. After numerous focus groups and mock-attacks within self-defense classes, we designed Athena with distinctive raised texture to guide your finger to the recessed button in the middle of the device. It must be pressed for 3 seconds to activate the device. 
In addition, once Athena is activated, the user has 10 seconds to deactivate the outgoing alert before contacts are notified.
How long will the battery last? 
Although we're constantly looking to maximize battery life, our current tests show that the battery will last approximiately 3 months. The mobile application will notify the user when the battery is running low. 
How do I select the colors I want? Or what if I move by the time you ship? 
We'll be sending a survey a couple of months before shipping to ask for your color selection(s) as well as updated address information if needed. 
What type of warranty will you offer? 
We appreciate your willingness to invest in us as we move towards production and we will do everything we can to ensure our customers are happy with it. Our development and QA teams are working very hard to minimize potential glitches. And if there are any required updates, we will provide them at no additional cost.
Is Athena water-resistant? 
The Athena device is water-resistant, which means it is rain and splash-proof. 
Is there a monthly fee for the GPS/texting/calling features?
There are no monthly fees that ROAR charges. However, text message and data rates from your wireless provider may apply based on your wireless service plan.
How far away from iPhone can you be and still work?

Athena uses a Bluetooth low-energy (BLE) protocol to communicate with the phone. BLE has a theoretical maximum range of 100m with perfect conditions and line of sight. Given the uncertainties in each user’s environment, fifty feet is a conservative estimate we’ve been using.

 
Am I being tracked all the time? 
No, your GPS coordinates will only be sent when you activate Athena - and only to those you designate as your emergency contacts. 

How do you ensure privacy? 
User privacy is of the utmost concern for us. We've secured our infrastructure with powerful encryption so your data is always private and safe. Our system is consistently updated with the latest security patches and our network's firewall is constantly monitored to prevent unwanted visitors. In addition, we do not store or retain your location information other than using it for alert purposes.
What if you are in an area with poor signal or bad data connection? Will this device still function?There are two aspects to the Athena jewelry: the first is sounding a loud alarm when the button is pressed and held for three seconds. That function will work regardless of your location or mobile phone signal strength. The second is the outreach to your emergency contacts. Athena connects with your mobile phone (via Bluetooth) to send messages with your location to your emergency contacts. If your phone does not have a good wireless provider connection (ie. poor or no signal), then the messages will not be sent. However, our mobile application will retry to establish a connection until you cancel it.

Can I swap out the designs?
ROAR is currently providing three different metal backings - Antique Silver, Timeless Black, & Rose Gold - but we're also working to provide users the option to customize the front of Athena with different styles and colors.
I have other questions that are not listed - where do I go?
You can ask questions at any time in the comments section of this campaign or by emailing us at help@roarforgood.com. 


We have been working for more than a year developing ROAR and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We have plans to mitigate the risks and have enlisted great advisors that will also help.
We need to create the tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.
When we have the first few production samples produced we will need to ensure they meet our quality standards. We have factored in several months for this process, which may involve iterative edits and improvements until we’re happy with what we’re sending you. However, if these take longer than anticipated, we’ll let you know why - along with a revised timeline.
We will undoubtedly have surprises on our journey, but we trust that we have the team to overcome all challenges, as we’ve done so far. Our goal is to make the best possible product for you and deliver it on time.
Thank you for your support - this couldn't happen without you! We hope you join us as we revolutionize safety and empower women everywhere.

story:
Hi I am Kristina Benshoff and I am the designer of Provocation. It is a contemporary clothing brand founded, funded, and single-handedly owned and operated by me. Any funds obtained through Indiegogo will be used to create sustainable digitally printed fabrics for the official launch of my 2014 Spring Collection in September at New York Fashion Week.

I plan to showcase my new 2014 Collection, " Blow-up". Using recent technology, I have designed garments inspired by Modernism in 60's fashion and art. The architecture of the clothing has a graphic and futuristic attitude. I will create my own prints inspired by the MOD movement. My digital textiles will be blown up and abstracted into pixels and polka dots, translating it into a new direction.

Provocation by Kristina Benshoff is an edgy high end fashion brand with sustainable ideals and a minimalist attitude. My designs are deeply rooted in digital print. Unlike conventional textile manufacturing, digital printing entails very little waste of fabric, ink, water or electricity. My clothing uses eco-friendly, water-based pigment inks on natural organic fiber textiles. No additional chemicals are used in the printing or preparation process. The future of fashion focuses on the process of learning more about where our clothing comes from, what it takes to make and how far it travels to market. It is important to see the larger picture of our garments true life cycle and it's environmental impact.

I will be working with local fabric manufactures, photographers, models and local printing companies which in turn, help support the local economy. When you buy from an independent, locally owned business  it significantly strengthens the economic base of the community.

This collection is designed and ready to put into production. I need your help to get my garments on the NYC Runway.

What Your Pledge Will Fund

The money you pledge will go towards:

~Digital Fabric Printing

~Other Fabrics and Notions

~Production Cost of Garments

How It Works

If you decide to pledge you can give money to my campaign using a credit card or PayPal account -you can use PayPal even if you don't have an account set up.

I encourage any and all donations. A little can go a long way and make a huge difference. I appreciate your support in all of my endeavors.

So Here Are Some Gifts For Your Generosity:

  • For a Plege of $1 or more, you will receive a Thank you on all Social Networks
  • For a Pledge of $5 or more, you will receive a Thank you on all Social Networks and a Fashionable Magnet.
  • For a Pledge Of $10 or more, you will receive a Thank you Card and a shout out on all Social Networks and  Fashionable Magnet.
  • For a Pledge of $25 or more, you will receive 5 Fashion Postcards along with the  previous incentives.
  • For a Pledge of $50 or more you will receive  a Piece of Up-cycled Leather Jewelry a Necklace, earrings or Bracelet along with the  previous incentives.
  • For a Pledge of $100 OR more, you will receive an original signed  fashion illustration plus all previous incentives.
  • For a Pledge of $250 or more, you will receive a custom made sustainable top with my "Reflection" print in an Organic Cotton Knit, Plus 5 Fashion Postcards and an original signed fashion illustration.
  • For a Pledge of $500 or more, you will receive a 2014 Lookbook of my collection and a custom Organic Cotton "Contemplation" Printed Dress, Plus 5 Fashion Postcards and an original signed fashion illustration.

Even If You Can Not Contribute You Can Still Help:

Get The Word Out

 

Tweet and Share with all of your friends. Every little bit helps support my journey.

 

Thanks So Much!

Kristina

story:
Summary

Hi everyone! My name is Sabina Stanne. I'm originally from Romania, and now live in Vancouver, Canada. My interest in fashion goes back as far as I can remember, but my real journey started in 2008 when I left my home in Europe, travelling on my own to North America to pursue my fashion design education. After several years of school and attempting to define myself as a designer, the company has recently started to take shape with my first collection. When creating, I think of a woman’s defining attributes: her softness, her strength, her compassion, her body language. My aim is to offer high-quality, detail-oriented garments, using fabrics such as silk satins, chiffons, and laces sourced from Italy and Turkey.

Based on the feedback and encouragement I've received so far, I'd like to be able to continue with a second collection, Spring/Summer 2014. As a young entrepreneur, I face lots of challenges in finding the financial resources for creating a new collection and making my work known. This is just one of them and I would be extremely happy to be able to share my work with the world. Each piece of each collection tells a story and I put lots of love into everything I create.

Also, I believe that luxury can be animal cruelty-free and you'll never find leather or fur used in my work. My infinite love and true compassion for animals is well known by everyone around me. I would love to be able to help abandoned and abused animals from everywhere, but as a start I would like to donate 10% of all the funds received to animal organizations such as “Help Labus” (www.help-labus.ro), “Robi” (www.4animals.ro/en/) and Rolda (www.rolda.org) from my home country. The street animals (dogs in particular) are still a big problem in some European countries and need our voices heard to make a difference.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The costs involved in creating a high-end collection are substantial, but as a new designer I had to work with very little to bring my first collection to life. Though I am happy with what I accomplished, the garments weren't a true representation of what I had envisioned. With this second collection I would like to get closer to that goal of having my ideas become a reality. This starts with the fabrics, which are the largest part of the overall cost. Beyond this, your contributions will go towards creating the patterns and sewing the first prototypes, creating the tags and packaging, lookbooks (catalogues), plus a launch/media event with a fashion show of the new collection.

While I wish I could thank every contributor in person, I'm offering perks from high-resolution photos and signed illustrations, to an invite to my Spring/Summer 2014 launch event in Vancouver with a spa package and lunch together. In addition to these, the animal organizations I mentioned will receive 10% of everything you contribute. All the details about your donation will be provided at the end of the campaign.

 

The Impact

I would like to serve as an example of a high-end fashion designer that doesn't use animal-derived components in their work. We can all look glamourous and beautiful without having to make others suffer. Additionally, I only work with manufacturers that believe in fair employment practices and working environments. Moreover, this particular project means a lot to me because we can all contribute to helping abandoned, sick and abused animals. I would like to make the situation of street dogs known to the world and continue to offer part of my sales to other animal-related charities around the globe in the future.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not all of you are able to help financially, but that's ok. I thank you for taking your time to view my campaign and I'd be extremely grateful if you can pass the message on to others. There are tools that you can use to help me get the word out, like copying and pasting the URL onto your Facebook page, email or any other social media.

For more information about my first collection, please visit my website www.sabinastanne.com. You can also "like" my professional Facebook page at www.facebook.com/SabinaStanne.

A big impact starts with small changes, so I hope to have as many of you involved in this as possible! I thank each and every one of you from the bottom of my heart, as well as on behalf of the charities I'm working with and the animals that you'll be able to help!

           

                      Thea Dress - One of the perks available

My interest in fashion goes back as far as I can remember, but my real journey started in 2008 when I left my home in Europe, travelling on my own to North America to pursue my fashion design education. Though I am happy with what I accomplished, the garments weren't a true representation of what I had envisioned. With this second collection I would like to get closer to that goal of having my ideas become a reality. This starts with the fabrics, which are the largest part of the overall cost. Beyond this, your contributions will go towards creating the patterns and sewing the first prototypes, creating the tags and packaging, lookbooks (catalogues), plus a launch/media event with a fashion show of the new collection.
While I wish I could thank every contributor in person, I'm offering perks from high-resolution photos and signed illustrations, to an invite to my Spring/Summer 2014 launch event in Vancouver with a spa package and lunch together. In addition to these, the animal organizations I mentioned will receive 10% of everything you contribute. All the details about your donation will be provided at the end of the campaign.
 
The Impact
I would like to serve as an example of a high-end fashion designer that doesn't use animal-derived components in their work. We can all look glamourous and beautiful without having to make others suffer. Additionally, I only work with manufacturers that believe in fair employment practices and working environments. Moreover, this particular project means a lot to me because we can all contribute to helping abandoned, sick and abused animals. I would like to make the situation of street dogs known to the world and continue to offer part of my sales to other animal-related charities around the globe in the future.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
I understand that not all of you are able to help financially, but that's ok. I thank you for taking your time to view my campaign and I'd be extremely grateful if you can pass the message on to others. There are tools that you can use to help me get the word out, like copying and pasting the URL onto your Facebook page, email or any other social media.
For more information about my first collection, please visit my website www.sabinastanne.com. You can also "like" my professional Facebook page at www.facebook.com/SabinaStanne.
A big impact starts with small changes, so I hope to have as many of you involved in this as possible! I thank each and every one of you from the bottom of my heart, as well as on behalf of the charities I'm working with and the animals that you'll be able to help!

           

                      Thea Dress - One of the perks available

story:
As a friendly gift, for the past few years we have sent to our friends bottles and bracelets which contain “Holy Water”. Very quickly we discovered a demand for more bracelets from their neighbors, colleagues and other family members because they saw them wear it and got excited about mixing religion with fashion. We did some brain storming and created a line which reaches out to the younger generation and fashionable. Due to the growing demand, we wanted to spread the word and let everyone know about our bracelets. Under Blue Sky Jewelry wants to give the world her new, fashionable and hip “holy Water” bracelets. With your help, we can make the world know that religion can be fashionable! 



Jordan River holy water known for its spiritual wealth followed to the blessing attached to it. According to Christian tradition, Jesus was baptized by John the Baptist on the banks of Jordan River (Matthew 3:13-17). This site considered as the third holiest site in the Christian world. Every Catholic Church recommends keeping a supply of holly water due to its many benefits. 

To this day, the baptism site is open to visitors and Conducts ceremonial baptism to 400,000 Christians and other faiths from all over the world each year, for healing, spiritual and protection against evil blessings.


All Under Blue Sky jewelry are carefully picked designs by thinking and planning to suit each and every one of you, according to popularity, chic and luxury that women from any age or style could love.

Each of our special bracelets we offer features a small designed pendant containing a few drops of the unique holy water from the Jordan River. These droplets carry with them: faith, history, spirituality, holiness, love and hope.

Wearing Under Blue Sky bracelets grants you the superior properties of the Jordan River and will accompany you wherever you go. In addition, based on the belief, water of the Jordan, grant forgiveness for sins and belonging to Christianity. You do not have to go to Jordan to win the waters qualities, we bring these qualities to you!



Each and every Under Blue Sky bracelet is provided with a certificate of authenticity to the holy water you receive. We truly believe it is a unique, thoughtful, beautiful and affordable Christmas gift for your loved ones!


Our main focus is to raise enough through this campaign so we can enlarge Under Blue Sky into a fully working small business. Our plan is to build a more user friendly web platform that reaches out to small communities, create more fashionable designs, and creating job opportunities.


We encourage any donation, even a little goes a long way!! You can help Under Blue Sky spread the word by sharing this page with your loved friends. Help us spread the blessing that comes with Under Blue Sky bracelets!

THANK YOU!!

story:
You're all about multi-tasking. Now your jewelry does it too.


  • FASHION FORWARD - an upgrade to any outfit plus unique asymmetrical designs always allow mom to remember on what side she last nursed 
  • BABY FRIENDLY - materials that are non-toxic plus something that perks baby's interest  
  • SOCIALLY MINDED - a partnership that helps impoverished women now plus creates a new future through access to education.  
That's a lot for a necklace!  

Fashion-Forward Jewelry

Our initial collection of simple and clean designs lets you upgrade any outfit, with just a pop of color. Although fashion forward for any woman, this collection is specifically aimed at giving new mom's something to help them feel put together--in a time when they may feel a bit undone.  There is a lot to think about after becoming a mother--your fashion choices should be easy. The collection provides this baby friendly option for mothers with a unique eye catching asymmetrical design, that is both fashion-forward and functional in secretly reminding mom’s on what side she last nursed. You are all about multi-tasking as a mom--now your jewelry does it too!

Baby-Friendly Jewelry 

Beads: Made from smooth, non-toxic, lead free wood beads that are saliva proof. If baby does choose to put a necklace in his or her mouth, and can be rinsed under running water and dried with a soft cloth while maintaining their excellent quality appearance.

Ribbon: Our choice of ribbon for this collection is a Japanese made double faced satin that is both high density, strong, and non-toxic.

Clasps: A break-away closure ensures your necklace will "break away" at the clasp if pulled on too hard. While it takes an incredibly strong pull for the necklace to "break away," you can be sure this additional safety feature keeps your necklace--and you--safe. 

All the pieces together create a jewelry option that moms (or anyone around babies) will love to wear, and one babies will love to look feel and play with during nursing, or bottle feeding (rather than your hair, or shirt;)!

As a reminder, Wind Over Water does not endorse any necklaces being given to baby to wear or being removed from mom’s neck and given to baby as a toy. As baby friendly as they are, they are made for mom!

Socially-Minded Jewelry

Your support goes directly into launching Wind Over Water and creating the initial collection of necklaces. Why is this so important in South Africa? When statisticians rate countries according to their level of inequality, the US rates as #39. South Africa rates #2. While all countries have their obstacles to overcome, doing so on the individual level often becomes even more difficult--especially for women. Nelson Mandela once said of South Africa: "I pay tribute to the mothers and wives and sisters of our nation. You are the rock-hard foundation of our struggle. Apartheid has inflicted more pain on you than on anyone else.” Almost 20 years after the end of Apartheid, the effects are still ingrained. However, as women are provided access to safe income generation, and encouraged to pursue continuing education, we believe individuals, like you, can play a part in a different history being written. 

The Collection

Our initial collection of the symbolic O-Ring, 3 Strand and Braided necklaces presents the signature 3 bead design, distinguishing the pieces and our commitment to partnership between you, Wind Over Water and the women making your piece. The unique 3 bead asymmetrical is both fashion forward and functional, able to secretly remind mom on what side she last nursed.

As you support Wind Over Water through our Indiegogo project, your support is recognized through your very own exclusive Wind Over Water necklace. As pieces are not available for open sales yet, the Indiegogo support will be the only way to receive one of these first necklaces. You will be a part of making this happen from the very beginning.

"O-Ring" Design

"3-Strand" Design


"Braided" Design

The Artisans 

Wind over Water’s first and primary partner is with South African organization, Threaded Dreams. Wind over Water can be confident in the ongoing training, community support, and financial education each woman receives as a part of this vital on-the-ground partnership. Threaded Dreams is a ministry committed to: 

  • Income generation through fashion jewelry, skills transfer and most importantly personal development in self worth, confidence, spiritual growth and educational programs. 
  • Focusing on those who are young head of households who are most vulnerable.

Angel (pictured above) is the Jewelry artisan highlighted in the video. Angel’s dream is to become an engineer, and she now has a savings account for her education for the first time in her life, the community to encourage her, and what we hope, are the means to make her dream come true. Thank you for being a part of her story, and the many other women she represents.

The $25,000 Goal

The money raised covers the project set up, design work, marketing, and initial inventory costs. It takes a lot of resources to launch a partnership like this, but the good news is - once it gets started it becomes sustainable. We invite you to join the launch of Wind over Water, because through the Indiegogo project, everything to get started, including jewelry materials will be provided to the artisans.

Through the project, each woman is provided weekly workshops that combine skill building as an artisan, and personal development as a world-changer. Through our partnership with Threaded Dreams, the women join a community where they are able to learn how to reach their dreams, and earn the financial capital in order to invest in it. Join the story of building a new line of jewelry that matches the talent of African artisans with a desire from socially minded, fashion forward moms for baby-friendly jewelry that they would be proud to wear.

Where the story starts... 

This story begins 10 years ago when traveling to Africa on an AIDS awareness humanitarian effort. While in one village with our group of college age students, a woman came out of her tiny hut, and handed her baby to us.  This was one mother's desperate attempt to give her child opportunity.  We knew we couldn't take this child, but also knew we we would never forget that moment.  So although this is where our story begins, you get to be a part of choosing what happens now.  Join us as we build a sustainable partnership to provide African artisans safe income generation through a jewelry collection that you would be proud to buy, wear, give, or support.  Become a backer and make an impact.  

Become a part of where the Story goes...
