story:
Off The Grid Collection is a clothing collection for the wanderlust. 

We make travel-friendly, fashionable pieces that you must take on your next adventure.

escape | wander | ask questions | be curious | do something that scares you | get lost | collect stories | laugh often | lounge | be a yogi | be helpful | get away | listen | love | If any of these words are your motto or tune, our collection is for you. 

We are traveling the world, talking to beautiful souls and researching how we can bring you sustainable, fashionable travel clothing. We are launching this Indiegogo campaign to raise the funds to create our first full collection. We need your help to make our collection a reality. In exchange, we are offering YOU the opportunity to get pieces from our 2015 before the rest of the world, including limited edition items. You can choose from any of the pieces in our collection, and we will make them specifically for you and deliver them to your doorstep before these pieces hit stores. Your contributions will help make this collection come ALIVE! Thank you in advance for your amazing support! 

For more good stuff, visit our website: www.theoffthegridcollection.com.

*Our Signature T-shirts above, released via web in January, are now 85% sold out! (please visit our website to order this t-shirt directly!)

Background

The idea for Off The Grid Collection came to us when we were in Bali at a surf camp. It was a reunion between friends from all over the world. We shared stories, adventures and a lot of laughs. As we were talking about our travels, our "secret" spots and favorite travel places, we all realized that we have a few "key" items in our suitcase that we never travel without; but these items were worn out or could be designed much better. That is where Off The Grid Collection was born, out of a need to bring more amazing travel clothes to the adventurous souls that roam our beautiful earth. 

The Campaign

We have finished our designs for our complete 2015 "launch" collection. We are ready to share our designs with the world, but we need your support to move our designs from drawings on paper to wearable items. As you can imagine, designing a complete clothing line not only takes a lot of time, creativity, long nights and inspiration - but there are also many costs involved. In order to bring Off The Grid Collection to you and fellow travelers, we need your support to invest in our collection today! Don't worry, you'll get amazing rewards for doing so! Here are the awesome rewards that we are giving away.

All rewards will be brilliantly packaged in "usable" and recycled materials- you'll see what we mean when you get your package!

Rewards!

Feel free to give us a shout if you have any questions about the rewards! Note that some of our rewards are very limited in number because we are in the sample production-phase, which means each item is handmade, they are not mass produced, so each item gets the love and attention it deserves:) All rewards are made to order in sizes small, medium, large and extra large. 

We've also included the shipping costs for our rewards claimed in the US. Not from the USA? No problem! Just throw in a couple extra bucks to help us cover the cost of getting these items to you. We would love to have you wearing Off The Grid wherever you are!

* We hope to have your products shipped out to you in Fall 2014, before the 2015 season begins!

*Eco/animal-friendly leather is a leather substitute (made of acrylic) that we have decided to use instead of "real leather". We want our collection to be animal friendly!

Trust us, the final products will be AMAZING! We have our hearts and souls behind this <3.

!!!!NEW REWARD!!!!! Off The Grid Collection "KEEP EXPLORING" Sticker

_______________________________________________________________________

The Wild | T-SHIRT | Tri-blend, Super soft, Grey color, Men/Women sizes, Water print design, Men's t-shirt reads, "Travel, Get Lost & Drink the Wild Air". Women's t-shirt reads, "Live in the sunshine, swim the sea and drink the wild air". 

_______________________________________________________________________

The Geologist | TERRY FLEECE MEN | Cotton/Elastane mix, Grey color, All-over water print featuring Tamil lettering, says "Off The Grid". 

_______________________________________________________________________

The Layover | SCARF | Men: 100% Handloom cotton, Charcoal Grey, Raw edge finishing, Removable dark eco/animal-friendly leather cuff, Features hidden pocket. Women: Silk/Cotton blend handloom fabric, Emerald color, Features large mandala print in dark green, Detail edge finishing, Removable dark eco/animal-friendly leather cuff, Features hidden pocket.

_____________________________________________________________________

The Peace Maker | HAREM PANTS | Men: Oxford fabric, Dark grey color, Loose fit. Women: Linen fabric, White color, Loose fit. 


_____________________________________________________________________

Share Your Story | YOUR STORY INCORPORATED INTO OUR COLLECTION + T-SHIRT | Since each one of our pieces tells a story, this reward will allow you to share YOUR best travel story with us (Ok, keep it PG for our mini fans), and we'll embed your story into our collection! That means that your amazing travel story will be printed in every t-shirt or scarf or bag that we make. We can only give away 5, so hurry! 

_____________________________________________________________________

The Campout | PONCHO | Womens: 100% handloom cotton, Multicolor, Oversized hood, Raw gem finishings, Mandala embroidery on back, One size.

_____________________________________________________________________

The Cartographer | UNISEX WEEKENDER BAG |  Waterproof canvas, Forest green, Dark eco/animal-friendly leather detailing and straps, Doubles as a backpack, Separate shoe compartment.

_____________________________________________________________________

The Anthropologist | WOMEN'S BAG | 100% heavy cotton handloom, Off White, Dark eco/animal-friendly leather detailing and straps, Doubles as a backpack, Raw gem detailing.

All-over fruit market bag lining. 

_____________________________________________________________________

The Travel Buddy | TWO WOMEN'S PONCHOS | 

You're a rad friend! With this buy-one-get-one exclusive, you can get a second poncho for your best friend at an amazing discount! Act fast, we can't give away too many of these because they are just TOO good of a deal! They would make a perfect gift for your travel buddy! With delivery at the end of November, this is a perfect holiday gift! 

_____________________________________________________________________  


Fill Your Suitcase | ENTIRE COLLECTION! | With just a few clicks you can have your bags already packed for your next adventure! This giveaway features the ENTIRE Off The Grid Collection. Men's package: Includes our T-shirt, Terry Fleece, Scarf and Harem pants all packed beautifully in our weekender bag! Women's Package: Includes our T-shirt, Scarf, Poncho and Harem pants all packed beautifully in our Anthropologist tote! Unbelievable steal- grab it today!

_____________________________________________________________________  


Design Workshop | PERSONAL WORKSHOP + T-SHIRT | Do you love to design? Do you yourself have some amazing ideas for the future of fashion but need some additional training to get it out there? With this reward you will get a personalized, one-on-one (or bring up to 3 friends!) for a full-day design workshop where we will help you develop the drawing skills to communicate your fashion designs, give you feedback on your ideas and help you develop your skills as a fashion designer. Held in our studio overlooking Lake Michigan in Traverse City.

_____________________________________________________________________  

Go Off The Grid With Us | WEEKEND GETAWAY | We personally can't wait to give away this amazing opportunity to spend the weekend with us in beautiful Northern Michigan. This reward includes a 2-day, 2-night stay with us at our home/studio on Lake Michigan, where we will take you on a personalized trip to see the best "off the grid" spots, secret hideouts, best views and eats. We'll also hook you up with the Cartographer or Anthropologist bag! 

_______________________________________

Where Will the Funds Go?

Our goal is to raise $8,500 to launch our collection. Of course we need much more than this to keep the project running and growing, but this is enough to cover our costs to get our first pieces created, and to get some of our fellow travelers wearing our collection! By creating a community of folks like YOU who are willing to support our project, it helps create momentum to get our collection in stores around the world. This campaign will give us the opportunity to have a full collection "in-hand" that we can promote at trade-shows, and bring to different boutiques and stores that may be interested in carrying our line. After we complete this campaign, our goal will be to bring our full collection to potential stores and boutiques in order to get our collection out into the world on a larger scale. The more funds we raise, the more products we can bring to you! 

The funds will specifically go towards:

  1. Fabrics - We searched high and low for the best fabrics that would suit our vision for our collection, as well as the overall goal of making our products "travel-friendly". We will be using handloom fabrics from Sri Lanka (made with fine Indian cotton with no electricity used in the handloom process. Each piece of fabric is one of a kind with a lot of character). Our high quality canvas is 100% waterproof, a must for travelers! Our women's scarves are made from a fine silk and cotton handloom fabric that retains the luxury of silk while still being soft and easy to wear and wash. We are using only the best linen, that has been pre-washed for an extra soft finish and ready to wear. 
  2. Materials - More than fabrics, we are also embellishing our products with lovely details that truly make our designs stand out. We found a wonderful leather-substitute for our bags, so that you can sport our bags around the world and be eco/animal-friendly. The "faux leather" is made of acrylic, and no animals were harmed in the making! Our women's poncho, aka The Campout, features a beautifully cut gem finishing that is cut in such a way that it still retains it's natural beauty. The funds of the campaign will also go towards additional costs such as yarn for stitching, buttons, lining, zippers, clasps, elastics, embroidery, dying, packaging and labels. 
  3. Labor - Most importantly, we have created a team of brilliant merchandizers, pattern makers and seamstresses in Sri Lanka that we believe can truly take our designs and bring them to life. Our goal is to make sure that they are fully compensated for their invaluable contribution to this collection. To read more about the garments industry in Sri Lanka please visit http://www.garmentswithoutguilt.com/
  4. Other costs - There are so many other things that go into making a collection, such as maintaining our website, getting high quality photos for our pieces and our web presence, creating promotional materials such as "lookbooks" for potential buyers- this is where the rest of the funds will go towards in order to promote Off The Grid Collection, so we can supply you with awesome travel essentials year after year!

Why Off The Grid?

Off The Grid Collection is interactive, inspired, friendly and sustainable.

Interactive | Our clothing collection is for YOU, and we mean it! Throughout our journey we will involve you in the design and production process, from initial ideas to choosing final prints- we want to create something that you feel was designed exactly for YOU. Join our mailing list and facebook page for all the fun!

Inspired | Each season of our collection is inspired from our travels. We talk to locals, we drink tea in road side stalls, we take local buses and eat with our hands. It is the people we meet and the sights that we see during these experiences that we remember most fondly. Each collection will be inspired from a different country around the world, and each piece tells a story. That story is printed on the inside of the garment - because we want these stories to live on, to be told and shared. 

Friendly | We like friendly. Off The Grid is not just a clothing line, but our aim is to create a community of fellow curious travelers, creatives, and friendly people alike. We will create a community where people can share their travel stories, share their favorite spots and connect with other travelers in their area. We want everyone to be friends. 

Sustainable | In this day and age, we believe that we have the technology to make clothing that lasts. Whether you are hand washing our t-shirt in a bucket in Belize, or machine washing after a night out at the corner pub, our aim is to create clothing that makes it through your adventures. We also love animals, and use eco/animal-friendly leather. 

We hope that you will take Off The Grid Collection on your next adventure. 

More About the Team!

Alex Zanin is a clothing designer from Italy. He has been working in the textile industry for more than 10 years around the world, and has extensive experience designing and manufacturing clothing for all sorts of labels such as Baci & Abbracci, Honda, Lui Jo and many more. It has always been his dream to create designs for his own label, and with his experience traveling the world, Off The Grid Collection is a perfect reflection of his design and life experience.

Sara Baumann is a researcher and filmmaker who has been working in Asia for the past 6 years. She has spent this time working on a variety of creative research projects for promoting social justice, such as a UNAIDS fashion show to address the stigma of AIDS in Bangladesh, films to bring awareness to women's health issues in a number of countries, a sewing project in India to help women start their sewing projects directly in their homes, and many more. Her projects have been featured at the Smithsonian, UN headquarters in NYC, and film festivals and research conferences across the globe. Now Sara wants to take her passion for research and fashion and put her experience and findings into clothing pieces that everyone can wear. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that people can contribute and help get Off The Grid Collection out there in SO many ways. Here are some ideas of how you can help us!

  • Air miles- We realize that there are many of you out there that travel a TON! If you have extra airmiles you can help us promote our collection by donating air miles.
  • Trade Show Passes - As young designers, trade shows can be really expensive! If you have trade show passes that may help us in our research please let us know.
  • Do you have a boutique? Talk to us about carrying our collection in your store- contact us today at sara@theoffthegridcollection.com.
  • Follow us on Instagram
  • Join our mailing list
  • Tweet about us!
  • Join our Facebook Page
  • Tell your friend's about us!!!!!
  • Share our website link
  • Have amazing travel photos/stories/packing tips? Use the hashtag, #offthegrid and let's create a sharing community!
  • Send us motivational messages via email/twitter/FB etc.! Trust us, we'll love you for it!
  • SHARE SHARE SHARE - We truly want to create a wonderful community of fellow wanderers and travelers, and we believe this can best be achieved if you tell your friends about us. It's pretty easy, just takes one click, one share on facebook etc. and we'll start building our community one step, one day, one person at a time!

Thanks to Jetty Rae for the amazing music track for our video, check her out!

Thanks to Lindsey Mak Photography for her support in photographing our first look book- check out our website to see her work!
story_txt:
Off The Grid Collection is a clothing collection for the wanderlust. We make travel-friendly, fashionable pieces that you must take on your next adventure.escape | wander | ask questions | be curious | do something that scares you | get lost | collect stories | laugh often | lounge | be a yogi | be helpful | get away | listen | love | If any of these words are your motto or tune, our collection is for you. We are traveling the world, talking to beautiful souls and researching how we can bring you sustainable, fashionable travel clothing. We are
launching this Indiegogo campaign to raise the funds to create our first full
collection. We need your help to make our collection a reality. In exchange, we are offering YOU the opportunity to
get pieces from our 2015 before the rest of the world, including limited edition items. You can choose from any
of the pieces in our collection, and we will make them specifically for you and
deliver them to your doorstep before these pieces hit stores. Your contributions
will help make this collection come ALIVE! Thank you in advance for your amazing support! For more good stuff, visit our website: www.theoffthegridcollection.com.*Our Signature T-shirts above, released via web in January, are now 85% sold out! (please visit our website to order this t-shirt directly!)BackgroundThe idea for Off The Grid Collection came to us when we were in Bali at a surf camp. It was a reunion between friends from all over the world. We shared stories, adventures and a lot of laughs. As we were talking about our travels, our "secret" spots and favorite travel places, we all realized that we have a few "key" items in our suitcase that we never travel without; but these items were worn out or could be designed much better. That is where Off The Grid Collection was born, out of a need to bring more amazing travel clothes to the adventurous souls that roam our beautiful earth. The CampaignWe have finished our designs for our complete 2015 "launch" collection. We are ready to share our designs with the world, but we need your support to move our designs from drawings on paper to wearable items. As you can imagine, designing a complete clothing line not only takes a lot of time, creativity, long nights and inspiration - but there are also many costs involved. In order to bring Off The Grid Collection to you and fellow travelers, we need your support to invest in our collection today! Don't worry, you'll get amazing rewards for doing so! Here are the awesome rewards that we are giving away.All rewards will be brilliantly packaged in "usable" and recycled materials- you'll see what we mean when you get your package!Rewards!Feel free to give us a shout if you have any questions about the rewards! Note that some of our rewards are very limited in number because we are in the sample production-phase, which means each item is handmade, they are not mass produced, so each item gets the love and attention it deserves:) All rewards are made to order in sizes small, medium, large and extra large. We've also included the shipping costs for our rewards claimed in the US. Not from the USA? No problem! Just throw in a couple extra bucks to help us cover the cost of getting these items to you. We would love to have you wearing Off The Grid wherever you are!* We hope to have your products shipped out to you in Fall 2014, before the 2015 season begins!*Eco/animal-friendly leather is a leather substitute (made of acrylic) that we have decided to use instead of "real leather". We want our collection to be animal friendly!Trust us, the final products will be AMAZING! We have our hearts and souls behind this <3.!!!!NEW REWARD!!!!! Off The Grid Collection "KEEP EXPLORING" Sticker_______________________________________________________________________The Wild | T-SHIRT | Tri-blend, Super soft, Grey color, Men/Women sizes, Water print design, Men's t-shirt reads, "Travel, Get Lost & Drink the Wild Air". Women's t-shirt reads, "Live in the sunshine, swim the sea and drink the wild air". _______________________________________________________________________The Geologist | TERRY FLEECE MEN | Cotton/Elastane mix, Grey color, All-over water print featuring Tamil lettering, says "Off The Grid". _______________________________________________________________________The Layover | SCARF | Men: 100% Handloom cotton, Charcoal Grey, Raw edge finishing, Removable dark eco/animal-friendly leather cuff, Features hidden pocket. Women: Silk/Cotton blend handloom fabric, Emerald color, Features large mandala print in dark green, Detail edge finishing, Removable dark eco/animal-friendly leather cuff, Features hidden pocket._____________________________________________________________________The Peace Maker | HAREM PANTS | Men: Oxford fabric, Dark grey color, Loose fit. Women: Linen fabric, White color, Loose fit. 
_____________________________________________________________________Share Your Story | YOUR STORY INCORPORATED INTO OUR COLLECTION + T-SHIRT | Since each one of our pieces tells a story, this reward will allow you to share YOUR best travel story with us (Ok, keep it PG for our mini fans), and we'll embed your story into our collection! That means that your amazing travel story will be printed in every t-shirt or scarf or bag that we make. We can only give away 5, so hurry! _____________________________________________________________________The Campout | PONCHO | Womens: 100% handloom cotton, Multicolor, Oversized hood, Raw gem finishings, Mandala embroidery on back, One size._____________________________________________________________________The Cartographer | UNISEX WEEKENDER BAG |  Waterproof canvas, Forest green, Dark eco/animal-friendly leather detailing and straps, Doubles as a backpack, Separate shoe compartment._____________________________________________________________________The Anthropologist | WOMEN'S BAG | 100% heavy cotton handloom, Off White, Dark eco/animal-friendly leather detailing and straps, Doubles as a backpack, Raw gem detailing.All-over fruit market bag lining. _____________________________________________________________________The Travel Buddy | TWO WOMEN'S PONCHOS | You're a rad friend! With this buy-one-get-one exclusive, you can get a second poncho for your best friend at an amazing discount! Act fast, we can't give away too many of these because they are just TOO good of a deal! They would make a perfect gift for your travel buddy! With delivery at the end of November, this is a perfect holiday gift! _____________________________________________________________________  Fill Your Suitcase | ENTIRE COLLECTION! | With just a few clicks you can have your bags already packed for your next adventure! This giveaway features the ENTIRE Off The Grid Collection. Men's package: Includes our T-shirt, Terry Fleece, Scarf and Harem pants all packed beautifully in our weekender bag! Women's Package: Includes our T-shirt, Scarf, Poncho and Harem pants all packed beautifully in our Anthropologist tote! Unbelievable steal- grab it today!_____________________________________________________________________  Design Workshop | PERSONAL WORKSHOP + T-SHIRT | Do you love to design? Do you yourself have some amazing ideas for the future of fashion but need some additional training to get it out there? With this reward you will get a personalized, one-on-one (or bring up to 3 friends!) for a full-day design workshop where we will help you develop the drawing skills to communicate your fashion designs, give you feedback on your ideas and help you develop your skills as a fashion designer. Held in our studio overlooking Lake Michigan in Traverse City._____________________________________________________________________  Go Off The Grid With Us | WEEKEND GETAWAY | We personally can't wait to give away this amazing opportunity to spend the weekend with us in beautiful Northern Michigan. This reward includes a 2-day, 2-night stay with us at our home/studio on Lake Michigan, where we will take you on a personalized trip to see the best "off the grid" spots, secret hideouts, best views and eats. We'll also hook you up with the Cartographer or Anthropologist bag! _______________________________________Where Will the Funds Go?Our goal is to raise $8,500 to launch our collection. Of course we need much more than this to keep the project running and growing, but this is enough to cover our costs to get our first pieces created, and to get some of our fellow travelers wearing our collection! By creating a community of folks like YOU who are willing to support our project, it helps create momentum to get our collection in stores around the world. This campaign will give us the opportunity to have a full collection "in-hand" that we can promote at trade-shows, and bring to different boutiques and stores that may be interested in carrying our line. After we complete this campaign, our goal will be to bring our full collection to potential stores and boutiques in order to get our collection out into the world on a larger scale. The more funds we raise, the more products we can bring to you! The funds will specifically go towards:

Fabrics - We searched high and low for the best fabrics that would suit our vision for our collection, as well as the overall goal of making our products "travel-friendly". We will be using handloom fabrics from Sri Lanka (made with fine Indian cotton with no electricity used in the handloom process. Each piece of fabric is one of a kind with a lot of character). Our high quality canvas is 100% waterproof, a must for travelers! Our women's scarves are made from a fine silk and cotton handloom fabric that retains the luxury of silk while still being soft and easy to wear and wash. We are using only the best linen, that has been pre-washed for an extra soft finish and ready to wear. 


Materials - More than fabrics, we are also embellishing our products with lovely details that truly make our designs stand out. We found a wonderful leather-substitute for our bags, so that you can sport our bags around the world and be eco/animal-friendly. The "faux leather" is made of acrylic, and no animals were harmed in the making! Our women's poncho, aka The Campout, features a beautifully cut gem finishing that is cut in such a way that it still retains it's natural beauty. The funds of the campaign will also go towards additional costs such as yarn for stitching, buttons, lining, zippers, clasps, elastics, embroidery, dying, packaging and labels. 


Labor - Most importantly, we have created a team of brilliant merchandizers, pattern makers and seamstresses in Sri Lanka that we believe can truly take our designs and bring them to life. Our goal is to make sure that they are fully compensated for their invaluable contribution to this collection. To read more about the garments industry in Sri Lanka please visit http://www.garmentswithoutguilt.com/


Other costs - There are so many other things that go into making a collection, such as maintaining our website, getting high quality photos for our pieces and our web presence, creating promotional materials such as "lookbooks" for potential buyers- this is where the rest of the funds will go towards in order to promote Off The Grid Collection, so we can supply you with awesome travel essentials year after year!
Why Off The Grid?Off The Grid Collection is interactive, inspired, friendly and sustainable.Interactive | Our clothing collection is for YOU, and we mean it! Throughout our journey we will involve you in the design and production process, from initial ideas to choosing final prints- we want to create something that you feel was designed exactly for YOU. Join our mailing list and facebook page for all the fun!Inspired | Each season of our collection is inspired from our travels. We talk to locals, we drink tea in road side stalls, we take local buses and eat with our hands. It is the people we meet and the sights that we see during these experiences that we remember most fondly. Each collection will be inspired from a different country around the world, and each piece tells a story. That story is printed on the inside of the garment - because we want these stories to live on, to be told and shared. Friendly | We like friendly. Off The Grid is not just a clothing line, but our aim is to create a community of fellow curious travelers, creatives, and friendly people alike. We will create a community where people can share their travel stories, share their favorite spots and connect with other travelers in their area. We want everyone to be friends. Sustainable | In this day and age, we believe that we have the technology to make clothing that lasts. Whether you are hand washing our t-shirt in a bucket in Belize, or machine washing after a night out at the corner pub, our aim is to create clothing that makes it through your adventures. We also love animals, and use eco/animal-friendly leather. We hope that you will take Off The Grid Collection on your next adventure. More About the Team!Alex Zanin is a clothing designer from Italy. He has been working in the textile industry for more than 10 years around the world, and has extensive experience designing and manufacturing clothing for all sorts of labels such as Baci & Abbracci, Honda, Lui Jo and many more. It has always been his dream to create designs for his own label, and with his experience traveling the world, Off The Grid Collection is a perfect reflection of his design and life experience.Sara Baumann is a researcher and filmmaker who has been working in Asia for the past 6 years. She has spent this time working on a variety of creative research projects for promoting social justice, such as a UNAIDS fashion show to address the stigma of AIDS in Bangladesh, films to bring awareness to women's health issues in a number of countries, a sewing project in India to help women start their sewing projects directly in their homes, and many more. Her projects have been featured at the Smithsonian, UN headquarters in NYC, and film festivals and research conferences across the globe. Now Sara wants to take her passion for research and fashion and put her experience and findings into clothing pieces that everyone can wear. Other Ways You Can HelpWe realize that people can contribute and help get Off The Grid Collection out there in SO many ways. Here are some ideas of how you can help us!
Air miles- We realize that there are many of you out there that travel a TON! If you have extra airmiles you can help us promote our collection by donating air miles.
Trade Show Passes - As young designers, trade shows can be really expensive! If you have trade show passes that may help us in our research please let us know.
Do you have a boutique? Talk to us about carrying our collection in your store- contact us today at sara@theoffthegridcollection.com.
Follow us on Instagram

Join our mailing list


Tweet about us!
Join our Facebook Page

Tell your friend's about us!!!!!
Share our website link

Have amazing travel photos/stories/packing tips? Use the hashtag, #offthegrid and let's create a sharing community!
Send us motivational messages via email/twitter/FB etc.! Trust us, we'll love you for it!
SHARE SHARE SHARE - We truly want to create a wonderful community of fellow wanderers and travelers, and we believe this can best be achieved if you tell your friends about us. It's pretty easy, just takes one click, one share on facebook etc. and we'll start building our community one step, one day, one person at a time!
Thanks to Jetty Rae for the amazing music track for our video, check her out!Thanks to Lindsey Mak Photography for her support in photographing our first look book- check out our website to see her work!

story:
Spare yourself from endlessly racking your brain and spending long hours searching for the right gift. Have professionals pick and design a gift that will be just right for your occasion. 

What you get. 

  • Professional choice
  • Individual design 
  • Personalized gift
  • Designer wrapped

Make Your Gift Stand Out! 

Regardless of the occasion, time of the year, age and whom you're getting the gift for; be that yourself, a family member, a dear friend or even a colleague, just let us know a few details and we will HANDPICK & DESIGN WRAP a very special gift with a Russian touch to it and tailored to your needs. 
If you're ordering not for yourself, we will e-mail you a photograph of what's inside the box, so that you know what you are presenting. 

So go ahead and choose your perk and expect the unexpected!


Help us by spreading the word, we would profusely appreciate that!

story:
High speed, ultra secure and easy to use. Instant setup. The best VPN Network.

 Meet Ziggit

Ziggit is for Everyone- This is a device that can be used by anyone in order to safely browse the internet.

Keep yourself and your loved ones safe. Nowadays the online world is becoming more and more dangerous. Databases, private profiles, emails, personal computers and many other places are getting hacked, but it is up to us to protect ourselves.

-Unblock websites

Access any website or app without geographic restrictions or censorship.

-Online privacy

Encrypt you Internet traffic and hide your IP address from hackers and spies. Stop them from seeing what you do online.

-Videos from anywhere

Watch the content you want from any country on earth, at blazing fast speeds.


What is VPN? 

VPN is a Virtual Private Network. What this helps with is by hiding your IP, you won't be able to be found. Keep your content secure, and keep others from accessing your devices. Hide the apps that you’re using on your computer, tablet, and smart phone.


How does the Ziggit VPN service work?

In this business we are getting together and going to work with the best network providers. This is the only way to get great quality from the VPN technology from all around the world. You will also be getting high quality service at competitive prices. When contributing to our project, you get one year of this service. Our premium plan will cost 10$ per month, and 5 $ per month if you buy a yearly membership. Our basic plan will be absolutely free, so anyone can use it. It will have less locations, but fully functional.


In the old days VPN was used, so that people at the office could access data from their home network. Now VPN technology is becoming available for all internet users. It helps people from all over the world connect in a secure way. It helps you stay safe, secure and anonymous online.


When is VPN useful?

When doing your online banking

When using Wi-Fi hotspots

When shopping online

When accessing media

When securing communication


Get started with Ziggit, just switch it on with one button, get your privacy, feel secure and connect to whatever you want!

How to use Ziggit?

When designing Ziggit, simplicity was one of the most important factures that we paid attention to. We want to make it easy for absolutely anyone to use. There are 3 simple steps to follow in order to use Ziggit. Just press the on button, choose what country you want to connect from and lastly, use any browser, or app from any device like you normally do.

Select Ziggit Wi-Fi

  Press the button on your Ziggit. Your device can now find your Ziggit Wi-Fi. Connect to it.

Connect to the Internet

  You can now control you Ziggit and connect it to a nearby network. Any network works as long as you have access to it.

Browse the internet

  Now use your device like you normally would, from browsing to using any apps that need internet connection.


Ziggit creates a secondary Wi-Fi network for your security.

Ziggit connects to Wi-Fi networks, and afterwards creates a secure network just for you. No installation is needed when using Ziggit, just connect and GO!

Ziggit works with open source encryption technology in order to protect your data. This is what the big boys in government and big companies are using.


Visit whatever websites you want.

Any governments censor the internet, blocking voices, one thing or the other from social media like Facebook, Twitter and other websites. This a a big problem for people because they can’t get access to information.

Some TV shows, websites, and even some YouTube channels can only be accessed from certain countries. Ziggit fixes this problem by letting you choose what country you want to browse the internet from.

Connect with Ziggit and use the internet as if you are there!


Which Wi-Fi devices can use Ziggit? All of them!

Now all your devices can enjoy online freedom, by simply connecting to your personal Ziggit. It’s as simple as that.


Ziggit is recommended for everyone that is trying to stay safe on the internet.


Ziggit- 9300 mAh battery

Ziggit has a powerful battery of 9300 mAh, which can come in handy when you’re away from a plug for a long time. You can even use a USB cable to link Ziggit to your device and charge it when running out of juice.


Timeline:

January- Launch Indiegogo campaign

March- Finish Indiegogo campaign

April- Start manufacturing

June- Production samples

August-Testing

September- Final Production/Packaging

November- Shipping

Retail price of Ziggit.


Ziggit device- $ 49

1 year of Premium VPN- $69

This service lets you use the worldwide network that Ziggit provides.

Stretch mark

If we reach $100,000 we want to open an open market where developers can start building apps and explore the possibilities of Ziggit. Our team can only do so much for this product, but by making it open source we can all work together and do so much more.

Frequently asked questions

Q:Does Ziggit work with all devices?

A: Yes, Ziggit works with all devices that have a Wi-Fi connection. As long as it is a regular Wi-Fi connection you can connect it any devices like smart phones, tablets, laptops, smart TV’s, media players.

Q:Is it necessary to contribute to the premium service in order to use Ziggit?

A: It is not necessary to have the premium service active in order to use Ziggit, but the premium service does give you access to more locations and greater speeds.

Q:Can I watch movies, series, TV shows on Ziggit?

A:Ziggit does not provide online content, but rather gives you access to areas to allow you to follow your favorite shows, or channels online. An example would be if you are travelling to Eastern Europe, and when trying to watch a TV show that can only be accessed from an IP in the USA you can’t access it. In this case you would need to use Ziggit and choose a network from the USA, and you will be able to watch the show as if you are back home.

Q: What do I do if I changed my address after contributing to the campaign?

A: We will contact everyone once more before shipping Ziggit and ask everyone for any changed names addresses, etc. You can also email us at any time if changes occur.

Q:Can I connect to other VPN services with my Ziggit?

A: There is no possibility to use other VPN services with Ziggit. We are trying to make Ziggit as simple to use as possible and this would make it to complicated, so we have decided to make the software preinstalled. With have chosen the best network providers to work with, so all you will have to do is turn it on and use it.

Q: Does Ziggit work absolutely everywhere?

A: Ziggit will work where it finds an internet connection, and isn’t restricted by network administrators that block ports. We will work with the best VPN partners in the game to make it possible to access the internet through Ziggit from as many locations as possible. We will do our best to make these occasions as rare as possible.

Q: Where is Ziggit shipped for free?

A:Ziggit will be shipped for free within the USA. If you are ordering Ziggit from another country it is best to add the international shipping perk to your package. When doing so please indicate the postal address, so that we can sort out all deliveries correctly.

Q: Can I use more than one device on my Ziggit?

A: Short answer is yes.

Q: What if I want to order a different perk?

Just add the perk that you want and contact us to let us know and work out the details. We will also contact everyone 4 weeks before shipping to ask if the postal address hasn't changed. If it has changed we will change the details to make sure that the perk gets delivered to the correct contributor.

A BIG THANK YOU TO EVERYONE INVOLVED!

We will work with the best VPN partners in the game to make it possible to access the internet through Ziggit from as many locations as possible. We will do our best to make these occasions as rare as possible.Q: Where is Ziggit shipped for free?A:Ziggit will be shipped for free within the USA. If you are ordering Ziggit from another country it is best to add the international shipping perk to your package. When doing so please indicate the postal address, so that we can sort out all deliveries correctly.Q: Can I use more than one device on my Ziggit?A: Short answer is yes.Q: What if I want to order a different perk?Just add the perk that you want and contact us to let us know and work out the details. We will also contact everyone 4 weeks before shipping to ask if the postal address hasn't changed. If it has changed we will change the details to make sure that the perk gets delivered to the correct contributor.A BIG THANK YOU TO EVERYONE INVOLVED!

story:
IF YOU DON'T LIKE DONAIRS...
                  ...than I don't know, you just won't get it. You might as well stop reading this right now, because none of this will make sense to you.

I went about Putting together and photographing what I'd call the perfect Halifax Donair. Then I put that sucker on a pillow, So soft.

I thought it was a pretty silly idea and I wasn't sure if I was wasting my time, but people love having a donair that they can slam their face down into after a long night of drinking without the greasy aftermath. Hell, you will have a comfy ass sleep on this meat covered pita, and you will have sweet saucy dreams.

The Donair Party Pillow was first introduced to Halifax this past summer, and it sold out pretty much friggin instantly. Plan B on Gottingen lovingly endorsed and help sell it (credit where it's due!) to the people that love to slurp down greasy Donairs.

The Coast even gave it a little article! People have been raving about the super limited run of pillows. So it's time they were made available to you!

Sweet Dreams, Donair Heads

-Stranger Scrag 

"What would you buy if you get that Money?"

  • The Fabric: 100% American cotton
  • The stuffing: 100% cotton as well!
  • The Tags: Softest tags you've seen on a pillow, period.
  • The Boxes (full colour pizza box)
  • The Stickers: Awesome 902 Donair stickers. (902 for life!)

The pillows will be sewn right here in Nova Scotia! 

I want everyone that donates to this to get their money worth! Donate $25 (The price of the pillow) and you will get a pillow! 

"There's No way you're gonna get $600"

I am setting this to be a flexible campaign, so at any level it will be successful.

The plan is to make enough pillows so that when they are sold, I can make another batch of pillows without a startup! Should I fall short of this goal, I can still send out the prizes, I have no minimum here, I just want you people to have these things, I feel like I'm hogging the fun. 

So to summarize:

Even if I only make one $25 donation, that means one person is getting a pillow. No one gets left behind!

    "But I'm Broke!"

    If you're broke, or you just want to buy a real donair instead, at least share this campaign so your friends may discover their new favourite meat pillow. (yum)

    Also, Check out http://StrangerScrag.com

story:
New Year, New designs, New team Member!

My name is Amae Love, I'm designer, singer and entreprenuer. I have been designing and sewing clothing since I was a teenager, and producing it for a decade with the same team. I LOVE being creative and having my creativity fuel my income! My clothing business fuels my career as a musical artist.

I have a wonderful production team, and I'm so excited to be creating new designs, this time with my Beloved partner, Tulku, who is a very successful community leader. Tulku produces 2 amazing music festivals, Enchanted Forest and ForeverEverLand. Look out for both of them in 2015!
His participation is making my businesses all the more yummy, effective, and organized. Together, we are poised for our greatest success yet!
As we speak, we are here in Bali creating Menswear, Women's clothing, leather belts and harnesses, silver and gold peacock feather jewelry, Epic silver and gold rings, septum rings and more. 

Our new clothing designs for 2015 include: Men's lightweight hoodies, yoga/lounge pants, shorts, fitted stretch jeans, a double breasted stretch vest, and a convertible collar canvas vest. For women, there is a cropped hoody, reversible miniskirt, 2 new short dresses and a long dress, a full length vest with snaps, bubble pants, a tunic T-shirt, leggings, and more.
Note: WE ARE ONLY HERE until April 10... so If what you want is a customized item, let us know ASAP so we can order it now. The sooner you order, the sooner we can get it to you.

What We Need & What You Get

One of the biggest challenges in doing a production with no outside funding is coming up with a large chunk of cash all at once.  With this campaign, we've figured out a way to help you help us...and we have SO much to offer in return!

Through this campaign we can offer you the best possible deals on our clothing, and customized options because we will be running this campaign during our design & production process.  We wont be offering these benefits to anyone but our campaign supporters...that's YOU!

I have a few successful crowdfunding campaigns under my belt: One for a music video, one for my upcoming album "REAL", and another Pre-order campaign for my last clothing production. Crowdfunding is still the best way I know to bring visibility to your projects, invite participation and get the support you need.  There is no better way for us to get the word out about what we are doing, raise the funds we need for production AND give you the best deal possible.
Crowdfunding is where it's AT, baby!!  :)

No matter which perk you select, you may choose  any of the designs. No need to decide now!

With 125+ products already up in the store, we can't list every product as a perk.
To simplify things for us and offer the most flexibility to YOU in our perks, We've set up the campaign for you to buy credits with us. (Although I have provided *suggestions* for what you can get in each category, you don't have to follow them!) The more you spend, the bigger your discount, and you don't have to decide what you want until it's time to fulfill your order (in about 2 months- just in time for summer!) If you end up wanting something that costs MORE than the credit selected, no worries! You can simply send us the rest of the money by the time your items are ready to ship. You will STILL be getting first dibs through your contribution! Your credit will cover the shipping cost unless otherwise noted.
If you know what you want already, and we have it in stock, we can fulfill your pre-orders RIGHT AWAY when you use PayPal.
Instant Gratification, baby!

Our high level of customer service will cater to you and insure your satisfaction with your final products! Having made our production possible, You will be our first priority. We allow you *infinite* flexibility with your credit. You may exchange sizes or items if needed. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to ask.
Our business needs these pre-orders to thrive!
Quite simply, it is how we are going to pay for our production.

Time to Break it Down!

  • Right now we are in Bali designing our new line and beginning our production. We are selecting fabrics, making orders, and setting the course for our year!
  • We need more than we are asking for in our goal. By no means is our goal an accurate representation of what it will cost to produce this line. We have already paid all our own travel, fabric, and sampling costs.
  •  We will use ALL of the campaign monies towards production- and then some! The more we raise here, the better!! This just allows us to give you the best deal right when we need it the most. (When we have to pay for everything before we have sold anything!)
  • Amae Love designs is a sound investment. Already in business for 10 years, We already have a thriving Etsy store and a 100% customer satisfaction rating. There is virtually no risk involved in your donation. You'll send us a donation, we'll get you some high quality stylish gear... End of story. Again, the whole "WIN-WIN" thing really turns us on!

Quality, Comfort, and Style: Our Vision & More

  • Creativity and self expression is at the heart of our business. Be colorful, be wild, be totally YOUnique!
  • We believe in comfort AND style! if you can't wear it dancing, what's the point?  We live to dance and we also work out and do yoga. This clothing is for an active lifestyle! Who knew sexy could be so comfy?
  • we use organic and sustainable fabrics whenever possible.
  • We believe in fair trade business practices! All members of our team are paid a living wage. We pay them per piece and we pay them what they ask for, no bargaining. We respect each others cultures. We laugh together!
  • We see to it that our products are quality and will stand the test of time. We know they do because its what we wear, and we are wild sauce! ;)
    Just read our reviews on Etsy to see for yourself.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us get the work out about our campaign and clothing line...this is is the #1 most important thing we can express to you! The more people see this in their feeds, the more they will be motivated to check it out.
When you share this campaign, say a few words any previously owned Amae Love Designs with your post and what you like about them. it makes a world of difference! We need all the help we can get, people. 
SHOUT IT FROM THE ROOFTOPS! :)

If you have questions for us, do not hesitate to ask. We are at your service!

We thank you from the bottom of hearts for helping to make our production possible.

We TRULY love this life and all of you. 

Love,
T&A

story:
Choose your language / Choisissez votre langue / Escoge tu Idioma: English / Français / Español


English




MEDIA DEMO DAY






WHAT CAN CLASSI DO FOR YOU?


ADDITIONAL FEATURES



Classi is the perfect fit  for your classic watch. It looks like a regular leather strap in appearance, but it’s powered by the best wearable technology on the inside. With Classi, you can use technology to improve your everyday life while keeping your beloved classic watch. Classi integrates the same features as today’s best wearable tech inside a classic leather watch strap that you can fit to your favorite traditional timepiece.

With Classi, you can make your own watch smart!


WHY CLASSI?

As wearable technology invades our lives, our world is becoming even more connected. Many of you are now faced with a dilemma: do I wear my classic watch or do I wear my smartwatch?

Some of you wear both, some of you value connectivity more than classicism and have made the switch, and some of you will never give up your beautiful traditional timepiece for one of today’s gadget-like wearables.

Powered by our top-notch sensors and machine learning algorithms, Classi is full of features that can enhance your everyday life discreetly without requiring you to give up wearing your beloved classic watch.


HOW DOES IT WORK?

We’ve combined state of the art technology and have created an innovative way of assembling electronics into a leather strap. The result is a genuine leather watch strap  that has the appearance of a regular strap on the outside but actually has smart technology built in.


PERKS


Standard Perks:


Advanced Perks:


Special Perks:



THE STORY BEHIND


THE DESIGN

Classi has been designed by the best engineers and experts from both the watch and Internet of Things field. For us, quality is the the most important factor in a product. We searched long and hard for the best partners, and we wouldn’t be here without them. 

Our team has worked hard on Classi’s every detail. We’ve worked with the best leather strap producers in the world as well as with watch specialists from Switzerland to shape our product.


SPECIFICATIONS


AVAILABILITY

Classi will be available for watches with the following widths: 

You will be able to choose between Classi in black calf leather, Classi in brown calf leather or Classi Elite, a handmade alligator strap.


THE APP

We’ve combined tradition with state of the art IoT technology. The Classi app is here to offer you the most user friendly experience. It will help you configure the different setting to run your notifications smoothly and will display all the data collected in your device. In addition, you will be able to activate the Navigation Mode and choose your destination.

CLICK HERE FOR APP PREVIEW

Simple and easy to use, our app helps you enhance your daily life.

CURRENT STAGE

At the moment, we are at the pre-production stage with Classi. We’ve  showcased our prototypes for months at different international shows, including the Wearable Technology Show in London, the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona, Baselworld in Switzerland and Viva Technology in Paris. 

(Video using the Classi strap with the MainTool app and showcase all the watch samples and product on one black table)


THE LUNATICS BEHIND MAINTOOL

Our vision at MainTool is to seamlessly embed technology into people's everyday lives. It isn’t a mystery though. What makes us special is our team.

Through our first product, Classi, we wish to give everyone the opportunity to make their regular watch smart.

Based in Paris, France and Madrid, Spain, our team probably consists of one of the oddest sets of people you would ever expect to find furiously and yet coherently working together towards the same quest. But we all share delusional passion and endless energy in striving to connect a daily accessory that is already on over a billion peoples' wrists.

MANAGEMENT TEAM


                                                  

                

                     

BEST ENGINEERING TEAM

We have the best IoT engineering team in the field. Together, our team has created more than 20 connected devices. They are led by:              

                 

WHY WE CREATED CLASSI

Not so long ago, smartwatches were supposed to be the next big thing. However, we thought these devices were impersonal. They were pieces of technology, not pieces of art like traditional classic watches. Don’t get us wrong, we love technology, but we didn’t think that smartwatches should replace all classic watches. We asked ourselves a question: what if you could have both, a classic watch and a smartwatch? Since then, we’ve been on a journey to combine the best of technology with the best of the watch industry. We’re excited to finally introduce you to Classi, the product of years of hard work.


MAINTOOL IN THE PRESS


NEXT STEPS

We want you to become part of the MainTool family. As an early adopter, you will be part of the watch industry revolution. Your pledge will be used to manufacture and market Classi in early 2017.

RISK & CHALLENGES

This is MainTool’s first product launch and we are completely dedicated to make it a great one for all and each of our Indiegogo backers. However, we are managing shipping and delivery for the first time and we know there are potential delays that we can not control.

We are passionate about what we do and we are confident that we will be able to deliver Classi as outlined in our timeline for several reasons:

1. We have experts on our team who have over 10 years of experience in hardware and wearable manufacturing.

2. We already have all our partners and agreements set.

3. We have been producing working units for 1 year now and are 100% prepared to scale our operation and meet the backer demand.

We understand that this campaign is an amazing opportunity to establish a customer base of backers that are as passionate as we are. Now, it is our mission to fulfill our promises and give our backers an awesome product and an even better after sales service!

FAQ

What makes Classi different?

Classi is a leather smart strap for classic watches. We’ve embedded the best of wearable electronics into a regular leather watchstrap that you can fit to your favourite traditional timepiece. Unlike other companies, which make smartwatches that look like classic watches, Classi gives you the power to make your own watch smart.

Classi can be fitted to any traditional timepiece and gives it the same features as most wearables, including activity tracking, notifications via vibrations, calorie counting and more.. We want to give people the best of both worlds by allowing them to keep the watch they love but also allow them to enjoy the best of technology.

The way we have embedded technology into a classic watchband is unique and patented (US 9,292,008). In addition to no compromise on design, our customers preserve their brand's culture, heritage and sentimental values since our electronics blend into the leather material until they quasi-disappear.

What does it do?

Classi not also combines the best of technology and design but also:

1) Measures footsteps + calories burned (pedometer)

2) Alerts smartly through discrete vibrations that can be customized

3) Communicates with iOS and Android apps

4) Uses a hidden button to reject phone calls and trigger emergency alerts

5) Can be customized with different modes based on your needs and situation

6) Has a 7+ day battery life 

How does Classi work?

Classi can interact with Android and iOS smartphones via Bluetooth. With Classi, you can store your health data in real time to check your progress and personalize your watch strap vibration for each kind of notification that matters in your life.

Classi uses cutting-edge technology to provide users with the best experience: flex-rigid Printed Board Circuits (PCB), batteries with flexible connections, tiny vibration motors and magnetic charging technology.

How does Classi interact with my smartphone?

Classi is a completely discreet solution so you keep your style while being connected. It connects to your mobile phone via Bluetooth and works together with our iOS and Android mobile app.

Classi requires you to download the free MainTool app from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store (to be released early 2017).

Classi is compatible with iOS and Android. It requires:

  • iPhone 4S or newer

  • iPod Touch 5th generation or newer

  • iPad 3 or newer

  • iPad Mini 1st generation or newer

  • iPad Air 1st generation or newer

  • Android devices equipped with Bluetooth 4.0 and running Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean) or later.


How does the emergency button work?

When you are in a dangerous situation, you can press the emergency button on your Classi strap. This will send an SMS to the emergency contact that you have pre-set on the MainTool app.

Can I customize the notifications for calls, WhatsApp, Facebook, SMS, emails, etc.?

Yes. Classi allows you to customize your strap vibrations for each kind of notification that matters to you. This includesphone calls,  WhatsApp messages,  Facebook messages, emails and SMS messages. You decide the notifications you want to receive and the type of vibration for each of them.

Why should I be an early adopter? What advantages do I get?

Early adopters are the key initial supporters that will help us bring this project to life and spread the word. To thank you for being our special early adopters and supporters, you get:

1) The Classi strap for just $99

2) A 2-year full warranty and after sales service

3) You will receive your strap before we sell it anywhere else!

How much will Classi cost after the campaign?

The retail price for Classi will be $149. We want to show gratitude to our supporters during the campaign and that is why they get such a big discount compared to the post-campaign price.

At what stage is MainTool with Classi?

Classi’s hardware, design and fully functional prototypes are done. They have been ready and exhaustively tested since June 2016. We are currently raising funds to start the industrial process and begin mass production. We also want to get our product validated by you.

After our first batch of market-ready products are shipped, we will sell our products via our website and through selected partners.

What OS does Classi support?

Classi is compatible with iOS and Android.

Which apps and devices are compatible with Classi?

Classi can beintegrated with all of your favorite healthcare apps.  Current integrations are based on smartphone notifications, but deeper integrations with productivity and risk prevention are planned.

Where can the Classi strap be shipped? How much does it cost?

Classi can be shipped worldwide. We collect a small fee in order to support our shipping costs.

We charge $10 per shipment for Europe and $20 per shipment for the rest of the world.

When will Classi be delivered?

We expect to ship out all the Classi straps by April 2017.

How will my order be shipped?

We will be shipping all the orders with the most suitable premium courier which will vary between countries. All shipments will have tracking numbers which will be emailed to you once the delivery has been shipped.

How long does the battery last?

Classi lasts 7+ days with a frequent use.

Is Classi waterproof?

Yes. Classi has an IP64 rating and  is “splashproof”, which means that it can resist the usual scenarios like temporarily being under the rain or washing your hands.

However, bear in mind that Classi is made of leather which may be damaged if it comes in  contact with water, so we do not recommend swimming or diving with it.

Do you offer warranty and after sales service?

Yes. Our final product will have a full 2-year full warranty to all our Indiegogo backers and we will have an after sales service available.

The warranty does not cover damage caused by accident or misuse of the strap while in the possession of a consumer not caused by a defect in material or workmanship.

How do I charge my Classi?

Classi comes with a small magnetic charger that you can plug into the port to charge your strap.

In which colors is Classi available?

Classi comes in three different versions: brown and black calf leather, and a premium model with real black alligator.

Do you have a patent for this technology?

Yes. The way we have embedded technology into a classic strap is unique and patented as of February 2016 (US 9,292,008).

Can I replace the battery?

No, but the batteries can work for more than 5 years with heavy use so you do not have to worry about it.

I do not find the answers to my questions here, what can I do?

You can find the full FAQ at this link. Feel free to drop us a line at contact@maintool.me We will be happy to answer all your questions!



Français



MEDIA DEMO DAY





QUE PEUT FAIRE CLASSI POUR VOUS?


CARACTÉRISTIQUES SUPPLÉMENTAIRES



Classi est la solution idéale pour votre montre classique. Il ressemble à un bracelet en cuir normal en apparence, mais il est alimenté par la meilleure technologie. Avec Classi, vous pouvez utiliser la technologie pour améliorer votre vie quotidienne tout en gardant votre montre classique bien aimée. Classi intègre les mêmes caractéristiques que les meilleures objets connectés d’aujourd’hui et plus encore, le tout dans un bracelet en cuir classique que vous pouvez adapter à votre pièce d'horlogerie traditionnelle préférée.

Avec Classi, vous pouvez faire de votre propre montre, une montre connectée!


POURQUOI CLASSI?

Comme la technologie embarquée envahit nos vies, notre monde devient de plus en plus connecté. Beaucoup d'entre vous sont maintenant confrontés à un dilemme: dois-je porter ma montre classique ou dois-je porter ma smartwatch?

Certains d'entre vous portent les deux à la fois, certains d'entre vous préfère la connectivité plus que le classicisme et ont fait le changement, et certains d'entre vous n’abandonneront jamais votre belle pièce d'horlogerie traditionnelle pour l'un des bracelets connectés sur le marché.

Equipé avec nos capteurs haut de gamme et des algorithmes d'apprentissage machine, Classi est plein de fonctionnalités qui peuvent améliorer votre vie quotidienne discrètement sans vous obliger à renoncer à porter votre montre classique bien-aimé.


COMMENT ÇA MARCHE?

Nous avons combiné l’état de l’art de la technologie de pointe et nous avons créé un moyen novateur d'assemblage électronique dans un bracelet en cuir. Le résultat est un bracelet en cuir véritable qui a l'apparence d'un bracelet normal à l'extérieur, mais a en fait une technologie intelligente à l’intérieur.

LA CONCEPTION

Classi a été conçu par les meilleurs ingénieurs et experts aussi bien du monde de la montre et de l’IoT. Pour nous, la qualité est le facteur le plus important dans un produit. Nous avons cherché longtemps et durement les meilleurs partenaires, et nous ne serions pas ici sans eux.

Notre équipe a travaillé dur sur tous les détails de Classi. Nous avons travaillé avec les meilleurs producteurs de bracelet en cuir dans le monde, ainsi qu'avec les meilleures spécialistes de l’horlogerie Suisse pour réaliser un produit incroyable et une technologie invisible.

ETAT D'AVANCEMENT

LES FOUS DERRIÈRE MAINTOOL

Notre vision chez MainTool est d'intégrer de façon invisible la technologie dans la vie quotidienne des gens. Ce n’est pas un grand mystère. Ce qui nous rend spécial c’est notre équipe.

Grâce à notre premier produit, Classi, nous voulons donner à chacun la possibilité de transformer leur montre régulière en Smartchwatch.

Basée à Paris, France et Madrid, Espagne, notre équipe se compose probablement de l’un des plus étrange ensemble de personnes que vous pouvez imaginer travaillant d’arrache pied et de manière conjuguée vers la même quête. Nous partageons tous une passion délirante et une energie sans bornes pour connecter un accessoire quotidien qui est déjà sur le poignet d’1 milliards de personnes.

POURQUOI NOUS AVONS CRÉÉ CLASSI?

Il n’y a pas si longtemps, les smartwatches étaient censées être la prochaine révolution. Cependant, nous avons pensé que ces appareils étaient impersonnelle. Ils étaient des morceaux de technologie, et non pas des oeuvres d'art comme les montres classiques traditionnels. Ne vous méprenez pas, nous aimons la technologie, mais nous ne pensons pas que les smartwatches devraient remplacer toutes les montres classiques. Nous nous sommes posés une question: et si vous pouviez avoir les deux, une montre classique et une smartwatch?

Depuis, nous avons travaillé dur pour combiner le meilleur de la technologie avec le meilleur de l'industrie horlogère. Nous sommes ravis de vous présenter enfin Classi, le produit d’années de travail acharnés.


MAINTOOL DANS LA PRESSE


PROCHAINES ÉTAPES

Nous voulons que vous fassiez partie de la famille MainTool. L’ayant adopté très tôt, vous ferez partie de la nouvelle révolution de l'industrie horlogère. Votre engagement sera utilisé pour fabriquer et commercialiser Classi dès début de 2017.

RISQUES & DÉFIS

Ceci est le premier lancement de produit de MainTool et nous sommes entièrement dédiée à en faire un succès pour tous et pour chacun de nos clients IndieGoGo. Cependant, nous gérons l'expédition et la livraison pour la première fois et nous savons qu'il ya des retards potentiels que nous ne pouvons pas contrôler.

Nous sommes passionnés par ce que nous faisons et nous sommes confiants que nous serons en mesure de livrer Classi comme indiqué dans notre calendrier pour plusieurs raisons:

1. Nous avons des experts de notre équipe qui ont plus de 10 ans d'expérience dans le matériel et la fabrication de wearable.

2. Nous avons déjà tous nos partenaires et les accords établis.

3. Nous avons produit des bracelets fonctionnels depuis 1 an maintenant et nous sommes 100% prêt pour l’opération et de répondre à la demande.

Nous comprenons que cette campagne est une occasion extraordinaire de mettre en place une base d’acheteurs tout aussi passionnés que nous sommes. Maintenant, il est de notre devoir de remplir nos promesses et donner à nos partisans un produit génial et un service après-vente encore meilleur !

FAQ

Ce qui rend Classi différent?

Classi est un bracelet en cuir connecté pour montres classiques. Nous avons intégré le meilleur de l'électronique portable dans un bracelet en cuir normal que vous pouvez adapter à votre pièce d'horlogerie traditionnelle préférée. Contrairement à d'autres entreprises, qui font des smartwatches qui ressemblent à des montres classiques, Classi vous donne le pouvoir de rendre votre propre montre intelligente.

Classi peut être adapté à toute pièce d'horlogerie traditionnelle et lui donne les mêmes caractéristiques que la plupart des wearables, y compris le suivi de l'activité, des notifications par vibrations, compter les calories et plus .. Nous voulons donner aux gens le meilleur des deux mondes en leur permettant de garder la montre qu'ils aiment, mais aussi de leur permettre de profiter du meilleur de la technologie.

La façon dont nous avons intégré la technologie dans un bracelet classique est unique et breveté (US 9,292,008). En plus aucun compromis sur le design, nos clients conservent la culture, le patrimoine de leur marque et des valeurs sentimentales puisque nos appareils électroniques se fondent dans le matériel en cuir jusqu'à ce qu'ils disparaissent quasiment.

Qu'est ce qu’il fait?

Classi combine le meilleur de la technologie et du design, mais aussi:

1) Mesure les pas + calories brûlées (podomètre)

2) Alertes intelligemment par des vibrations discrètes qui peuvent être personnalisées

3) Communique avec iOS et les applications Android

4) Utilise un bouton caché pour rejeter les appels téléphoniques et alerte déclenchement d'urgence en envoyant un sms avec la position GPS par Google Maps

5) Peut être personnalisé avec différents modes en fonction de vos besoins et de la situation

6) A une durée de vie de la batterie 7+ jours

Comment fonctionne-t-Classi?

Classi peut interagir avec Android et iOS smartphones via Bluetooth. Avec Classi, vous pouvez stocker vos données de santé en temps réel pour vérifier vos progrès et personnaliser la vibration de votre montre bracelet pour chaque type de notification qui compte dans votre vie.

Classi utilise une technologie de pointe pour fournir aux utilisateurs la meilleure expérience: flex-rigides Circuits carte imprimée (PCB), des batteries avec des connexions flexibles, de minuscules vibreurs et une technologie de recharge magnétique.

Comment Classi interagi avec mon smartphone?

Classi est une solution tout à fait discrète de sorte que vous gardez votre style tout en étant connecté. Il se connecte à votre téléphone mobile via Bluetooth et travaille en collaboration avec nos applications mobile iOS Android.

Classi a besoin de l'application MainTool que vous trouverez gratuitement sur l'Apple App Store ou Google Play Store (à libération anticipée 2017).

Classi est compatible avec iOS et Android.

Compatible avec :

  • iPhone 4S ou plus récent

  • iPod Touch 5e génération ou plus récent

  • iPad 3 ou plus récent

  • iPad Mini 1ère génération ou plus récent

  • iPad Air 1ère génération ou plus récent

  • Appareils Android équipés de Bluetooth 4.0 et fonctionnant sous Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean) ou version ultérieure.

Comment fonctionne le bouton d'urgence?

Lorsque vous êtes dans une situation dangereuse, vous pouvez appuyer sur le bouton d'urgence sur votre bracelet Classi. Ceci enverra un SMS au contact d'urgence que vous avez pré-réglée sur l'application MainTool.

Puis-je personnaliser les notifications pour les appels, WhatsApp, Facebook, SMS, e-mails, etc.?

Oui. Classi vous permet de personnaliser vos vibrations pour chaque type de notification qui compte pour vous. Cela inclue les appels, WhatsApp messages, messages Facebook, e-mails et des messages SMS. Vous décidez les notifications que vous souhaitez recevoir et le type de vibration pour chacun d'eux.

Pourquoi devrais-je être un early adopter (premier acheteur) ? Quels avantages puis-je obtenir?

Les premiers utilisateurs sont les supporters initiaux clés qui nous aideront à mener ce projet à la vie et diffuser la bonne parole. Pour vous remercier d'être nos early adopters et supporters spéciaux, vous obtenez:

1) Le bracelet Classi pour seulement $99

2) Une garantie complète de 2 ans et service après-vente

3) Vous recevrez votre bracelet avant que nous le vendions nulle part ailleurs!

Combien coûtera Classi après la campagne?

Le prix de détail pour Classi sera de minimum $149. Nous voulons montrer la gratitude à nos partisans pendant la campagne, c’est la raison pour laquelle ils obtiennent un rabais important par rapport au prix post-campagne.

A quel stade est MainTool avec Classi?

Le hardware de Classi, la conception et les prototypes sont entièrement fonctionnels sont effectués. Ils étaient prêts et testés de façon exhaustive depuis Juin 2016. Nous attendons donc les commandes pour démarrer le processus industriel et commencer la production de masse. Nous voulons aussi obtenir une validation du concept de ce produit par la communauté on line.

Après notre premier lot de produits prêts pour le marché et expédié, nous allons vendre nos produits via notre site Web et par des partenaires sélectionnés.

Quel système d'exploitation prend en charge Classi?

À l'heure actuelle Classi est compatible avec iOS et Android.

Quelles applications et périphériques sont compatibles avec Classi?

Classi peut être intégré avec toutes vos applications de soins de santé préférés. Les intégrations actuelles sont basées sur des notifications de smartphone, mais des intégrations profondes avec la productivité et la prévention des risques sont prévues, la mesure du stress.

Ou le bracelet Classi peut être expédié? Combien ça coûte?

Classi peut être expédié dans le monde entier. Nous recueillons un petit supplément afin de couvrir nos frais d'expédition.

Nous facturons $10 par envoi pour l'Europe et $20 par envoi pour le reste du monde.

Quand Classi sera livré?

Nous nous attendons à expédier tout les bracelets Classi en Avril 2017.

Comment ma commande sera-t-elle envoyée?

Nous expédierons toutes les commandes par le transporteur le plus appropriée selon les pays. Tous les envois auront des numéros de suivi qui seront envoyés par email une fois que la livraison sera expédiée.

Combien de temps dure la batterie?

Classi dure plus de 7 jours avec une utilisation fréquente.

Classi est il imperméable à l'eau ?

Oui. Classi est IP64 et est "splashproof", ce qui signifie qu'il peut résister aux scénarios habituels comme étant temporairement sous la pluie ou le lavage des mains.

Cependant, gardez à l'esprit que Classi est fait de cuir qui peut être endommagée si elle entre en contact avec l'eau, donc nous ne recommandons pas de nager ou plonger avec elle.

Offrez-vous la garantie et service après-vente?

Oui. Notre produit final aura une pleine garantie complète de 2 ans à tous nos acheteurs sur IndieGoGo et nous aurons un service après-vente disponibles.

La garantie ne couvre pas les dommages causés par un accident ou une mauvaise utilisation du bracelet.

Comment puis-je charger mon Classi?

Classi est livré avec un petit chargeur magnétique que vous pouvez brancher sur le port USB pour charger votre bracelet.

Dans quelles couleurs Classi est disponible?

Classi est disponible en trois versions différentes: cuir de veau brun et noir, et un modèle haut de gamme avec un vrai alligator noir.

Avez-vous un brevet pour cette technologie?

Oui. La façon dont nous avons intégré la technologie dans un bracelet classique est unique et breveté depuis Février 2016 (US 9,292,008).

Puis-je remplacer la batterie?

Non, mais les batteries peuvent durer pendant environ 5 ans avec une utilisation intensive de sorte que vous ne devez pas vous inquiéter à ce sujet.

Je ne trouve pas les réponses à mes questions ici, que dois je faire ?

Vous pouvez trouver la FAQ complète à ce lien. N’hésitez pas à nous écrire à contact@maintool.me Nous serons heureux de répondre à toutes vos questions !

¿QUÉ PUEDE HACER CLASSI POR TI?


CARACTERÍSTICAS ADICIONALES


Classi es el complemento perfecto para tu reloj clásico, tiene el diseño y luce como una correa de cuero regular pero incorpora la mejor tecnología wearable en su interior. Descubre cómo la tecnología de Classi puede mejorar tu vida cotidiana, manteniendo tu querido reloj. Classi integra las mismas características que los mejores wearables de hoy en día en el interior de una correa de cuero clásica que se puede ajustar a tu reloj tradicional favorito.

¡Con Classi convierte a tu propio reloj en un reloj inteligente!


¿POR QUÉ CLASSI?

A medida que los wearables invaden nuestras vidas, nuestro mundo está cada vez más conectado. Muchos de nosotros ahora nos enfrentamos a un dilema: ¿me pongo mi reloj clásico o me pongo mi reloj inteligente?

Algunos de ustedes llevan ambos, otros valoran conectividad más que tradición y han hecho el cambio, y otros nunca renunciarían a su hermoso reloj tradicional para llevar uno de los wearables actuales que parecen gadgets.

Impulsado por nuestros sensores de máxima calidad y algoritmos de aprendizaje automático, Classi está lleno de características que pueden mejorar tu vida cotidiana discretamente sin necesidad de que tengas que renunciar a usar el reloj clásico que tanto te gusta.


¿CÓMO FUNCIONA?

Hemos combinado la tecnología más avanzada y hemos creado una innovadora forma de montar la electrónica dentro del cuero y así ofrecerte Classi. El resultado es una genuina correa de cuero que tiene un diseño clásico al tiempo que mantiene toda su inteligencia en la parte interior.
