story:
What is it

The T-Bone is intended as an open platform for 3D printing and similar CNC applications like laser cutters, or milling machines. It's based on open source projects (like BeagleBoard, Arduino, Reprap) and will be also released as open source once finished.

The T-Bone will come pre-programmed for Reprap Mendel 3D Printer. Best known in the Prusa Mendel or Prusa i3 variant. The Software will include low level drivers, the printer application and a high level Web Interface for control. Just connect your steppers, heaters and sensors, configure the software and you are ready to print.

To join highest performance with flexibility and easy programming, we use a very powerful concept: Hard- and software abstraction layers! User interface, configuration, G-Code interpreter, and path planner are running on the BeagleBone. This makes it easy to use existing open source software components, using the existing toolchain on the Linux operating systems of the BeagleBone. Real-time communication with the BeagleBone is handled by a small microcontroller, placed on the T-Bone. The microcontroller is fully compatible with the Arduino toolchain, so everybody can easily modify it. Complex acceleration and velocity calculations for the stepper motors are done by dedicated motion controllers. These are dedicated hardware components, developed to get the maximum performance out of a given stepper motor without putting any workload to the host system.

The low level drivers for the motion controllers and realtime applications are written with the Arduino IDE in C. The higher level applications for G-Code analysis, motion control and web interface are written in Python. There are no special hardware drivers involved. Most of the hardware can be used on the built in Arduino or BeagleBone Black. All software will be released as open source software on github.

Here are the main features of the basic board:

  • 5 stepper motor driver (run syncronized, 3 x up to 4 A, 2 x up to 1.5 A)
  • 10 inputs for end switches (two for each axis)
  • Support for switch-less step detection (http://youtu.be/kB22GvtcAO8).
  • 3 inputs for incremental encoders (3 axis supporting closed loop control)
  • 3 inputs for thermistors
  • 1-wire interface for digital temp and other sensors
  • 2 high power outputs (for extruder and heatbed, up to 12 A)
  • 1 mid power output (for fans, LEDs, ..., also expandable)
  • Power supply for BeagleBone (5 V, 1.2A)
  • Input voltage 12 - 24 V
  • Board is stackable to control several T-Bones with one BegaleBone

For more detailed description of the hardware features see here (to be continued...).

But that's not all. We are planning to create some additional expansion boards with special features. Here are some of the feature we are planning:

  • Support for rotary axis like driller, miller, ...
  • Support for laser cutters
  • External touch panel display
  • Support for other hardware plattforms

And you can do even more! The software is easily adaptable to most CNC applications. If you want to connect your CNC mill you do not have to develop it from ground up, just adapt the printing logic a bit.


What we need

Our funding goal has a simple reason: Produce a first batch boards for reasonable cost. If we can achieve the 20,000 € (roundabout 200 boards) the economies-of-scale is our friend, earnings cover expenses (production cost, tax, fees, shipment).

If we achieve more than the basic goal, we are able to spend some money to realize additional features. And we will use 10% of the additional profit to support other open source crowdfunding projects.

Stretch Goals

  • 22,500 €, Filet Mignon: Hereby we enable the StallGuard function for sensorless end stop detection. The motor can sense a mechanical end stop without physical switches (see a short demo at http://youtu.be/kB22GvtcAO8).  now part of the basic goal!
  • 25,000 €, Rib-Eye: Encoder feedback for three axis (x,y extruder). With encoder feedback a motor can be used in closed-loop-operation.
  • 30,000 €, Porterhouse: Need more than one T-Bone for your application? We can make the board stackable. So there are no limits of motors or extrudes to control. now part of the basic goal!
  • 40,000 €, Sirloin: Applications like drilling or milling machines using a fast rotating motor. With these stackable extension board so-called BLDC motors can be easily controlled in speed to get the optimum result.
  • 50,000 €, Tenderloin: Optical distance sensors make calibration easy and more precise. This specially useful for deltaprinters.

What is the plan

We had and have a very ambitious time schedule. But we are pretty sure that we can keep it.

What was:

  • November 2013: First concept for the project.
  • December 2014: Breadboard prototype finished.   
  • January 2014: First assembled PCB
  • February 2014: Final BOM. Crazy idea for the board shape
  • March 2014: Start of crowdfunding. The Prusa i3 makes its first steps
  • April 2014: Everyone is busy with the crowdfunding campaign.
What will be:

  • Mai 2014: T-Bone successful funded. Release of the OSHW. 
  • June/July 2014: Production of the boards.
  • August 2014: Shipping of the boards
The time schedule for the software release needs to be revised as we need some time to add the additional features. But a basic version will properly released during May. The final version will be released latest when we ship the boards.

The perks that are not related to the technical implementation are properly shipped like primary scheduled.

What you get

We are offering a broad selection of different perks. We offer different version of the T-Bone itself. The bare PCB (Rare), the board with all SMD parts assembled and THT parts attached (Medium), or the fully assembed board (Well Done).

And we decided to add another option, the T-Bone Deluxe! This perk will include T-Bone and a BeagleBone Black Rev C together. We will pre-install our software on the BeagleBone. Only printer specific settings are necessary to make it work. Et voilà. Bon apetit!

Brand new: The T-Bone BBQ. It is a set of SMT breakout boards for THT-mounting of SMD-parts. All pins of the SMD chips are connected to pins of a 0.1” header. Contains following footprints:

•   2 x 16-SSOP
•   1 x 28-SO
•   1 x 28-QFN 5x5
•   1 x 32-QFN 4x4
•   1 x 32-QFN 5x5
•   1 x 32-QFN 7x7
•   1 x 36-QFN
•   1 x 40L-QFN
•   1 x 48-QFN 7x7
•   1 x 48-TQFP

The T-Bone BBQ:

What's the idea behind

First of all we just like to create some great hardware with fast and flexible software. But that's not all. Our aim is to create the most powerful system for open source motion control application. We belief in crowdfunding, open source development, and the maker movement as one of the most exciting things in the internet with potential to make a big change. To say it with Neil Young: We all can get T-Bone!

How you can help us further

Money is important for the realization, but it's even a small bit of all. To make real great hard- and software, we would need your ideas. Any features we haven't covered yet? And if you have question, just ask. About the technology, but also why we think crowd funding and open source is such a great thing. Let's start discussion and share our ideas, because that's what the internet about!

Who we are

We are a team of open source enthusiasts from Germany, located in Hamburg St. Pauli. We have profound knowledge of motion control applications, hard- and software development. 

The aim of the project is to be open source. We use open source hardware and software for the development. And all results of our project are open source. Also the projects funding should be open source. Therefore we would start a crowdfunding project.

Persons:

  • Andreas: Former life as electronic engineer. In transformation to become a Powerpoint industrial engineer. The project is part of his master thesis about democratizing innovation. He is responsible for everything not covered by anybody else. And the philosophical foundation.
  • Jonas: Electrical Engineer and wannabe tinkerer. Transformation to powerpoint engineer successfully accomplished. Hopes, that he will be able to order a controller board for his ShapeOko2. Contributes weired ideas, tbonoid board-shapes and panel optimization for tBonoid shapes in completely unselfish test series on TRINAMICs Weber Grill.
  • Lars: In the final stage of his studies of Electrical Engineering and designs the T-Bone electronics. always interrupted by the great ideas of the marketing guy just like in real life. The hardware design is part of his bachelor thesis.
  • Marcus: Computer Scientist. Developed web applications far too long. Now working on the boundary of software, hardware, Internet of Things and fun. Cofounder of Hamburgs tinker drinkup ‘Palo Altona’. Founder of Interactive Matter. Adding software, agile methods and silly ideas to the project.

In the news

Several journals and blogs reviewed our project. Here a selection of the most populars:

3ders.org

all-electronics.de

DIY 3D Printing

heise online

machinekit.io

microfabricator.com

open-electronics.org

opensourceecology.org

And the philosophical foundation.Jonas: Electrical Engineer and wannabe tinkerer. Transformation to 
powerpoint engineer successfully accomplished. Hopes, that he will be 
able to order a controller board for his ShapeOko2. Contributes weired 
ideas, tbonoid board-shapes and panel optimization 
for tBonoid shapes in completely unselfish test series on TRINAMICs 
Weber Grill.Lars: In the final stage of his studies of Electrical Engineering and 
designs the T-Bone electronics. always interrupted by the great ideas of 
the marketing guy just like in real life. The hardware design is part of
 his bachelor thesis.Marcus: Computer Scientist. Developed web applications far too long. Now working
 on the boundary of software, hardware, Internet of Things and 
fun. Cofounder of Hamburgs tinker drinkup ‘Palo Altona’. Founder of 
Interactive Matter. Adding software, agile methods and silly ideas to 
the project.In the newsSeveral journals and blogs reviewed our project. Here a selection of the most populars:3ders.orgall-electronics.de

story:
How is the 2.0 improved? 

We took all the feedback and suggestions we received from our backers and created an even better wallet. 

  • The Articulate Wallet 2.0 now uses an upgraded premium full grain imported Italian leather that looks and feels amazing.   We wanted a wallet that would compare to the inflated designer brand wallets.  Not only does it look and feel the same, it incorporates features that no other wallet has. 

  • The new design has six card slots with slanted corners to make for quick access.  It is truly one of a kind. 





  • The 2.0 is now 1/2in THINNER then the 1.0.  ONLY .35in!! This makes it as thin as an iPhone!  By using an upgraded leather, we were able to make one of the thinnest leather bill-folds on the market today.

  • Seamless, refined build quality. The edges of the wallet now wrap inside of the wallet. This makes for a professional, higher quality wallet.  

  • The lining on the back pocket wraps over itself.

  • We added a special RFID blocking lining. You can now feel more secure that your personal information is better protected.

    Our goal is to help prevent against Identify theft. We embedded a material that is known to block the transmission of this type of signal. Though we can't guarantee 100% protection due to the variability of transmissions with RFID cards our goal is to limit perpetrators  from gaining information access.

    Other RFID blocking wallets on the market are boring/bulky and have nothing unique about them.   

  • We widened the wallet by 1/4in to hold your bills more easily.


Articulate Wallet 2.0 Collection



The Story-

Articulate began just over a year ago, when we set out to create a wallet that would simplify our lives.  We launched our first design on Kickstarter and thanks to the overwhelming support, we were successfully funded.  We fulfilled over 3,000 orders and since then have received feedback and suggestions for a better wallet.  Taking them into consideration we have come up with something truly unique and one of a kind.  

We wanted a wallet that was convenient to use, looked great, and was thin at the same time.  Money clips are a one solution to keeping it thin, but we found it very inconvenient folding your bills to put them away.  The standard bill-folds we found on the market were either too bulky, too cheap looking, or way over priced.  The Articulate Wallet 2.0 gives you everything you look for in the perfect wallet.  An ultra-thin minimalist design, convenient to use, and all at a very affordable price.


What is RFID and why should I care?

What is RFID?

Not familiar with RFID? RFID is the technology that allows an individual to simply wave their credit card to complete a purchase. Instead of the traditional swipe action that we are so accustomed to, people now have the ability to simply wave there card in front of a scanner which completes a transaction. 

Why is Articulate telling me about RFID?

With every great technology advance there is always going to be someone who wants to break the system. Criminals with very minimal technical skills have created devices similar to the to the scanner which vendors such as grocery stores or use to complete purchases. With these makeshift scanners that the criminals make, they can easily steal your personal financial information. With this information they can make new credit cards based on your financial information. All the perpetrator needs to do is walk past an innocent civilian which then picks up the credit card signal embedded in the credit card.

With the Articulate Wallet 2.0, your information is better protected, including the card in the back pocket.Though we can't guarantee 100% protection  due to different frequency signals in each card, our goal is to limit perpetrators  from gaining information access.  Feel more secure that all your personal information is protected in an ultra thin and stylish design.  

The Perfect Wallet

•Patent Pending back pocket for your most used card

•SIX easy access card slots

•TWO underneath pockets for business cards and change

•RFID blocking

•Ultra Thin minimalist design (.35in)

•Several colors to choose from + International version

Delivery

We are currently stocked with inventory so no need to wait months for product. We will be delivering your order 3-5 days after your purchase with Indiegogo!


Risks and Challenges

The challenges of Articulate Wallet 2.0 will be getting the word out, and convincing backers to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

•SIX easy access card slots
•TWO underneath pockets for business cards and change
•RFID blocking
•Ultra Thin minimalist design (.35in)
•Several colors to choose from + International version
Delivery
We are currently stocked with inventory so no need to wait months for product. We will be delivering your order 3-5 days after your purchase with Indiegogo!






Risks and Challenges
The challenges of Articulate Wallet 2.0 will be getting the word out, and convincing backers to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

story:
Buy a pair of Nacho-inspired sunglasses designed by 5th-grader Vanessa, and help fund art education at some much deserving elementary schools. 


Knockaround is a sunglasses company based in San Diego, California.  We've been around since 2005.  Through the years we've worked with some amazing people and some amazing brands.  We've been featured on notable websites like InStyle.com and Hypebeast.com.  We've been mentioned in periodicals like Complex and GQ.  Celebrities like Snoop Dogg, Natalie Portman, and Ashton Kutcher wear our sunglasses.


This year, we decided to launch a new charitable program called Knockaround Class Acts.

Knockaround Class Acts aims to donate money, resources, and art supplies to local, underfunded elementary schools.

Art is a crucial part of companies like Knockaround and plays a significant role in our daily surroundings.  But unfortunately, we’re seeing funds, resources, and classes for art education in public schools rapidly disappear from the national landscape. That is why it is so important for us to do what we can and show young students the artistic career opportunities available to them in the future.


The winning design.

With the help of ArtReach, our partnering non-profit organization, we visited three local San Diego elementary schools, and collected designs from over 250 fourth and fifth graders.  After much deliberation (there were lots of really great designs), we decided we couldn't pass up 5th grader Vanessa's Nacho design.  Great job, Vanessa!



Buy a Pair!  Here is who you'll be helping.

100% of the proceeds from this campaign will be donated.

Each of the three elementary schools that submitted designs will be awarded 15% of the funds to pay for new art supplies and art lessons.  A $1000 educational scholarship will be awarded to Vanessa for her outstanding design.  And the remaining money we raise will be donated to ArtReach, our partnering non-profit organization, which facilitates visual art education in underfunded elementary schools around San Diego.  Read more about ArtReach here.  


Trust Us.  We've done this before. 

Working with young designers is not a new idea to Knockaround. In 2012, Knockaround held a design contest at a local elementary school. The 5th and 6th grade students designed their own pair of sunglasses and the Knockaround team selected a single pair to put into production.

Amongst the designs was a standout pair of "Shark Attack" glasses created by 6th grader Sebastian. The Shark Attack sunglasses were produced in a limited edition of 200 pairs, and all 200 pairs sold out in under an hour. $5 from every pair sold contributed to a $1,000 donation of new art supplies for Sebastian’s school.

Based on the success of the Shark Attacks, we knew we had to expand this program. 


The details.

Once the campaign is complete, Knockaround will produce the winning Nacho sunglasses and ship them directly to everyone that supported the cause on Indiegogo.com. 

We expect the Nacho sunglasses, and all of the other rewards, to ship by late Spring 2014... so everyone that contributes will have their sunglasses in time for summer!  

As an extra special reward, if you donate at the $100 level or above, we'll include a re-issued pair of the famous Shark Attack sunglasses from 2012.


International Donations

Unfortunately, we are unable to ship perks internationally, however, international contributors can still donate to our campaign.


Help us spread the word!

Even if you're not in a position to contribute, you can still help us spread the word about Knockaround Class Acts by telling your friends about our campaign. Share this page using the share buttons above and help us maximize our donation!


Limited Perks

Throughout the campaign we will be adding limited offer perks. Like Knockaround, many of our collaborating partners have an affinity for art. A few of them have helped us create special donation perks which include past Limited Edition sunglasses: 


1985 Chicago Bears-inspired Limited Edition Streaker Sports Shuffle Fort Knocks, presented by Streaker Sports. 15 available.


Throwback San Diego Padres-inspired Limited Edition Bring Back the Brown II Fort Knocks, presented by Product Etcetera. 5 available. 


Golden Gate Bridge-inspired Limited Edition Benny Gold "1937" Fort Knocks, presented by Benny Gold. 5 available. 


Aloha State-inspired Limited Edition Pow Wow Fort Knocks, presented by Jasper Wong, Founder of Pow! Wow! Hawai'i. 5 available.

story:
Xfect/Perfect is the new sexy, effective shapewear with a fashion look completely made in Italy from the design to the production

Xfect/Perfect is the fashion product to make every woman feel self-confident, at ease and always admired with a “WOW” silhouette hiding any panty line. It’s not only shapewear but also the magic touch to make women perfect with any cloth line

The name reflects the purpose of our products: it underlines that women can really feel perfect and improve their image and yotheirur silhouette with a little help from a high tech shapewear.

Completely made and designed in Italy

 

AS SEEN ON:

  

                                                                                                                                  



COLOR AND SEXY AT LAST!!

The xfect/Perfect product line is completely different from what’s on the market today as it’s sexy and made in the latest fashion trend colors. Shapewear must help women but also be part of their fashion apparel. I can be worn without hiding it!

 

 

INNOVATIVE DESIGN AND MATERIALS

We always pay great attention to the development and study of new models: from the selection of the fabric to the final quality of the products. Every detail counts for us. The high tech and innovative fabrics are our trademark and guarantees the success of our products among our customers.

OUR SECRET INGREDIENT

All the fabrics we use for xfect/Perfect products are our real “secret ingredient”: high quality, breathable and so versatile that they can shape your body without any problem making our products easy and comfortable that they can be worn all day long always improving your silhouette. You’ll forget you are wearing shapewear!!

 

HOW DID THE IDEA START AND HOW WE CHOOSE INDIEGOGO?

Xfect/Perfect is an Italian project born between Milan and Rome in the last 4 years. Roberta was looking for a shapewear to fit in a new dress. The market only offered old fashion products (Bridget Jones like), very uncomfortable to wear (too tight) of with a very poor quality (the fabric would lose immediately any effectiveness). So, together with the Team, she created a new product to fill the quality gap in the market putting quality, effectiveness and comfort into one single apparel offering something new and affordable to every woman: a real breakthrough.

OBJECTIVES

Today xfect/Perfect offers a complete shapewear line that is sold in the best boutiques across Italy and in several European markets.

But we wanted to take it a step further: we want to create a complete shapewear clothing line xfect/Perfect Fashion for which we have already created some prototypes presented in our video.

We want to launch this new line on Idiegogo for all of you and to receive from you ideas, feedbacks, comments and, why not, also “digital high fives”.

For this new clothing line we choose to use a super high tech new material with unique characteristics: it does not crumple with the use, it can be easily cleaned with a damp cloth and, if used or placed in a suitcase it is perfect again in a second. It’s the ideal product for the active and working women who wants to be perfect from morning to evening.

 

 

From the development of new prototypes, with your help, we want to go on and produce the new line to offer women some more and jump start this new project. These are our objectives:

25.000$ - the beginning

Set-up of the production line. Production of the first prototype  xfect/Perfect fashion shapewear products for our Indiegogo fans.

35.000$ - the launch

Production of the first complete xfect/Perfect shapewear product line and make it available for all our Indiegogo fans and followers.

50.000$ - the development

Launch of the first mass production and funding of the development of new materials which, on top of the current breakthrough characteristics do not absorb bad odor (smoke, sweat, kitchen, etc) and prepare new products  with this new materials.

100.000$ - the dream

Export of the products in new markets.

 


THE PERFECT TEAM

Roberta: the project started from her idea. It’s the real engine and brain of the company.

Federico: engineer, experienced supply chain manager is in charge of delivering products and managing operations.

Massimo: member of the team, owner of a fashion brand, always looking for new ideas and innovative projects. Brought his wide experience in the fashion industry.

Pietro: social media owner and master in word-of-mouthing. 

We all want to achieve something really new!!!


PERKS

For this crowdfunding campaign xfect/Perfect will offer the Perks on the right side of the screen, which you’ll be receiving as a gift for your generous support. Herebelow the pictures of our Perks.
Do not forget to write us an email (info@xfect.com) with the size and color. 
 

STRING

 
SUMMER
TUMMY

 

LEGGINGS

 

 TOP

TANK LACE

 

SHAPE

 NUDE DRESS

 U DRESS
 
SHAPE ALL SEASON

 U DRESS LACE

 PANTS

 SHAPING DRESS

Use the following size chart to choose the right size for you: 

FAQ

Shipment costs are included in the Perks?

  • Yes for Italy, but for international shipping, please see the instruction for each perk.

 Can I change the product if the size is incorrect?

  • Of course. But you have to take care of all the shipment costs for the return and the shipment of the new product. 

When will the product be available

  • Our target is the have the new products ready to be shipped by September 2015. All the pther products will be shipped after 30 days from the submission of the perk.

When can I choose my size and my color? How

  • You can choose them when you have decided your perk.
  • On our website www.xfect.com you can see all the info on size, colors and materials.

Can I wear xfect if I am pregnant?

  • Yes all our products are great for pregnant women as they can help to relief fatigue.

Have you tought to create new models or colors?

  • YES! We have a strong pipeline of new products ranging from shapewear to clothline. We will also use the feedbacks received from all of you to decide new colors and products, so send your comments in!

story:
We wanted to create a time piece truly inspired by Simplicity x Carbon fiber - so we have spent the last 12 months creating a unique watch that is:

  • Simple & Versatile
  • Minimalist Inspired
  • High Quality
  • Sleek & Stylish
  • Affordable

Carbon is designed to pay homage to the minimalist era of modern design. Free of distractions, the focus is truly in the form and simplicity of the crossover between a classic/modern sports dial - inspired by Carbon Fiber.

Carbon offers both modern and classic styles combined with a hint of sophistication - with a clean 316L stainless steel bezel 45mm in diameter free of any embellishments to keep the focus on the dial. The dial uses minimal incremental markers for the index of time to help keep the face clean. With a unique Carbon fiber grained face, unified with the minimalist index approach - we believe that time can be measured simply.

We have incorporated an engraved rounded crown (3 o'clock position) with knobs (2 and 4 o'clock positions) to drive the chronograph features without taking the focus away from the face.

Powered by a Japanese Seiko 6-Hand chronograph engine, the beholder has access to the following, in the Sleekest form:

  • Luminous hour/minute hands
  • Extended length Second hand
  • Stopwatch function Lap/reset functions
  • Milliseconds/Elapsed Seconds/Minutes dials
  • Contrasting Date window

A Flat Sapphire crystal lens is then flush-mounted to the bezel to embrace the sized case and create a perfect look and feel on the wrist - not being too chunky, nor too flat - providing an increased sense of luxury and quality. The finished case is rated up to 5ATM water resistant for maximum durability.

We have added quick-release spring bars to our hand crafted Genuine Leather and Nato* styled straps for added Versatility. It means that you can change the strap in seconds, without the use of tools. Our Stainless Steel straps are designed to fit perfectly – so the use of the strap tool (included in the set) is required.

Each strap is coupled to the case with stainless steel 22mm-width lugs, combined with the case – it makes the perfect watch for any occasion - every time. With your help, we believe we can bring Carbon to life.

After months of design adjustments and revisions - we had our design finalized and created prototypes with our manufacturers. The results were amazing - we were beyond belief, something so beautiful, so sleek - sophisticated had been born.

With Carbon, we not only wanted to design a watch that captured the essence of simplicity and carbon fiber – we wanted it to be versatile. With that in mind, we created a time piece that came with interchangeable straps as a set – along with a matching travel case. We have infused a combination of styles and fine-tuned a look to complete any style, every day, whatever you do - wherever you go.

What’s included in every set*:

Being inspired by Versatility - we believe that you should be able to take your watches with you wherever you go. As a result, we have designed a matching Travel Wallet to help you carry not only your watches, but all your travel necessities too: A picture is worth a thousand words.

The travel case was designed to not only house the time pieces, but to enable the user to stay organized with travel documents whilst on the go! 

We have finalized the internals of the Rival Travel Case, here is how it looks on the inside! The internals boast the following features:

  • Left side: Travel Essentials
  • Inner is of Suede construction
  • Coin Zipper Pocket
  • Passport Large slot
  • Boarding Pass half slot
  • Mini-Zero Card slots
  • Right side: Watch Travel Kit Watch straps/pockets

We didn't take any shortcuts when it came to selecting the highest quality materials for the build & assembly - we believe that with this combination, not only does the time piece look sleek but has an increased sense of luxury and quality.

  • Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel
  • Case Back: 316L Stainless Steel Screw type
  • Case Diameter: 45mm
  • Case Thickness: 12mm
  • Lug Width: 22mm
  • Lug-to-Lug: 50mm
  • Bezel: One-piece Stainless Steel
  • Movement: Japanese VD57 Chronograph
  • Battery: Original - 24 months
  • Dial: Carbon Fiber grain with Luminous Hour/Minute hands
  • Crown: 6x2.5 mm - Monogram
  • Crystal: Sapphire - Flush Mounted
  • Stainless Strap: Stainless Steel - 22mm Solid End-Links - Monogram Buckle - Measures ~20cm (7.9in) in length.
  • Leather Strap: Genuine Leather - 22mm Monogram Pin/Buckle - Measures ~20cm (7.9in) in length.
  • Nato Strap: Nylon - 22mm Monogram Pin/Buckle - Measures ~26cm (10.2in) in length.
  • Water Resistance: 5ATM
  • Weight: ~149g with Stainless Strap

SINFUL BLACK 
Case: Black w/Black Accents
Stainless Steel Strap: PVD Coated Matte Black
Leather Strap: Tapered Genuine Leather Black
Nato Strap: Signature Stripe Black/Red 

QUATTRO BLACK 
Case: Black w/Red Accents
Stainless Steel Strap: PVD Coated Matte Black
Leather Strap: Genuine Leather Black Carbon Fiber grain
Nato Strap: Signature Stripe Black/Red

ARCTIC WHITE 
Case: Polished Silver w/White Accents
Stainless Steel Strap: Polished Silver
Leather Strap: Tapered Genuine Leather Tan
Nato Strap: Signature Stripe Blue/White

 *Final strap design and configuration may slightly differ than shown.

We are so confident in the quality of our watches, that if something were to go wrong within 12 months, we will swap it over for you absolutely free. All our watches are backed with a 12 month factory warranty – which covers the watch from defects and manufacturing faults – please keep in mind that usual wear and tear is not covered.

*We have factored in the Chinese New Year holiday (As the most of February, our manufacturers will be on holiday) so production won't be completed until they return. Although we are planning to prepare production for some components earlier as our campaign progresses - to ensure that the production process is as smooth as possible.

Exposure is still one of the most important factors for any successful campaign, please share it to help us make this project come to life! You can share it from the links on top of the page or you can use the links below! Thank you for checking out our page!

Rival Collective is a small team who loves the simplicity and sophistication of Carbon Fiber. We would love to bring out a line of sleek everyday lifestyle products that cannot be found anywhere else.

Being based in Melbourne, Australia - we are always inspired and motivated by the culture and the lifestyle in the world's most livable city just at our door step! Carbon Fiber continues to inspire us and we've been pouring many countless hours it into our projects - we still have so much to show you guys - so keep an eye out on more upcoming projects! Join us on our journey to Sleek.

Carbon won't be possible without you. We need to fulfill a minimum order with our manufacturers and that's where you come in. We are raising funds particularly for R&D, manufacturing, packaging and logistics. In return for your support you will be one of the first in the world to own a Carbon timepiece!

Risks and challenges

We have been working on Carbon for over 12 months now and have set our delivery date by taking into account Lunar New Year holidays. If in the off chance that there are any product revisions, delays and other setbacks we will make sure that everyone will be informed.

During fulfilment, we will do our best to get these out on time – and will now include unique tracking numbers with every order to ensure that the reward gets delivered quickly and on time. Please do allow up to 15 days for international delivery, allow up to 7 days for local delivery.

For any other concerns, feel free to reach us directly customercare@rival-collective.com – as we may not always be available to monitor every comment that is posted in the comments section.

*All designs mentioned in the campaign are subject to Copyright © 2015. All rights reserved. There may be minor changes in design since the start of the campaign - but we do try our best to keep everyone in the loop!
story_txt:
Would you like to feature us? Click to get in touch!


We wanted to create a time piece truly inspired by Simplicity x Carbon fiber - so we have spent the last 12 months creating a unique watch that is:

Simple & Versatile
Minimalist Inspired
High Quality
Sleek & Stylish
Affordable





Carbon is designed to pay homage to the minimalist era of modern design. Free of distractions, the focus is truly in the form and simplicity of the crossover between a classic/modern sports dial - inspired by Carbon Fiber.
Carbon offers both modern and classic styles combined with a hint of sophistication - with a clean 316L stainless steel bezel 45mm in diameter free of any embellishments to keep the focus on the dial. The dial uses minimal incremental markers for the index of time to help keep the face clean. With a unique Carbon fiber grained face, unified with the minimalist index approach - we believe that time can be measured simply.
We have incorporated an engraved rounded crown (3 o'clock position) with knobs (2 and 4 o'clock positions) to drive the chronograph features without taking the focus away from the face.
Powered by a Japanese Seiko 6-Hand chronograph engine, the beholder has access to the following, in the Sleekest form:

Luminous hour/minute hands
Extended length Second hand
Stopwatch function Lap/reset functions
Milliseconds/Elapsed Seconds/Minutes dials
Contrasting Date window

A Flat Sapphire crystal lens is then flush-mounted to the bezel to embrace the sized case and create a perfect look and feel on the wrist - not being too chunky, nor too flat - providing an increased sense of luxury and quality. story:
Short Summary

We are an industrial design team from Hungary. Our goal was to create a simple, yet fashionable accessory, which can be worn by everyone, regardless of age, or gender. The contributors can help us produce these glasses.

What We Need & What You Get

We use a wide variety of state-of-the-art laser machinery, and getting access to them is pricey. The creative work, and prototyping is time and money consuming (software, material, tools).

The revolutionary design of Plexi™ glasses lets us create a product that is both fashionable, and minimalistic. The glasses are made of industrial left-over material. This way, we can prevent unnecessary pollution, and reuse it in a creative way.


We created a design, which makes it easy to assemble, carry on you, and thanks to the modular structure, you can alter the look of your glasses. Every part is available in multiple colours.


Every pair of glasses have a unique serial number, counting from #1.



If we won't reach our goal, we will improve our design based on your thoughts, and start another campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute to our project, but would like to help, please share it on social networks, and get the word out.

story:
3 wind knots - unique handmade jewelry, offered only in limited editions of high quality products. Each piece of jewelry has a particular story and meaning, which inspire, motivate and create positive feelings and emotions. Thus, they serve as talismans. The jewelry is designed by Sigita Trukšāne.

The inspiration and ideas for the jewelry design stem from the nature of Latvia, its forests, meadows, the Baltic Sea, as well as its history and culture. Mostly the jewelry is made out materials that can be found in Latvia.

The modern design of jewelry collections includes historic Baltic signs, goddesses, flowers, and animals. The products can be personalized to match the uniqueness of each person. 3 wind knots offers jewelry for all-women, men and children. 

The brand has been internationally recognized, and the jewelry is sold successfully in countries such as the UK, Germany, the USA, Canada, France, Hong Kong, Japan, Switzerland, Taiwan, Australia and others. The jewelry by 3 wind knots has repeatedly caught the British Vogue attention.

Learn more about us at our WEBSITE. 

We have worked for months on developing the idea and prototypes of the new handmade jewelry collection "Giving the sign". 

The main idea and inspiration behind the “Giving the sign” collection is letting the world know about the state of your soul and relationship status. Whether you are happy on your own, looking for someone or already have found the love of your life, this jewelry will help to thank the world for the chances already received and kindly ask for new adventures and opportunities.

The collection features necklaces, bracelets, rings and earrings, made of sterling silver and leather for both women and men.

The uniqueness of these products lie in the jewelry design in the form of fruit and vegetables, each of which carries a certain meaning to tell the universe and the people around you about your status, feelings and wishes. You can choose from jewelry which features lime, tomato or cabbage.


Lime hides its taste and color deep within, and is completely satisfied with this situation. You do not mind solitude, you enjoy your own company and are completely self-sufficient. If the right person comes along, there is a chance you will open up, but for now a single life is equally enjoyable and fun.

See more product images here.


Tomato. The love fruit tomato will be a sign for others and the higher forces that you are open and ready for a new relationship. You are ready to share unforgettable adventures, joys and sorrows; all you have to do is tell the universe that you cannot wait to meet your other half and become whole.

See more product images here.


Cabbage. You are happily together, and your relationship is a source of joy and stability. The cabbage symbolizes strength and security, its roots are just like your unshakeable love towards each other, while its leaves hide the countless wonderful moments you have spent together and will be spending together in the future!

See more product images here.


So far we have created prototypes of the products and packaging, as well as several samples. Within this campaign with your support we wish to raise funds that would let us produce in larger quantities. The funds would go towards:

  • purchase of the materials for jewelry
  • purchase of the materials for packaging 
  • funding of the marketing materials for the campaign

Why should you participate? The answer is quite simple: to make the world a happier place for everyone. In a playful,l yet subtle way this jewelry will help people to express their relationship status by giving the sign to the universe or other people, who might also be looking for someone. For instance, a tomato bracelet could help the right person to receive the right sign. Even if you are not looking for a relationship, or already have found the love of your life, there is nothing more endearing than a beautiful daily reminder about how lucky you truly are.

Please support us and help the people become happier and connect more easily! Feel free to share our campaign and let your friends know about this inspirational jewelry collection.



Last, but not least, we hope you enjoy the perks we have prepared for you. We truly appreciate any donation, big or small, and hope these pieces of jewelry will bring you back double the inspiration, support and motivation you have given us! Thank you!

For instance, a tomato bracelet could help the right person to receive the right sign. Even if you are not looking for a relationship, or already have found the love of your life, there is nothing more endearing than a beautiful daily reminder about how lucky you truly are. 


Please support us and help the people become happier and connect more easily! Feel free to share our campaign and let your friends know about this inspirational jewelry collection. 



















Last, but not least, we hope you enjoy the perks we have prepared for you. We truly appreciate any donation, big or small, and hope these pieces of jewelry will bring you back double the inspiration, support and motivation you have given us! Thank you!

story:
Dazzling Diamond Stud Earrings - No Greedy Markup 
Jimmy Duval and Ms. E found buying fine diamonds online notoriously 
non-transparent, overpriced, and filled with marketing smoke.

We Knew There Must Be a Better Way
We created easychic.diamonds, an online fine diamond store,
without the greedy markups, without sales tax, and with free shipping.

Now you can own GIA Certified fine diamond stud earrings for less
than a 15% markup, and find a trusting relationship.

We need your help in spreading the word.  Your rewards are dazzling.
And, we'll donate a portion of our profits to empowering young women's independence through education.

Online Diamond Stores Are On a Greedy Profit Binge
Buying fine diamond stud earrings online?  You're paying a greedy 40% 
to over 100% markup.  And forget about brick-and-mortar jewelry stores.

There Must Be a Less Expensive Way
Hi, I'm Jimmy Duval and my partner Ms. E (yes, that's her name) searched
for fine diamond stud earrings online and could only find outrageous greedy
prices and to many unanswered questions.

              

So out of frustration we created our own less expensive online brand easychic.diamonds .  We built our store on low markup - maximum 15%,  
no sales tax, and free shipping.  We buy directly from our manufacturer, 
custom make and sell directly to you.

We only offer GIA (Gemological Institute of America) certified heirloom quality diamonds so there is never a question of trust.  We only offer conflict free, environmentally responsible diamonds.

Why We Need Your Support
We need your help to spread the word that now there is a less expensive way, easychic.diamonds ... no greedy anything.   

What's In It For You?

Donate $10, $25, or $50.  Example: For $50 we will thank you with a free
2nd price quote (we'll find comparable GIA certified diamonds for less) plus
a $500 credit, on already discounted fine diamond stud earrings until
December 1, 2015.  No sales tax, GIA Certificate, and Free USA shipping.  

What Your Support Buys
Your donation is only paying for the cost of reaching women in the media
that connects with them.  That's it!

Jewelry blogs like Gemologue by Lisa Uria, Gem Gossip, and Jewels in the Library.   Print like W Magazine, Harper's Bazaar, Editorialist, and Town & Country
to name a few in our media program.  

Your support will allow us to reach women with a consistent campaign 
of blogs, small ads, and public relations for the remainder of 2015 and into 2016,
"Diamond Stud Earrings Without the Greedy Markup."

                               
Why Diamond Stud Earrings?
Jewelry's "Little Black Dress" is the one piece of jewelry a woman can wear
every day: a woman's first jewelry "Must Have," her jewelry "Essential."
They can be worn night and day, work or play. 

That's why women choose diamond stud earrings as their first serious jewelry 
purchase and why they are easily taken advantage of by greedy diamond merchants online.  easychic. diamonds, with your help, will change all that.

Risk
We are very comfortable that we will be able to deliver your custom made
GIA certified fine diamond stud earrings within one week. 
If the earrings you choose have already been sold (happens often) we will 
endeavor to deliver diamonds for the same price or less within two weeks. 

Find us at
          

Our Team
I'm Ms. E,  Prior to easychic.diamonds I had a dream career for almost 
ten years selling diamonds.  During that time I kept asking for a better way
to buy diamonds online.  A way I could trust.

I'm Jimmy Duval, and I gave up my career for easychic.diamonds as a
marketing consultant to join Ms. E.  easychic.diamonds was the last thing
we could ever have imagined at the beginning of 2015.  But after searching
online we could not find any level of trust.

Our sense of frustration led us to create easychic.diamonds.
which has now become our cause.  We're given up our careers,
and to date have financed easychic.diamonds 100 Percent.

With your help we can offer our alternative.  Trust,  GIA certified,
custom made fine diamond stud earrings with no more than 15% markup, no sales tax, and free shipping.

We need your help
Help us spread the word ...
"Fine Diamond Stud Earrings Without the Greedy Markup."
Help us empower young women's independence  through education.
We will thank you with a free price quote and up to $500 credit.

                               Why Diamond Stud Earrings?Jewelry's "Little Black Dress" is the one piece of jewelry a woman can wearevery day: a woman's first jewelry "Must Have," her jewelry "Essential."They can be worn night and day, work or play. 
That's why women choose diamond stud earrings as their first serious jewelry purchase and why they are easily taken advantage of by greedy diamond merchants online.  easychic. diamonds, with your help, will change all that.

RiskWe are very comfortable that we will be able to deliver your custom madeGIA certified fine diamond stud earrings within one week. 


If the earrings you choose have already been sold (happens often) we will endeavor to deliver diamonds for the same price or less within two weeks. Find us at


          

Our TeamI'm Ms. E,  Prior to easychic.diamonds I had a dream career for almost ten years selling diamonds.  During that time I kept asking for a better way to buy diamonds online.  A way I could trust.


I'm Jimmy Duval, and I gave up my career for easychic.diamonds as a marketing consultant to join Ms. E.  easychic.diamonds was the last thing we could ever have imagined at the beginning of 2015.  But after searching online we could not find any level of trust.Our sense of frustration led us to create easychic.diamonds.which has now become our cause.  We're given up our careers,and to date have financed easychic.diamonds 100 Percent.With your help we can offer our alternative.  Trust,  GIA certified,custom made fine diamond stud earrings with no more than 15% markup, no sales tax, and free shipping.We need your helpHelp us spread the word ..."Fine Diamond Stud Earrings Without the Greedy Markup."Help us empower young women's independence  through education.We will thank you with a free price quote and up to $500 credit.

story:
What is Only One?

Only One supports charities with contributions collected from the sale of apparel, primarily mens and ladies T-shirts and hooded sweatshirts, through our seasonal collection.

These tee's will feature special one off designs specifically for one of the six charity groups that it supports! They are:

Food & Hunger

Clean Water

Aids

Breast Cancer

Cancer

Children

Each collection will be strictly "Limited Edition". There will ONLY be 100 made per style, per design.

To put that in perspective, there's a male and female version of all of tee's. So 6 Charities X 2 Versions X 100 MADE = 1200 Limited Edition designed tee's available. (100 per style)

To follow this up there will also be a range of Hooded sweatshirts for men and sweatshirts for women which will also feature the designs. Again, this is a completely limited edition run. ONLY 50 per style, per design will ever get made!

To put that in perspective, 6 Charities X 2 Versions X 50 MADE = 600 Limited Edition designed Hoodys/sweats available. (50 per style)

Remember this: We are aiming to give around 60%+ of every one sold to our charity partner! 100% of funds raised by Only One go directly to the charities cause and NOT operating costs

Why I need you? - I need to hit $30,000 (£20,000) to really get Only One up and running.

Our aim is to hit our target of $30,000! The interest in Only One and the feedback so far has been amazing. My vision is to create more fashion inspired apparel to link with charities on a weekly basis but this is just the start and why I'm created the fashion brand Only One!  I’m looking for your support to launch not only my first campaign through Indiegogo but also raise enough capital so I can get an e-commerce website professionally made, employ a full time designer, purchase enough stock upfront for printing and run future cause campaigns through our website - www.onlyone.org.uk

We will then be donating even more to charities and we can really make a difference to have a big impact on people who need our help!

ALL PERKS ALL LEVELS!

$15 – ‘Only One Founders Badge' 

Faitrade Founders badge and your name inscribed on our founders wall in our office forever! 

$25 – ‘Only One Organic Fairtrade Shopper Tote Bag’ 

Custom designed Shopper Tote with any of our brilliant charity designs. 100% Organic Fairtrade tote shopping bag. Natural un-dyed plain weave fabric. Fair Wear Foundation certified. Soil Associtation certified. GOTS certified. Carbon Trust low carbon certified. W:38cm x H:42cm

$35 Only One Tee's

WRAP certified, super soft cotton and printed here in the UK!

Small - 2XL!

$55 Only One Mens Hoody/Ladies Sweat

Men's fullzip hoody with kangaroo pouch or the Ladies slouchy Sweatshirt! Soft feel triblend sponge fleece. WRAP certified & printed here in the UK!

Small -  XXL 

$300 - Only One Ten Tees - 2 Options Avialable!

Get 10 Tee's! Great for an office or friends!

$1000 - Only One Tee Kit Out!

Get 40 tee's! Enough for a team or yourself for a whole year!

 

 Why I need you? - I need to hit $30,000 (£20,000) to really get Only One up and running.

Our aim is to hit our target of $30,000 and around $7000 will be donated directly to Pump Aid's cause through this campaign. We already have a list of amazing charities that are interested or have signed up to have a campaign run on their behalf. The interest in Only One and the feedback so far has been amazing. However, some won't sign up until we've got a fully working website and registered some successful cause campaigns. I've created the brand, the business is ready to operate and now I’m looking for your support to launch not only my first campaign through Indiegogo but also raise enough capital so I can get an e-commerce website professionally made, employ a full time designer, purchase enough stock upfront for printing and run future cause campaigns through our website - www.onlyone.org.uk

We will then be donating even more to charities and we can really make a difference to have a big impact on people who need our help!

 

Clean Water Charity Partner

 www.pumpaid.org

The award winning Pump Aid are a unique water sanitation charity that works with rural communities in Sub Saharan Africa – Over the past 10 years they have provided access to clean water and sanitation to over 1.1 million people.

The Art Created

Mens Design: "Right 2 Water" - "This goes hand in hand with Only One's cause campaign partners, Pump Aid. Its a right that every person on our planet, right now in 2012 and going forward should always have access to clean water".

Ladies Design: "Water is Life" - "It's symbolic and it's in every human being and so is water. Water is Life was inspired through Pump Aid's cause, we just wanted everyone to share there water heart. Erib says "The inspiration stems from loving the clean water you have access to. The tap is recognition that with an elephant pump from Pump Aid, children in Africa have a chance to get clean sustainable water, every day of their lives"

PERKS TO HELP ALL!

Be a part of making a difference: Below are some of the amazing perks you can receive today, remember they are completely “Only One”. There's a sizing guide chart to help you understand the fits and all products that are included in our campaign. All perks give back to Pump Aid with at least 60% of your sale to our cause campaign.

We could all really make a difference here, not just to one charity but your setting me up to continue this and work with many more charities and offer you many more campaigns!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your Questions Answered

If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?

Just email me directly, I'll try and answer whatever maybe on your mind. You can also add me personally directly on Facebook or Twitter and ask any questions to me. If your a charity and interested in joining one of our campaigns please get in touch.

chris@onlyone.org.uk

When will my stuff be delivered?

Estimated Shipping Date: March 2013

We know you want to show off your cause apparel ASAP, so once our campaigns finished we'll be working hard to get them printed and ready to ship as soon as possible. We refuse to send you anything but the highest quality product!

Will the print crack?

This isn't the old school days of the screen printed tee! We use the latest technology and the print is of the highest quality. You just need to make sure you follow the simple "care instructions" to get the best longetivity of your tee. i.e. Washing it inside out, don't iron directly on the print - Simples!

Can I return my tee to exchange for another size?

No. Every campaign is an exclusive one off run and we donate money to the cause off every purchase. We provide you with accurate sizing information so that you make the right choice. We can't ask the charity for the money back that we donate. If there are any damaged items, we will be happy to offer you an exchange on any left over tee's we may have or refund you if not. Remember though, it's highly unlikely we'll be able to replace it as they run ONLY ONCE. We aim to provide the highest quality products so we hope this will not be an issue.

Are your tees shrinkproof?

The men's tees are already pre-shrunk. Our women's tee's will have some shrinkage of around 4% which is well below the minimum standard. Most tee's in the market will shrink some 9-12%.

Is the apparel available in retail stores?

NO! Only One will be only sold online through our website www.onlyone.org.uk once we have built it!

What percentage of donations go to the charities?

Only One's business model is to be as transparent as possible and we never want you to have to ask the question "And then what?" With that said we will not only tell you what, we will show you exactly what will be given!

For example, for every item purchased, there will always be a donation to our chosen campaign partner. We on average give 60%* of the sale and way more than any normal donation given off the sale of goods.

Who does the artwork and where is the apparel manufactured?

The artwork is designed by our featured artists from anywhere around the world. We want to showcase the best upcoming talent. Our ultimate goal is to bring on a full-time artist/designer in the future who will not only create our campaigns but will showcase future artists work to.

Our apparel and products are ALWAYS ethically sourced and made. We've teamed up with a brilliant clothing supplier to provide the best quality tee's & tops that are available here in the UK market. Their products are WRAP certified (Ethically made and not produced in any child sweatshops, regularly audited) and provide quality fitting apparel. Some of the Tee's we'll be using will be 100% ringspun combed cotton, that's super soft and better than most tee's on the market. We are also heavily involved in reducing our carbon footprint. This can be WRAP certified, Fairtrade and Organic properties. Our print work is done here in the UK and our printers are one of the most ethical here in the UK. They are actually a completely carbon neutral business, meaning our impact on the enviroment is also really helping.

Is there a charge for International Shipping?

Yes, but only if you are outside Europe. You will need to add an additional charge to ship internationally outside of Europe.

It costs $5 for the Water Bottle, Tote Bag and Tee. $10 to ship any of the Tops and $30 for the higher level perks internationally. Please include that in the checkout price. If you forget, we'll contact you prior to shipping to finalise those details. We DO NOT make any money what so ever on international postage. Please see our shipping charge chart above!

Don't forget if you have any specific questions about your location, please email me at Chris@onlyone.org.uk

 

Thank you!

Thank you for reading and looking at my campaign - Chris Mooney!
