story:
Lets make vegan shoes together!


WHO

Mink is an ultra-luxe collection of Italian-made vegan shoes. Mink believes that you do not need give up quality, fit, creativity or style to be vegan. Minks mission is dedicated to leading the fashion industry into an era of responsibility towards animals, people and the planet!

           Rebecca Mink founded Mink in the year 2000 with a simple vision.

To change the way people see leather shoes. Leather shoes are not better then non leather. It is a misconception... an old school thought process embedded in our minds!

Mink is made from the highest quality 100% Italian non animal components and fabrics. All materials are carefully chosen by Rebecca for their unique look, durability, eco properties, and factory conditions. Mink is dedicated to producing the highest quality vegan shoe without having to compromise. Why choose between being vegan and looking great? Mink makes it possible to be both.



WHAT

Mink is in a battle to get vegan shoes on as many people as possible. Rebecca Mink will never give up. However, with long lead times for payment, stocking everyone's sizes, and the large shoe companies that Mink competes with it is a steep uphill battle. The truth is Mink needs your support. Over 14 years Mink has sold custom, grown to amazing boutiques, and even sold to the big boys at Zappos. All this done with a lot of passion, dedication, and confidence. Even with all this energy it has only allowed Mink to sustain at a certain level. The market is here!!! Mink gets requests from men and women all over the world daily looking for vegan shoes! Mink does not have the cash flow to keep up with the demand. Mink is poised ready and the market has arrived.

With your help we can make our next collection, expand to lower price points, and create more availability for vegan shoes worldwide. This will bring investor attention and we will take off. The time for vegan shoes is NOW!

Our new Indiegogo philosophy is the gather the people ..then build.

This is sustainable and your support will grow Mink into the next phase where it will surely become one of the top vegan lifestyle brands of our time. The Mink shoe is made in the same prized Italian factories as Chanel, Christian Louboutin, Dolce and Gabbana, Jimmy Choo and more. All without harming animals!

Mink is the next big thing in fashion. Join the movement! We need you to get there.

We are launching an Indiegogo campaign to push forward what we cannot do with a small team, limited cash flow, and infrastructure.

Mink can push forward what has never been done.

1) Gather - With pre-sales Mink can allow women to choose high quality vegan shoes delivered to their doorstep. Your size, your color, your favorite.

2) Support - We can make couture custom vegan shoes for men or women! What is your dream shoe? It does not have to be leather.

3) Give - Mercy For Animals ..Support their lifesaving work for the animals!

4) Receive - All animals will receive our respect and support. Show the world you care about animals by not wearing them. Be fashionably aware!


WHERE

It really is true.... 

Mink is made in the same factories as all of the most respected brands in the world.

With no add campaigns, excess salaries, and overhead Mink can offer you an unbeatable price for an Italian made good. Rebecca Mink went to Italy in the year 2000 scouring the Tuscany region for the best shoe factories on the planet. Rebecca found them, built a longstanding relationship with them, and worked closely with them to create the best vegan shoe in the world.

It is not alway easy working in Italy. Sure there is great Pasta and wine, but Italians are stubborn in a good way! They are connected to tradition and the craft of making shoes with your hands. Rebecca Mink adores the love and pride they have for making shoes and wants to support them. Mink has stayed with Italian production because those working on the shoes care about the product, are treated properly, and they deliver impeccable perfection every delivery.

Mink has developed such a rapport with the great 4th and 5th generation Italian shoemaking artisans that we can offer custom couture shoes as well as production. Here is how the custom shoe works.

We measure your foot, create a mold or "last" (sanded to perfection), put it into a machine (like an MRI) to make a duplicate 100% recycled plastic mold with a hinge to perfect the fit. This is your own personal mold with your name on it. Then we can make you any shoe you want with your "last". Mink is the only brand in the world offering this white glove service to the vegan community.



WHY

Mink wants to get everyone an Italian shoe they can afford. At this time we are giving you $100 off all retail price of this collection in order to help! We are taking any profit and giving it directly to the amazing Mercy For Animals organization. We plan on lowering prices even more with expansion in the near future and your help. Simply put..Italian shoes cost more because they are better. Each shoe goes through a rigorous testing, development, and fit phase. You are getting the best!


PERK #1 $20 (10% to MFA)

Mink party!

We would like to cordially invite you to the hottest vegan shoe party in Venice Beach, Cali! We are planning on having a super launch party when we ship the clogs and everyone who contributes over $20 is invited! 

BTW- We do not just party. We Gather and learn. We hold panels that educate people about animals and what they can do in their community to help and change. You can help choose the topic for the panel too! We will vote. Help Pit Bulls? Whales? Any ideas? Some examples Mink has had in the past were about "eco fashion" and local things we can to to help "cat rescue" organizations.


PERK #2 $25 (100% to MFA)

Mercy for animals

Mercy For Animals is dedicated to preventing cruelty to farmed animals and promoting compassionate food choices and policies.

MFA works to create a society in which all animals are treated with the respect and compassion they rightfully deserve, and serves as a voice for farmed animals through proactive consumer education initiatives, cruelty investigations, legal advocacy, and corporate outreach.


PERK #3 $50 (10% to MFA)

Mink has always made custom boxes in Italy each season. All made from recycled paper, printed with soy based ink, and recyclable. This glitter clog collection we decided to make a box with each and every name that helped us create the collection. Any donation over $50 and you will get your name on the Kitty Clog box! We will send you a box if you are not getting a shoe. Your name will be in vegan shoe history!!


PERK #4 $165 (10% to MFA)

GOLD OPEN TOE / PINK CLOSED TOE retail $265 now $165


PERK #5 $195 (10% to MFA)

BLUE OPEN TOE / BRONZE CLOSED TOE retail $295 now $195


PERK #6 $265 (10% to MFA)

BLACK OPEN TOE / WHITE CLOSED TOE retail $365 now $265


PERK #7 $295 (10% to MFA)

CUT OUT CLOG IN GREEN OR MIXED GLITTER retail $395 now $295


PERK #8 $1,000 (10% to MFA)

$1,000 worth of Mink shoes! You pick! Get the clogs, the next women's collection (coming out in Summer), or put toward custom shoe order.

Either way we know you will be happy!!


PERK #9 $2,500 (10% to MFA)

Custom made to order.

We work on your shoes for over 2 months! Here is what we do to make the shoe.

1) Sketch your dream shoe

2) Measure your foot

3) Make a mold or "last" carved in wood

4) Machine (like MRI) turns your mold into a 100% recycled plastic "last" with a hinge fr better fit and your name on it.

5) Mink makes your shoe and you own the "last" with your name and the shoe.

If you order additional shoes down the line they will be less expensive once your "last" is built. Custom Couture vegan shoes for men or women!

*some limitations due to custom nature



PERK #10 $5,000 (10% to MFA)

Visit our top Italin factories in the world!

You get.

1) Custom couture vegan shoes made for you.

*Same process as above

2) AND We will take you on a tour of the factory in Italy that produces the best shoes Christain Louboutin & Chanel!

Once in a lifetime opportunity!

*transportation and hotel not included


PERK #11 $7,500 (10% to MFA)

Shoe vacation

1) Custom Couture vegan shoes made for you.

*Same process as above

2) THEN we will take you all over the Tuscany region for 3 full days. Show you ITALIAN heel, sole, buckle, fabric, and shoe factories! Private tour of best restaurants and sights in Florence. Italian shoe vacation!!!

*transportation and hotel not included


PERK #12 $15,000 (10% to MFA & MORE!)

Support with your own shoe collection created by Mink for an animal welfare organization of your choice. You can have an entire custom shoe collection (2 male and 2 female) created especially to benefit your favorite animal organization!!!!

Ex) PIG & COW & CHICK collection for Mercy For Animals

Ex) ORCA collection for Sea Shepherd

Ex) BUNNY collection for PETA

.......and also own one shoe for yourself!

This is the ultimate. You will be able to have your own vegan shoe collection that gives straight back to the animal's. This will help 10% not for Mercy for animals and then we can give another 10% to the organization you choose to collaborate with. Also you are welcome to come to Italy to watch the shoes being made in person.

Mink has always had a dream of collaborating with an animal welfare organization and without the funds it has been impossible. You can make this possible!


WHEN

Kitty litter clog collection delivery:

Lets make vegan shoes together NOW! If you order a pair you will be wearing them by Summer 2014. We have an agreement that even if we miss our goal (no way!) the Italian factories will support all of us and make the shoes we desire without minimums.

Custom shoe delivery:

If you make custom with us we will work with you on your schedule. It will take 2 months from when we establish the approved sketch to completion.

Join us in Italy..

Italian factory visits, shoe vacation packages, and for private collections for animal welfare organizations we will work out with your current schedule.


FYI

A)

Rebecca Mink has never eaten an animal since age 4. Teh story is she was at a bday BBQ and a kid told her hot dogs were made from dogs. WHAT? Rebecca went on a life mission to never eat an animal because she knew it was wrong! Rebecca has worked as a wardrobe stylist to celebrities for the past 20 years. Mink shoes is self funded by Rebecca's "day job". Rebecca has not taken a salary ever nor will she see any funds from this campaign. Rebecca wants to make vegan shoes and Indiegogo gives her a platform to make it possible. Mink shoes is a true pioneer in vegan shoemaking. All funds will go toward this cause. We need your help to get to the next level.


B)

WHERE DOES MY MONEY GO?

10% off the top of each donation will go directly to Mercy for Animals


PERK 1 ($20)

Party!

Toward the vegan food, drink, planning and promo for the Indiegogo party. You can help  choose the topic for the panel too! We will vote. Help Pit Bulls? Cats? Any ideas? We always donate a portion to a local organization.


PERK 2 ($25)

This $25 will go directly to Mercy For Animals. Simple.


PERK 3 ($50)

Box
Toward the production of the custom boxes for the collection. Any leftover will go toward design and construction of our next samples. We are excited to make a new collection in the Summer. 

 
PERK 4,5,6,7 ($165, $195, $265, $295)

The clogs
Development, material, components, factory production cost, shipping from Italy. This is how much they cost! The small profit we put on top goes directly to Mercy For Animals.


PERK #8 ( $1,000)

Mink shoes for you at discounted price or credit toward a custom couture order.


PERK #9 ($2,500) Couture custom vegan shoes

Sketch, development, sourcing, last / mold production, and Italian cobbler to make the shoe. Many people work for 2 months to make and perfect your dream shoe. This is used to pay them and cover the cost of making custom one of a kind option.


PERK 10,11 Visit factory (4 offered @$5,000) & Shoe vacation (4 offered @$7,500)

These perks have the possibility of generating $25,000 after all custom couture shoe costs (each includes a custom shoe) and MFA donation are paid for. This extra cash flow will be used to bridge production, pay for travel, help hire new staff, pay Italian cobblers, sewers, cutters, overhead, development, sourcing, and creation of new and innovative fabrics and creative ways to make vegan shoes.


PERK 12 Shoe collection for animal welfare organization ($15,000) 2 offered

10% already for MFA then 10% more to your choice organization. The cost to develop out 4 shoes from sketch to creation and have them ready for a volume production is approx. this cost. There will have to be a second raise for any sales and promotion following the sample production. This just covers the sample production. Yes.. shoe samples are expensive to make. Developing a vegan shoe takes time to be certain we make the same quality (if not better) then a leather alternative. We have ALWAYS talked to and had a dream to create shoes for our favorite different animal organizations. We have never had the extra cash flow to do it. This would be a dream come true and we would do anything to see it happen! We would greatly appreciate anyone that wants to fund such a special unique project.


C)

FIT

Ladies-

Advice for sizes for clogs. Watch video we will make certain we have the right size.  After the campaign closes on April 17th we will contact you, send you charts and measurements and even talk to you on the phone if you need further assistance. No need to order now / we will contact you when funding closes. You pick the heel and one you like in the price point ..donate that amount..and then we go over details later.

Custom couture is obviously fit that we perfect together with individual measurements done. for each foot.


Men-

Watch video for options. You can buy clogs or custom couture for you  or  your favorite lady. Again for the custom we will take individual measurements for perfect fit and for the clog we will email you info.



LETS DREAM BIG

Reaching higher and wider then thought possible. Mink philosophy is always to look outside the box. Here are some high level goals that we know can be achievable with your help!

If we can move this campaign further then any vegan shoe we can obtain our dream stretch goals and that will bring vegan to the masses!!!


ACT NOW

The time for vegan shoes is NOW. We must come together to make it happen. If you do not have the cash, spread the word through your networks!

We have recycled postcards if you are interested in helping us gorilla market in your neighborhood. Let us know and we can send you some postcards.

With the current shoe industry competition Mink is asking for your help to make vegan shoes more available. We can show the world together and demand there be more vegan shoe options.

Gather & support Mink to show the fashion industry you do not have to compromise to have the best shoes in the world. Join in treating animals, people, and the planet with the respect they all deserve. Lets make vegan shoes together!
story_txt:
Lets make vegan shoes together!




WHO


    Mink is an ultra-luxe collection of Italian-made vegan shoes. Mink believes that you do not need give up quality, fit, creativity or style to be vegan. Minks mission is dedicated to leading the fashion industry into an era of responsibility towards
    animals, people and the planet!           Rebecca Mink founded Mink in the year 2000 with a simple vision.

    To change the way people see leather shoes. Leather shoes are not better then non leather. It is a misconception... an old school thought process embedded in our minds!


    Mink is made from the highest quality 100% Italian non animal components and fabrics. All materials are carefully chosen by Rebecca for their unique look, durability, eco properties, and factory conditions. Mink is dedicated to producing the highest quality
    vegan shoe without having to compromise. Why choose between being vegan and looking great? Mink makes it possible to be both.







WHAT


    Mink is in a battle to get vegan shoes on as many people as possible. Rebecca Mink will never give up. However, with long lead times for payment, stocking everyone's sizes, and the large shoe companies that Mink competes with it is a steep uphill battle. The truth is Mink needs your support.
    Over 14 years Mink has sold custom, grown to amazing boutiques, and even sold to the big boys at Zappos. All this done with a lot of passion, dedication, and confidence. Even with all this energy it has only allowed Mink to sustain at a certain level. The market
    is here!!! Mink gets requests from men and women all over the world daily looking for vegan shoes! Mink does not have the cash flow to keep up with the demand. Mink is poised ready and the market has arrived.


    With your help we can make our next collection, expand to lower price points, and create more availability for vegan shoes worldwide. This will bring investor attention and we will take off. The time for vegan shoes is NOW!


    Our new Indiegogo philosophy is the gather the people ..then build.


    This is sustainable and your support will grow Mink into the next phase where it will surely become one of the top vegan lifestyle brands of our time. The Mink shoe is made in the same prized Italian factories as Chanel, Christian Louboutin, Dolce and
    Gabbana, Jimmy Choo and more. All without harming animals!



    Mink is the next big thing in fashion. Join the movement! We need you to get there.
  


    We are launching an Indiegogo campaign to push forward what we cannot do with a small team, limited cash flow, and infrastructure.


    Mink can push forward what has never been done.


1) Gather  - With pre-sales Mink can allow women to choose high quality vegan shoes delivered to their doorstep. Your size, your color, your favorite.


2) Support - We can make couture custom vegan shoes for men or women! What is your dream shoe? It does not have to be leather.


3) Give - Mercy For Animals ..Support their lifesaving work for the animals!


4) Receive - All animals will receive our respect and support. Show the world you care about animals by not wearing them. Be fashionably aware!




WHERE


    It really is true.... Mink is made in the same factories as all of the most respected brands in the world.

    With no add campaigns, excess salaries, and overhead Mink can offer you an unbeatable price for an Italian made good. Rebecca Mink went to Italy in the year 2000 scouring the Tuscany region for the best shoe factories on the planet. Rebecca found them,
    built a longstanding relationship with them, and worked closely with them to create the best vegan shoe in the world.


    It is not alway easy working in Italy. Sure there is great Pasta and wine, but Italians are stubborn in a good way! They are connected to tradition and the craft of making shoes with your hands. Rebecca Mink adores the love and pride they have for making
    shoes and wants to support them. Mink has stayed with Italian production because those working on the shoes care about the product, are treated properly, and they deliver impeccable perfection every delivery.


    Mink has developed such a rapport with the great 4th and 5th generation Italian shoemaking artisans that we can offer custom couture shoes as well as production. Here is how the custom shoe works.


    We measure your foot, create a mold or "last" (sanded to perfection), put it into a machine (like an MRI) to make a duplicate 100% recycled plastic mold with a hinge to perfect the fit. This is your own personal mold with your name on it. Then we can make you any
    shoe you want with your "last". Mink is the only brand in the world offering this white glove service to the vegan community.










WHY


    Mink wants to get everyone an Italian shoe they can afford. At this time we are giving you $100 off all retail price of this collection in order to help! We are taking any profit and giving it directly to the amazing Mercy For Animals organization. We plan on lowering prices even more with expansion in the near future and your help. Simply put..Italian shoes cost more
    because they are better. Each shoe goes through a rigorous testing, development, and fit phase. You are getting the best!




PERK #1 $20 (10% to MFA)





Mink party!


    We would like to cordially invite you to the hottest vegan shoe party in Venice Beach, Cali! We are planning on having a super launch party when we ship the clogs and everyone who contributes over $20 is invited! BTW- We do not just party. We Gather and learn. We hold panels that educate people about animals and what they can do in their community to help and change. You can help choose the topic for the panel too! We will vote. Help Pit Bulls? Whales? Any ideas? Some examples Mink has had in the past were about "eco fashion" and local things we can to to help "cat rescue" organizations.



PERK #2 $25 (100% to MFA)




Mercy for animals


    Mercy For Animals is dedicated to preventing cruelty to farmed animals and promoting compassionate food choices and policies.


    MFA works to create a society in which all animals are treated with the respect and compassion they rightfully deserve, and serves as a voice for farmed animals through proactive consumer education initiatives, cruelty investigations, legal advocacy, and
    corporate outreach.




PERK #3 $50 (10% to MFA)


    Mink has always made custom boxes in Italy each season. All made from recycled paper, printed with soy based ink, and recyclable. This glitter clog collection we decided to make a box with each and every name that helped us create the collection. Any donation over
    $50 and you will get your name on the Kitty Clog box! We will send you a box if you are not getting a shoe. Your name will be in vegan shoe history!!







PERK #4 $165 (10% to MFA)


GOLD OPEN TOE / PINK CLOSED TOE retail $265 now $165














PERK #5 $195 (10% to MFA)


BLUE OPEN TOE / BRONZE CLOSED TOE retail $295 now $195














PERK #6 $265 (10% to MFA)


BLACK OPEN TOE / WHITE CLOSED TOE retail $365 now $265












PERK #7 $295 (10% to MFA)


CUT OUT CLOG IN GREEN OR MIXED GLITTER retail $395 now $295














PERK #8 $1,000 (10% to MFA)


$1,000 worth of Mink shoes! You pick! Get the clogs, the next women's collection (coming out in Summer), or put toward custom shoe order.

Either way we know you will be happy!!





PERK #9 $2,500 (10% to MFA)


    Custom made to order. We work on your shoes for over 2 months! Here is what we do to make the shoe.


1) Sketch your dream shoe


2) Measure your foot


3) Make a mold or "last" carved in wood


4) Machine (like MRI) turns your mold into a 100% recycled plastic "last" with a hinge fr better fit and your name on it.


5) Mink makes your shoe and you own the "last" with your name and the shoe.
If you order additional shoes down the line they will be less expensive once your "last" is built. Custom Couture vegan shoes for men or women!

    *some limitations due to custom nature





PERK #10 $5,000 (10% to MFA)


    Visit our top Italin factories in the world!
You get.

1) Custom couture vegan shoes made for you.


    *Same process as above


2) AND We will take you on a tour of the factory in Italy that produces the best shoes Christain Louboutin & Chanel!


    Once in a lifetime opportunity!


    *transportation and hotel not included








PERK #11 $7,500 (10% to MFA)


    Shoe vacation


1) Custom Couture vegan shoes made for you.


    *Same process as above


2) THEN we will take you all over the Tuscany region for 3 full days. Show you ITALIAN heel, sole, buckle, fabric, and shoe factories! Private tour of best restaurants and sights in Florence. Italian shoe vacation!!!


    *transportation and hotel not included








PERK #12 $15,000 (10% to MFA & MORE!)


    Support with your own shoe collection created by Mink for an animal welfare organization of your choice. You can have an entire custom shoe collection (2 male and 2 female) created especially to benefit your favorite animal organization!!!!

Ex) PIG & COW & CHICK collection for Mercy For Animals


Ex) ORCA collection for Sea Shepherd

Ex) BUNNY collection for PETA

.......and also own one shoe for yourself!


    This is the ultimate. You will be able to have your own vegan shoe collection that gives straight back to the animal's. This will help 10% not for Mercy for animals and then we can give another 10% to the organization you choose to collaborate with. Also you are welcome to come to Italy to watch the shoes being made in person.

    Mink has always had a dream of collaborating with an animal welfare organization and without the funds it has been impossible. You can make this possible!





WHEN


    Kitty litter clog collection delivery:


    Lets make vegan shoes together NOW! If you order a pair you will be wearing them by Summer 2014. We have an agreement that even if we miss our goal (no way!) the Italian factories will support all of us and make the shoes we desire without minimums.


    Custom shoe delivery:


    If you make custom with us we will work with you on your schedule. It will take 2 months from when we establish the approved sketch to completion.

Join us in Italy..
    Italian factory visits, shoe vacation packages, and for private collections for animal welfare organizations we will work out with your current schedule.





FYI


A)
Rebecca Mink has never eaten an animal since age 4. Teh story is she was at a bday BBQ and a kid told her hot dogs were made from dogs. WHAT? Rebecca went on a life mission to never eat an animal because she knew it was wrong! Rebecca has worked as a wardrobe stylist to celebrities for the past 20 years. Mink shoes is self funded by Rebecca's "day job". Rebecca has not taken a salary ever nor will she see any funds from this campaign. Rebecca wants to make vegan shoes and Indiegogo gives her a platform to make it possible. Mink shoes is a true pioneer in vegan shoemaking.
    All funds will go toward this cause. We need your help to get to the next level.



B)

    10% off the top of each donation will go directly to Mercy for Animals

PERK 2 ($25)


This $25 will go directly to Mercy For Animals. Simple.
PERK 3 ($50)

    The clogs

Mink shoes for you at discounted price or credit toward a custom couture order.

Watch video we will make certain we have the right size.  After the campaign closes on April 17th we will contact you, send you charts and measurements and even talk to you on the phone if you need further assistance. story:
We make watches with craftsman spirit

OPIFEX, craftsman, maker in Latin, founded by a team of passionate watchmakers and craftsman that experience in Swiss watch manufacturing for years.

Last year, we started our venture into the world with our watchmaking experience. After a year refining, we sincere introduce our first watch - Venture.

We focus on each process of manufacturing to ensure our products are in high standard. OPIFEX concentrates to make the product great with our watchmaking experience.

We work on calibre

Venture equips our automatic calibre, FE01M. The main feature of FE01M is its skeleton date disc, which normally features on high-end swiss made timepieces. It is also the first one in crowdfunding platform, which makes Venture unique. The manufacturing requires ultra-precision processing on sheet metal. OPIFEX team spent a year to refine the manufacturing process as well as the inspection method. We sincere introduce Venture to all of you with the highest quality and durability.

All components are strictly controlled by OPIFEX team. The performance of the FE01M is equivalent to Japanese Miyota 8215, which widely used in the affordable group watches. You will not worry about the performance with its luxury outlook.  

Uncompromised elements with affordable price range

Besides tailor-made calibre, Venture features Lightweight Titanium Casebody (All are TiC coated) with Modular Lugs (Durable 316L Stainless Steel with PVD coating), Super Durable Sapphire Lens and Super Bright with Unique Color Swiss SuperLuminova BGW9.

 
Venture - Rosegold

Venture - Charcoal

Venture - Champagne

Venture - Atom (Special Edition for Backers)

Titanium Bracelet - Solid TiC coated Titanium Bracelet with butterfly buckle.

story:
Not Your Average Pepper Spray

PepperFace was originally founded in 2006. The idea was simple: create a pepper spray that you wouldn't be a burden to carry with you, and that would protect you when you needed it to.

One you wouldn't be afraid of misfiring.

One that, ultimately, didn't look embarrassing to have.

But why a pepper spray, and why us? That story is a little less simple to tell.

At the time, my wife and I frequented a trail in our neighborhood for jogging. One morning we woke up to find out that a close of friend of ours, who was also into jogging, was violently attacked and robbed during her morning routine. It could have easily been my wife or myself on the trail that morning. 

We eventually found that she did not, like many people, carry a pepper spray—and for the simplest reasons:

  • Too large to carry comfortably
  • A fear of using it incorrectly
  • It just wasn't the most pleasant looking accessory

With our safety threatened and our neighbors in shock, it was hard to find comfort being outside again. And while we decided to purchase pepper sprays, we quickly realized that we too didn't find them appealing nor practical. 

Not long after, the idea struck us: why hasn't anyone developed something better?

And so we went to work.

Introducing The PepperFace

Fast forward a few years and we successfully launched our very first product, the PepperFace. Our first wave of sprays were met with an overwhelming response and was praised by a myriad of media outlets and organizations alike including E! News, The Wall Street Journal, and US Weekly among others, along with celebrity partnerships and endorsements.

We even partnered with the National Center on Domestic and Sexual Violence (NCDSV) to help raise awareness, empower women, and bring an end to the assaults.

The Next Step: PepperFace 2.0

Our homegrown operation was a success! But not without our share of difficulties. We had a small range of colors and customization options. Our sprays were light, but still not the most comfortable. And while our spray was accurate, it did not shoot as far as we would have liked.

So we went back to the drawing board, and we couldn't be happier with our results:

PepperFace now aims to reach a broader audience with an even better product. Lighter, faster, and far more accurate than our original design, our new and improved PepperFace offers both functionality and aesthetic:

Our goal has always been, first and foremost, to provide people a sense of security and a means of achieving it. It isn't enough to simply carry a pepper spray. We set out to ensure that ours had the stopping power and effectiveness you can rely on. We developed PepperFace to be easy enough to carry or conceal and provide what you  need to keep harm at bay.

And we didn't stop there. We realized that many of our customers wanted a little something extra: a touch of glamour and glitz. So we developed a unique line of sprays adorned with Swarovski crystals:

But We Need Your Help

With these upgrades in place and prototypes approved, we have invested both time and money to bring you the very best self-defense tool that we can. We want to empower others to take a stand against assaults.

With your help, we can successfully produce and ship our product across the globe. We believe everyone should keep some kind of self-defense tool with them at all times, and why not have it be something that looks just as sleek as it is functional?

And while we hope you never have to use it, you'll be glad you had it if you did.

We want to raise awareness and help prevent attacks. It's as simple as choosing to be armed. Choosing to remain vigilant. A decision to not let yourself fall victim to someone else's will and using the right product to do so.

PepperFace is for anyone and everyone looking to give themselves a sense of security, empowerment, and peace of mind.

With PepperFace you'll never be put in a position of helplessness again.

For friends, for family, and for you. Stay safe in style.

 

Important: When ordering your Standard Spray, you are given two color options. Please select your preferred color first, followed by a secondary choice should your first option sell out. Keep in mind, we do plan on restocking all color options regardless. Thank you.

story:
We've already started shipping our Indiegogo Early Bird tanks!

 

 

 

Everyone can benefit from a moment of peace. Uncover your moment with a Jellyfish Cylinder Nano aquarium, the easiest and most affordable aquarium that makes keeping jellyfish simple for anyone.

  • Live jellyfish shipped year-round from our certified breeding facility right to your doorstep
  • Special laminar water flow pattern not possible in regular fish tanks mimics the natural open water habitat of jellyfish
  • Integrated mechanical, chemical and biological filtration in an accessible, hidden compartment makes it simple to operate and keep clean
  • Driven by a whisper quiet air pump that oxygenates the water and introduces no heat, keeping the jellyfish comfortable at room temperature
  • LED changes the colors of the jellyfish with the click of a remote control button
  • Made from durable, crystal clear acrylic hand-molded by the same factory we've been working with for five years
  • Comes with all the accessories you need so you just add water: LED, remote control, sponge filter, salt, air pump, pipette, activated charcoal, nitrifying bacteria starter, and hydrometer

 

Spread the word and reap the rewards! If you refer friends to buy a tank, you both get one jellyfish upgraded from small to medium size (a $17 value for each of you)! To receive your upgrade after you buy your tank, forward your pledge confirmation email from Indiegogo to info@jellyfishart.com with the message "I got a bigger jellyfish for [your friend's first and last names]!" Then tell your friend to forward their confirmation email from Indiegogo to info@jellyfishart.com with the message "[your first and last names] got me a bigger jellyfish!" We'll message you back when we've received both emails to confirm you'll both get one jellyfish size upgrade. You can get up to three size upgrades (because the tank comes with three jellies), but feel free to tell all your friends!

Strettttttch Goal -- If we reach $1M during this project, we'll automatically add a free small jellyfish to every one of our $250 reward packages (a $22 value)! That's not just three jellyfish, but four in total. Start the countdown!

 

 

 

One of the biggest improvements we have made to our company since our 2011 Kickstarter campaign is drastically improving our customer support system. We have attacked that from every angle by designing our product (and re-designing our existing products) to make jellyfish lifespan the top priority.

  • Tutorials at JellyfishArt.com/kb/start guide you through every step from setup to maintenance with instructional diagrams, videos and articles (see the Setup and Acclimation videos below)
  • All our jellyfish come with a 30-Day Guarantee, so we replace them for free if needed. In reality, the jellyfish live a lot longer than that in this tank. We actually don't know how long yet because the jellies in our first running prototypes from seven months ago are still kicking!
  • We give live, personalized, one-on-one support via phone at (844) 535-5900, email at info@jellyfishart.com and live chat at JellyfishArt.com

Your tank arrives in the first shipment and is easy to set up in ten minutes:

Then whenever you're ready for your non-stinging jellyfish, schedule your second shipment at JellyfishArt.com to be delivered to your doorstep. The $250 rewards include jellyfish, food and express shipping to anywhere in the contiguous U.S.. With the $150 reward, you can purchase jellyfish from us separately. Customers outside the U.S. can get the tank from us and get jellies from partner suppliers.

 

We gave a few early prototype tanks out to some experts in the marine biology and aquarium fields (and one to Vanilla Ice too). Brandon Rutherford (Illinois Science Teacher of the Year 2013), Matt Pedersen (Aquarist of the Year 2009 at the Marine Aquarium Society of North America), Mike Senske (co-founder of Aquarium Design Group) and Ron Shimek (prolific aquarium writer and PhD in zoology) give their expert feedback on our tank in this video:

 

Our company has been featured in:

 

Jellyfish Art has built a 100% sustainable breeding facility in our Florida warehouse to supply our customers with healthy jellyfish year-round. It is staffed with marine biologists and has earned the highest inspection rating of the Florida Fish and Wildlife Division of Aquaculture. Once your tank is set up, you can schedule delivery of your jellyfish from our facility at our website JellyfishArt.com.

 

In 2011, Alex Andon and Mark Regal crowdfunded the Desktop Jellyfish Tank in one of the first successful Kickstarter product launches, transforming his hobby into a real business, Jellyfish Art. In 2013 they teamed up with us, Reef Aquaria Design. We are one of the nation’s premier custom aquarium design companies, a family-run business with three generations of experience. By combining Reef Aquaria Design’s expertise with Alex's original vision, we were able to make the original Desktop Jellyfish Tank much easier for customers to operate and maintain. Over the past several years, Jellyfish Art has made significant upgrades to its jellyfish aquaculture operation to improve the quality and consistency of our moon jellyfish and significantly increase their lifespan.

 

Our story began in 1954 when Joseph Turner started building some of the first custom reef aquariums as a founding member of the Florida Marine Aquarium Society. He quickly became known as an expert in his field. His son, Jeff Turner, carried on the business and, with his wife Joleen, founded Reef Aquaria Design. Now their son Joe runs Jellyfish Art.

 

We've created award-winning custom reef and jellyfish aquariums, including a 2,000-gallon coral reef exhibit at the Smithsonian's National Museum of Natural History and the world's largest privately-owned jellyfish aquarium at the Coba Cocina restaurant in Kentucky. We even built a jellyfish tank with Vanilla Ice for his TV show on The DIY Network, The Vanilla Ice Project!

 

Jellyfish Art is committed to sustainability. Every year we help the conservation non-profit Coral Restoration Foundation transplant hundreds of threatened staghorn corals to the reefs surrounding the Florida Keys.

 

In March 2015, we created the Jellyfish Art Education Initiative to inspire the next generation of ocean stewards. We supply educators with jellyfish aquariums, give classroom presentations and lead marine biology field trips to teach kids about marine conservation. Please feel free to use our extensive Educator Resource Guide to turn your jellyfish aquarium into an immersive learning experience!

Education Through Jellyfish -- For every 100 tanks we sell on Indiegogo we'll donate a tank to a school. We invite all our Kickstarter backers to submit candidate schools and vote on them!

 

Jellyfish Art wouldn’t be here without you crowdfunders, and we can’t wait to launch this tank to you first!

 

**UPDATE**
story_txt:
** This Indiegogo campaign will be over this Sunday, May 1, so get in your discounted orders now while you can! **
We've already started shipping our Indiegogo Early Bird tanks!
 
 

 
Everyone can benefit from a moment of peace. Uncover your moment with a Jellyfish Cylinder Nano aquarium, the easiest and most affordable aquarium that makes keeping jellyfish simple for anyone.

Live jellyfish shipped year-round from our certified breeding facility right to your doorstep
Special laminar water flow pattern not possible in regular fish tanks mimics the natural open water habitat of jellyfish
Integrated mechanical, chemical and biological filtration in an accessible, hidden compartment makes it simple to operate and keep clean
Driven by a whisper quiet air pump that oxygenates the water and introduces no heat, keeping the jellyfish comfortable at room temperature
LED changes the colors of the jellyfish with the click of a remote control button
Made from durable, crystal clear acrylic hand-molded by the same factory we've been working with for five years
Comes with all the accessories you need so you just add water: LED, remote control, sponge filter, salt, air pump, pipette, activated charcoal, nitrifying bacteria starter, and hydrometer

**UPDATE**
 
 

We just finished up shipping out tanks to all our 2,371 Kickstarter backers. Now we're getting ready to ship the first batch to our Early Bird Indiegogo backers within this month!

story:
The main feature of Divided By Zero watches is its design concept. We prefer neat minimal design, monochrome palette and the highest quality with an affordable price. And we're totally crazy about accuracy and precision! That's why we used the miraculous power of science - all of our concepts are based on the researches, strict recommendations and direct involvement of actual mathematicians, architects and engineers, who helped us to create ultimate design with perfection in every detail.


BETA SERIES: PASCAL / NEWTON / TURING / VOLTA

We decided that our next project must explore the evolution of the design concept further. It blends accuracy of calculations with the beauty of natural science. The βeta series is inspired with the greatest minds of mankind and their inventions and the greatest minds of our team put a lot of effort to achieve absolution in every line, curve and index mark on the watch dial. Divided By Zero is the golden section of watch design!


BETA SERIES: GALILEO / ARCHIMEDES

This time we wanted to make every watch in the new series more individual and distinctive. Each watch has a strong connection between its design and concept, and for more character we added some prominent unique details to it. Meet the βeta series!


NEWTON


NEWTON

Newton explores the idea of the trinity concept which is the basis for an every object we create. And it's a very attractive shape, too ;) The main feature of Newton is the dial's reflective surface with a slightly changing tone of its color. It's named after Isaac Newton, referring to his teachings and laws of motion.


GALILEO


GALILEO

Galileo relies on pure minimalism in design. The concentric dial refers to orbits and the sub-dials are planet and its satellite. The most interesting feature is the partly sandwich dial which creates a multi-layer effect. This watch was named after the one of the greatest astronomers in history — Galileo Galilei.


ARCHIMEDES


ARCHIMEDES

Archimedes is the second one in our sub-dial department. It also has a sandwich volume dial and an ideally symmetrical face, supporting the whole idea of our mathematical design. Archimedes watch is the homage to the famous ancient Greek mathematician.


PASCAL


PASCAL

Pascal watch is the most complicated in the series! Yet simple to read the time, as always. It has a classic Nodus structure image on its dial. But the most notable thing is the handcrafted outer layer which is cut by the shape of the dial image! The watch's inspiration source is Blaise Pascal's researches. 


VOLTA


VOLTA

Volta is and ode to the geometrical beauty of the basic shape — circle, which is also a foundation in design for almost every watch. The model shares its name with the prominent Italian scientist Alessandro Volta.


TURING


TURING

Turing follows up the minimalist path in the βeta series. Its dial is decorated with an infinite loop to depict the idea of the abstraction of time itself. It bears the name of a swift minded genius of Alan Turing.


COPERNICUS

COPERNICUS BLACK

Copernicus watch is inspired by famous Medieval astronomer and mathematician Nicolaus Copernicus. Design of the model refers both to his personal astrolabe and to the theory of Copernican heliocentrism. Copernicus is available in two different color options: black or white.

 

We are very proud with our concept we've brought to the first launch. That's why we decided to revise the αlpha series and present you the new enhanced versions of Gauss, Kepler, Plato and Euclid models. All αlpha watches come with the new thick strap with a spectacular red or blue edging and artificially weathered leather, domed crystal and reworked design, which slightly improves the initial developments preserving the main features. Suitable for those, who prefers more traditional outlook!


ALPHA SERIES: GAUSS & KEPLER


ALPHA SERIES: EUCLID & PLATO

 

Divided By Zero is a watch for everyone.

We may be over our heads with the obsession with maths and science, but our goal is to create watches you'd like to wear! That's why we try to make it perfect in every aspect.

We want Divided By Zero to become a part of everyone's wardrobe in the world! It's universality affords an easy strap change and suits every wrist with its massive yet sophisticated construction.

We give our watches the character to fit the individuality of its owner. You can easily find the specific watch that'll become a part of yourself.

 

The development of every model of Divided By Zero watches is a hardworking process. We study a lot of watches, try tons of designs and make infinite tests before we come up with a solid prototype.  

Thanks to our supporters, we had a lot of feedback on our previous campaign. That's why we exactly know what we need to improve in our second series.

The DBZ team did their homework! First of all, there were some people who wasn't very satisfied with our straps. The issue is solved! Now we offer the more superior high quality genuine leather straps, which are much thicker and more sturdy than before.

 

We wanted to add some distinctive features in our design, which would be unique and memorable and make our watches stand out. The new DBZ βeta series comes in a pitch black color palette with the signature blue square root second hand.

For the new series we've also replaced flat crystal with domed to make more “out of this world” impression and offer you a better view on our trademark design.

One of our experimental features is a hand cut bezel for the Archimedes model corresponding to the design pattern.

All of our straps have the blue edging — main color of Divided By Zero watches.

Galileo and Pascal have minimalist sub-dials placed on the different layers with the main dial. Both models have artificially aged case and strap buckles.

 

The other thing, rather than design, a lot of people love Divided By Zero watches for, is its affordable price. Our primary goal is to bring our projects to life and make happy as much people as we can with our watches. That's why we offer such an attractive price on the DBZ watches, which starts from $105 USD! There are several factors that affect the price.

  • No retail margin at all! That’s right! You get your watches directly from the manufacturer, avoiding any middlemen with their commissions on the way to your wrists.
  • Production costs. We’re always transparent and honest about it. There’s a graph below showing how we could achieve such an affordable price with an every stage of manufacturing and every piece of the watch itself priced accordingly as well as company profit.

This graph depicts the difference in pricing policy between Divided By Zero and the most of other watch brands in similar price range. Such an attractive price is formed by avoiding any extra distribution costs and retail markups, as well as significantly cutting the brand’s profit.

 

The new βeta series watches are made of high grade 316L stainless steel with a black PVD-coating with the total weight of 45 g for each timepiece! It comes with a thick genuine leather ZULU-strap, domed crystal and offers 5 ATM water resistance. The movement is the accurate and reliable Japanese-made Miyota.

Case Diameter: 43 mm 
Case Thickness: 9.5 mm 
Face Diameter: 37 mm 
Total Weight: 45 gram
Band Material: Genuine Leather 
Band Width / Length / Thickness: 20 mm / 255 mm / 2.0 mm   
Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel 
Buckle: 316L Stainless Steel 
Crystal: Domed mineral
Movement: Miyota 2035 / Miyota 6P25 (Japan) 
Water Resistant: 5 ATM

Our watches are already in the manufacturing stage! You have the possibility to jump on a leaving train and get yourself a DBZ watch with the full original discount!

We’re confident in terms and that each stage will be completed in time because of our experience with the previous campaign. Last time we delivered the watches to our backers in a month ahead of the schedule! Here's our production plan,

 

Social media are the perfect tool to influence the success of the campaign. If you like our concept and our watches, please, tell your friends about it. Together we can achieve much more to succeed and make Divided By Zero a strong brand with a faithful army of supporters!

FACEBOOK: facebook.com/divided0
TWITTER: twitter.com/divided0 
INSTAGRAM: instagram.com/divided0

 

You can get high definition images of the DBZ watches on our Flickr page. Feel free to use the best we have, if you’re a journalist, a blogger or simply like our style :)

For any other press related issues contact us on: hello@divided-o.com

story:
English / French

 Projet Français, mais rédigé en Anglais, pour lire la partie Française, merci de vous rendre en bas de la page.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

After a year of hard work, design & development, we are back ! This is our third fund-raising campaign, each new campaign gave us a chance to improve and upgrade the design and the technology. The success came from our backers from over 50 countries and the media who talked about us: 

 

  

Brand story of Griffin Emblem includes two parts: The Lion-Griffin and the Treasure. Griffin was not only perceived as the King of mythical creatures, but also as a symbol of the protector of a treasure. The diamond beneath the Griffin’s foot in the logo is just the symbol of each well-designed accessory on the wrist. The word "emblem" is a reference to the treasure.

 

 

 

 

We wanted to bring to the world high quality, automatic watches at an affordable price. After 3 successful campaigns on Indiegogo and thousand of happy backers, we decided to launch a third collection of higher specifications and quality automatic watches. We improved the design, technology, some features, and also proposed our best design selection in more colors.

We have the prototypes and everything else. The only thing missing is your support to launch the production !
 
 

 

For the backers who were involved in our previous collections, they know already that GRIFFIN EMBLEM is a synonym of quality, but for the new visitors, you can find our specifications below. Our last two collections helped us to understand more of your needs, so we decided to upgrade the design and technology. (For example: multilayer dials design, natural Ruby gemstones, detailing index, stainless steel reflector ring, better 3D effect of the logo, etc.). We are also bringing back the nice 42mm case as well and a genuine leather strap. Having a watch made by GRIFFIN EMBLEM means:  

 

• Best material selection & Top quality automatic watches

• Really affordable with a great quality-price ratio compared to the same specifications and quality products worldwide

• No battery needed

• A design that can go with professional and casual style

• Unisex

Each models will be limited in 100 pieces,  it will come with a unique serial number engraved on the back. 

We also bring back the customization of the metal plate, which allows you to customize your watch with a little message (see the pictures after the watches!)

 

To order your watch, just click on the picture of the watch you want , you can then fill your information and pay your perk :) 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

‧ All 316L Stainless Steel

 

‧ Miyota 82S0 / 82S5 Automatic Movement (Made in Japan)

‧ Vibration Frequency: 21600 vibrations per hour

‧ Jewels: 21 Jewels

‧ Exhibition Back with serial number

‧ Sapphire Crystal 

‧ Water-resistant to 5 ATM (50 meters)

‧ Genuine Leather Strap

‧ Approx. band width: 22-20mm

‧ Approx. case diameter: 42mm

‧ Approx. watch thickness: 12.6mm

‧ One year international warranty

‧ Natural ruby gemstones for models RG1053 and RGS105

‧ 200pcs of zirconia stones for model RGS105

‧ Swarovski baguette crystals for model RG1082

 

 

For Men & Women

 

The Exhibition Back

The exhibition back lets you discover the beautiful movement of your automatic watch. You can also find a lot of information on the case back, such as your model, the brand, the name of the movement and also your serial number (000/100).

 

The Mechanical Automatic Movement

All GRIFFIN EMBLEM watches use the Japanese MIYOTA 82S series mechanical automatic movement— with exquisite workmanship, this movement series is held to very high quality standards. Both the material selection and assembling technicians have a good reputation. The 82S series, which was selected by GRIFFIN EMBLEM, was one of its masterpieces. The fantastic hollowed out and naked pendulum design utilizes intricate carvings and shows off the manufacturing process—this makes the series’ movements perfect in functionality and beautiful in appearance.

 

 The 316L Stainless Steel

All GRIFFIN EMBLEM watches are made of 316L stainless steel, which comes from the United States. It is the standard steel number of the "ASTM: American Society for Testing and Material." Its corrosion resistance is remarkably strong and the texture is of high quality as well. L means low carbon. It has little impact on human skin and it is the only option for an advanced watch. The designers of GRIFFIN EMBLEM treat watches as artwork, and because of this choose only sophisticated Japanese mechanical movements to put within these pieces. We also focus on the process of polishing; the advanced technology of frosting and polishing makes the polish and texture of the watch fine and clear, and from there a strong three-dimensional appearance is formed.

 

 

The Leather Packaging

All watches come with an elegant leather packaging. The package contains all the tools you’ll need to get your watch ready to wear in just a few seconds. This nice box has perfect dimensions and will fit perfectly into your drawer, your briefcase, or your purse.

 

 

 

The Sapphire Crystal

The glass of Griffin Emblem Watches are made of Sapphire crystal, which is the most expensive type of crystal for watches and is three times harder than mineral crystal. It is made of an extremely durable synthetic material that makes it shatterproof and scratch resistant (not scratch proof). It also has a non-reflective film to prevent glare.

 

The Setting Of Zirconia Stone

RGS105 (2 Year Anniversary Limited Edition) have "200" pcs of zirconia stones. These stones are mounted using both claw setting and channel setting very carefully, which are professional setting techniques for making engagement rings or other luxury jewelry. 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The High Quality Leather Strap (with Quick-Release Pins)

Each GRIFFIN EMBLEM watch is equipped with an advanced leather strap, allowing you to not only appreciate its intricate craft, but also enjoy the comfortable feeling. This leather will last for ages and is very comfortable to wear. Each strap also has what we call "quick release pins," so you can now change your strap in just a few seconds without any tools!

The DIY Metal Plate

 

With your watch, you will receive a blank metal plate. If you’d like to customize it, you can add the “Customization” perk to your order. If you choose to customize your metal plate with text, you will receive TWO metal plates: a blank one and an engraved one.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

The stretch goals are a way to upgrade our product thanks to your contributions. If we reach a definite amount of money, we can make our watches better. This is our first stretch goal. We also want you to tell us what stretch goals you are looking for as well!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Please take one second and  click on the logos below to share the project

 

Win Free Engraving for Your Metal Plate with a Single Click

 

 

We are ready to offer you customization for your watch in exchange for you helping us spread the word. When you share our project using the share button, it creates a special link only for you. With this link, we will be able to track the number of visits and sales you are bringing to our project.

STEP 1: You need to be logged in your account on Indiegogo. If you do not have an account, you can create one for free via Facebook Connect in around 20 seconds.

STEP 2: Go on our project and click on the buttons to share it. You can use Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and send the project by email to friends.

STEP 3: If someone buys a watch thanks to you, you will get a metal plate customized for FREE .
 

If we do not succeed in reaching the minimum amount of $ 15,000 for launching the products, you will be refunded. The only big risk is a delay in production. We are working with the best factories, but even if we are a brand, we are also customers, so we are dependent on the factories. We know there are a lot of attractive projects out there- this is not our first ride and we hope that you will help us for a third time.

 

1 - How do I buy?

2 ways:
1/ On the right side of the campaign, you can see the price of each model. You need to click on the model you want to order. Each watch: has a reference (RG1008-1 for example). Check the pictures to see the reference of the particular watch you are looking at.
2/ By clicking directly on the picture of the watch , it will redirect you to fill your information and then proceed to the payment. You can pay with Paypal (safest way to pay online)

 1a - How do I choose my watch / strap after I buy a contribution?
Please write a comment to tell us the model (s) you want.
2 - When will I receive my watch?
 

We will do our best to start shipments in September/October 2016.This may vary depending on your localization.

(Delivery time of rewards / perks are subject to best efforts and are not guaranteed.)

 3 - Do you ship worldwide and how much does it cost?
We ship worldwide and the shipping is free.
4 - Are there any extra fees?
Our products are manufactured and assembled in Hong Kong, in the best factories we could find. We have to ship from there, and because of this, the customs in your country may stop your package and tax it around 15%. In our experience, around 5 to 10% of our contributors had to pay customs fees. We are already offering free shipping and the customs are different in each country so we  can not  refund you the customs fees.
5 - I just bought a watch, and I regret doing so. Can you refund me  ? 
Regarding to the terms of Indiegogo, we cannot refund you. When you make a contribution to our project, we use the money to pay commissions to both Indiegogo and Paypal, and of course for the manufacture of the watch you preorder. We launch the production of the watch  because  you bought it. If you help us with a contribution, be sure you want it, because we will not refund you (unless the project fails). ( Terms of Indiegogo )
6 - I have another question. How can I reach you?
The easiest way to contact us is by commenting on the project, or sending us an email at alain.recuze@gmail.com. We will answer you within 48 hours. If you do not receive an answer, feel free to write to us again reminding us to answer you. We may be busy, or we simply may have forgotten about it, after all- we are only humans. You can also find us on our social networks. Please follow us to stay in touch with the brand:
 

                        

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Après un an de travail, de design et d'amélioration nous sommes de retour ! C'est notre troisième campagne de financement participatif, chaque projet nous a permis  d'apprendre et d'optimiser notre technologie. Le succès de nos projets viennent de nos contributeurs de plus de 50 pays , et des médias qui ont parlés de nous :

 

 

 

L'histoire de la marque Griffin Emblem se compose de deux éléments . Le Griffon (lion-griffon) et son trésor . Le Griffon n'était pas seulement perçu comme l'un des rois des créatures mythologiques mais également comme le gardien et protecteur de trésors. Le diamant sous la patte du Griffon est le symbole de nos excellents accessoires liés au poignet. Le mot "Emblem" fait ici référence au trésor.

 

 

Nous souhaitions apporter au monde des montres élégantes, automatiques et de très bonne qualité, à un prix accessible a tous; c'est pourquoi nous avons lancé notre premier projet en Novembre 2014 via Indiegogo. Cette premiere campagne a été une veritable experience, notre rêve a vu le jour grace a tous nos contributeurs, et tout le soutien a permis d'amener notre tout premier projet à 576% de notre objectif avec 364 contributeurs. Notre projet a été inséré dans la newsletter d'Indiegogo et nous avons également fait la page d'accueil du site durant plusieurs jours.  Nous espérons recevoir autant de soutien de votre part.

 

 
 

 

 

Griffin Emblem souhaite vous apporter des montres de très bonne qualité, un mouvement Miyota ainsi qu'un cadran de 42mm de diamètre. Avoir une Griffin Emblem c'est posséder une montre avec :

 

  • Meilleure sélection de matériaux & montre automatique top qualité 
  • Tarif abordable avec un très bon rapport qualité / prix pour une montre automatique de bonne qualité 
  • Pas besoin de batterie/pile
  • Un design qui s'allie parfaitement avec un style professionnel ou décontracté 
  • Unisexes

 

Chaque modèle sera limité à 100 exemplaires, et viendra avec un numéro de série unique, gravé au dos de votre montre.

Pour commander votre montre, cliquez simplement sur la montre de votre choix, vous serez redirigé vers une page pour y compléter vos informations de livraisons et de paiement.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

L’arrière du boitier

L’arrière du boitier dispose également d'un design dit Squlette pour vous laisser admirer la beauté du mouvement de votre montre automatique. On peut également y voir de nombreuses informations comme la marque, le numéro de série gravé (pour les 100 premieres pièces de chaque modèle), le mouvement et la référence du modèle.

 
Le mouvement
Toutes les montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM utilisent la série japonaise Miyota 82S de mouvements mécaniques automatiques, une execution exquise et supervisée par des normes de haute qualité. Ce mouvement dispose d'une très bonne reputation, a la fois sur le choix des matériaux mais aussi sur son assemblage. La serie 82S est l'une des plus belles oeuvres de Miyota (Citizen). Sa conception est faite de sculptures complexes. La presence de rubis expose de façon élégante son processus de fabrication et renforce également son degré de qualité. Les rubis réduisent les frottements au sein du mécanisme et améliore donc sa longévité. Cet ensemble donne de très beaux mouvements.
 
L'acier
Toutes les montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM sont faites d'acier inoxydable 316L. 316L est une reference destinée a l'acier, aux Etat-Unis. La reference 316 provient de la societe "ASTM, American Society for Testing and Material". Sa capacité de resistance a la corrosion est très forte et la texture de celui-ci est aussi tres bonne. L signifie Low carbon. Il aura donc peu d'impact sur la peau humaine et il est l'une des meilleures options disponible pour les montres complexes. Les designers de GRIFFIN EMBLEM  considèrent les montres comme des oeuvres d'art, en plus de choisir un mouvement mécanique japonais sophistique, ils mettent également l'accent sur le processus du vernissage, sur sa technologie de pointe de givre et de polissage, ce qui rend la texture de la montre claire, qui lui permet un fort aspect tridimensionnel.

 
 
Le packaging de la montre
Chaque montre sera livrée avec un packaging elegant et unique. Sa petite taille vous permet de le ranger facilement dans votre tiroir, votre valise ou pourquoi pas votre sac a main. Chaque coffret est compose du cadran de la montre, son bracelet, la plaque de metal et ses accessoires, ainsi qu'un manuel d'instructions a lire avant utilisation de la montre.

 

 

Le verre saphir 

Chaque montre GRIFFIN EMBLEM est équipée d'un verre en saphir, très résistant.

 

 

Les Pierres Zircone

RGS105 (Edition Limitée pour les 2 ans) contient "200" pieces de pierre Zircone. Ces dernières sont en serti griffes, ces pierres ne vous feront pas défauts. 

 

 

Le bracelet (avec ouverture facile)

Chacune des montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM est équipée d'un bracelet en cuir de qualité, ce qui vous permet non seulement d’apprécier son artisanat complexe, mais aussi de profiter de la sensation de confort de celui-ci. Chaque bracelet est très confortable et durera dans le temps. De plus, chaque bracelet est équipé d'une "ouverture facile", qui vous permet de changer de bracelet en quelques secondes seulement ! (voir video plus bas)

 

 

 

 

La plaque de metal personnalisable

Chaque montre Griffin Emblem est composée d'une petite plaque métallique sur le côté de la montre. Cette plaque est avant tout un choix esthétique mais peut également être personnalisée. Si vous faites le choix d'acheter la contrepartie "Customization" votre montre sera livrée avec deux plaques, l'originale "vierge" et la seconde gravée avec votre message (limite a 10 caractères). Les vis et le tournevis sont bien entendu fournis avec votre montre. La plaque est de couleur argent sur chaque modèle.

 

  

 

 

 

Notre objectif est de récolter 15 000$ , cependant si nous dépassons ce montant nous mettrons en place des paliers de financement. Ces paliers nous permettent d’améliorer les montres de façon significative. Le premier objectif est situé a 30 000$ et permettra d'obtenir des aiguilles luminescente de meilleur qualité, ainsi que des vis de rechange pour la plaque de métal. Dites nous par commentaire toutes vos idées sur les améliorations possibles pour le palier suivant.

English / French
 Projet Français, mais rédigé en Anglais, pour lire la partie Française, merci de vous rendre en bas de la page.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 

 
After a year of hard work, design & development, we are back ! This is our third fund-raising campaign, each new campaign gave us a chance to improve and upgrade the design and the technology. The success came from our backers from over 50 countries and the media who talked about us: 

 

  
Brand story of Griffin Emblem includes two parts: The Lion-Griffin and the Treasure. Griffin was not only perceived as the King of mythical creatures, but also as a symbol of the protector of a treasure. The diamond beneath the Griffin’s foot in the logo is just the symbol of each well-designed accessory on the wrist. The word "emblem" is a reference to the treasure.
 

 
 

 

We wanted to bring to the world high quality, automatic watches at an affordable price. After 3 successful campaigns on Indiegogo and thousand of happy backers, we decided to launch a third collection of higher specifications and quality automatic watches. We improved the design, technology, some features, and also proposed our best design selection in more colors.

We have the prototypes and everything else. The only thing missing is your support to launch the production !
 

  



For the backers who were involved in our previous collections, they know already that GRIFFIN EMBLEM is a synonym of quality, but for the new visitors, you can find our specifications below. Our last two collections helped us to understand more of your needs, so we decided to upgrade the design and technology. (For example: multilayer dials design, natural Ruby gemstones, detailing index, stainless steel reflector ring, better 3D effect of the logo, etc.). We are also bringing back the nice 42mm case as well and a genuine leather strap. Having a watch made by GRIFFIN EMBLEM means:  

 
• Best material selection & Top quality automatic watches
• Really affordable with a great quality-price ratio compared to the same specifications and quality products worldwide
• No battery needed
• A design that can go with professional and casual style
• Unisex
Each models will be limited in 100 pieces,  it will come with a unique serial number engraved on the back. 
We also bring back the customization of the metal plate, which allows you to customize your watch with a little message (see the pictures after the watches!)
 
To order your watch, just click on the picture of the watch you want , you can then fill your information and pay your perk :) 
 
 

 

 
 

 
  

 

 



 
 


 


 


 
‧ All 316L Stainless Steel 
‧ Miyota 82S0 / 82S5 Automatic Movement (Made in Japan)
‧ Vibration Frequency: 21600 vibrations per hour
‧ Jewels: 21 Jewels
‧ Exhibition Back with serial number
‧ Sapphire Crystal 
‧ Water-resistant to 5 ATM (50 meters)
‧ Genuine Leather Strap
‧ Approx. band width: 22-20mm
‧ Approx. case diameter: 42mm
‧ Approx. watch thickness: 12.6mm
‧ One year international warranty
‧ Natural ruby gemstones for models RG1053 and RGS105
‧ 200pcs of zirconia stones for model RGS105
‧ Swarovski baguette crystals for model RG1082

Sa capacité de resistance a la corrosion est très forte et la texture de celui-ci est aussi tres bonne. L signifie Low carbon. Il aura donc peu d'impact sur la peau humaine et il est l'une des meilleures options disponible pour les montres complexes. Les designers de GRIFFIN EMBLEM  considèrent les montres comme des oeuvres d'art, en plus de choisir un mouvement mécanique japonais sophistique, ils mettent également l'accent sur le processus du vernissage, sur sa technologie de pointe de givre et de polissage, ce qui rend la texture de la montre claire, qui lui permet un fort aspect tridimensionnel.

 

 
Le packaging de la montre

Chaque montre sera livrée avec un packaging elegant et unique. Sa petite taille vous permet de le ranger facilement dans votre tiroir, votre valise ou pourquoi pas votre sac a main. Chaque coffret est compose du cadran de la montre, son bracelet, la plaque de metal et ses accessoires, ainsi qu'un manuel d'instructions a lire avant utilisation de la montre.


 
 
Le verre saphir 
Chaque montre GRIFFIN EMBLEM est équipée d'un verre en saphir, très résistant.

 
 
Les Pierres Zircone
RGS105 (Edition Limitée pour les 2 ans) contient "200" pieces de pierre Zircone. Ces dernières sont en serti griffes, ces pierres ne vous feront pas défauts. 


 

 
Le bracelet (avec ouverture facile)
Chacune des montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM est équipée d'un bracelet en cuir de qualité, ce qui vous permet non seulement d’apprécier son artisanat complexe, mais aussi de profiter de la sensation de confort de celui-ci. Chaque bracelet est très confortable et durera dans le temps. De plus, chaque bracelet est équipé d'une "ouverture facile", qui vous permet de changer de bracelet en quelques secondes seulement ! (voir video plus bas)
 
 


  
La plaque de metal personnalisable
Chaque montre Griffin Emblem est composée d'une petite plaque métallique sur le côté de la montre. Cette plaque est avant tout un choix esthétique mais peut également être personnalisée. Si vous faites le choix d'acheter la contrepartie "Customization" votre montre sera livrée avec deux plaques, l'originale "vierge" et la seconde gravée avec votre message (limite a 10 caractères). Les vis et le tournevis sont bien entendu fournis avec votre montre. La plaque est de couleur argent sur chaque modèle.
 

   
 
 
Notre objectif est de récolter 15 000$ , cependant si nous dépassons ce montant nous mettrons en place des paliers de financement. Ces paliers nous permettent d’améliorer les montres de façon significative. Le premier objectif est situé a 30 000$ et permettra d'obtenir des aiguilles luminescente de meilleur qualité, ainsi que des vis de rechange pour la plaque de métal. Dites nous par commentaire toutes vos idées sur les améliorations possibles pour le palier suivant.

story:
We’re Alex and Marcus, the creators of „True Boxers“. Our journey started almost more than a year ago when we decided to take a different approach towards how boxer shorts are made.

Our mission is to create durable boxer shorts with fun prints without compromising on fit, quality and ethical production.

Most brands these days purposely make goods which are meant to fall apart after a few years. We want to create boxer shorts that are fashionable, but made from materials that are durable. We call our mission 'Sustainable Fashion'. 

In other words, True Boxers aims to be an apparel label that enables you to have sustainable but still fashionable boxer shorts. We’ve spent the past year vigorously researching properly certified cotton suppliers with the same mindset as us, and manufacturers with fair working conditions.

After a long journey we found our perfect match, our supplier in Spain and our manufacturer in Portugal - both are committed to the integrity of their staff. It’s been our goal to only use certified poplin cotton as well as environmentally friendly dye. This ensures that your pair of boxers is made of the softest, most comfortable and sustainable fabric possible.

Help us eliminate fast fashion & move towards sustainable fair fashion. We believe that creativity and confidence leads individuals to generate true sustainable changes in this world. With our product we want to set a new benchmark for men’s underwear.





Design. Our design is unique, fun and timeless. 
Perfect Fit. We’ve been working closely with our manufacturer over the past 4 months in order to develop the perfect fit. So far we have created almost 20 different prototypes in order to find the optimal cut.
Sustainability. There is constant pressure to keep pushing for a higher level of sustainability, both environmentally as well as socioeconomically. Our certified fabric from Spain contains environmentally friendly dye.
Made in Europe. Our Boxers are made in Portugal and assembled in Austria under fair labour standards. We believe that fair wages result in high quality products. Change is underway, but we think it needs to progress at a faster pace. That’s why we’ve created True Boxers. It’s our business model for a global change in purchasing and supplier practices, workers’ rights and social responsibility. We’re going further than any fashion company has ever gone, and we’re encouraging you to follow our lead.
Soft Waistband. Our Boxers feature an elasticized waistband and a softer fabric than most other waistbands for superior comfort.
Durable. Our fabrics and stitching are of exceptional durable quality, in order to ensure our products to be long lasting. We use the lockstitch method which results in a much stronger seam that is difficult to rip and is less prone to puckering.
100% Cotton. We use high-quality cotton that has an extra-long staple – what this means is that it has longer fibers, resulting in a silkier, more durable fabric. Our fabric costs may be higher, but we think that the difference will be noticeable.
Poplin Quality. Poplin is a plain weave, which means the threads alternately cross over and then under each other. This results in a very smooth and durable fabric, particularly with higher thread counts. Also, garments made out of poplin look very crisp when ironed. Our boxers are made in poplin quality with 120 grams which gives you the feeling that you’re wearing a very lightweight fabric.
Quality Control. And of course all of our True Boxers must pass our “hand-check".


For our Kickstarter Campaign, we’ve designed 6 unique and timeless boxer shorts for men.







Because we are a young startup company, we aren’t able to afford the minimum order quantities (just over € 20,000) required to complete a full production run of our TRUE BOXERS. We`ve spent the last 12 months developing our prototypes and our mission.

Now we need your help and backing to reach these minimum order quantities to get TRUE BOXERS up and running. We think everyone deserves a pack of unique boxers for the world to see. If we reach our goal, we’ll be able to purchase the minimum order quantities and deliver TRUE BOXERS straight to your doorstep.


Tiago Lima-Koch for the outstanding videography, Jana Frantal for the stunning photography, Clara Wassak for the superb branding & CI, Katherina Appelgren for her impressive wording support, Julius Abel & Maxamillion for their phenomenal tune "Maxamillion Feat. Mia - Yellow Ledbetter (Julius Abel Remix)" and Sophie Pochtler & Clemens Beutler for the exceptional action photography, Sophia Petzold for striking social media backing and Dr. Roland Manfreda for Tax and Legal Support

Our fascinating models Chiara Pochtler, Julia Weißenbäck, Sophia Petzold, Maximilian Niedermayer, Jakob Jelinek.



We want to keep the conversation going. Launching TRUE BOXERS is just the first step. Whether or not you’re able to support us at this point, join us as we continue to enlarge the collection.

trueboxers.com 

facebook.com/trueboxers

instagram.com/trueboxers/

@trueboxers

Or send us a mail: hello@trueboxers.com
