story:
My name is William Gittens and I've been in jewelry sales for over 40 years selling for some of the most prestigious companies in the country.  I've traveled the world buying and selling jewelry and gem stones and believe that my experience can help anyone interested in buying their first piece of jewelry all the way up to that experienced collector. Thank you so much for considering my campaign.

Through my years in sales I've tried to guide both the novice and experienced jewelry buyer in the right direction in choosing the best in terms of grade and quality. I've found that so many people buy on emotion with little knowledge or experience and it has become my goal to educate and inspire people about jewelry. It's become a passion for me to help people with these important moments in their lives, like buying an engagement ring or that special anniversary gift.

I've been thinking about and working on this book for almost the entire time I've been in the business of jewelry sales. I feel that now is the right time to publish as I've retired and my knowledge on the subject can be passed on to a generation eager to understand and purchase jewelry. This is my life in a book and I hope that you enjoy and benefit from it. Thank you again for considering my campaign.

story:
Live brighter with AGOGO

When was the last time you reached for the light switch and hoped it would turn on?  Or the last time you had to put your book away because the sun was setting?  If you’re reading this right now, the odds are that you will never have to worry about having light when you need it.  But for more than a billion people on this planet, daily access to electricity is simply not a reality.  Not only is this inconvenient, it also seriously hinders the ‘developing’ in developing countries.  With your support, AGOGO Solar can help change that.

Starting in Uganda, we have a plan to make consistent, affordable access to light a possibility.  Not only do we want to get solar power to those who need it, we want to create jobs and train future leaders in Uganda.  That’s why we are building a solution that empowers Africans to be able to afford high-quality, proven solar lamps that are already on the market.

AGOGO has sold several lamps in Gulu, Uganda and is recruiting a team of Ugandans to form a team of direct sales distributors.  In addition to selling lamps, these distributors demonstrate the lamps to their friends and neighbors and educate them on the benefits of switching to solar.  This model leverages existing social groups and the strong sense of community in Ugandan culture to help solar power catch on.  We also offer flexible microfinancing to help families afford to make the switch.  We hope to build a strong base in northern Uganda and then expand from there.

Why Solar?

Most people in Sub-Saharan Africa light their homes with kerosene.  While kerosene is simple and readily available, it is also outdated and dangerous.  Kerosene presents families with several problems:

  • High recurring costs

  • Health problems due to prolonged smoke inhalation

  • Fire hazards

  • Poor light quality, which leads to eye strain

Luckily, there is a proven solution to the problems associated with kerosene: solar power.  When solar lamps are used instead of kerosene, it has been shown to dramatically improve lives.  Solar power not only solves many of the problems of kerosene, it also creates added value.  Solar lamps have many benefits:

  • Sunlight is free

  • There is no smoke to irritate the eyes or damage the lungs

  • Fire hazards are essentially eliminated

  • Solar lamps are much brighter than kerosene lanterns

  • Many solar lamps include USB ports to charge mobile devices, which are an important  and growing part of African life, even in rural areas

At AGOGO Solar, we believe that these benefits can have far-reaching effects.  Families who have solar power can work and study into the evening, providing additional income and improving opportunities for children.  Users of the Sun King Pro 2 (the lamp we’re selling) have reported a 25% increase in household income and a 75% increase in study time.  They are also able to charge their phone when they need to, rather than having to pay to use a public charging station.  Access to energy truly changes lives.

Why Uganda?

Uganda is one of the most disadvantaged nations in the world, ranking in the lowest 10% of countries in terms of average income per capita and the lowest third of countries in Africa.  Half a gallon of kerosene costs about as much as the average day’s wages in Uganda (just $1.64).  Yet up to three quarters of the country still relies on kerosene for household lighting.

Despite the clear advantages solar energy offers, it has failed to gain traction and widespread adoption in Uganda.  One of the greatest factors contributing to this is the high upfront cost of switching to solar.  Solar lamps cost between $40 and $50, which is out of reach for many, especially in rural areas.  Our model provides microfinancing with individualized payment plans, giving people a way to pay for lamps over time.  This makes it possible for millions to afford to switch to solar who couldn’t before.

Jenny (one of our team members) was in Uganda for a study abroad in 2013 to interview former child soldiers from the country’s civil war.  She made many friends and witnessed firsthand how solar power could benefit the people.  We have been working with some of Jenny’s friends in Uganda to do market research and validation of our model, and we have already sold several lamps.  The work we have done so far has shown that this model will be successful in Uganda, and we are confident that it will continue to grow rapidly and sustainably.

The Plan

AGOGO Solar is using two key tools to make solar lamps more available than ever before: microfinancing and a direct sales model.

Our flexible microfinancing approach allows people to start using their lamp after paying only a small deposit.  They then pay the rest of the lamp off after time through small weekly payments.  Once the lamp is fully paid off, the customer owns it outright and never has to pay for light again for the lifetime of the lamp.  If the customer is unable to continue making payments, they can return the lamp and have their initial deposit refunded.  A flexible payment schedule is negotiated when the lamp is purchased, allowing customers to pay off the lamp quickly or distribute the cost over more time.  Microfinance is a system that has been used and proven throughout the developing world with great success and default rates that are significantly lower than loans in the US.

We are also building a network of direct sales representatives who will sell solar lamps to the people who live around them.  Ugandan communities are very close-knit, and trust is an important part of their culture.  As customers see the benefits of solar power, they get excited about the technology and want to share it with their friends and neighbors.  We hope to tap into existing social groups such as women’s organizations, workers’ guilds, and village savings and loan collectives.  Distributors are selected through an application and interview process and are trained on sales and business principles.  They earn a commission for every lamp they sell, providing a source of income and incentive to help us grow.

The Lamps

We’re using the Sun King Pro 2 by Greenlight Planet.  This lamp is one of the most popular of its kind in developing countries, and it has consistently received among the highest ratings of similar lamps.  It produces up to 100 lumens (that’s about five times brighter than kerosene) and has several light level settings.  It also includes a USB charger that is compatible with mobile phones.  This feature is in high demand in Uganda, where even most rural people own mobile phones, but inconsistent access to electricity means that many have to travel to the city center and pay to use a public charging station.  The Sun King Pro 2 is very durable and has a two year warranty and five year battery life.  We have received very positive feedback from people who have already bought lamps, and we are excited about the interest they have generated among friends and neighbors.

About Us

AGOGO is a multidisciplinary team of Brigham Young University students.  We have backgrounds in engineering, economics, advertising, international relations, family studies, and business management.  We have been working with the Ballard Center for Economic Self-Reliance in BYU’s Marriott School of Management to develop and implement this business plan.  We’ve been working with our contacts in Uganda, and have already sold several lamps.  Our goal this summer is to validate our business plan by selling more lamps and more fully building out our distribution model.  Learn more about us and follow our story at agogosolar.wordpress.com.

The AGOGO Way

Our people-first philosophy is deeply ingrained in everything we do.  We even chose the name AGOGO to remind us that ultimately, our first priority will always be the lives of each individual we serve.

When Jenny was in Uganda interviewing former child soldiers, she heard countless heartbreaking stories and met dozens of incredible people.  One of the friends she met is Agogo Isaac, a young man who has endured many challenging experiences but is working hard to create a better life for himself.  Agogo Isaac’s cheerful attitude and indomitable spirit are a testament to the fact that with courage, creativity, and tenacity, the future is always bright.

AGOGO believes in integrity and empowerment.  Our business model empowers the Ugandans themselves to sell lamps to their neighbors, friends, and associates.  We encourage our distributors to look around themselves and imagine what could be possible for those closest to them if they had easy, consistent access to light.  Honesty and trust are central to our business, and we are committed to building a brand that people can rely on.  We train all our distributors on basic business practices and help them develop skills to take ownership of their own future.  We believe that by running a business rather than a charity, we can help build the Ugandan economy at the grassroots level, rather than relying on donors to keep the project going.


What We Need & What You Get

This summer, we are launching AGOGO Solar in Gulu, Uganda and are raising funds for our initial inventory and operational costs.  Your donation will go toward purchasing lamps and getting the business off the ground.  In appreciation for your contribution, we are excited to offer the following perks for funders:

Impact

AGOGO is committed to building the Ugandan economy and providing Ugandans with access to affordable solar energy.  Your contribution will go directly to lamps that will be used by people in Gulu, Uganda.  We will also use some of the funds from this campaign to build a network of distributors who will earn money from the lamps they sell.  Our plan is to reinvest profits from lamp sales into AGOGO and grow it as a sustainable business that will benefit Uganda for years to come.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thanks for stopping by!  Whether or not you’re able to contribute financially, we’d love for you to help us get the word out.  If you like what we’re doing, use the share tools at the top of this page to post a link to this project on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, your blog, or whatever else you use to tell your friends about the cool things you find.  If you have questions or comments, or if you want to work with us, use the “Contact” link near the top of this page below the video.  We also invite you to follow our story at agogosolar.wordpress.com.  Together, we can make the future brighter.  Thanks!
story_txt:
Live brighter with AGOGOWhen was the last time you reached for the light switch and hoped it would turn on?  Or the last time you had to put your book away because the sun was setting?  If you’re reading this right now, the odds are that you will never have to worry about having light when you need it.  But for more than a billion people on this planet, daily access to electricity is simply not a reality.  Not only is this inconvenient, it also seriously hinders the ‘developing’ in developing countries.  With your support, AGOGO Solar can help change that.Starting in Uganda, we have a plan to make consistent, affordable access to light a possibility.  Not only do we want to get solar power to those who need it, we want to create jobs and train future leaders in Uganda.  That’s why we are building a solution that empowers Africans to be able to afford high-quality, proven solar lamps that are already on the market.AGOGO has sold several lamps in Gulu, Uganda and is recruiting a team of Ugandans to form a team of direct sales distributors.  In addition to selling lamps, these distributors demonstrate the lamps to their friends and neighbors and educate them on the benefits of switching to solar.  This model leverages existing social groups and the strong sense of community in Ugandan culture to help solar power catch on.  We also offer flexible microfinancing to help families afford to make the switch.  We hope to build a strong base in northern Uganda and then expand from there.Why Solar?Most people in Sub-Saharan Africa light their homes with kerosene.  While kerosene is simple and readily available, it is also outdated and dangerous.  Kerosene presents families with several problems:
High recurring costs
Health problems due to prolonged smoke inhalation
Fire hazards
Poor light quality, which leads to eye strain
Luckily, there is a proven solution to the problems associated with kerosene: solar power.  When solar lamps are used instead of kerosene, it has been shown to dramatically improve lives.  Solar power not only solves many of the problems of kerosene, it also creates added value.  Solar lamps have many benefits:
Sunlight is free
There is no smoke to irritate the eyes or damage the lungs
Fire hazards are essentially eliminated
Solar lamps are much brighter than kerosene lanterns
Many solar lamps include USB ports to charge mobile devices, which are an important  and growing part of African life, even in rural areas
At AGOGO Solar, we believe that these benefits can have far-reaching effects.  Families who have solar power can work and study into the evening, providing additional income and improving opportunities for children.  Users of the Sun King Pro 2 (the lamp we’re selling) have reported a 25% increase in household income and a 75% increase in study time.  They are also able to charge their phone when they need to, rather than having to pay to use a public charging station.  Access to energy truly changes lives.Why Uganda?Uganda is one of the most disadvantaged nations in the world, ranking in the lowest 10% of countries in terms of average income per capita and the lowest third of countries in Africa.  Half a gallon of kerosene costs about as much as the average day’s wages in Uganda (just $1.64).  Yet up to three quarters of the country still relies on kerosene for household lighting.Despite the clear advantages solar energy offers, it has failed to gain traction and widespread adoption in Uganda.  One of the greatest factors contributing to this is the high upfront cost of switching to solar.  Solar lamps cost between $40 and $50, which is out of reach for many, especially in rural areas.  Our model provides microfinancing with individualized payment plans, giving people a way to pay for lamps over time.  This makes it possible for millions to afford to switch to solar who couldn’t before.Jenny (one of our team members) was in Uganda for a study abroad in 2013 to interview former child soldiers from the country’s civil war.  She made many friends and witnessed firsthand how solar power could benefit the people.  We have been working with some of Jenny’s friends in Uganda to do market research and validation of our model, and we have already sold several lamps.  The work we have done so far has shown that this model will be successful in Uganda, and we are confident that it will continue to grow rapidly and sustainably.The PlanAGOGO Solar is using two key tools to make solar lamps more available than ever before: microfinancing and a direct sales model.Our flexible microfinancing approach allows people to start using their lamp after paying only a small deposit.  They then pay the rest of the lamp off after time through small weekly payments.  Once the lamp is fully paid off, the customer owns it outright and never has to pay for light again for the lifetime of the lamp.  If the customer is unable to continue making payments, they can return the lamp and have their initial deposit refunded.  A flexible payment schedule is negotiated when the lamp is purchased, allowing customers to pay off the lamp quickly or distribute the cost over more time.  Microfinance is a system that has been used and proven throughout the developing world with great success and default rates that are significantly lower than loans in the US.We are also building a network of direct sales representatives who will sell solar lamps to the people who live around them.  Ugandan communities are very close-knit, and trust is an important part of their culture.  As customers see the benefits of solar power, they get excited about the technology and want to share it with their friends and neighbors.  We hope to tap into existing social groups such as women’s organizations, workers’ guilds, and village savings and loan collectives.  Distributors are selected through an application and interview process and are trained on sales and business principles.  They earn a commission for every lamp they sell, providing a source of income and incentive to help us grow.The LampsWe’re using the Sun King Pro 2 by Greenlight Planet.  This lamp is one of the most popular of its kind in developing countries, and it has consistently received among the highest ratings of similar lamps.  It produces up to 100 lumens (that’s about five times brighter than kerosene) and has several light level settings.  It also includes a USB charger that is compatible with mobile phones.  This feature is in high demand in Uganda, where even most rural people own mobile phones, but inconsistent access to electricity means that many have to travel to the city center and pay to use a public charging station.  The Sun King Pro 2 is very durable and has a two year warranty and five year battery life.  We have received very positive feedback from people who have already bought lamps, and we are excited about the interest they have generated among friends and neighbors.About UsAGOGO is a multidisciplinary team of Brigham Young University students.  We have backgrounds in engineering, economics, advertising, international relations, family studies, and business management.  We have been working with the Ballard Center for Economic Self-Reliance in BYU’s Marriott School of Management to develop and implement this business plan.  We’ve been working with our contacts in Uganda, and have already sold several lamps.  Our goal this summer is to validate our business plan by selling more lamps and more fully building out our distribution model.  Learn more about us and follow our story at agogosolar.wordpress.com.The AGOGO WayOur people-first philosophy is deeply ingrained in everything we do.  We even chose the name AGOGO to remind us that ultimately, our first priority will always be the lives of each individual we serve.When Jenny was in Uganda interviewing former child soldiers, she heard countless heartbreaking stories and met dozens of incredible people.  One of the friends she met is Agogo Isaac, a young man who has endured many challenging experiences but is working hard to create a better life for himself.  Agogo Isaac’s cheerful attitude and indomitable spirit are a testament to the fact that with courage, creativity, and tenacity, the future is always bright.AGOGO believes in integrity and empowerment.  Our business model empowers the Ugandans themselves to sell lamps to their neighbors, friends, and associates.  We encourage our distributors to look around themselves and imagine what could be possible for those closest to them if they had easy, consistent access to light.  Honesty and trust are central to our business, and we are committed to building a brand that people can rely on.  We train all our distributors on basic business practices and help them develop skills to take ownership of their own future.  We believe that by running a business rather than a charity, we can help build the Ugandan economy at the grassroots level, rather than relying on donors to keep the project going.What We Need & What You GetThis summer, we are launching AGOGO Solar in Gulu, Uganda and are raising funds for our initial inventory and operational costs.  Your donation will go toward purchasing lamps and getting the business off the ground.  In appreciation for your contribution, we are excited to offer the following perks for funders:ImpactAGOGO is committed to building the Ugandan economy and providing Ugandans with access to affordable solar energy.  Your contribution will go directly to lamps that will be used by people in Gulu, Uganda.  We will also use some of the funds from this campaign to build a network of distributors who will earn money from the lamps they sell.  Our plan is to reinvest profits from lamp sales into AGOGO and grow it as a sustainable business that will benefit Uganda for years to come.Other Ways You Can HelpThanks for stopping by!  Whether or not you’re able to contribute financially, we’d love for you to help us get the word out.  If you like what we’re doing, use the share tools at the top of this page to post a link to this project on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, your blog, or whatever else you use to tell your friends about the cool things you find.  If you have questions or comments, or if you want to work with us, use the “Contact” link near the top of this page below the video.  We also invite you to follow our story at agogosolar.wordpress.com.  Together, we can make the future brighter.  Thanks!

story:
Pearl Couture USA is proud to give you a chance to own a true gem at a fraction of it's value. Our family purchased thousands of cultured south sea pearls from an estate years ago and we are now ready to share the fortune with the world.


We want to give you options, that's why we are offering these beautiful stud earrings in your choice of yellow or white 14 karat gold and offer an array of sizes from 6mm to 10mm.

  • 6mm Pearls: A bit smaller than 'usual' - a good option for ladies 5'3" or under and/or with a particularly slender neck.
  • 7mm - 8mm Pearls: The 'standard' size. Most pearls you've likely seen are about 7-8mm.
  • 9mm - 10mm Pearls: Luxury size. Larger than the 'usual' pearl, but subtly so.

We need your help to help cover the expenses of turning these fabulous pearls into beautiful pearl stud earrings.

  • We need gold! Pearls by themselves are beautiful in their own right, but it's the gold that connects them to you.
  • Streamlining the process.  We aim to perfect the process to create these stunning pieces, from a facility, manufacturing equipment, to jewelers here in the USA.  With your help we can make this happen!
  • Unique presentation.  It's all about the presentation - we can deliver in a jewelry box that is a treasure in it's own right.
  • Insure your investment. Providing an appraisal report from UGL to show the estimated retail value of these beautiful earrings.

If we are able to fund this campaign, we would be able to keep our costs down and produce earrings as low as $59 per pair, a price that is 90% off the estimated retail value.  With your help we hope to break the market and show that it's possible to offer a stunning product without it costing hundreds of dollars.

Pledge of $59

  • A beautiful pair of 6-6.9mm South Sea Cultured Pearl Earrings
  • Set in your choice of genuine 14k white or yellow gold
  • Placed in a unique treasure chest jewelry box
  • A mini appraisal report from UGL with the estimated retail value of your earrings.  (Please note that estimated retail value varies)
  • Free delivery

Pledge of $69

  • Everything included in the $59 reward but with a pair of 7-7.9mm South Sea Cultured Pearl Earrings

Pledge of $79

  • Everything included in the $59 reward but with a pair of 8-8.9mm South Sea Cultured Pearl Earrings

Pledge of $89

  • Everything included in the $59 reward but with a pair of 9-9.9mm South Sea Cultured Pearl Earrings

Pledge of $99

  • Everything included in the $59 reward but with a pair of 10-10.9mm South Sea Cultured Pearl Earrings

story:
Fashion Diaries: Ship Me to Germany

Meet and Greet

Hello! My name is Bree Moore. I am a fashion merchandising major at the University of North Texas. I am also an intern at Amphibian Productions, I assist with costume designing and I work full time at a very busy well known hotel. Although its tough I am learning to balance my dreams and reality. I work hard daily to maintain that balance and I know one day it will pay off when my dream comes true through my hard work and dedication. 

The Campaign 

My dream, and to help my dream there is a BIG opportunity in Germany in November. I believe in taking full advantage of every opportunity presented to me. My uncle presented some of my work to an up and coming fashion designer, and she would love to meet me so we can talk about fashion and a possible business proposal. Here’s the kicker, my budget. My budget doesn't agree with my dreams right now, it barely agrees with my reality. I am asking for YOUR help. I would appreciate anything; just a dollar would be a huge blessing. And I am asking for you to share my video and tell a friend or family member; I will forever be grateful. 

Ship Me OFF

The campaign will take place in Berlin, Germany in November. I have a personal website that I am going to update to keep everyone posted about my journey; www.breemoore.com. Also, I will be updating my personal social media profiles. The campaign will finish in late October. 

Team Work! 

My purpose in life is to live out all of my dreams and inspire people to do the same no matter what obstacles are blocking them. I want to inspire people that can relate to me, especially people that think because they can not afford something, they can not do it. With your help, I can inspire someone to believe and not give up. Lets prove that there are people out there willing to help and most importantly, care. 

Living Proof: My Budget

I plan to stay in Germany for about 2 weeks. My room and board is taken care of. Obviously, while I am away I can not attend work so I have to think about how my monetary commitments will be taken care of. Below is a list of my biweekly bills: 

Rent:  510

Electric:  110 

Cable:  100

Car Note:  460

Car Insurance:  137

Phone Bill:  110

Renters Insurance:  18

Food:  200

Gas:  60

Passport:  200

Plane Fare:  1400

Total: $3, 305

*1,695* The difference will be used to enjoy and be able to experience Germany without any monetary limitations.

story:
Verstecken war gestern

Sich endlich nicht mehr anders fühlen. Ob online oder im Store, ob mit mehr oder weniger Kurven: wir alle wollen einfach nur das shoppen, was uns glücklich macht. Dabei hat es in der Vergangenheit vielleicht administrativ Sinn ergeben, nur bis Größe 42 zu produzieren: Eine bewusste Nicht-Trennung von Normgrößen und Übergrößen ist das Ziel von „mable“, einem Label, das eine gesunde Körpereinstellung unterstützt. Nicht nur Frauen mit Modelmaßen haben das Selbstbewusstsein, die Trends vom Laufsteg zu tragen. Kurven sind ein Mega-Trend - mable unterstützt diese Bewegung und begrüßt die üppigeren Mädels im Kreis der stylischen Modeträger. 

Da kann sich ein Curvie auch mal die schlankere Freundin schnappen, Partnerlooks shoppen und muss nicht mehr traurig sein, wenn es die richtig trendigen Klamotten nur für die Schlanken gibt - 

denn dieser Fakt gehört ab jetzt der Vergangenheit an.




Für mehr Vielfalt in der Mode

Viele Designer entwerfen ihre Teile an sehr schlanken Models. Das wird in Modeschulen so vermittelt und geht schneller und einfacher. 
Einfacher ist aber nicht immer besser! Mode hat kein Größenschild und deshalb steht mable für mehr Größenvielfalt in der Designermode. Wir entwerfen unsere Designs nicht nur für schlanke, knabenhafte Figuren - auch für Mädels mit üppigem Popo, toller Oberweite oder etwas mehr Bauch ist etwas dabei. Wir nennen unser Konzept ALLSIZE - jeder hat eine Schokoladenseite, die es ins Rampenlicht zu rücken gilt

  • "Problemzonen" gibt es bei uns nicht
  • Es gilt: herzeigen, statt verstecken. Wenn du dich selbst liebst, siehst du am besten aus.
  • Ziehe an, was du magst und zeige dein Selbstbewusstsein!


VORBESTELLUNG  JETZT MÖGLICH!





Risiken & Herausforderungen

Wir stehen noch ganz am Anfang: ob unsere Designs bei vielen Mädels ankommen, wissen wir noch nicht.  Deshalb ist Feedback für uns ganz wichtig! Gerade arbeiten wir noch an der Passform der ersten Kollektion. Nach der Vorstellung in München könnt ihr euch ein genaueres Bild von den endgültigen Teilen machen.




Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Für Stoffe, Produktion und Präsentation der Kollektion brauchen wir ein kleines Budget, um das Vorhaben in die Tat umzusetzen. 

Wir haben kleine Packages für dich zusammengestellt, mit deren Kauf du uns unterstützt. Suche dir einfach eins - oder auch mehrere - aus und kaufe sie.

ÜBRIGENS: Du kannst auch gern mehr Geld an uns spenden, als der Perk kostet, gib den zusätzlichen Betrag einfach beim Checkout-Prozess ein.




Dahin geht das Geld

10.000€ sind viel Geld - wofür wir das Geld verwenden, siehst du hier:



Erzähle Familie, Freunden & Bekannten

Auch, wenn du uns nicht mit einem Perk-Kauf unterstützen kannst - du bist wichtig! Bitte sprich mit deinen Freunden über unsere Kampagne, teile sie auf Facebook oder Twitter oder leite sie per Mail weiter. 
Das geht ganz einfach über die Indiegogo - Buttons.

story:
Thank you so much for supporting us during our campaign! At this time, we are no longer accepting pre-orders on Indiegogo. For further inquiries, you can contact us at info@breezing.co

Press

  • Forbes
  • Scientific American
  • CNET
  • PSFK
  • ABC News
  • Fox News
  • more at the bottom of this page...

Meet Breezing.

For the first time ever, a metabolism tracker that syncs with your smartphone. Brought to you by a team of dedicated researchers and engineers, Breezing combines innovative design with proven science. 

 

 

Vital.

Metabolism matters.

Your metabolism determines what your body needs just to sustain life. For most people, 70-80% of the calories you burn comes from metabolism - not exercise.

Everyone’s metabolism is different. And your metabolism can change over time. Age, weight, body composition, and hormones are intricately connected to metabolism. That's why tracking your metabolism is so important. 

Knowledge.

Breezing tells you: 

Your Metabolism REEding (Resting Energy Expenditure): The number of calories your metabolism burns everyday

Your Body's Energy Source: Whether you're burning carbohydrates, fats, or a mix of both

Your Total Energy Expenditure: The total number of calories you burn (metabolism + activity level) depending on how active you are.

Your Metabolic History: Your metabolism over time, so you can see changes easily.

Your Weight History: Your weight progress, showing you how it corresponds with your metabolism. 

                   

(Why does the app look different in the video? Since the filming of the video, we've improved our app's user interface to make it even easier to use.)

Personalized Feedback.

Based on your unique metabolic profile and individual goals, Breezing gives you diet and exercise advice customized to your needs.

                         

Connecting + Sharing.

The Breezing app lets you share results through e-mail, Facebook, and Twitter. You can tell your friends and family how you're doing, or keep your doctor, coach, or trainer updated on your progress.

Real, Accurate Science.

Breezing measures your metabolism using indirect calorimetry, the Gold Standard method preferred by the World Health Organization.

While traditional indirect calorimeters are large, bulky, and difficult-to-use, Breezing streamlines indirect calorimetry – so it’s simple, mobile, and effective. 

All in the sensor.

Our sensor cartridges are pre-calibrated, ensuring optimal performance. For the utmost accuracy, each cartridge is designed for one REEding and can be disposed after use.

Portable.

Anywhere you go, anywhere you want. Breezing syncs to your smartphone or tablet wirelessly, via Bluetooth. 

Easy-to-use.

1) Insert sensor cartridge. 2) Breathe. 3) That's it.

Where We Are

Breezing is a fully functional, working device. Through extensive testing, we've developed and optimized Breezing's state-of-the-art sensor technology, validating the results against gold standard reference methods.  We've also refined Breezing's Android app to achieve the best possible user experience, so that anyone, anywhere, can use Breezing and get accurate results. 
 

What's Next 

Our goal is to make Breezing available for everyone. And to do that, we need your help. We’re looking for funds to bring Breezing into mass production and to further develop the app for all mobile platforms. 

1. At this time, we've established manufacturing and quality control procedures for the Breezing hardware and sensor cartridges with our manufacturer. We need to prove to the manufacturer there is demand, so we can start large-scale production.

 


2. Breezing is Android-ready, and the next step for us is the iPhone/iPad. Whether it's Android or iOS, we want to make sure that Breezing works seamlessly on all devices.

                                          
 
Over the course of the campaign, we’ve received some great feedback. One question that’s been asked a lot: Why isn’t there an iPhone app for Breezing?
 
To our iPhone users, we deeply apologize.
 
We are 100% committed to creating the iOS version for iPhone/iPad – but we need your help to get there.
 
That’s why we’ve added a new perk: B is for Apple. The funds from B is for Apple are specifically earmarked for Breezing’s iPhone/iPad app development. When you contribute $25, you’ll be directly aiding our efforts to develop the Breezing app for iOS. In addition, you’ll receive the Advance Download of the Breezing Demo App for iPhone/iPad as soon as it’s released.  
 
We know how important it is to have the Breezing app available on all platforms. Your support will help us reach that goal. 

What We're Offering

$1.99:
Advance Download of the Breezing App for Android (demo mode). Released to you before anyone else.

$25:
B is for Apple. Advance Download of the Breezing App for iPhone/iPad (demo mode). You want an iPhone/iPad app for Breezing. Well, we do, too. Together, we can make this happen.

$50:
BPA-free Stainless Steel Limited Edition Water Bottle. Studies have shown drinking water boosts your metabolism. So, drink up.

$210:
Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 with Pre-installed Breezing Demo App. An Android-powered tablet with the Breezing demo app already installed for you.After thoroughly researching the tablets in the market, we've decided to offer our Breezing demo app with the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 (8GB). This tablet is the #1 bestseller on Amazon, has consistently received rave reviews, and is powered by the latest Android 4.1, Jelly Bean. (More details here: http://www.samsung.com/us/mobile/galaxy-tab/GT-P3113TSYXAR-specs)

$250:
Full Breezing Device with 10 Sensor Cartridges, and Breezing App for Android. Be a part of our exclusive first-generation of users.

$450:
Full Breezing Device with 10 Sensor Cartridges, plus Android-Powered Tablet with Pre-installed Breezing App. You can have it all.

All of our early adopters will get complete technical support with their Breezing device. We will also continue to supply Breezing cartridges beyond what's included in the perk (see FAQs for pricing information).

Here's a summary:

 NOTE: The Breezing App released this May is for Android. For non-Android users, we offer the Samsung Galaxy tablet (Tab 2.0 7.0, 8GB) with the app pre-installed.

Your Voice Counts: Referral Contest

Our Indiegogo campaign is more than a fundraising effort - it's the chance for us to hear your thoughts, your comments, your suggestions about Breezing. And on Indiegogo, the world's largest open source crowdfunding platform, we hope to hear from as many voices as possible.

You can support us by joining our efforts to spread the message. Simply share Breezing's Indiegogo campaign with anyone you think would be interested. At the end of the campaign, the person who has given us the most referrals will receive the VIP perk: a one-on-one Breezing REEding and consultation with the Breezing founders, including a Breezing device and lifetime support.

It's the least we can do.

Who We Are: Heart+Brains Behind Breezing

A passionate team of researchers, scientists, and engineers, Breezing is a spin-off company of Arizona State University. 

The Creators:

NJ Tao, Ph.D., President/Co-founder. NJ is a Professor of Electrical Engineering & Chemistry at Arizona State University (ASU), as well as Director of the Center for Bioelectronics and Biosensors at ASU Biodesign Institute. He has over 15 years of experience working with chemical sensors and is a key inventor of Breezing’s core technology.

In his spare time, NJ likes to hike, sketch, and sing karaoke. His favorite movie is Forrest Gump. 

Erica Forzani, Ph.D., Co-founder/VP of Product Development. Erica is an Assistant Professor of Chemical Engineering, Deputy Director of the Center for Bioelectronics and Biosensors at ASU Biodesign Institute, and the inventor of Breezing's sensing technology. Her current research interests lie in the realm of health applications, and environmental health and safety.

Erica loves bread, pastries, and dulce de leche. She has the special ability to fall asleep anywhere.

Francis Tsow, Ph.D., VP for R&D and Engineering. Francis is an Assistant Professor at ASU's Biodesign Institute and has developed new detection methods to preserve the lifetime of sensors. He has extensive experience in design and building miniaturized thermal and acoustic sensors. 

Francis enjoys Italian opera and has a fondness for chocolate - especially M&Ms.

Xiaojun Xian, Ph.D., VP of Production. Xiaojun has seven years of experience in chemical sensors, and holds 2 patents related to the chemical modification of sensor materials. His expertise serves as the link between Breezing's R&D team and the manufacturing partner for successful production. 

Xiaojun Xian was born in Xi'an. He is the proud father of a bouncing baby boy, who was born in Arizona.

Special Thanks: 

So many people have helped make this campaign possible. A shout-out to all our superstars: Anna Miller and her production crew (Ben and Eric), Adam Mann, Barbara Ainsworth, Chris MacGriff, David Jackemeyer, and Jessica Nichols.

Thank you so much!

 

FAQs

How much do the sensor cartridges cost?

Each sensor cartridge is $3-5, depending on the quantity ordered. This price reflects the considerable amount of research and labor that goes into every cartridge. To maintain the highest standards of quality, our sensor cartridges undergo rigorous inspection and testing, and are produced here, in the United States.

How does Breezing compare to current indirect calorimetry tests? 

Each additional Breezing measurement is $3-5 (cost of sensor cartridge), while current indirect calorimetry tests are upwards of $40, performed at a facility or clinic.

How frequently should I use Breezing?

Metabolism is closely linked to many factors, such as your intrinsic physiology, your age, and your lifestyle (e.g., diet and exercise). Monitoring metabolism has multiple benefits, but how frequently you should measure metabolism depends on your goal.

If you are a healthy individual that just wants to maintain and monitor your health, once a week may be sufficient.

If you want to adopt a new exercise or metabolism-boosting routine, 4-5 measurements throughout the day may be useful to determine the effects of that routine.

If you were diagnosed with a thyroid disorder and need to start treatment, your metabolism will change with your hormone levels and thyroid gland activity. You may want to consult with your doctors about the frequency of REEding measurements.

If you are a body builder, your metabolism increases with increases in muscle mass, and 1-2 measurements per week may help your training.

Can cartridges be re-used?

Each sensor cartridge is designed for one time use only.

Can my mouthpiece be re-used?

You can re-use your mouthpiece after cleaning.

How long does each REEding measurement take?

Each REEding measurement typically takes between 1 - 1.5 minutes.

 

Tech Specs

Everything you ever wanted to know - and more.

Product Name Breezing™
Principle Indirect calorimetry* (Measurement of oxygen consumption rate and carbon dioxide production rate)
Measurements
Parameters Resting Metabolic Rate (RMR) or Resting Energy Expenditure (REE)Respiratory Quotient (RQ, Energy source, e.g. carbohydrates, fat, etc.)
Resolution / Unit 10 kCal/day for REE, 0.01 for RQ
Measurement time < 2 min.
Operating environment
Temperature range 59 to 91 oF (10 to 33 oC)
Elevation range 0 to 10,000 feet (0 to 3040 meters)
RH Range < 20 to 88%
Wireless Communication
Wireless Type Bluetooth
Carrier Frequencies 2.40 to 2.48 GHz
Max Power 2.5 mW
Antenna Omnidirectional
Distance Up to 33 feet (10 meters)
Operating Specifications
Power Input 7.4 V - 680 mAh
Battery Type Lithium ion polymer
Operating Time > 50 times
Data Storage External device with Breezing App (phone or tablet)
Size and Weight
Weight 6.0 oz. (170 g)
Dimensions 1.8 in ×2.1 in ×4.8in  (4.7 cm × 5.4 cm × 12.3 cm)
 Compatibility
Android Android 2.2 or higher (smartphones example: HTC EVO, Samsung Galaxy SIII, Samsung Note II, etc.)  
Others
Warranty 1 year limited
Included Accessories Mouthpiece (reusable) and sensor cartridges (1 time use)

* Recommended and Preferred Method by American Dietetic Association (H. M. Seagle, G. W. Strain, A. Makris, and R. S. Reeves, "Position of the American Dietetic Association: Weight Management," Journal Of The American Dietetic Association, vol. 109, pp. 330-346, 2009).

story:
(ALL PLEDGE PICTURES ARE ON THE GALLERY TAB ABOVE)

Buy A Shirt

Give A Shirt

FOR EVERY SHIRT PURCHASED A SHIRT IS GIVEN TO SOMEONE IN NEED

PIECE FOR PEACE

1. High Quality & Collection

2. 100% Made in America - SUPPORTS USA ECONOMY

3. THE MOST IMPORTANT YOU ARE GIVING BACK TO COMMUNITIES IN NEED

We are now expanding to communities around the world that are in need, Imagine wearing the same clothes for weeks on end. Not being able to wash them in clean water or being able to change your clothes when you need to... Where here to change that. Its simple For Every Shirt Purchased A Shirt Is Given To Someone In Need. We are with a number of charities that are working with us to give clothing to people in need all over the world.  

Its been an amazing journey so far this year in all that we have accomplished. Where we are is having 15 people onboard and ready to Design/Make/Sale/Promote/Change Peoples Lives For Ever &To Make This KickStarter A Success.

How We Give Back

At N.I we are committed to creating the biggest impact possible with the clothing that we give to improve and increase health benefits. We have been launched sense January of 2012 and so far we have given over 1,ooo shirts to people in need across the united states. Thousands of people do not have access to proper clothing to help keep their bodies protected. Toxins, bacteria and viruses are more easily spread without proper and clean clothing, Clothing is one of our most basic needs. It ranks among air, food, water, and shelter. . in cases of extreme poverty, clothing is often one of the first needs to be ignored, In such circumstances, daily necessities like food and water take top priority. Clothing, which can be reworn, therefore is reworn. Day after day. After day... after day…. We could not do it with out our partnerships with humanitarian organizations worldwide that have deep experience and a long-term presence in the countries and communities they serve. Together, we find different communities that will benefit the most clean clothing due to economic, educational & health needs, and where local businesses in there community will not be negatively affected. The Funding is going to get out staff to Africa and to be able to bring as many shirts as possible to give to people in need. We Have all the give a way shirts ready we just need the funds to travel to africa safely and to film a video of all there happy faces for you. 

NOTHINGS IMPOSSIBLE

At N.I we choose to live are life's as NOTHINGS IMPOSSIBLE. Its about chasing your Dreams and knowing you can accomplish anything you set your heart and mind to. N.I stands together as ONE, and we are committed to make every person feel equal, loved and bring unity throughout the world. We devote ourselves to be part of something bigger which is to heal, lift and inspire humanity’s consciousness. Together we share the opportunity to provide a deserving person a new shirt and our reward is to experience the gratitude and the emotions of each and every recipient. Our goal is to reach people far and wide with our message that we all deserve to be the best life has to offer.

The Product

Our collection provides a high quality selection of clothing & accessories that not only look good but feel good. They have exclusive N.I  Piece for Peace Labels, and you know from the choice of your shirt, outerwear or accessory you know that someone in need will receive a piece of clean clothing thanks to you. 

 (ALL PLEDGE PICTURES ARE ON THE GALLERY TAB ABOVE)

Stay updated with us on our website to see the changes you have assisted us in making by supporting us with a pledge. We will be posting a video early next year to show the changes in peoples lives we have all made.

Thank you,

Sincerely

N.I 
The Piece For Peace Project

(ALL PLEDGE PICTURES ARE ON THE GALLERY TAB ABOVE)

 

When Pledging, Please put in the note the style of shirt or outerwear you would like also with your size. 

Thank you,

Sincerely

N.I 
The Piece For Peace Project

story:
Are you ready for some love in your pants once again?

We’re back! …with a little help from you.

The 90’s lounge pant loved by millions of Canadians.

Same adjustable waist belt.

Same long lasting fabric that gets softer with every wash.

Still 100% Made in Canada!

A little history…

The Modrobes pant was created in 1996 by Steven Sal Debus as a project for a business course.

Steven wanted a super simple, super comfortable and adjustable lounge pant that you could eat/drink/study and sleep in...

So he and and a merry crew traveled around to universities, colleges, events and concerts all over Canada, and even the USA sometimes, selling their unique comfort clothing along the way.

Then the brand exploded in popularity in the late 90’s and every cool kid in Canada seemed to own a pair of the funky pants. The Modrobes “I want you in my pants” stickers seemed to be everywhere too. The young company exploded in popularity, opening stores and selling across North America...too big it seemed...

Millions of pairs of pants were sold!

After selling over 2 million pairs of pants and with pressure to make garments in China the company shut down and Steve moved to the mountains of British Columbia.

After 25 years it may be time for the world to experience Modrobes once again.

What We Need:

We need to make 200 pants to make this project happen. That is 200 * $50 equals $10,000.

What You Get:

You will get the pants, either the original or fleece, or both pants.

Modrobes was known for having wonderful colors. The more pants we sell in the campaign the more colors will be available.

Why would you want these pants?

Well, if you are 90's kid then you already know why..baggy, adjustable, loungey fun pants with cool colors and 90's nostalgia; every time you put them on you'll travel back in time to when the internet was a baby, Y2K was the scariest issue and cell phones didn't have cameras...plus, the music was awesome!!

If you are not a 90's kid then you are going to get a super simple, adjustable and comfortable pair of "made in Canada bum around" lounge pants that will last about 25 years and get softer every time you wash them. Modrobes pants were made with love and we wanted everyone to have a sense of value and belongingness. If you wore our pants we considered you part of our big family. As part of our values we made our garments in Canada so you are also supporting your family, friends and neighbors and not some foreign sweat shop.

Note: If this is your first pair of Modrobes lounge pants they will actually feel a little crispy when you first get them because they are made of a blend of 65/35 poly/cotton. Like a good old school pair of jeans after you wash them a few times they will start to soften nicely into your body...and then 20 years from now you will be hanging out comfortably and someone will say.."Hey, are those modrobes?"..and you'll be like..."damn right they are"...and then you'll feel a warm wave of love wash over your entire body...and only then will we have accomplished our mission.

Perks/Rewards/Styles: (you choose your color, size and style at the end of the campaign)

Note: If you buy the 2 Pack or more you can choose either the Lounge or Fleece for any or all of your pants...and the shipping cost will be lower..yes..you guessed it..savings!

The belt buckle adjustment:

Modrobes is known for the easy adjustment belt and buckle. Why? It adjusts every time to your waist..whether that grows or shrinks you will always get the perfect, snug fit.

The Lounge Pant: made from industrial strength, lightweight poly/cotton poplin.

Colors: We are offering 4 colors in this pant and we will be adding an additional color for every hundred pairs we sell...and we can keep adding more and more colors....!

Sizing:

The Fleece Lounge Pant: made from the nicest open weave polar fleece we can find.

Colors: We are offering 4 colors in this pant and we will be adding an additional color for every hundred pairs we sell...and we can keep adding more and more colors....!

Sizing:

The Impact:

Judging from the feedback and facebook posts the impact of bringing Modrobes back will be an increase of happiness for a lot of people. That's a good reason to do anything. So  If this campaign is successful Steve may actually start up Modrobes again and make more styles. Not sure tho...he's pretty lazy and old these days...but he has a soft spot for Modrobes fans..and he really does still love making people happy by creating comfy clothing.

Risks & Challenges

The only real challenge is still trying make garments in Canada for an affordable price. But the founder has been making clothing now for over 35 years. He has found a small manufacturer and fabric suppliers to make the pants and he is sampling them now. He has a lengthy career making garments and delivering on crowdfunding campaigns so you can be 1000% sure you will get your pants. Modrobes was like his baby so he does not want to disappoint anyone. Maybe he will even make stickers again..

Returns: If you don't like the pants after a few test lounges please either return to us(no prob.) or give them to someone who will appreciate them. Every Modrobes pant needs a loving pair of legs and a crotch where they can thrive and spread good will.

Shipping: Sorry, shipping across Canada is not what we would consider cheap. Canada Post is our only option and we are actually charging a little less than they charge us.

**Oh, If you want to save money on the shipping just double up with a friend, buy more and save on the pant and shipping cost.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign with anyone who grew up in the 90's and tell those that didn't grow up then what they missed...and how they can get in on it before it's too late.

And thank you...it's been one of the greatest joys of my life to experience the love for Modrobes then and now.

Sincerely,

Steven Sal Debus

story:
Short Summary

My name is Joey and I'm a business administration student at HEC Montréal. Over the past few years, I've worked as a designer and manufacturing agent. Since I had a good relationship with a textile printer in Mexico, I decided to create a small street wear line by printing my friends' artwork on the fabric I was using to make the samples. I'm hoping to grow a community of artists and offer them the opportunity to create clothing and accessories with their artwork and give them access to an online platform where their products can be purchased. This will allow them to focus on creation without having to worry about production, sales, distribution, etc. 

What We Need & What You Get

To get decent prices with the textile printer, we need to order bigger quantities of fabric. We also need the funds to ship the fabric to Montreal, cover pattern making and production. This is why we need your help to raise $15,000 in order to start the 1st production. In return, you'll get to pick the items of your choice from our lookbook, before they become available for purchase on our website, at 20 to 40% off. You'll also get a discount on your next order on our online store and support talented artists.  

How to place an order

Everything we make is unisex, except for leggings (I suppose this is debatable). At this time, we only use 100% polyester fabrics, except for the backpack. Just select the products and print of your choice from the lists below and make sure to indicate them in your order. If you want to add individual items to your order, just add the appropriate amount (as shown in the perks list on the right) and specify it in your order. We couldn't make one sample in each print, so the photos below are just to guide you in the selection of the cut and show what the prints look like.

Here are your options of products:

  • T-shirt: standard (small or medium)
  • T-shirt: low cut (one size fits all)
  • T-shirt: oversized (one size fits all)
  • Leggings (small, medium or large)
  • Hoodies (one size fits all)
  • Low crotch sweatpants (one size: fits most: xs / s / m)
  • Tote bags (small or big)
  • Clear vinyl & black leather backpack (no prints for this item)

And your options for prints:

  • mateom-1
  • mateom-2
  • Vanya purple
  • Vanya orange
  • Vanya pink
  • Vanya green
  • Vanya blue
  • GODMAGIC
  • A137-1
  • A137-2
  • A137-3
  • Emilie
  • Claudine

The Impact

By backing this project, you'll help us get started with our first production and hopefully allow us to offer new products such as sneakers, jewelry and baseball caps. Our collaborators will also be able to earn some money by creating prints with us, which could lead to more exciting collaborations!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign with your friends! We are on Facebook, Twitter and Tumblr. Repost our photos and updates on Facebook, tag us in your posts etc...

  

Everyone who backs the campaign is eligible for our referral program. Here's how it works:

  • Get 6 friends to back the campaign to get a FREE tote bag (small)
  • Get 10 friends to back the campaign to get a FREE t-shirt or pair of leggings
  • Get 20 friends to back the campaign to get a FREE hoodie or pair of sweat pants

Make sure you're logged into your Indiegogo account when using any of the Share Tools on this campaign to save your referrals. You can also copy and paste the campaign URL displaying in your browser's address bar, as long as you're copying the URL that displays when you are logged into your Indiegogo account.

If you don't have an account on Indiegogo, you can still have your referrals tracked on the campaign's referrals tab once you've contributed to this campaign. You will be presented with a special URL immediately after contributing (on the completed contribution landing page, under "Spread the word!") that you can copy and share with your network.

story:
Who I Am - A Chinese Calligraphy Lover

I am Winfred Hung from Hong Kong. My hobby is Chinese Calligraphy which I have learned for more than 10 years. I have participated in several Chinese Calligraphy Exhibitions and have been teaching Calligraphy to secondary school and university students. In recent years, I specialize in Ancient Chinese characters. I am amazed by the beautiful pictogram and the interesting stories behind them.

Everyone has a dream they want to pursue. As a fresh graduate, instead of finding an office job, I am making every effort to achieve my dream: to promote Ancient Chinese characters and Calligraphy to people from all over the world. And the outcome is Draword.

 

What It Is - A Pioneer to Revitalize Ancient Chinese characters

Draword's business model is simple: Design pattern, manufacture T-shirt, set up online store and sell. What makes Draword different is the theme. Draword is probably the first design shop to adopt Ancient Chinese characters as its theme. Ancient Chinese characters are a heritage left by ancestors showing their imagination and wisdom, but sometimes they are difficult to understand. Therefore, the purpose of Draword is to facilitate our understanding of them. Let's look at the examples below.

 

The Chinese character below means "think".

             

Beautiful? But it is almost impossible to understand how this character represents "think"... Now let's look at the ancient version of it.

                                    

This one may be interesting, but we still need a key to disclose the secret......

 

 

                    

Here it is! By looking at the designed Cartoon character, now we know the character "思" is divided into two parts: head (and brain) and heart (with 3 valves) . That means when we make decisions, we need rational thinking while considering others' feelings. Please see the T-shirt design below:

        

The front side shows the designed Cartoon character and meaning and the back side displays the original styles of the character. The QR code printed at the corner links to Draword's Facebook fan page where a detailed explanation of the character is provided.

Wearing the T-shirt equals to having a story to tell. Customers are encouraged to share the message of the T-shirt to their friends. The ultimate goal of the design as well as Draword is to let more and more people appreciate the interesting stories behind the Chinese characters.

 

Right now Draword is going to produce its first series of 3 T-shirts.

 

 No.1

 

No.2

No.3

 

Color: White, Gray

Sizes offered:

Size Shoulder length Chest circumference Sleeve length Height
2XS 38cm 86cm 18cm 63.5cm
XS 41cm 91cm 18cm 66cm
S 43cm 97cm 20cm 68.5cm
M 46cm 102cm 22cm 71cm
L 48cm 107cm 23cm 73.5cm
XL 51cm 112cm 23cm 76cm
2XL 53cm 117cm 24cm 79cm
3XL 56cm 122cm 25cm 81cm

 


As for the first T-shirt Boneman, when you look at the explanation of the character below, you might feel like you are having a biology lesson:

Then how about the theme of the last design? Take a guess! The first one who comes up with the correct answer will get that T-shirt for FREE after the campaign!

 

What I need - $ and Support!

I need to raise USD1300 to cover the following costs:

  • The largest portion of funding will go towards T-shirt manufacturing cost;
  • Indiegogo process fee and overseas wire cost;
  • Delivering cost of the perks.

So I am turning to our strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, I am offering stylish Ancient Chinese character T-shirt and Calligraphy work. Your contribution will help me produce the first series of products, and further, it will help promote Ancient Chinese characters and Calligraphy to people from all over the world.

 

What You Get - Unique Perks

$5 - Thank you letter

Contribute $5 and you will receive this traditional Chinese style thank you letter that you probably have never received before.

                                 

Left: Envelope  Right: Tang poem  Bottom: Tang Poem (English translation)

The envelope is in traditional Chinese style and all the contents are written in Calligraphy. The name of the addressee will be your Chinese-translated name.

The letter will also be included if you order T-shirt(s) or Calligraphy work.

                        

Want to have a beautiful Chinese Calligraphy? This is your chance!

 

$30(the delivery cost is included) - T-shirt X1

$50(the delivery cost is included) - T-shirt X2

$70(the delivery cost is included) - T-shirt X3

Please refer to the designs above.

 

$100 - Chinese Calligraphy Work (mounted) 74''X19''

                        

The end product will be similar to the one on the left. As for the script, you can choose either Regular Script (left) or Ancient Script (right)

You can provide me the sentence(s) you want me to write. Otherwise, the content will be a Tang Poem. Even if you do not know Chinese, it is ok; you can send me the English one and I will translate it into Chinese.

 

$160 - All in ONE (Thank you letter + 3 T-shirts + Calligraphy work)

 

What Happened If I Fail to Meet the Goal - Dream still Goes On

My dream will not stop if the goal cannot be met. I will pay for the manufacturing cost from my wallet(though it is poorly thin). Therefore, as long as there is one person making a contribution for the T-shirt, the T-shirt will be delivered. Of course, your support is definitely not only for me, but also for the spread of Ancient Chinese characters and Calligraphy to everyone who is interested in it.

 

Other Ways You Can Help - Share!

Everyone can become critical when someone else asks them to take money out from their own pocket, but you can support me in other ways too. Other than financial support, any support is appreciated! If you like this idea, please share with your friends and family, on Facebook, Twitter and Indiegogo sharing tools!

 

FAQ

1. What is your academic reference on the explanation of the Ancient Chinese characters?

Draword makes cross-reference from published books and online resources to ensure every designed Cartoon character is based on the most reliable explanation. Other versions of the etymology will be mentioned on the Facebook fan page.

2. Is your business sustainable?

Yes. There are thousands of Chinese characters which can be turned into designs for t-shirts. Currently, I have drafted more than 20 designs. In the long run, Draword will expand its production to a variety of products including greeting cards, cups, phone cases and so on.

3. What are the criteria when you design the Cartoon characters?

The cartoon characters make references to the structure and shape of the ancient characters. Draword does not aim to copy the character, but to highlight the main features of the character in an interesting way.

 

Contact Me

Thank you to all of you who are still reading this campaign. It is not easy to read through the lengthy text. If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions, please email me at hungmmll@gmail.com.
story_txt:
Who I Am - A Chinese Calligraphy Lover

I am Winfred Hung from Hong Kong. My hobby is Chinese Calligraphy which I have learned for more than 10 years. I have participated in several Chinese Calligraphy Exhibitions and have been teaching Calligraphy to secondary school and university students. In recent years, I specialize in Ancient Chinese characters. I am amazed by the beautiful pictogram and the interesting stories behind them.
Everyone has a dream they want to pursue. As a fresh graduate, instead of finding an office job, I am making every effort to achieve my dream: to promote Ancient Chinese characters and Calligraphy to people from all over the world. And the outcome is Draword.
 
What It Is - A Pioneer to Revitalize Ancient Chinese characters
Draword's business model is simple: Design pattern, manufacture T-shirt, set up online store and sell. What makes Draword different is the theme. Draword is probably the first design shop to adopt Ancient Chinese characters as its theme. Ancient Chinese characters are a heritage left by ancestors showing their imagination and wisdom, but sometimes they are difficult to understand. Therefore, the purpose of Draword is to facilitate our understanding of them. Let's look at the examples below.
 
The Chinese character below means "think".
              
Beautiful? But it is almost impossible to understand how this character represents "think"... Now let's look at the ancient version of it.
                                     
This one may be interesting, but we still need a key to disclose the secret......
 
 
                     
Here it is! By looking at the designed Cartoon character, now we know the character "思" is divided into two parts: head (and brain) and heart (with 3 valves) . That means when we make decisions, we need rational thinking while considering others' feelings. Please see the T-shirt design below:
         
The front side shows the designed Cartoon character and meaning and the back side displays the original styles of the character. The QR code printed at the corner links to Draword's Facebook fan page where a detailed explanation of the character is provided.
Wearing the T-shirt equals to having a story to tell. Customers are encouraged to share the message of the T-shirt to their friends. The ultimate goal of the design as well as Draword is to let more and more people appreciate the interesting stories behind the Chinese characters.
 
Right now Draword is going to produce its first series of 3 T-shirts.

No.2

No.3
 
Color: White, Gray
Sizes offered:

As for the first T-shirt Boneman, when you look at the explanation of the character below, you might feel like you are having a biology lesson:

Then how about the theme of the last design? Take a guess! The first one who comes up with the correct answer will get that T-shirt for FREE after the campaign!
 
What I need - $ and Support!
I need to raise USD1300 to cover the following costs:

The largest portion of funding will go towards T-shirt manufacturing cost;
Indiegogo process fee and overseas wire cost;
Delivering cost of the perks.

So I am turning to our strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, I am offering stylish Ancient Chinese character T-shirt and Calligraphy work. Your contribution will help me produce the first series of products, and further, it will help promote Ancient Chinese characters and Calligraphy to people from all over the world.

story:
Manuel's New Vision Project

Manuel is embarking on an exciting project to revitalize American Fashion by developing a new line of "one of a kind" products that will feature traditional Manuel flair and quality at an affordable price. Setting out to raise $250,000 in new capital for this project and its operations, Manuel will also be contributing to his beloved Music City by creating employment opportunities in the community and introducing his legendary design techniques to the next generation of fashion designers.

The New Vision

After decades of dressing the biggest names from country music, ock and roll to Hollywood legends and heads of state, Manuel is launching a new line of affordable high quality "one of a kind" pieces with the same superior craftsmanship associated with the Manuel brand.

Manuel's vision is to use the early 20th century artisan and craftsman techniques with 21st century technology to achieve lower price points with Manuel quality made in America.  You can learn more about Manuel's new vision by checking out the video in the UPDATES TAB.

Who is Manuel?

Manuel's original designs have become the trademark of true American style. Manuel was responsible for making Johnny Cash the "Man in Black." He crafted Elvis’ signature gold lamé suit. He fashioned the garments Bob Dylan wore when performing for the Pope. He has dressed all four generations of Hank Williams. And, if this is not enough to bring him a legendary status in music history, you can thank him for both The Rolling Stones and The Grateful Dead’s notorious insignias. But it doesn’t stop here: presidents, athletes, dancers, artists and movie stars have also donned his glittering couture. He has created wardrobes for over 90 movies and 13 television shows.  You can learn more about Manuel by visiting http://manuelcouture.com or clicking on the Media Gallery Tab above to watch more videos about Manuel.

Expect The Unexpected!

The fresh "New Vision" line will create a new chapter in American design by fusing elements of traditional American western design with new innovative design elements.

"New Vision" will include shirts, pants, dresses, skirts, jackets, boots, leather items and accessories (view some of Manuel's one of a kind merchandise by clicking on the Media Gallery Tab above). 

Do not expect to see the elaborate, and at times, over-the-top embroidery and rhinestone designs that Manuel is known for around the world. This is a "New Vision."

The Campaign 

Manuel needs to raise a minimum of $250,000 to: 

Purchase state-of-the-art equipment including screen printing, CAD design, embroidery, sewing and boot making equipment

Establish an artisan co-operative that will create the new clothing designs, boots and accessories under Manuel's direction

Restructure business operations to support his new vision

Produce first run items and promote them for sale in Manuel's store, retail establishments and online. 

The project plan projects that these new items will start in production in about 4-6 months and will be available for retail sale in about 5-8 months after the funds are collected.

How Can I Contribute?

As a contributor to the campaign you will receive Manuel’s eternal gratitude and rewards for your donations such as t-shirts, clothing from the new line, accessories and special access to VIP events.  Please check out our list of  exciting perks to the right.  Also, view some of Manuel's one of a kind merchandise by clicking on the Media Gallery Tab above.  Some items are still in the design stages and, as the campaign progresses, we will update you with more details.

If you can't donate, please share Manuel’s "New Vision" campaign with your friends via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, your blog, and by any other communication means.

Let's bring this "New Vision" campaign to light and preserve Manuel’s legacy for years to come!

story:
Contact us puppybritches@gmail.com with any questions.

 

Some History

Hey everyone! My name is Miss Tan, owner/creator of Miss Tan Designs and with my Mom, Miss Betty, we are the creators of Puppy Britches. Creativity has always been a part of my family. My Mom has been a seamstress all of her life. When she was younger, she often made clothes without even using a sewing pattern. For years, I hid my creativity skills because I was told it would never get me anywhere. So in my late 20s, I started drawing and creating and haven't been able to stop. We are inspired by the things around us. Of course, Max, our dog, is one of our greatest. We didn't have money to buy a cone, when he was cut by the groomer, so my Mom made him some pants. Puppy Britches was born. With both of our talents, we want to be able give pet owners fashionable alternatives to the cone.

What is Puppy Britches?

Puppy Britches was created to give pet owners an alternative to the cone. Our dog, like many others, loves to sniff the ground. If he needs to wear a cone for any reason, it inhibits his ability to do everything. When wearing pants, he does not mess with his injury and plus, it allows him to be him. For us, we are adding a little bit of fashion to it with creative patterns and designs.

We are handmade business. Puppy Britches is in its beginning startup phase. We have ideas and passion just not enough funds to do it. 

Your contributions towards Puppy Britches will help us down the right path from handmade hobby to a small business in the making.

Why take part?

All funding towards Puppy Britches is going toward us buying the supplies we need to get this line off the ground. My Mom being a professional sewer has worked with some great machines. Her mother's old antique machine is just not up-to-date. I have tons of patterns that I want to bring to life. We need money to get custom fabric. We need a printer that will help us in our designs, shipping, and label process. All other funds is for marketing and any other supplies we may need to help our process go faster. 

Your Impact

Puppy Britches is ready to go. Your contribution will get us one step closer to listing our first products. We currently are doing pants, but we want to expand our line to shirts, leg warmers, suspenders, etc. One day, we want our pet parents to dress just like there wonderful companions. 

We already have our prototype and model.

Additional Assistance

All support we receive is appreciated. Please forward and share this with as many people as you can! Let's make Puppy Britches the hottest thing in dog apparel. 

Click here to visit our websites: 

http://www.PuppyBritches.com

http://www.MissTanDesigns.com

 

Contribute NOW!!!

 

Thank you for your generosity and support!

story:
Checkout our latest Campaign!


-------

-

https://www.indiegogo.com:443/projects/1789108/x/10209824?secret_perk_token=1a78e273


---------

The latest from the DREAM project the NIGHTMARE is available Oct. 31!

Exclusive prerelease available now as a perk along with the DayDream!!


Latest pictures:

the brushed metal silver and polished blue are the confirmed production color/finish options.



----------

ABOUT THE PROJECT:

Hello!

My name is Ben McPhee and I work for YoYoFactory®.

We started making yoyos in 2003 and now make a wide range of fine yoyos (even if I do say so myself).

We started making yoyos because we love yoyos. We still do. We make crazy projects every now and then. YoYoFactory® made the first yoyo to spin for over 20 minutes. We helped make the biggest functioning yoyo in the world and then made the smallest functioning modern performance yoyo. (Shhh… we even have a design with an electro-pulse driven motor for even longer spins.)

Our objective today isn't so ambitious and its purely selfish. We want fresh new titanium yo-yos to play with.

That's it. It's simple. Titanium yoyos are pretty cool. Titanium is very strong, allowing us to cut it thinner and achieve extreme weight distribution not possible in more common materials. Its also cool to touch and sounds AMAZING. We have made titanium yoyos before but now we want to make a full-sized competition-ready titanium yoyo. This has never been done on any significant scale.

We are seeking to raise $20,000. Because this will allow us to order enough to make it affordable to share it with you guys, our friends, and anyone else who like us, wants a new full sized titanium yoyo.

You want one too? GREAT!

Let's do this! 

Here is the design.


As drawn, its 65.75gm 56mm in diameter, 43mm wide. In production there might be some minor changes but we will report everything here and to our supporters. The theory with the design is to take advantage of the properties of titanium as a material to deliver maximum performance. Titanium can be machined THIN because it is STRONG so we did that, allowing us to load up the rims. INERTIA in the rims delivers long stable spins. This will have MORE.

The hardware (other bits in the yoyo) is all standard issue. We will ship with probably a nice CTX bearing, standard CBC large bearing pads, stainless steel axle. While a titanium axle would be nice and are readily available it may bond to the body, so dis-similar metals are needed.


The timeline starts from when we reach the goal.

Day 14 later we approve/Revise design based off PROTOTYPES. If you order a prototype, you will be playing with one now also. We can make revisions and this is the only real way delivery time can be delayed, with multiple prototypes, but I don't want a yoyo that isn't amazing.

When the product is approved production begins and in 6 weeks, YoYos are born. 

Production will be done in CHINA. All supporters yoyo will be air freighted to the USA, where we will conduct a final inspection before shipping to YOU. We will offer a 14 day warranty on any defects too so if you aren't happy with our work, you won't be out of pocket.

You are still in? AWESOME!

You can have one for a super deal if you will support the project. The first 100 people willing to get on board can have one for $200. The retail for this yoyo will be $300 so you will be doing very well for yourself. We also will give you the chance to vote on the name and choose your color (silver or blue).

If 100 people are on board we hit the goal and production will begin!

Just in case 100 people aren't willing to jump, there are some other 'offers' to help get us over the line.

YoYoFactory -shirt $18



—————


-Ben

YoYoFactory


Also Check out the Facebook group created for this project

https://www.facebook.com/groups/titaniumdream/
